		<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Top Misconceptions about Web Development]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/top-misconceptions-about-web-development/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 07 Sep 2018 13:03:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=254</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In today's jiffy who is oblivion to word ‘Website'? Websites aren't just a stack of web pages on the web but now have become essential pieces of a jigsaw puzzle of a company's success.

If a site is used in a perfect way, it creates a mesmerizing picture of profits else, we all know what kind of chaos it can create. It has now become common in almost every business and non-business organization. From large multinational company to a sapling firm, each finds its online presence essential to create its domination.

More are the people, more are the thoughts. Various thoughts definitely lead to various misconceptions and myths. Think twice, aren’t you one of those people who have such myths?.

Well, don’t worry! Do not stress out. We are here to help. Here are Top 5 Misconceptions about Website Development which you need to uproot right now from your minds.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/easy.png" alt="Easy Banner">
<h2>1) Website Development is Everyone’s Cup of Tea</h2>
This point might disappoint your perception, but that’s it. It’s the reality! Website designing is not at all an easy task.

You might have seen various websites with basic looks. Your thoughts might have crossed the path of perception of its ease. But pacify yourself for these sites may not have got either&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/web-development-agency-in-india.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">good web designers</a></strong>&nbsp;or maybe it is the last resort after the tons of tries. A simple feature, a simple catch needs an ocean of efforts. Maybe not hundreds but considerable and countable working hours are required which could stand erect to both the expectations and company norms.
<h2>2) Website Done! Now Sit Back and Relax</h2>
If you have this misconception, then my dear, hear me out; for a website is never DONE. We all know how dynamic the business environment is. Web environment is even more rapidly changing. You open your eye the other day and see a new trend trending.

Hence, a site needs to be altered again and again in a quick span of time, either to make it survive the online competition or to mark the economic changes on the web.

Domination requires a change. Modify your sites and enter the competition of web domination.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/tide-of-visitors.png" alt="Tide of Visitors Banner">
<h2>3) I made the site here comes a tide of visitors</h2>
Okay! So, at last, you made a site. Congratulations. But how would people know about it? How would the world know that a person (you) who exists has launched a site? If you expect your site to go viral in a matter of a few days, then you are wrong.

You need to get aid from web marketers,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/top-five-website-optimization-techniques.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">keep on modifying your site</a></strong>&nbsp;according to latest preferences. Keep on adding the contents relating to the latest trends. Only then, after a good quantity of time, you should start expecting something.
<h2>4) Website Development doesn’t itch the pockets</h2>
Buying a domain might not cost much. But what about its development and design? What about its maintenance and alteration?

Believe me; they can really put a hole in your pockets if you do not keep a check. Make your website in such a way that it becomes your brand extension which may earn greater returns in the future.

No matter how costly the sites can be; but if you take it as an investment, it can really provide you the leads in coming times.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/time-to-chill.png" alt="Time to chill Banner">
<h2>5) My website earns me enough! It’s the time to Chill</h2>
Suppose you buy a car. It gives you great mileage. Won't you give it a service? Yes, you would. Same applies to the websites. We all know how dynamic the web platform is. The trends change within a flicker of a second. You need to pace up with the changing atmosphere. Else, there are many sites waiting to take over.

Your site needs a regular alteration else it might not work in new browsers or get obsolete. There is no sitting back in the game of web development. Grab your gears and start working.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/techies-infotech.jpg" alt="Time to chill Banner">
<h2>Techies Infotech</h2>
Techies Infotech offers services with clear transparency and serves you with a wide area of expansion with the decades of expertise. We provide website development services with a clear conscience. Our success lies in your development. Let us work together to bring a parallel increment in growth graph.]]></content:encoded>

2021, many experts believe that cryptocurrencies will continue to 
grow in popularity, and are likely to become more widely accepted 
as a means of payment. While some governments have tried to restrict or even ban certain cryptocurrencies, most of these efforts have been unsuccessful so far.

here to stay.]]></wp:comment_content>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to Manage Business’s Online Reputation]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-manage-businesss-online-reputation/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Sep 2018 13:46:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=269</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In today's jiffy, no one can't deny how important the web platform has become for business management. Almost every new business joins the global race on the web in the hope to reach the top. Some do succeed in achieving what they have thought of, but some have to pacify themselves with whatever they get.

Now imagine, in this race of reputation building, someone blocks your way. Someone tries to bring down your reputation, someone tries to argue with you in public. What would you do? How would you continue to the race of becoming a big entrepreneur? How would you silent these proclaimers? Yes, it is really difficult. But a pious goodwill and a strong backend may help fight for good of the firm and may aid in getting to the top.

Given beneath are some of the most valuable points to keep in mind while maintaining the online reputation, for this is the major factor which may decide the fate of your business.

<strong>Let’s get started.</strong>
<h2>1) An active presence on all the major sites</h2>
You are into the race; how would the world know? Announce your presence by being active on platforms like Twitter, Google+, and Facebook. If you are into a highly competitive ambiance, you may need other accounts too. To give eye feasting information, do not forget to get yourselves to Instagram and Pinterest. People would like a lot if you post some videos about your work. Best Video Production results could be gathered from YouTube and Vimeo should be there at your service.
<h2>2) Social Media is a Magnet Media</h2>
Along with the accounts on Twitter, Google+, and Facebook, you need to be proactive on other social media platforms too. Youth today is significantly active on these platforms where you can get good leads for your&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>social media marketing in India</strong></a>&nbsp;and abroad. Building a goodwill on these platforms gradually helps you get better ranks on Google, giving you a boost in the race. You can weigh you performance using many tools. Some of the most prominent are Klout and Kred.
<h2>3) Claim your brands and products like a pro</h2>
It is just like another naïve act if you have different products and brands beyond your company name and you are using the same site for everything.

You need to create different sites, web pages and social media platforms for getting it individual ranks. Use the best strategies for all the pages and sites.
<h2>4) Protect those who run the business</h2>
Every person associated with the business must have a strong social media presence. Keeping a low profile just makes the associated personnel more vulnerable to drive-by defamers.

People usually search business with the name of a person. If the respective person has a parallel profile, customers could easily be ported to the business site.
<h2>5) Authorship Applicable</h2>
The author is the one who works like the pen and ink for a website. The author should be plagiarism free and Google approved. Google can tag only an individual Google+ profile as an author. No company as a whole can become that. The author has penmanship of the site and should stay true and wise.
<h2>6)Blogging</h2>
Blogs are the hub of local SEO. If written carefully, Blogs can take the website to high Google ranks and hence can polish up your global image.

Not only that, blogs can also act as your personal courts. You can clarify any assertion made by mass through the blog where you can clean up the mess in one go.
<h2>7)Listen</h2>
Stick that to your mind, if a customer is complaining about something, there must be some drawback. And if there are regular negative reviews, you need to act as soon as you can.

There are some businesses which are dumb enough to not reply to the negatives and when the site starts reflecting the negative reviews, other potential customers too fly away.

It is better to have a patient word with the complainant and listen to his complaint. Act accordingly and win the trust.
<h2>8)Apologize</h2>
Following the previous point, if you create the chaos, own the damn thing like a boss. A kind and honest apology may help you diffuse the situation at the earliest.

Keep in mind that the apology should be genuine and not the wordy nonsense. And yes, do not forget to clear up the mess afterward unconditionally.
<h2>9)Step away from Online Arguments</h2>
These are easy to be stuck in. But remember, your replies could be seen by a million others too. If while replying, you get into a heating argument, knowing that you are right, you might end up saying and doing what you shouldn't. This might take away your potential clients as well.

The best way is to keep your calm and answer with the positivity and professionalism. You might not be right, but your professional answers may win the hearts.
<h2>10)Invest a bit more!</h2>
Building a reputation requires investment both in time and money. If you think that online presence is just a luxurious have-on; think again. You are definitely wrong here.

Online presence is now a must-have for every other business firm. And if you are doing for the luxury purpose, and with the amateurish deeds, this can take your site to dooms and oblivions.

You need to give proper time and capital for your online growth. If you do not have enough time, find some agency or company which can do it for you. (P.S. We do that)
<h2>11)Efficient SEO utilization</h2>
Search Engine optimization or SEO keywords play a big game to improve your go0ogle rankings and giving you a firm goodwill for your web growth. If you are not familiar with the term, give a search to the&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>best SEO company</strong></a>&nbsp;in your region. Their aid may mean a lot more than what you would have ever thought.

Techies Infotech is the best web development and&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>digital marketing agency in India</strong></a>&nbsp;offering a wide sector of services in the IT field. With years of successful experience, we are flying on cloud 9 along with the good clients and their happy results. Contact Techies Infotech and take your sites to great rankings and high reputations.]]></content:encoded>

Some do succeed in achieving what they have thought of, but some have to pacify themselves with whatever they get.<br \/><br \/>Now imagine, in this race of reputation building, someone blocks your way. Someone tries to bring down your reputation, someone tries to argue with you in public. What would you do? How would you continue to the race of becoming a big entrepreneur? How would you silent these proclaimers? Yes, it is really difficult. But a pious goodwill and a strong backend may help fight for good of the firm and may aid in getting to the top.<br \/><br \/>Given beneath are some of the most valuable points to keep in mind while maintaining the online reputation, for this is the major factor which may decide the fate of your business.<br \/><br \/><strong>Let\u2019s get started.<\/strong><\/p><h2>1) An active presence on all the major sites<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">You are into the race; how would the world know? Announce your presence by being active on platforms like Twitter, Google+, and Facebook. If you are into a highly competitive ambiance, you may need other accounts too. To give eye feasting information, do not forget to get yourselves to Instagram and Pinterest. People would like a lot if you post some videos about your work. Best Video Production results could be gathered from YouTube and Vimeo should be there at your service.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>2) Social Media is a Magnet Media<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Along with the accounts on Twitter, Google+, and Facebook, you need to be proactive on other social media platforms too. Youth today is significantly active on these platforms where you can get good leads for your\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>social media marketing in India<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0and abroad. Building a goodwill on these platforms gradually helps you get better ranks on Google, giving you a boost in the race. You can weigh you performance using many tools. Some of the most prominent are Klout and Kred.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>3) Claim your brands and products like a pro<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">It is just like another na\u00efve act if you have different products and brands beyond your company name and you are using the same site for everything.<br \/><br \/>You need to create different sites, web pages and social media platforms for getting it individual ranks. Use the best strategies for all the pages and sites.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>4) Protect those who run the business<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Every person associated with the business must have a strong social media presence. Keeping a low profile just makes the associated personnel more vulnerable to drive-by defamers.<br \/><br \/>People usually search business with the name of a person. If the respective person has a parallel profile, customers could easily be ported to the business site.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>5) Authorship Applicable<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">The author is the one who works like the pen and ink for a website. The author should be plagiarism free and Google approved. Google can tag only an individual Google+ profile as an author. No company as a whole can become that. The author has penmanship of the site and should stay true and wise.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>6)Blogging<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Blogs are the hub of local SEO. If written carefully, Blogs can take the website to high Google ranks and hence can polish up your global image.<br \/><br \/>Not only that, blogs can also act as your personal courts. You can clarify any assertion made by mass through the blog where you can clean up the mess in one go.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>7)Listen<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Stick that to your mind, if a customer is complaining about something, there must be some drawback. And if there are regular negative reviews, you need to act as soon as you can.<br \/><br \/>There are some businesses which are dumb enough to not reply to the negatives and when the site starts reflecting the negative reviews, other potential customers too fly away.<br \/><br \/>It is better to have a patient word with the complainant and listen to his complaint. Act accordingly and win the trust.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>8)Apologize<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Following the previous point, if you create the chaos, own the damn thing like a boss. A kind and honest apology may help you diffuse the situation at the earliest.<br \/><br \/>Keep in mind that the apology should be genuine and not the wordy nonsense. And yes, do not forget to clear up the mess afterward unconditionally.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>9)Step away from Online Arguments<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">These are easy to be stuck in. But remember, your replies could be seen by a million others too. If while replying, you get into a heating argument, knowing that you are right, you might end up saying and doing what you shouldn't. This might take away your potential clients as well.<br \/><br \/>The best way is to keep your calm and answer with the positivity and professionalism. You might not be right, but your professional answers may win the hearts.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>10)Invest a bit more!<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Building a reputation requires investment both in time and money. If you think that online presence is just a luxurious have-on; think again. You are definitely wrong here.<br \/><br \/>Online presence is now a must-have for every other business firm. And if you are doing for the luxury purpose, and with the amateurish deeds, this can take your site to dooms and oblivions.<br \/><br \/>You need to give proper time and capital for your online growth. If you do not have enough time, find some agency or company which can do it for you. (P.S. If you are not familiar with the term, give a search to the\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>best SEO company<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0in your region. 		<title><![CDATA[Importance of Videos Production For SEO]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 18 Oct 2018 14:49:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=314</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Web platform these days has become one of the most dynamic platforms of the galaxy. It has become such platform which changes within a blink of an eye. Hence it is very important that one stays updated with the pros and cons of the aspects of the web world.

SEO plays a major role in determining whether your website would fly or crawl in the online world.

There are many aspects which affect your SEO too. Among many, videos play a protagonist role. A good video can boost your&nbsp;<strong>SEO rankings</strong>; however, a bad video can make your ranks to ash.

Here are some of the reasons why Videos are important from the point of view of SEO Rankings.
<h2>1.Video content tend to generate more social signals</h2>
Videos, by their prime characteristics, tend to be more viral. They spread like a forest fire - covering each and everything.

For their this very nature, these are shared on social media sites like Facebook, Google+, LinkedIn etc. where their reach gets vast.

On such platforms, it gets likes, shares, hearts and +1’s. The thing with Google is that it translates these likes and all to calculate the performance of video, hence giving priority to top grossing videos; which is why videos prove to be beneficial for&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">search engine optimization.</a></strong>
<h2>2. Increasing conversion rates</h2>
When videos are embedded on a&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">website</a></strong>, they tend to arise more interest of the viewer. The interest bounces higher if the owner himself/ herself speaks for the company.

Videos make a close relativity of company with its viewers. Customer testimonials are great to attract new seekers. Such videos eventually increase the chances of lead conversion or even the close calls on each SEO click.

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.jpg" alt="YouTube – The Second Largest Global Search Engine">&nbsp;
<h2>3.YouTube – The Second Largest Global Search Engine</h2>
Google, obviously is the top search engine at the global level. But many aren't aware that YouTube ranks the second in the list.

With more than 100 hours of videos uploaded every minute, you can well imagine how far its reach is.

To add the cherry on the cake, SEO optimized videos earn a lot more traffic than usual and common videos.
<h2>4. Google ranks the YouTube videos on Google Search Engine</h2>
The biggest reason why Google ranks the YouTube videos is that Google owns YouTube. Hence just like Google algorithms, there is a series of complicated algorithms which Google uses to rank the YouTube videos and shows the most relevant one on the top. Using the keywords in videos could become a fortunate deal.
<h2>5. Transcription of YouTube video contents</h2>
YouTube transcribes your spoken script automatically. If your spoken content is optimized just as you optimize your content for website pages,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">blog posts</a></strong>, press releases, and articles, it would help your channel, website and video content by oceanic advantages. Video contents are must for every business marketing strategy.

Now the question arises that how to make videos good enough to hit the bull’s eye of video marketing? How to make the content that reaches a good number of people? And how to organize the matter in those videos?

Well! Here are some of the points which might come handy while planning a video for marketing purposes. So, grab your notepads and see the points.
<h4>1. Plan like a Pro</h4>
Well, this is the point which everyone would suggest. But almost all would have different versions of explanation. What I think is that planning is necessary to keep the track of your progress.

If you aren’t having a plan, then how are you going to measure your statistics? Weave a plan and then hold yourself accountable to it.
<h4>2. Show what you know</h4>
Allow me to tell you that on the broad categorization, the videos could be divided into three types namely Educational, Inspirational and Entertaining.

Know what your niche is and how much knowledge you have in that regard. Gather more information if need be and then come up with a great video which pacifies every query.
<h4>3. Start up your creativity</h4>
As now you have a plan and know what needs to be there to create a video, this is the right time to dive in the magma of creation.

Get it straight to head that every video you create would be better than the previous one. So, don’t sit back if you get the negativity on your initial videos.

You need to be brimming with expressions and should have good storytelling skills to bind your viewers to see the video until the end.
<h4>4. Scavenge for Matters</h4>
And here comes the best and most important part; The SEO Part! You might have heard of SEO optimization in a blog. If yes, then this is going to be oddly similar.

Well, the title of your video decides the fate of its rankings. If the relevant keywords are involved, it is going to be in limelight, but if not; then good luck shuffling through the pages on the web.

And for what purpose the description part is? Add on the keywords, just the relevant ones and then, sit back and relax.

But for all that, you need to have a good research of hot and trending tags, keywords and every other such stuff.
<h4>5. Connect yourself to Influencers</h4>
Just imagine! How cool it would be when some celebrity promotes your product or service. How impactful it would be when some of the sensations advertise your product!

Okay, get back to reality. You aren’t in 90’s where celebrity endorsement was an option only to the big brands. If you can’t afford the massive budget celebrities, tie up with the influencers.

These are the micro-celebrities having their loyal followings in thousands and millions.

They have a way with their followers and know how to leave an impact on people. Find the correct influencer, tie up with him and see your brand reach thousands of people at the same time.

<strong>Techies Infotech - Leading Digital Marketing and Video Production Company</strong>

People tend to find the videos more presentable and informing at a personal level. Even Google ranks the videos which favor its algorithms and are perfectly optimized.

Get to know what it takes to make the Google favorable videos. Contact Techies Infotech, The best web design and development, and&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/video-production.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">video production agency</a></strong>&nbsp;and explore a new horizon of opportunities and potential leads.]]></content:encoded>

The interest bounces higher if the owner himself\/ herself speaks for the company.<br \/><br \/>Videos make a close relativity of company with its viewers. Customer testimonials are great to attract new seekers. Such videos eventually increase the chances of lead conversion or even the close calls on each SEO click.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.jpg\" alt=\"YouTube \u2013 The Second Largest Global Search Engine\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>3.YouTube \u2013 The Second Largest Global Search Engine<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Google, obviously is the top search engine at the global level. Google ranks the YouTube videos on Google Search Engine<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">The biggest reason why Google ranks the YouTube videos is that Google owns YouTube. Hence just like Google algorithms, there is a series of complicated algorithms which Google uses to rank the YouTube videos and shows the most relevant one on the top. Using the keywords in videos could become a fortunate deal.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>5. Transcription of YouTube video contents<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">YouTube transcribes your spoken script automatically. If your spoken content is optimized just as you optimize your content for website pages,\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">blog posts<\/a><\/strong>, press releases, and articles, it would help your channel, website and video content by oceanic advantages. How to make the content that reaches a good number of people? And how to organize the matter in those videos?<br \/><br \/>Well! Here are some of the points which might come handy while planning a video for marketing purposes. So, grab your notepads and see the points.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>1. Plan like a Pro<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Well, this is the point which everyone would suggest. But almost all would have different versions of explanation. What I think is that planning is necessary to keep the track of your progress.<br \/><br \/>If you aren\u2019t having a plan, then how are you going to measure your statistics? Weave a plan and then hold yourself accountable to it.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>2. Show what you know<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Allow me to tell you that on the broad categorization, the videos could be divided into three types namely Educational, Inspirational and Entertaining.<br \/><br \/>Know what your niche is and how much knowledge you have in that regard. Gather more information if need be and then come up with a great video which pacifies every query.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>3. Start up your creativity<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">As now you have a plan and know what needs to be there to create a video, this is the right time to dive in the magma of creation.<br \/><br \/>Get it straight to head that every video you create would be better than the previous one. So, don\u2019t sit back if you get the negativity on your initial videos.<br \/><br \/>You need to be brimming with expressions and should have good storytelling skills to bind your viewers to see the video until the end.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>4. Scavenge for Matters<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">And here comes the best and most important part; The SEO Part! You might have heard of SEO optimization in a blog. If yes, then this is going to be oddly similar.<br \/><br \/>Well, the title of your video decides the fate of its rankings. If the relevant keywords are involved, it is going to be in limelight, but if not; then good luck shuffling through the pages on the web.<br \/><br \/>And for what purpose the description part is? Add on the keywords, just the relevant ones and then, sit back and relax.<br \/><br \/>But for all that, you need to have a good research of hot and trending tags, keywords and every other such stuff.<\/p><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>5. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Trends That Will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/trends-that-will-define-future-of-digital-marketing-in-2019/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Dec 2018 14:58:25 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=327</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[With the approaching of 2019, the&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>digital marketing</strong></a>&nbsp;platform too is getting evolved. Now, the digital marketing would not just be encompassing around SEO, Social Media, PPC, and Content Writing; but would also be giving a prestigious place to Artificial Intelligence and Visual Search.

There are many trends and strategies which are going to get merged in the sector of digital marketing by the year 2019. These trends and strategies are getting evolved in the current high-tech, internet-connected era and their needs have risen from the past many years. Entrepreneurs need to implement these strategies in the businesses if they wish to succeed in an ever dynamic environment of 2019.

Here is a list of Key Digital Marketing Trends for 2019.
<h2>Artificial Intelligence</h2>
<p align="justify">It is the prioritized need of tomorrow’s world. It gets out to gather the required information itself by getting into conversations. According to the latest research, by the year 2020, 25% of the businesses would be using chatbots, which would be up from less than 2% in 2017.</p>
All over, a business adopting AI by the year 2019 would be able to save a lot of money, would accelerate growth, and would gradually get an edge over the competitors.
<h2>Chatbots</h2>
<p align="justify">Chatbots, with no doubt, is going to be an indispensable part of Digital Marketing by the year 2019.</p>
This is an AI-based service getting into the automatic conversation with your clients and site visitors. With over 1.2 billion people interacting with the chatbots, it has been estimated that by 2020, almost 81% of total business would be using them. It has also been estimated that by the year 2022, people would be able to save $8 billion per annum through chatbots. This technology would have an upper hand in the banking and healthcare industries.

The reason people prefer to interact with chatbots is that they are responsive and respond within a quick span of time. Not only that, but they are always technically correct and never lose their patience. To add on the benefits, they always maintain a chat history and are quick in providing the references.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/trends-of-digital-marketing-2.jpg" alt="Trends That Will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019">&nbsp;
<h2>Programmatic Advertising</h2>
<p align="justify">Programmatic Advertising means letting the Artificial Intelligence buy the ads by itself so that you can target a more specific audience. This automation is very efficient and fast. Hence it tends to increase the conversions and lower customer acquisition costs.</p>
It has such a wide and wise impact that it has been expected that 90% of the ads which we’ll see in 2020 would be automated.
<h2>Video Marketing</h2>
<p align="justify">Videos are the rising needs of any enterprise or venture. Almost all the businesses today are taking the support of videos to rank high in the online world. Following extrapolations clear the facts:</p>

<ul>
 	<li>39% of the people call the vendors after viewing the videos of their business.</li>
 	<li>72% of the businesses say that videos have improved their conversion rates.</li>
 	<li>70% of customers tend to share a brand’s video within their circle.</li>
 	<li>52% of the customers say that after watching a product video, they become more confident about buying the product online.</li>
</ul>
<p align="justify">Youtube is the biggest evidence of business video promotions. Every day, numerous videos are uploaded on youtube which tends to increase the user engagement and further lead to business expansion.</p>
Live video too is gaining popularity these days. Businesses nowadays are using live videos for interviews, product demos or the glimpses of events etc.

With the ever-decreasing cost of video equipment and ever-increasing quality of smartphone cameras, making good quality videos has now become very easy and businesses are shifting to personalized videos from phone calls or emails. This term is called 1:1 video approach. However, it is important to&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/avoid-video-marketing-mistakes.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">avoid any mistake while creating a video</a>&nbsp;</strong>.

Youtube and other videos are also displayed in SERPs, hence&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/"><strong>SEO</strong></a>&nbsp;of videos has gained much importance.

These days, 360-degree video contents have attracted much of the user engagement. This gives the people an interactive experience as they can themselves move the image left or right.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/trends-of-digital-marketing-3.jpg" alt="Trends That Will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019">&nbsp;
<h2>Personalization</h2>
<p align="justify">If you want to be highlighted in 2019, you need to create a personalized marketing strategy. It means that you need to have personalized content, emails, products and even more.</p>
According to a fact, 96% of marketers believe that customer relationships can be advanced by personalized services.
<h2>Influencer Marketing</h2>
<p align="justify">Many social media celebrities have emerged in these years. These people have a good following and their word of mouth can influence many people.</p>
So, businesses contact these people for advertising which has proven to be a boon business. They have good control over social media and charge much less amount than the movie and TV stars. These influencers could be YouTubers, Bloggers or people having a high following on other&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>social media</strong></a>&nbsp;accounts.

Businesses have experienced around 60% increase in their workings with help of influencer marketing.
<h2>Visual Search</h2>
<p align="justify">Visual search is a new way to reform the online world. With this advancement, a user need not type long queries rather he can just upload the image and get the relevant information about it.</p>
Pinterest has dived to the pool of opportunities with this advancement and with its Lens (visual search tool), they are able to provide a better search experience to its users.

Google Lens, the visual search engine by Google, can recognize landmarks, objects, and other things visually through a camera app.

There are many other apps as well which can help in visual searches through mobile phones.

Marketers can ace at the competition by jumping to the visual search, drawing the customer attention, and serving them with perfection.
<h2>Social Media Stories</h2>
<p align="justify">With the growing trend of social media stories, it has become important for marketers to adopt this format for promotions as well.</p>
First Snapchat introduced the concept of ‘My Story’, which was followed by Instagram and Facebook. Even Youtube came up with its own stories concept by the name of ‘Reels’.

As the stories disappear after a set of time, there always prevails a fear of missing out. Hence, it can yield quick and good views further providing a scope of expansion.
<h2>Voice search and smart speakers</h2>
<p align="justify">With the increase in voice searches, businesses have been compelled to rethink their marketing strategies. Audio search has taken an auspicious place in the digital world by decreasing the efforts of people and providing them with the results through audios only. A person need not type his query, just a voice command is enough. The artificial intelligence is getting smarter and mistakes committed by these audio assistants are getting reduced.</p>
Smart Speakers like Alexa and Google Home have also become a striving part of the business world. Businesses are now trying to include these gadgets in their working to increase the efficiency and be parallel to the latest technology.
<h2>Conclusion</h2>
<p align="justify">2019 is definitely going to be a milestone in the digital advancements. With the expected increase in usage of Artificial Intelligence, businesses would get better and the competition of the digital world would touch a new level.</p>
But you need not worry, for Techies Infotech, the&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>best Digital Marketing Agency</strong></a>&nbsp;is here to help you out. With the perfect alignment with the advancements in the technology, we are here to provide the best services and consultation for your business advancement strategies.]]></content:encoded>

This automation is very efficient and fast. Hence it tends to increase the conversions and lower customer acquisition costs.<br \/><br \/>It has such a wide and wise impact that it has been expected that 90% of the ads which we\u2019ll see in 2020 would be automated.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Video Marketing<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">Videos are the rising needs of any enterprise or venture. This gives the people an interactive experience as they can themselves move the image left or right.<br \/><br \/><\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/trends-of-digital-marketing-3.jpg\" alt=\"Trends That Will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Personalization<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">If you want to be highlighted in 2019, you need to create a personalized marketing strategy. It means that you need to have personalized content, emails, products and even more.<br \/><br \/>According to a fact, 96% of marketers believe that customer relationships can be advanced by personalized services.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Influencer Marketing<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">Many social media celebrities have emerged in these years. These people have a good following and their word of mouth can influence many people.<br \/><br \/>So, businesses contact these people for advertising which has proven to be a boon business. They have good control over social media and charge much less amount than the movie and TV stars. These influencers could be YouTubers, Bloggers or people having a high following on other\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\"><strong>social media<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0accounts.<br \/><br \/>Businesses have experienced around 60% increase in their workings with help of influencer marketing.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Visual Search<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">Visual search is a new way to reform the online world. With this advancement, a user need not type long queries rather he can just upload the image and get the relevant information about it.<br \/><br \/>Pinterest has dived to the pool of opportunities with this advancement and with its Lens (visual search tool), they are able to provide a better search experience to its users.<br \/><br \/>Google Lens, the visual search engine by Google, can recognize landmarks, objects, and other things visually through a camera app.<br \/><br \/>There are many other apps as well which can help in visual searches through mobile phones.<br \/><br \/>Marketers can ace at the competition by jumping to the visual search, drawing the customer attention, and serving them with perfection.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Social Media Stories<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">With the growing trend of social media stories, it has become important for marketers to adopt this format for promotions as well.<br \/><br \/>First Snapchat introduced the concept of \u2018My Story\u2019, which was followed by Instagram and Facebook. Even Youtube came up with its own stories concept by the name of \u2018Reels\u2019.<br \/><br \/>As the stories disappear after a set of time, there always prevails a fear of missing out. Hence, it can yield quick and good views further providing a scope of expansion.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Voice search and smart speakers<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">With the increase in voice searches, businesses have been compelled to rethink their marketing strategies. Audio search has taken an auspicious place in the digital world by decreasing the efforts of people and providing them with the results through audios only. A person need not type his query, just a voice command is enough. The artificial intelligence is getting smarter and mistakes committed by these audio assistants are getting reduced.<br \/><br \/>Smart Speakers like Alexa and Google Home have also become a striving part of the business world. Businesses are now trying to include these gadgets in their working to increase the efficiency and be parallel to the latest technology.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h2>Conclusion<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">2019 is definitely going to be a milestone in the digital advancements. With the expected increase in usage of Artificial Intelligence, businesses would get better and the competition of the digital world would touch a new level.<br \/><br \/>But you need not worry, for Techies Infotech, the\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\"><strong>best Digital Marketing Agency<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0is here to help you out. With the perfect alignment with the advancements in the technology, we are here to provide the best services and consultation for your business advancement strategies.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"19bf","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"eff9db0","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"23de","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Questions to ask before hiring a Web Development agency in India]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/questions-to-ask-before-hiring-a-web-development-agency-in-india/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 19 Jan 2019 15:01:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=333</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<section id="main-container">As time is going on, the vastness of the online world is getting even more vast. With the increase in its scope, competition and players, the place for naive minds has really gone extinct. You want to be the player of a bigger game, you need to be the winner of the smaller one.And in this neck to neck game, all your efforts can drain into oblivion if your business isn’t in the eyes of competitors and audience.

A website is the frontier of any business which proclaims the presence of its owner. So, it is really important to choose a web developer and designer carefully for the better the agency, the better is the website.

Given below are some of the most important questions you should ask the <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/web-design-and-development.html"><strong>web design and development</strong></a> company before hiring them.
<h3>How do they measure growth?</h3>
<img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/how-do-they-measure-growth.jpg" alt="measure growth" />

A website is basically a fully loaded rifle to give you a shot of success bull’s eye. So, before hiring a web design and development agency, you ought to know that
<ul>
 	<li>How the agency keeps a check on the market value of its clients</li>
 	<li>How the growth rate is measured</li>
 	<li>You should also know what was the previous bounce rate of patients, and the data of traffic, <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">keyword ranking</a></strong> etc. This can help you get a clearer image of the agency.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Would the site favour search engine?</h3>
<img class="aligncenter" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/favour-search-engine.jpg" alt="favour search engine" />

The main aim of each website is to rank good on search engines. If the site is not on the first page, then for what good the site is? SEO is the key to get a good score on the search engine.

Now for the same, you need to ensure that
<ul>
 	<li>The site should be composed of the latest algorithms and standards and it should be cooked in such a way that when a seeker searches for any relatable keyword, your site pops to the top.</li>
 	<li>The agency must offer <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>SEO services</strong></a> and must be having some experienced SEO experts who can give their aid to take your site to soaring heights.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Would I have the power to make the changes?</h3>
<img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/make-the-changes.jpg" alt="make the changes" />

It is common knowledge that businesses are highly dynamic. They change in a flicker of a second. Hence timely updates are always required on the website.

But if the website is rigid, you won’t be able to make any changes; hence you need to know if you can edit the site afterwards or not.
<ul>
 	<li>Some agencies allow making the changes and updates from your own website management system.</li>
 	<li>But, on the other hand, there are some agencies which make changes themselves and ask for an additional fee to do that.</li>
</ul>
Hence, you need to be fully aware of the type of agency you’re dealing with so that in future, no conflict arises and both the ventures go side by side.
<h3>Would I be able to see the work in progress?</h3>
<img class="alignright" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/work-in-progress.jpg" alt="work in progress" />

It is for the company’s good if it can see into the working of the agency. This way, it can provide a personal touch to the website and probability of mistakes also reduce.
<ul>
 	<li>Some agencies provide extra relief by preparing a draft of the website and ask if any amendments are required.</li>
 	<li>But there are some agencies, which put the companies in the oblivion and present only the final product. These type of agencies are more likely to commit mistakes and are vulnerable to remakes.</li>
</ul>
<h3>What other services can you offer?</h3>
<img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/other-services.jpg" alt="other services" />

Most of the web development and design companies offer a plethora of other services as well. These services can include content writing, graphic designing, video editing, digital marketing etc.
<ul>
 	<li>You need to make sure that the team you are selecting is in proper synchronisation with its other services.</li>
 	<li>Make sure the agency understands the whole of your requirement before enacting upon it.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Which methodology do they follow? Agile or Scrum</h3>
<img class="alignright" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/agile-or-scrum.jpg" alt="Agile or Scrum" />

These both methodologies are an essential part of any web development and design agency.

In agile methodology, work is framed within the team and then sent for approval and feedback. Meanwhile, other work is started.

But on the other hand, in Scrum methodology, a project is made and sent for approval. Next work is not started until and unless previous work has been approved and changed according to the feedbacks.

Confirm the methodology, the agency is following for this would make the basics of your expectations from the agency.
<h3>Is there an effective communication strategy?</h3>
<img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/communication-strategy.jpg" alt="communication strategy" />

A venture relies on the bond they share within. An agency needs to have a sound communication strategy within to perform each and every task so that nothing is missed and a joint effort reflects from the final product.

Making the surity of effective communication strategy would ensure synchronisation of efforts and efficiency of the result.
<h3>Closing Comments</h3>
We are one of the best Web design and Development Agency in India offering web development services to a vast global clientele. We have a highly qualified and experienced team of graphic designers, content writers and SEO experts to provide you with the aid along.

So wait no more and reach out to <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Techies Infotech</strong></a> and see your website touching the high google ranks and helping you make a desirable venture in today’s digital world.

</section>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"1df","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"f72f2f8","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"6e2c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"f5","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<section id=\"main-container\" class=\"main-container\"><div class=\"container\"><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-12 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><div><p class=\"justify\">As time is going on, the vastness of the online world is getting even more vast. With the increase in its scope, competition and players, the place for naive minds has really gone extinct. You want to be the player of a bigger game, you need to be the winner of the smaller one.<br \/><br \/>And in this neck to neck game, all your efforts can drain into oblivion if your business isn\u2019t in the eyes of competitors and audience.<br \/><br \/>A website is the frontier of any business which proclaims the presence of its owner. So, it is really important to choose a web developer and designer carefully for the better the agency, the better is the website.<br \/><br \/>Given below are some of the most important questions you should ask the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/top-five-website-optimization-techniques.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">web design and development<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0company before hiring them.<\/p><h3>How do they measure growth?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/how-do-they-measure-growth.jpg\" alt=\"measure growth\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">A website is basically a fully loaded rifle to give you a shot of success bull\u2019s eye. So, before hiring a web design and development agency, you ought to know that<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>How the agency keeps a check on the market value of its clients<\/li><li>How the growth rate is measured<\/li><li>You should also know what was the previous bounce rate of patients, and the data of traffic,\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">keyword ranking<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0etc. This can help you get a clearer image of the agency.<\/li><\/ul><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Would the site favour search engine?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/favour-search-engine.jpg\" alt=\"favour search engine\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">The main aim of each website is to rank good on search engines. If the site is not on the first page, then for what good the site is? SEO is the key to get a good score on the search engine.<br \/><br \/>Now for the same, you need to ensure that<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>The site should be composed of the latest algorithms and standards and it should be cooked in such a way that when a seeker searches for any relatable keyword, your site pops to the top.<\/li><li>The agency must offer\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>SEO services<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0and must be having some experienced SEO experts who can give their aid to take your site to soaring heights.<\/li><\/ul><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Would I have the power to make the changes?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/make-the-changes.jpg\" alt=\"make the changes\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">It is common knowledge that businesses are highly dynamic. They change in a flicker of a second. Hence timely updates are always required on the website.<br \/><br \/>But if the website is rigid, you won\u2019t be able to make any changes; hence you need to know if you can edit the site afterwards or not.<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>Some agencies allow making the changes and updates from your own website management system.<\/li><li>But, on the other hand, there are some agencies which make changes themselves and ask for an additional fee to do that.<\/li><\/ul><p class=\"justify\">Hence, you need to be fully aware of the type of agency you\u2019re dealing with so that in future, no conflict arises and both the ventures go side by side.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Would I be able to see the work in progress?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/work-in-progress.jpg\" alt=\"work in progress\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">It is for the company\u2019s good if it can see into the working of the agency. This way, it can provide a personal touch to the website and probability of mistakes also reduce.<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>Some agencies provide extra relief by preparing a draft of the website and ask if any amendments are required.<\/li><li>But there are some agencies, which put the companies in the oblivion and present only the final product. These type of agencies are more likely to commit mistakes and are vulnerable to remakes.<\/li><\/ul><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>What other services can you offer?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/other-services.jpg\" alt=\"other services\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">Most of the web development and design companies offer a plethora of other services as well. These services can include content writing, graphic designing, video editing, digital marketing etc.<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>You need to make sure that the team you are selecting is in proper synchronisation with its other services.<\/li><li>Make sure the agency understands the whole of your requirement before enacting upon it.<\/li><\/ul><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Which methodology do they follow? Agile or Scrum<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/agile-or-scrum.jpg\" alt=\"Agile or Scrum\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">These both methodologies are an essential part of any web development and design agency.<br \/><br \/>In agile methodology, work is framed within the team and then sent for approval and feedback. Meanwhile, other work is started.<br \/><br \/>But on the other hand, in Scrum methodology, a project is made and sent for approval. Next work is not started until and unless previous work has been approved and changed according to the feedbacks.<br \/><br \/>Confirm the methodology, the agency is following for this would make the basics of your expectations from the agency.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Is there an effective communication strategy?<\/h3><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/communication-strategy.jpg\" alt=\"communication strategy\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">A venture relies on the bond they share within. An agency needs to have a sound communication strategy within to perform each and every task so that nothing is missed and a joint effort reflects from the final product.<br \/><br \/>Making the surity of effective communication strategy would ensure synchronisation of efforts and efficiency of the result.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Closing Comments<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">We are one of the best Web design and Development Agency in India offering web development services to a vast global clientele. 		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:63:"gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==";}]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Top 5 Website Optimization Techniques For 2019]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/top-5-website-optimization-techniques-for-2019/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 22 Mar 2019 15:03:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=336</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Keeping pace with these ever-evolving trends in website optimization has become hard to play with over the period of last 10 years. Earlier, Google was supposed to assess the websites on the basis of 200 ranking factors. But with the advancing time, the factors that determine SERPs have also evolved.

Hang On! But we still can account for some factors that haven’t changed. Therefore, being one of the best SEO companies in India we have taken an initiative to help you with&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">website optimization techniques</a></strong>&nbsp;2019. So, let’s run into some successful techniques to optimize your website in 2019.
<h3>1. Employ Technical SEO</h3>
Infusing the website with technical SEO has become an inescapable strategy to optimize your website in 2019. Technical SEO has become the need of the website optimization 2019 because:
<ul>
 	<li>Factually, a website’s speed is majorly counted upon the technical SEO. However, Google is backing the websites that have more first meaningful paint speed.</li>
 	<li>In addition, JavaScript is the other emerging website optimization technique for 2019, adopted by the major search engines. It helps your website gain an edge over others. This tool is for front-end programming that creates a feature-rich, fast and user-friendly website. So, laying your hands on JavaScript is another wise move to rank your website.</li>
 	<li>Progressive Web App (PWA) is another website optimization tool which is popping up in 2019. Powered by Google, this tool enhances the website by featuring qualities like an app. It is an exposure to a various web solutions. For instance, the existing website with PWA let you experience improved performance, advanced conversion rates, push notifications and offline operations. Hence, start building your plans to make your website stay live as a PWA in the future, to experience superior SERPs.</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Mobile First Approach</h3>
Owing to the facts, mobile searches have been widely accepted as the best SEO trend for the past few years. Further, the experts have acknowledged the growth in mobile searches in 2019 and beyond. Therefore, Google prefers mobile user experiences over the desktops. Hence,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">making your website responsive</a></strong>, using short meta titles, scaling your images appropriately, setting the pop-ups avoiding them to cover the content and many more are certain practices to address mobile users. Thereupon, ensure your targeted audience a better user interface in 2019.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/top-five-website-optimization-techniques-for-2019-2.jpg" alt=" Top 5 Website Optimization Techniques For 2019">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>3. Voice Search</h3>
Pertaining to the current scenario, we are witnessing a major inclination of the people towards mobile phones. Considering this fact, the experts have tagged ‘Voice Search’ as an invincible website optimization technique for 2019. Assenting to the success followed by this strategy, almost every SEO company is strategizing their services with this feature. Although being advantageous, this website optimization tool has a downside too. The major challenge is confronted by websites with complex responses, making it a hard nut to crack. Yet its pros outweigh its cons, making it one of the best trends to optimize your website in 2019.
<h3>4. Qualitative Content</h3>
As the best SEO Company in India, our stringent research on the SEO performance has stated a fact that ‘Over the past few years, Google Algorithm has adopted a quality-centric approach, when ranking a website.’ The research clearly displayed the superior results for the websites with quality content outperforming the websites with weak content. As a result, we vouch for the websites with quality content rather than the websites with quantitative content. To optimize your website in major search engines, it is advocated to build a&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-content-marketing-strategy.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">website with excellent content</a></strong>, as it is the best tool to help you rank your website.
<h3>5. User Centric</h3>
If employed the user-centric approach or user experience (UX) into your website development, your proximity to higher ranks in SERPs broadens up. UX means invading into your users’ minds and learning about their requirements, abilities, and limitations. Once, you have chalked out all the aforementioned, it becomes a cake walk for you to address your users efficiently. Not only this, but UX also considers the business’s goals and objectives to perform better when optimizing the website comes into question.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/top-five-website-optimization-techniques-for-2019-3.jpg" alt=" Top 5 Website Optimization Techniques For 2019">

While offering the best website design service in India, we consider the following aspects while building a website:
<ul>
 	<li>Structuring the content in such a manner, that it is easily discoverable by the users.</li>
 	<li>User-friendly website</li>
 	<li>Quality and useful content</li>
 	<li>Ensures the credibility</li>
 	<li>Value-driven for the user</li>
</ul>
Being the best SEO and&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">web design company in India</a></strong>, Techies Infotech take it as their duty to keep you posted about the ever-evolving website optimizations techniques for 2019. Hence, perfection and updated performance are the USPs of our company. So, help you avoid racking your brains, we serve as a one-stop solution for your entire website and SEO related queries.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[State of Digital Marketing in 2019]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/state-of-digital-marketing-in-2019/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 27 Mar 2019 15:04:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=339</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>State of Digital Marketing in 2019</strong></h2>
With the commencement of 2019, businesses are on a lookout for embracing new competitive trends and techniques to allure and connect with the maximum number of customers. Moreover, everyone is able to witness the unstoppable and accelerated systems of&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/best-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing</a></strong>. Considering this fact, almost every business is trying its level best to strengthen its digital marketing in 2019 to attract and convert the most audience. Therefore, having said that, below mentioned are some of the dominating trends of digital marketing in 2019.
<h2>1. Colloquial Social Media</h2>
With the ever-evolving trends in digital marketing, this upcoming trend of two-way conversation on&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">social media</a></strong>&nbsp;makes it even more amazing. This will allow the brands to get in touch with their audiences and assess their requirements. Moreover, the brands will also be enabled to learn what kind of content executes better in reaching their target audience. Besides this the companies can also:
<ul>
 	<li>Indulge in a question-answer session with their clients</li>
 	<li>Develop and post engaging content</li>
 	<li>Prompt replies to the queries</li>
</ul>
All these factors are certainly helpful in maximizing your business.
<h2>2. Videos cultivated for SEO</h2>
SEO aids businesses to understand their users’ behaviour. As search engines are ever evolving, you should be quite certain to keep a tab on all the updates. This adaptation will allow you to create user-friendly, engaging websites that cope well with the altered algorithms to maintain their rankings. This is the point where videos come to action.

Pertaining to the recent researches, videos are shared maximum as compared to both texts and links. This is because videos are relatively more captivating and hold the potential to reach the maximum number of audiences. The prediction for 2019, displays that the businesses will focus more on&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/top-five-website-optimization-techniques.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">improving SEO rankings</a></strong>, by optimizing contents of the video. Make sure that the keywords act as the important carriers of the below-mentioned aspects:
<ul>
 	<li>Description</li>
 	<li>Video Title</li>
 	<li>URL</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/state-of-digital-marketing-in-2019-2.jpg" alt="state of digital marketing in 2019">&nbsp;
<h2>3. Enhancement of Geo-marketing</h2>
Although businesses have incorporated geo-marketing in their marketing strategies, yet they are not able to derive more precise and accurate results from them. Therefore certain technologies like geo-fencing have come into action to solve this issue. Geo-fencing allows businesses to advance one step closer to their prospective clients. This technique has enabled businesses to cope up with the problem of location targeting. It has allowed the brands to allure their competitors’ clientele and make them learn about their brand.

Addressing your audiences with digital ads that are displayed on the mobiles with predefined geographic areas, works wonders for the brands to earn with geo-marketing. For instance, businesses can develop and launch a geo-mapping ad considering the distance from a competitor’s store. Perhaps when any customer reaches the targeted location he is served with an ad for your brand, possibly blazing interest in your store and brand. Consequently, these notifications automated for the targeted locations are the best way to generate high engagement and awareness of your brand in lieu of your business.
<h2>4. Personalized Email Marketing</h2>
With the advancement of time, customers have become more inclined towards personalization. However, when brands come into the question, customers consider it to be a less important matter.

Subsequently, treading an extra mile of personalizing the emails can lead to more loyal customers with maximum conversions. But while creating a personalized email marketing campaign you should consider the following:
<ul>
 	<li>Creating personalized emails on the basis of your various market segments.</li>
 	<li>Select to boost the services and products that your selective customers find interesting.</li>
 	<li>Draft short yet powerful content.</li>
 	<li>Generate creativity that represents your brands well and captivates the audiences.</li>
</ul>
Besides the personalization of emails, businesses will also concentrate on making these emails easily accessible to mobile users. In accordance with the researches, 84% of the survey respondents account for the population that uses their mobile phones to view personal emails.

Not only this, but you should also ensure that your personalized emails should contain the content that optimizes lead generation and capitalization in this highly competitive, mobile market.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/state-of-digital-marketing-in-2019-3.jpg" alt="state of digital marketing in 2019-3">
<h2>5. The emergence of New Technologies</h2>
This New Year, businesses will consider infusing new technologies into their marketing techniques to enhance the experience of their customers. Therefore, the incorporation of Artificial Intelligence and augmented reality are certain to enhance both your customer service as well as marketing strategies as a whole. Moreover, if you desire to rule the technology game, ensure to schedule sometime every week to learn and understand the technological advancements in the digital field.

It is equally crucial to be aware of all the upcoming technological opportunities like ad platforms or listening tools etc. The best way to keep a tab on these forthcoming is by subscribing to RSS feeds and Facebook Pages. As companies have already progressed into 2019 marketing techniques,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Techies Infotech</a></strong>&nbsp;is the best digital marketing agency in India, understands the importance of implementing these trends. Our niche operations as a&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing agency in Amritsar</a></strong>, gives us an edge over others, by helping the brands embrace the upcoming technologies and trend in this field to derive greater results.]]></content:encoded>

The emergence of New Technologies<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">This New Year, businesses will consider infusing new technologies into their marketing techniques to enhance the experience of their customers. Therefore, the incorporation of Artificial Intelligence and augmented reality are certain to enhance both your customer service as well as marketing strategies as a whole. Moreover, if you desire to rule the technology game, ensure to schedule sometime every week to learn and understand the technological advancements in the digital field.<br \/><br \/>It is equally crucial to be aware of all the upcoming technological opportunities like ad platforms or listening tools etc. The best way to keep a tab on these forthcoming is by subscribing to RSS feeds and Facebook Pages. As companies have already progressed into 2019 marketing techniques,\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Techies Infotech<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0is the best digital marketing agency in India, understands the importance of implementing these trends. Our niche operations as a\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">digital marketing agency in Amritsar<\/a><\/strong>, gives us an edge over others, by helping the brands embrace the upcoming technologies and trend in this field to derive greater results.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"69ff","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"738e182","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"d1e","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>
