					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-avoid-the-8-most-common-video-marketing-mistakes/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 17 Apr 2019 15:11:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=348</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[There was a time when&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/video-production.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">video marketing</a></strong>&nbsp;was considered to be an expensive affair for any business to undertake. But with the advent of technologies such as smartphones and other professional video equipment, this process has become a lot easier.

Besides that, access to various platforms like YouTube, further makes video marketing even simpler. Consequently, there is almost a good percentage of people who are engaged in video&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-content-marketing-strategy.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">content marketing</a>&nbsp;</strong>, to promote their business or brand.

But before you get rolling, it is quintessential to take heed of a few simple steps to outperform your competitors with a quality video. According to recent studies, researchers have come up with some easy ways to avoid the 8 common video marketing mistakes. Below mentioned are the 8 common mistakes made by an aspiring video marketer together with the ways to avoid them:
<h3>1. Excess of Aggressive Selling</h3>
Have you ever thought of how you will react to a person who met you for the first time and right away proposes you for marriage? Aggressive Selling is somewhat similar to that instinct. We understand that there will a very distant probability, but it is always good to establish a relationship gradually. The best way is to unfurl things eventually. Firstly, put across a teaser video, to fascinate your potential buyers. Further, start sharing your real content and encourage a continued relationship.
<h3>2. Videos are not inclusive in Campaigns</h3>
The biggest mistake committed by the video marketers is that, they overburden their target audience with information, that it ruins their first impression. Always try and leave your viewer into thoughts and curiosity, once he has viewed your short-span video. Rather than creating a lengthy video, one should focus on creating various short fragments of videos with a multifarious approach. This, in turn, gives rise to the ‘marinated effect’, which means multiplication and concentration on the intended purpose of the company. Subsequently, your viewers will be filtered, which implies that now your videos should be short, informative, precise and entertaining. Establish an emotional bond, inspire and leave them in the curiosity to learn more.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/techies-v2.jpg" alt="How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>3. Inadequate Title and SEO</h3>
Engaging Titles and powerful tagging are considered to be certain&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">essential factors in enlarging your SEO</a></strong>&nbsp;and controlling your views. Even though you have a great video, but if people are unable to find it, all your efforts will be in vain.
<h3>4.Discorded Content</h3>
Video marketing is not only restricted to visual images. To create an effective video, one needs to align the images with the best possible sounds and text. You should consider these points, whenever developing a video. The complete video should be reflective and deliberately planned.Each and every factor such as the use of appropriate words, the tone of the voice, sectional use of the content and screen, all accounts for the overall performance of your video.
<h3>5. Emphasize on products, not people</h3>
In reality, people are more inclined towards the stories rather than facts. Therefore do not end up stuffing your video with facts. Rather share stories about the people who are already using your products. Also, share their reviews about the same. Remember, if your story is conveyed well, then the people are deemed to look out for more information.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/techies-v3.jpg" alt="How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>6. Unmanaged power of the video</h3>
Have you ever wondered how powerful a video can be? To put it in other words, if compared to a picture that tells a 1000 words, a video is ought to be powerful which lasts for a minimum of 30 seconds. Just ensure that your video showcases the correct content with an appropriate essence. Moreover, you should also take care of the style being employed while creating a video. Try and pick the style that is authentically complied with your brand. This further escalates your message and helps you<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;target the right audience.</a></strong>&nbsp;.
<h3>7. Inappropriate use of Social Media Platforms</h3>
It is irrefutable that YouTube is one of the best platforms to showcase the videos. But the market is swelled with other platforms too. Therefore do not constraint your reach instead uses your SEO by publishing your videos on many other social platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram and Facebook. This does not imply that your initial platform of posting should be YouTube and then you can share the link on other platforms. Did you know that when you upload a video directly on a platform, say Facebook, you are certain to almost double your views as compared to those that you would receive by sharing?
<h3>8. Prolonged Videos</h3>
We reside in a world of prompt contentment and short consideration span. This is where you get your baseline to create your video. It implies that your video should be entertaining and informative yet short. This has evolved as the trademark of video marketing.
<h3>Techies Infotech – Best Video Marketing Service Providers in India</h3>
While serving you with the best quality informative videos for your brand, we ensure to play our expertise.

<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Techies Infotech</strong></a>&nbsp;takes every single strategy into consideration to avoid the above mentioned 8 most common video marketing mistakes. With our uncontestable services, we ascertain to provide you with a flawless video that connects, resonates and engages your target audience, to drive traffic to your site and generate sales.]]></content:encoded>

But with the advent of technologies such as smartphones and other professional video equipment, this process has become a lot easier.<br \/><br \/>Besides that, access to various platforms like YouTube, further makes video marketing even simpler. Consequently, there is almost a good percentage of people who are engaged in video\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-content-marketing-strategy.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">content marketing<\/a>\u00a0<\/strong>, to promote their business or brand.<br \/><br \/>But before you get rolling, it is quintessential to take heed of a few simple steps to outperform your competitors with a quality video. According to recent studies, researchers have come up with some easy ways to avoid the 8 common video marketing mistakes. Below mentioned are the 8 common mistakes made by an aspiring video marketer together with the ways to avoid them:<\/p><h3>1. Excess of Aggressive Selling<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Have you ever thought of how you will react to a person who met you for the first time and right away proposes you for marriage? Aggressive Selling is somewhat similar to that instinct. We understand that there will a very distant probability, but it is always good to establish a relationship gradually. The best way is to unfurl things eventually. Firstly, put across a teaser video, to fascinate your potential buyers. Further, start sharing your real content and encourage a continued relationship.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>2. Videos are not inclusive in Campaigns<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">The biggest mistake committed by the video marketers is that, they overburden their target audience with information, that it ruins their first impression. Always try and leave your viewer into thoughts and curiosity, once he has viewed your short-span video. Rather than creating a lengthy video, one should focus on creating various short fragments of videos with a multifarious approach. This, in turn, gives rise to the \u2018marinated effect\u2019, which means multiplication and concentration on the intended purpose of the company. Subsequently, your viewers will be filtered, which implies that now your videos should be short, informative, precise and entertaining. Establish an emotional bond, inspire and leave them in the curiosity to learn more.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/techies-v2.jpg\" alt=\"How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>3. Inadequate Title and SEO<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Engaging Titles and powerful tagging are considered to be certain\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">essential factors in enlarging your SEO<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0and controlling your views. Even though you have a great video, but if people are unable to find it, all your efforts will be in vain.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>4.Discorded Content<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Video marketing is not only restricted to visual images. To create an effective video, one needs to align the images with the best possible sounds and text. You should consider these points, whenever developing a video. The complete video should be reflective and deliberately planned.Each and every factor such as the use of appropriate words, the tone of the voice, sectional use of the content and screen, all accounts for the overall performance of your video.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>5. Emphasize on products, not people<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">In reality, people are more inclined towards the stories rather than facts. Therefore do not end up stuffing your video with facts. Rather share stories about the people who are already using your products. Also, share their reviews about the same. Remember, if your story is conveyed well, then the people are deemed to look out for more information.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/techies-v3.jpg\" alt=\"How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>6. Unmanaged power of the video<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Have you ever wondered how powerful a video can be? To put it in other words, if compared to a picture that tells a 1000 words, a video is ought to be powerful which lasts for a minimum of 30 seconds. Just ensure that your video showcases the correct content with an appropriate essence. Moreover, you should also take care of the style being employed while creating a video. Try and pick the style that is authentically complied with your brand. This further escalates your message and helps you<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\u00a0target the right audience.<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>7. Inappropriate use of Social Media Platforms<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">It is irrefutable that YouTube is one of the best platforms to showcase the videos. But the market is swelled with other platforms too. Therefore do not constraint your reach instead uses your SEO by publishing your videos on many other social platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram and Facebook. This does not imply that your initial platform of posting should be YouTube and then you can share the link on other platforms. Did you know that when you upload a video directly on a platform, say Facebook, you are certain to almost double your views as compared to those that you would receive by sharing?<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>8. Prolonged Videos<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">We reside in a world of prompt contentment and short consideration span. This is where you get your baseline to create your video. It implies that your video should be entertaining and informative yet short. This has evolved as the trademark of video marketing.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Techies Infotech \u2013 Best Video Marketing Service Providers in India<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">While serving you with the best quality informative videos for your brand, we ensure to play our expertise.<br \/><br \/><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>Techies Infotech<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0takes every single strategy into consideration to avoid the above mentioned 8 most common video marketing mistakes. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[10 Most Popular Payment Gateways in India]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/10-most-popular-payment-gateways-in-india/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 01 Sep 2018 13:02:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=1872</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<section id="main-container">
<h2>The web is the new home to us, the Homosapiens.</h2>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/payment-gateway-img.jpg" alt="PayTM Payment Gateway Banner">

World today has become so much engrossed in the internet web that people now have found the ways to commence their business through it. From large tycoons to small merchants, everyone is using online ways to earn money. Since it is the exchange of money, people need to choose their payment gateway minutely so that there are no chances of any kind of fraud or monetary loss.

It is suggested that people should have at least 3 payment gateway sources so that the customer can get a choice to which source to use. This whole article is about payment gateways. But what are payment gateways? Why are they important? Why is it necessary to have a payment gateway while doing online business?

Well, Payment gateways are the agencies or the companies which transfer the money from one person or organization to other over the web. Since it is all online, money is stored and transf erred in form of digital points. Now, let’s get started.
<h3>1. Atom Paynetz Payment Gateway service</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/atom.jpg" alt="ATOM Banner">
<h4>Payment Solutions for every Business.</h4>
With over 100 payment options, 15 million+ transactions and 4500+ strong merchants all over the world, Atom is a progressive Payment Service Provider promoted by FT Group.

The annual maintenance charges get applicable from the second year onwards with the amount of Rs. 2400. Transaction fee per Transaction varies from the mode of payment used.

Pivotal features of Atom Paynetz are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not supported</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;in T+2 days</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Only Android as of now.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Phone number is given on the Contact Us page, which could be used to contact the customer support executives.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not Supported</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero</li>
 	<li><strong>No of Days to start a transaction:</strong>&nbsp;Within 5-6 days</li>
</ul>
Atom Paynetz Payment Gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>Call 022-6686 4010</strong>.
<h3>2. CCAvenue Payment Gateway</h3>
<h4>Revolutionizing collections and Payments</h4>
CCAvenue Payment Gateway is one of the Advanced Payment Gateways in Indian Market. With 200+ Payment options and around 6 Credit Card facilities, this agency is showing its future motive to take over the web crystal clear. Taking on the web doesn't only mean taking over the web of India, but the whole world; hence it offers the payment option in 27 major currencies and allows multilingual payment page in 18 major Indian and international languages.

Have a Gala Time starting the CCAvenue Payment Gateway for its initial setup fee is Nil. The annual maintenance charges are just Rs. 1200. Transaction Fee per transaction is varied on the basis of source chosen.

Some of its key features are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Supported on CCAvenues.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Free.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;CCAvenue settles payments on a weekly basis for all amounts over &amp; above of Rs. 1000.</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Android, iOS, and Windows.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;CCAvenue allows collection of payments in 27 major foreign currencies</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Their website claims 24x7x365 days of Voice, Chat and emails support.</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation required:</strong>&nbsp;List of documents required is mentioned on the official CCAvenue site.</li>
</ul>
CCAvenue Payment gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>+91 22 67425555</strong>
<h3>3. DirecPay Payment Gateway Service</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/direcpay.jpg" alt="Direcpay Banner">
<h4>Because the Customer Experience Matters</h4>
DirecPay is one of the most reliable and reasonable Payment Gateway available in Indian Market. It is one of the largest payment service providers on the Indian Web.

Let’s have a glimpse to their reasonable charges:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Annual maintenance Charge:</strong>&nbsp;Zero.</li>
 	<li><strong>Transaction Fee per Transaction:</strong>&nbsp;variable transaction fee applies</li>
 	<li><strong>Domestic Credit and Debit cards:</strong>&nbsp;Flat fee @ 2%</li>
 	<li><strong>Wallets:</strong>&nbsp;Flat fee @ 2%</li>
 	<li>Taxes extra as applicable from time to time.</li>
</ul>
Some of its chief features are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Supported</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Android and iOS.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Customer support not available over weekends.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;Settlement in T + 2 days.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;US$ is supported.</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation required:</strong>&nbsp;Business registration documents.</li>
</ul>
DirecPay Payment Gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>Call +91 96197 12858 Email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:contact@direcpay.com">contact@direcpay.com</a></strong>
<h3>4. EBS Payment Gateway</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/ebs.jpg" alt="EBS Banner">
<h4>Global capabilities, local expertise</h4>
All hail to the E-Billing Solutions for they are the First Indian Merchant account providers to achieve PCI DSS 3.0 standards of compliance. It has also been certified and audited by ISO 27001-2013 Standards making it one of the most secure service providers across the globe.

They ask for no Fee over Initial Setup but the Annual Maintenance charges are Rs. 2400 flat applicable every year. The transaction charges per transaction vary according to the package you select.

Key Features of EBS Gateway are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;EBS Payment gateway accepts Visa, Master Card, American Express, JCB &amp; Diners cards.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;EBS Payment Gateway supports 11 major foreign</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Free of cost.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:&nbsp;</strong>Settlement takes place within 2-3 days.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:&nbsp;</strong>Not available over weekends</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:&nbsp;</strong>Windows, iOS, and Andriod.</li>
</ul>
EBS Payment Gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>Call +91-22-44887000</strong>
<h3>5. Emvantage Payment Gateway Service</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/emvantage.jpg" alt="Emvantage Banner">
<h4>Convenient, Fast, Reasonable and Reliable</h4>
If we talk about the proofs, Emvantage has proven its worth by getting certified by PCI-DSS V3.1; leading the Indian Markets.

Their Annual Maintenance and Per Transaction fees are variable and highly dependent upon the package selected.

Pivotal Features of Emvantage are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not supported.</li>
 	<li><strong>Domestic Credit cards supported:</strong>&nbsp;All IndianMastercards, VISA, Maestro andRupay cards acceptable.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;not available.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;T+2 is the settlement cycle.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Is accessible over weekdays.</li>
 	<li>Documentation required: Yes.</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Android, Windows, and iOS.</li>
</ul>
Emvantage Payment gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>Call +91 120 4328545 Email&nbsp;<a href="mailto:sales@emvantage.com">sales@emvantage.com</a></strong>
<h3>6. InstaMojo Payment Gateway</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/instamojo.jpg" alt="Instamojo Banner">
<h4>The business now Strain less!</h4>
InstaMojo is one of the thriving payment gateway agencies in India. Providing their services at the most reasonable costs, this agency has become an integral part of many new firms’ favorites’ list. Moreover, InstaMojo provides its clients the assistance of collecting the payments over the internet with or without a website.

Talking about its charges, they have the least annual maintenance charges. It is ZERO. Yes, you read right; InstaMojo doesn’t charge a penny for its maintenance cost. Coming to transaction fee, they charge Flat Fee @ 2% + Rs. 3 per transaction.

Let’s cover some of its key features to understand it better.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment:</strong>&nbsp;Not Accepted</li>
 	<li><strong>Credit Card Payments:</strong>&nbsp;Not Accepted</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Not yet but might come with it soon.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Nil</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation Required:</strong>&nbsp;As listed in the post-sign-up form.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not supported. Only Indian Rupee Currency.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Although The Customer Care Helpline is closed on weekends, they are pretty active on the weekdays.</li>
 	<li><strong>Supported eCommerce CMS System:</strong>&nbsp;All major ones such as Magento, Prestashop, Opencart etc.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;3 days in your connected Bank account.</li>
</ul>
You can contact InstaMojo by calling them at&nbsp;<strong>+91 88801 10011.</strong>
<h3>7. Mobikwik Payment Gateway</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/mobikwik.jpg" alt="Mobikwik Banner">
<h4>Simple and Powerful Payment Solution</h4>
Who hasn’t heard of Mobikwik on Television Advertisements and other promotional references? Mobikwik Payment Gateway is a touristy service for online credit, and debit card and internet banking processing transactions.

Their annual maintenance and Transaction fees are custom and unremarkably negotiable.

The steering features of Mobikwik are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;All Indian &amp; International Mastercards, VISA, Discover &amp; Diner’s cards acceptable.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Customer support always seems to be busy.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;No</li>
 	<li><strong>Domestic Credit cards supported:</strong>&nbsp;All Indian &amp; International Mastercards, VISA, Discover &amp; Diner’s cards acceptable.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;T+2 days</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Android, Windows, and iOS.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero</li>
</ul>
Mobikwik Payment Gateway Contact Details&nbsp;<strong>Call 011-30018008</strong>
<h3>8. PayPal Payment Gateway Service</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/paypal-payment-gateway.jpg" alt="PayPal Payment Gateway Banner">
<h4>Pay with Paypal</h4>
PayPal has its roots and branches in over 200+ countries across the globe. PayPal has gained the trust of millions of international business firms. It supports more than 100 currencies and could hold PayPal balance in around 26 currencies. Indians primarily use PayPal for their international payments.

PayPal Payment Gateway Charges are ZERO for annual maintenance. However, transaction fee per transaction is 4.4% + US$0.30 + Currency conversion charges.

Key Features of PayPal Payment gateway services are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;PayPal can be used by an Indian merchant only for receiving international payments only. PayPal does not support or recognize Indian currency.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;There are no withdrawal fees on PayPal.</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;PayPal has a great customer support system.</li>
 	<li><strong>No of Days to start a transaction:</strong>&nbsp;You can start receiving payment immediately after successful registration.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;Paypal supports over 100 currencies globally.</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;iOS and Android.</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation required:</strong>&nbsp;Mentioned on PayPal official gazette.</li>
</ul>
PayPal Payment Gateway Contact Details&nbsp;<strong>Toll-free 18002123852</strong>
<h3>9. PayUbiz Payment Gateway Service</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/payubiz-payment-gateway.jpg" alt="PayUbiz Payment Gateway Banner">
<h4>Simplified Payment Solutions</h4>
Here we are talking about one of the biggest global players of payment gateway. PayUbiz is part of Naspers, a US$25 Billion Media and Internet Company listed in Johannesburg and London stock exchange. It is the income gateway to more than 70 of the top 100 eCommerce Companies.

Their charges include:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Annual maintenance Charge:</strong>&nbsp;Variable charges apply.</li>
 	<li><strong>Transaction Fee per Transaction:</strong>&nbsp;Variable charges apply.</li>
</ul>
Some of the essential features of PayUbiz are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not supported</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Android, Windows, and iOS.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;No</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Customer support always seems to be busy.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;T+2 days</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation required:</strong>&nbsp;Extensive list of documents.</li>
</ul>
PayUbiz Payment Gateway Contact Details:&nbsp;<strong>Call 0124-6624801 Email:&nbsp;<a href="mailto:contact@payu.in">contact@payu.in</a></strong>
<h3>10. PayTM Payment Gateway</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/paytm.jpg" alt="PayTM Payment Gateway Banner">
<h4>PaytmKaro!</h4>
In today’s jiffy, no one is unfamiliar with the word PayTm. May it be Local Karyana Store or a High-Class Business Firm; today Paytm has spread its clouds to every sector of economic activity. With Paytm Cash Wallet, it has proved to be a boon to the small eCommerce merchants.

Initial Setup Fees was Rs. 5000 but has been waived as of now. Annual maintenance charges too have been waived off. Transaction fee per transaction varies according to the mode of payment.

Some of its central features are:
<ul>
 	<li><strong>International Payment / Credit card Support:</strong>&nbsp;Supports all kind of credit cards.</li>
 	<li><strong>Withdrawal Fees:</strong>&nbsp;Zero.</li>
 	<li><strong>Settlement days:</strong>&nbsp;Settlement takes place within 2-3 days</li>
 	<li><strong>Customer Support:</strong>&nbsp;Good customer support all through the week.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-Currency Support:</strong>&nbsp;Not supported as of now</li>
 	<li><strong>Documentation required:</strong>&nbsp;Business registration and Bank accounts details.</li>
 	<li><strong>Multi-currency transaction charges:</strong>&nbsp;Not applicable.</li>
 	<li><strong>Mobile App Integration:</strong>&nbsp;Available for both Android, iOS.</li>
</ul>
PayTM Payment Gateway Contact Details: Signup on their website.

These were some of the leading Internet Payment Gateways.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/techies-infotech-new.jpg" alt="Techies Infotech logo">

Techies Infotech primarily deals with Web Marketing where such gateways are regularly used. With the suggestions from professionals to which gateway is the best, take your business to heights.

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your phone or internet device and contact Techies Infotech now!

From large tycoons to small merchants, everyone is using online ways to earn money. Since it is the exchange of money, people need to choose their payment gateway minutely so that there are no chances of any kind of fraud or monetary loss.<br \/><br \/>It is suggested that people should have at least 3 payment gateway sources so that the customer can get a choice to which source to use. This whole article is about payment gateways. But what are payment gateways? Why are they important? Why is it necessary to have a payment gateway while doing online business?<br \/><br \/>Well, Payment gateways are the agencies or the companies which transfer the money from one person or organization to other over the web. Since it is all online, money is stored and transf erred in form of digital points. Now, let\u2019s get started.<\/p><h3>1. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[React Native vs Native mobile app development - What to choose for app development!]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/?p=2607</link>
		<pubDate></pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2607</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>React Native vs Native mobile app development - What to choose for app development!</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Traditionally, native languages have been used to write mobile applications. However, nowadays, cross-platform development is immensely gaining popularity with a significant market share. The ongoing wave of the growing adoption of React Native has made the developers’ community think whether or not React Native can be a right replacement for mobile app development to a full native ?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Launched in 2015, React Native presently has a full-fledged community of more than 2 thousand active contributors with over 3 lac weekly downloads on average from npm. Facebook, Skype, Uber etc. are notable global brands, which have incorporated React Native. The key reason for the extensive adoption of React Native is its ease of cross-platform environment and exclusive technological style helpful in accomplishing it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though React Native has gained success in a very short span of time, yet there are people who still prefer native mobile applications. The followers or supporters of Native stand by its advantageous performance and high strength as compared to hybrid platforms.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though settlement aspects do exist between Native and React Native, yet thorough consideration is mandatory while making a right selection between both of the technologies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In this article, you get to weigh in the aspects that make React Native and Native different from one another and a thorough comparison between the two prominent technologies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Comparing traditional native with react native mobile apps –</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What is native app development?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In contrast to web applications or websites, native app development demands specific technologies and skill-set from a developer. These are platform-specific apps that do not run over a browser. Hence, there are no concerns related to compatibility or browser behaviour while creating these apps.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To access these apps, the users should download them via app stores like Google Play and App store of Apple. Once you install the app on your mobile, it can be used by tapping over the respective icon that appears on the mobile screen. By utilizing mobile OS’s native features, the native app developer can implement app functionalities and deliver a better user experience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros of native app development –</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Native app development caters some significant advantages that encourage app developers to give it preference over React Native. Here listed the key advantages of using native app development for your development projects –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Native web apps offer great speed </strong>– Though native app development is a time taking process, yet the apps feature a great speed as compared to React Native based apps.</li><li><strong>Access to APIs helps developers make great apps – </strong>APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) help making an app look and perform great with native qualities. With these APIs, the app can access frameworks and tools available on certain platforms. Based on the SDK platform, these APIs offer integration of hardware and software, allow media sharing even without network connectivity etc.</li><li><strong>Native web apps have easily identifiable native appearance and feel – </strong>Being created on Native environment, the apps developed on this framework feature native look and feel.</li><li><strong>Easy availability of documentation – </strong>In contrast to React Native, Native app development has easy documentation availability benefits to developers. Those who are not much familiar with testing and setting up Native applications can also succeed in app development with its thorough documentation.</li><li><strong>Robust app development – </strong>Native apps are known to be more reliable, efficient, and robust as compared to React Native apps.</li><li><strong>More secure – </strong>As Native apps are developed in a proper native environment and thorough coding, these are more secure than React Native apps.</li><li><strong>Demands low maintenance – </strong>The development and writing two different code for iOS and Android is certainly time taking in Native app development. But, if we look at long-term benefits, Native apps demand for low maintenance and thus reduce the cost of maintenance in the future.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Cons of native app development – </strong>Though programmers greatly rely on the performance and usability of native app development, yet there are some certain drawbacks that have to be considered before choosing it for your development project.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Two applications to be developed</strong> – This is a thing to note about native app development that you cannot use one application to run on iOS and Android both platforms. For instance, an application created on Swift cannot be run on iOS and Android both, similarly, an application created on Java cannot be run on both. So, two different native applications for two different platforms.</li><li><strong>Consumes a lot of effort &amp; time – </strong>To create a great app on Native, you have to spend a lot of time and expertise. As the development is based on native languages, the development process is usually slow. Moreover, if you want native apps for iOS and Android both, you need two separate applications to be developed.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>What is React Native?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A cross-platform open-source framework, React native is quite popular among the development community for creating Android and iOS applications. The best thing about developing apps on React Native is; they run over both the platforms effortlessly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ultimately, it saves a lot of development time for developers as they don’t need to create two apps for Android and iOS, but one app for both the platforms. There are several plus points about React Native that contribute to the popularity of React Native app development. Here, we are discussing few notable advantages of React Native –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>&nbsp;<strong>Pros of React Native –</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Time saving on development process - </strong>React Native saves app development time for developers by 40%.</li><li><strong>Single code base - </strong>In React Native, around 70 percent code is shareable across iOS and Android cross-platforms. This way, developers find an ease in developing apps using this platform.</li><li><strong>Fast app loading</strong> - As React Native framework saves files, developers are not required to reload the whole application while making changes or editing.</li><li><strong>Open-source platform – </strong>Being an open-source framework, React Native enables developers to freely access it for application development. To understand the React Native framework, developers can evaluate codes to enhance their development process.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Cons of React Native – </strong>React native has numerous advantages that have contributed to its success and today, the platform is adopted by market leaders including UberEats, Facebook and the list goes on. Along with plus points, there are certain minuses that are equally important to be explored before choosing the better one between Native and React Native development. Here are certain drawbacks of React Native –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Limited third-party library – </strong>As React Native features minimal third-party library, developers have to depend on native libraries that is only possible by incorporating native modules. Ultimately, it increases expense, effort and time on development.</li><li><strong>Improper native elements – </strong>An app made on React Native cannot access the device’s native elements such as camera and voice recorder in the React Native directly. It makes development more complex.</li><li><strong>Does not support all APIs of Native – </strong>No doubt, React Native supports some important APIs of Native, but not all APIs. This limitation leads developers to look upon native modules for other functionalities and APIs to access.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Design issues – </strong>Android and iOS platforms follow certain design parameters, but React Native works entirely different. The graphical features get automatically transformed here with different placement from one another. In this condition, a developer has to create separate code to match design guidelines.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Factors to consider when choosing the right platform for mobile app development</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The time a business owner thinks of getting a mobile app developed for his business, the prime objective is to present the products and services to end-users in the best way.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Besides, the mobile app can smartly address the needs of consumers by responding to maximum target audience. Therefore, if you plan to get a mobile app developed on React Native or Native platforms, you should consider following factors before finalizing the right platform –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Budget of your mobile app development</li><li>Timeframe for developing the app</li><li>&nbsp;UI/UX experience you expect to have in your app</li><li>&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance</li><li>&nbsp;&nbsp;Complexity level</li><li>Your business size</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>When to choose Native app development -</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>When you look for an app with native functionalities, you should consider Native app development. For example, to develop complex apps like gaming apps, native app development will be the best option.</li><li>When you focus on a single app development platform like iOS or Android to build your app, Native is the best choice to go with.</li><li>When you have good resources to provide required support to various logistical requirements to run two streams of mobile development altogether with perfect sync.</li><li>When you look for direct accessibility over the capabilities of a device, you must rely on native.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>When to choose React Native</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>&nbsp;</strong>If you plan to create a cross-platform application for certain purpose</li><li>&nbsp;When you seek a solution to create an MVP or prototype quickly.</li><li>If you seek logistical advantages of a hybrid framework with single codebase to support app development process</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why is React Native better for startups</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>React Native has several great aspects that encourage startups to choose this platform for app development. Following are key reasons to support React Native for startups –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Can easily work with other solutions – </strong>The great quality of React Native is that; it works brilliantly with other leading technologies like Django. This way, you can find functionalities from other technologies in your app by incorporating React Native in your mobile app.</li><li><strong>Remarkable development with active community support – </strong>Being a framework of Facebook, React Native is rapidly growing and improving with every passing day. The support of the active community of React Native is another great aspect of choosing this framework for your mobile app development that perfectly fits your startup environment.</li><li><strong>Determining native UX experience – </strong>With React Native, you can deliver your app’s MVP version in a faster way and that is quite a beneficial thing for the growth of your business. The ReactJS UI library and native environment of React Native enables developers to develop responsive UI for mobiles. It is also a way to get access over features of other devices such as GPS and maps to deliver an advanced user experience.</li><li><strong>Time &amp; money saver – </strong>Usually, startups don’t have a high budget for a mobile app and for app development at a limited budget, React Native is the best option to go with. In React Native app development, a developer writes a code one time and using that, he can run the app on Android as well as on iOS platform. This way, the development process becomes faster and flawless. Writing 2 different codes for iOS and Android makes the app development quite expensive. But, it is not the case with React Native.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Companies using React Native</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Although React Native is a new technology, yet the performance and great features of this platform are encouraging businesses to adopt it for their mobile app development projects. Presently, several leading tech giants of the world have already adopted React Native which include Facebook, Instagram, Bloomberg, Pinterest, and F8.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why choose Techies Infotech for React Native app development?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In mobile app development, React Native has found a note-worthy position already as more and more businesses are inclined towards it for app development. Though the success of your <strong>cross-platform app development</strong> depends on your selection of a good <strong>React Native app development company</strong> that has a proven track record of delivering the best <strong>react native app development services</strong> in the market.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are looking for such a reliable platform to address your React Native app development needs for your business, then Techies Infotech can help you with the best solutions.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Success Stories of Techies Infotech]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/success-stories-of-techies-infotech/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 29 Jun 2018 09:15:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=14</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>Amandeep Hospital</strong>- The journey of their digital presence with Techies Infotech</h2>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/best-hospital-for-knee-replacement-surgery.jpg" alt="amandeep-hospital-website screenshot" />  <img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/amandeep-hospital-amritsar.jpg" alt="Amandeep hopital app screeshot" />

Digital presence has become of utmost importance in today’s time. With the increasing usage of social media platforms, organizations are becoming more aware of the value of social media marketing.

Techies Infotech, a premium IT solution provider, has its wings spread across the globe. Our clients, domestic as well as international, have always experienced more return to them in terms of services provided by us. The services of Techies Infotech and the contentment of its customers are raising high with each passing day.

One of our esteemed clients, Amandeep Hospital, has been availing our services for the last three years. It is our privilege to work with them and we share a mutual admiration.
<h2>Background</h2>
Amandeep Hospital was set up in the year 1990 and has a revolutionary identity as it has been able to uplift the standard of the healthcare sector due to advanced treatments.

But their presence was not known at the global level and the reason was that they missed out on the social platforms due to which their digital presence never came to the forefront.
<h2>Need</h2>
Realizing this pitfall, they searched for the best IT solution providers who could rescue them from the problem they were facing and after the search, Amandeep Hospital finalized Techies Infotech. The reason they chose us over others was the performance history of Techies Infotech and also the positive response from other clients.
<h3 align="center">Activities</h3>
<strong>Website Designing </strong><img class="aligncenter" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/amandeep-hospital-website.jpg" alt="amandeep hospital Web Page Screenshot" />

We commenced working with them by first creating and designing a website that acted as a reflection of their services to the world. This slowly garnered appreciation and also gave a digital identity to the Hospital. Well, that was just the beginning. Something great was waiting.

With more people coming to know about Amandeep Hospital across the globe, our services provided them with an opportunity to expand the scope of their services. This led to a sharp growth in the number of patients who came to avail of the services for their respective health problems. Our team of experts created and designed their website so well that no one could deny the fact that the website worked as an accelerator to speed up the popularity pace of the hospital.

<strong>Mobile Application </strong><img class="aligncenter" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/all-1.jpg" alt="amandeep hospital app screenshot" />

After realizing the benefits they reaped from the website, the management of Amandeep Hospital decided to take a step further. It was because they were highly satisfied with the services of Techies Infotech.

The next target was to build up a mobile-friendly application (Android and iPhone) that will be available to people at all times. This app had many distinct features that added another feather to the cap. Techies Infotech developed a mobile app that included all the features which made it a one-shot provider of information about the Hospital and its services.

This app was developed so as to make it user-friendly to be able to help the patients to get treated for their problems at Amandeep Hospital as quickly as possible. Through this app, users can make an enquiry, book appointments, make hassle-free payment. This made it easier for the patients to avail of the facilities.

<strong>Digital Marketing </strong>

<img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/digital-marketing.png" alt="Digital Marketing Banner" />

Again after the success of the mobile app, it was then decided by the management of the Hospital that Techies Infotech will also take charge of social media platforms and other related activities since these platforms have a very wider reach among people.

We then started by creating and managing their Facebook page, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn accounts. It got a great response from the audience and thousands of people started following it.

Blogs publishing task was undertaken and video shoots were started to cover the important events held at Hospital. These activities are still carried on with full dedication by the team.

Word of mouth spread across which helped to create more awareness among people. It acted as a trendsetter and with this even Techies Infotech touched new heights as the team made it prominent that their hard work and dedication can do great work. All the campaigns have brought success.

<strong>Creative Designing </strong><img class="alignleft" src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/creative-designing.jpg" alt="design on laptop screen" />

Graphics Designing for hoardings, flyers, and posts is one of the core services provided by Techies Infotech.

All the branches of Amandeep Hospital are covered under our services.

As a result of all the activities:
<ul>
 	<li>Traffic increased on the website.</li>
 	<li>Increase in awareness among people.</li>
 	<li>Positive reviews from blogs.</li>
 	<li>Business expansion.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Result</h3>
From January 2016 to March 2018, there have been various beneficial results in different contexts:
<h6><img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/arrow.png" alt="Arrow Side Left" /> January 2016 to March 2016 showcased the following results</h6>
<ul>
 	<li>Users: 2036</li>
 	<li>Pageviews: 7182</li>
 	<li>New users: 2031</li>
</ul>
<h6><img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/arrow.png" alt="Arrow Side Left" /> January 2017 to March 2017 showcased the following results</h6>
<ul>
 	<li>Users: 4385</li>
 	<li>Pageviews: 13285</li>
 	<li>New users: 4287</li>
</ul>
<h6><img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/arrow.png" alt="Arrow Side Left" /> January 2018 to March 2018 showcased the following results</h6>
<ul>
 	<li>Users: 7546</li>
 	<li>Pageviews: 39589</li>
 	<li>New users: 7231</li>
</ul>
Focusing on Facebook activities, the following is the glimpse of the remarkable results
<h6><img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/arrow.png" alt="Arrow Side Left" /> April 2017 to May 2017 showcased the following results</h6>
<ul>
 	<li>Users: 347</li>
 	<li>Reach: 35885</li>
 	<li>Page likes: 133</li>
</ul>
<h6><img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/arrow.png" alt="Arrow Side Left" /> April 2018 to date showcased the following results</h6>
<ul>
 	<li>Page view: 923</li>
 	<li>Reach: 48697</li>
 	<li>Page likes: 1935</li>
</ul>
There has been a rise in results with passing time and involvement in various activities.
<h3>Our Perception</h3>
Techies Infotech believes in the fact “Customer is king”. We provide customized services to our clients since every client is unique and so are their needs and requirements. The structure of our services varies from customer to customer. We not only aim to satisfy the requirements of our customers but also work for their delight.

We offer various services ranging from Website Design, Website Development, Mobile Application (Android and iPhone) to Graphic Designing, Digital Marketing, and Web Application. Development Services.

Over years, we have built up a wide clientele base due to the perfection and dedication in providing services. And that is the reason why we have domestic as well as international clients. Word of mouth has also spread which has made us the first choice of the customers.]]></content:encoded>

Our clients, domestic as well as international, have always experienced more return to them in terms of services provided by us.The services of Techies Infotech and the contentment of its customers are raising high with each passing day.<br \/><br \/>One of our esteemed clients, Amandeep Hospital, has been availing our services for the last three years. It is our privilege to work with them and we share a mutual admiration.<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"clear\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"col-lg-12 col-md-12\"><h2>Background<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Amandeep Hospital was set up in the year 1990 and has a revolutionary identity as it has been able to uplift the standard of healthcare sector due to advanced treatments.<br \/><br \/>But their presence was not known at the global level and the reason was that they missed out on the social platforms due to which their digital presence never came to the forefront.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Need<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Realising this pitfall, they searched for the best IT solution providers who could rescue them from the problem they were facing and after the search, Amandeep Hospital finalized Techies Infotech. The reason they chose us over others was the performance history of Techies Infotech and also the positive response from other clients.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><\/div><div class=\"col-lg-12 col-md-12\"><h3 align=\"center\">Activities<\/h3><\/div><div class=\"col-lg-12 col-md-12 menu-outline\"><div class=\"blue_heading\">Website Designing<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border \" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/amandeep-hospital-website.jpg\" alt=\"amandeep hospital Web Page Screenshot\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">We commenced working with them by first creating and designing a website which acted as a reflection of their services to the world. This slowly garnered appreciation and also gave a digital identity to the Hospital. Well, that was just the beginning. Something great was waiting.<br \/><br \/>With more people coming to know about Amandeep Hospital across the globe, our services provided them with an opportunity to expand the scope of their services. This led to a sharp growth in the number of patients who came to avail the services for their respective health problems. Our team of experts created and designed their website so well that no one could deny the fact that the website worked as an accelerator to speed up the popularity pace of the hospital.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"blue_heading\">Mobile Application<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/all-1.jpg\" alt=\"amandeep hospital app screenshot\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">After realising the benefits they reaped from the website, the management of Amandeep Hospital decided to take a step further. It was because they were highly satisfied with the services of Techies Infotech.<br \/><br \/>The next target was to build up a mobile-friendly application (Android and iPhone) which will be available to people at all times. This app had many distinct features which added another feather to the cap. Techies Infotech developed a mobile app which included all the features which made it a one-shot provider of information about the Hospital and its services.<br \/><br \/>This app was developed so as to make it user-friendly to be able to help the patients to get treated for their problems at Amandeep Hospital as quickly as possible. Through this app, users can make an enquiry, book appointment, make hassle-free payment. This made it easier for the patients to avail the facilities.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"blue_heading\">Digital Marketing<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/digital-marketing.png\" alt=\"Digital Marketing Banner\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">Again after the success of the mobile app, it was then decided by the management of the Hospital that Techies Infotech will also take charge of social media platforms and other related activities since these platforms have a very wider reach among people.<br \/><br \/>We then started by creating and managing their Facebook page, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn accounts. It got a great response from the audience and thousands of people started following it.<br \/><br \/>Blogs publishing task was undertaken and video shoots were started to cover the important events held at Hospital. These activities are still carried on with full dedication by the team.<br \/><br \/>Word of mouth spread across which helped to create more awareness among people. It acted as a trendsetter and with this even Techies Infotech touched new heights as the team made it prominent that their hard work and dedication can do great work. All the campaigns have brought success.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"blue_heading\">Creative Designing<\/div><div 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Google Release Source Code for Android I/O App]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/google-release-source-code-for-android-i-o-app/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 14 Aug 2018 09:15:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=16</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[As per the annual trend of Google to release source code for its I/O app after few weeks of developers conference, the remarkable 2018 I/O Android version with a “comprehensive rewrite” featuring Architecture Components, Kotlin, Material Theming, and other modern elements has been released. The Kotlin is a novel, modern language, to write the codebase of the app itself, and is also used with Google calling it an “easy choice” to use Android’s newest supported programming language.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/android-io-app.jpg" alt="Digital Marketing Banner">

Rather than following the conventional Content Provider + Sync Adapter Architecture that's been followed in the I/O 2017 app, the 2018 version would incorporate dramatic ground-up rewrite, following the new Android Architecture Components system, per Google.

Furthermore, several Firebase services are applied
<ul>
 	<li>Cloud Firestore</li>
 	<li>Firebase Cloud Functions</li>
 	<li>Firebase Cloud Messaging</li>
 	<li>Remote Config</li>
</ul>
The paramount purpose of the app is to serve as a scheduler for the event, and continuing to be a good indicator of what's in store for users in terms of the visual aesthetic trend that Google would be following in a given year. Likewise, it would reveal the 'recommended' coding practices, for developers by giving them a peek at how the newest APIs and platforms can be best utilized. There's now a bottom navigation bar, and the system nav bar is themed to match it. With the navigation bar one can have quick access to general information, the schedule, and a map.

The prevailing methodology has also seen changes. Now, the more prominence is given to the modularity. Get a better handle on Google’s Best practises for app development. The app is accessible for developers on&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/google/iosched" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Github.</strong></a>]]></content:encoded>

The Kotlin is a novel, modern language, to write the codebase of the app itself, and is also used with Google calling it an \u201ceasy choice\u201d to use Android\u2019s newest supported programming language.<\/p><div class=\"hospital_img wow zoomIn\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/android-io-app.jpg\" alt=\"Digital Marketing Banner\" \/><\/div><p class=\"justify\">Rather than following the conventional Content Provider + Sync Adapter Architecture that's been followed in the I\/O 2017 app, the 2018 version would incorporate dramatic ground-up rewrite, following the new Android Architecture Components system, per Google.<br \/><br \/>Furthermore, several Firebase services are applied<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>Cloud Firestore<\/li><li>Firebase Cloud Functions<\/li><li>Firebase Cloud Messaging<\/li><li>Remote Config<\/li><\/ul><p>The paramount purpose of the app is to serve as a scheduler for the event, and continuing to be a good indicator of what's in store for users in terms of the visual aesthetic trend that Google would be following in a given year. Likewise, it would reveal the 'recommended' coding practices, for developers by giving them a peek at how the newest APIs and platforms can be best utilized. There's now a bottom navigation bar, and the system nav bar is themed to match it. With the navigation bar one can have quick access to general information, the schedule, and a map.<br \/><br \/>The prevailing methodology has also seen changes. Now, the more prominence is given to the modularity. Get a better handle on Google\u2019s Best practises for app development. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Importance of Graphic Designing in Digital Marketing]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/importance-of-graphic-designing-in-digital-marketing/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 07 Aug 2018 09:15:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=17</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2><strong>Why Graphic Designing?</strong></h2>
World today is not just confined to the deep cut impacts of the words but the graphics along have assisted a lot in maintaining a long term interest of the viewers. Hence it is really pivotal to make the graphics eye feasting and self-explanatory so that viewer doesn’t have to dive to imaginative worlds to figure out the meaning behind each pic.

<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/creative-designing.html"><b>Graphic designing</b> </a>has not just affected our real lives but has also left a deep impact on our social and digital lives. Now our lives are more dependent on number of likes, shares, comments, tags and all such stuff. In such hullabaloos, we haven’t yet noticed the changing algorithms of social sites. Even the social media today is using such algorithms which show good graphics on the top to gather more of what we call ‘views’.
<h2><strong>What is Graphic designing?</strong></h2>
Now why is this graphic designing so important in digital lives? Why good graphics are prioritized in social media platforms? Why digital marketers with good graphic designers are under fortune?

All answers are concealed behind the folds of new era traditions. Before starting with ‘Why graphic designing is considered important in <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><b>Digital marketing?’</b></a> We first need to understand that what is Graphic designing?

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/what-is-graphic-designing.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />

Graphic designing is an art of making a fusion between creativity and information. Graphic designing can said to be a still form of infotainment. It is a trick to keep a constant interest of the viewer in the content and arise his/her keen interest in searching more.

It is a visual process of communication through images, graphics and sometimes words too. The aim is to feed the info-hunger of the viewers and provide them all the necessary knowledge in a stimulating way. This is the best way to provide more information in less time and with clear and concrete words.

<em>Graphic designing plays a crucial role in digit marketing too. Some of the headers under which it provides its assistance are:</em>

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/brand-identities.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />
<h2><strong>1) Creating Brand Identity</strong></h2>
In the jiffy of globalization, no one can’t deny the importance of brand identity in global market. Through graphics, a company makes its own individual identity and stays in a distinct status within hoard of competitors. A good brand identity can attract a number of potential traders and customers.
<h2><strong>2) Helps to Convey Brand Message</strong></h2>
In the world of numerous complexities, businesses have become cumbersome more than ever. Technical jargons are out of reach of people than ever. Message conveyed in words attracts very less people and may not be able to retain their interests. Here graphics come to rescue. Graphics can provide each necessary information in a creative way. A good graphic attracts near about 85% more people and has proven to retain their interest and people tend to read more if they are fascinated by the graphics.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/creates-strong-impression.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />
<h2><strong>3) Creates Strong Impression</strong></h2>
A good graphic not only delivers the information but creates a strong impact on people. People tend to get more involved in graphics than words. Extrapolations say that around 85% of people are attracted to graphics and indulge in business seeing their graphic potentials only. Words might be forgotten, but a message through a video or graphic is far more intimidating to the scavenging minds.
<h2><strong>4) Preserving Customer Interest</strong></h2>
Web of today has become so swift that even minute information isn’t out of its reach. Since people have limited time today, they rely on the graphics to understand the stories. Now if people find these graphics cumbersome, less readable or less attractive, they might jump to other sites. To maintain their interest in your graphics, it is must to develop creative, readable and involving visuals.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/preserving-customer-interest.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />    <img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/the-story-tellers.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />
<h2><strong>5) Graphics are the Story Tellers</strong></h2>
Good visuals with perfect graphics can narrate a whole story and can leave an impression of eternity in readers’ minds. A perfectly woven graphic along with carefully stitched words narrates the success stories of the firm and creates a personal bond between the potential clients and the company.
<h2><strong>Techies Infotech</strong></h2>
Graphic designing is no doubt an essential part of the corporate world. Graphics have power to either take you to success or even drag you down to losses. Hence it is essential to carefully decide the designs and contents of graphics as they decide the fate of the firm.

<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/"><b>Techies Infotech</b></a> is the leading graphic designing firm in the present society. With menial rates and effective services, it never fails to pacify the urge of perfection. Contact us today and we’ll selflessly assist you give thrust to your success graph. <img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/techies-infotech.jpg" alt="" data-wow-duration="1s" data-wow-delay=".2s" />]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[Like FDR, who was able to overcome the complete weakness of US federal government over private banks and financial sector in general, when dealing with the Great Depression. Or Lincoln, who held the bipartisan country together with a grip of a mountain grizzly bear.]]></excerpt:encoded>

Hence it is really pivotal to make the graphics eye feasting and self-explanatory so that viewer doesn\u2019t have to dive to imaginative worlds to figure out the meaning behind each pic.<br \/><br \/><\/p><p class=\"justify\"><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/creative-designing.html\"><b>Graphic designing<\/b>\u00a0<\/a>has not just affected our real lives but has also left a deep impact on our social and digital lives. Now our lives are more dependent on number of likes, shares, comments, tags and all such stuff. In such hullabaloos, we haven\u2019t yet noticed the changing algorithms of social sites. Even the social media today is using such algorithms which show good graphics on the top to gather more of what we call \u2018views\u2019.<\/p><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-7 align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>What is Graphic designing?<\/strong><\/h2><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><p class=\"justify\">Now why is this graphic designing so important in digital lives? Why good graphics are prioritized in social media platforms? Why digital marketers with good graphic designers are under fortune?<br \/><br \/>All answers are concealed behind the folds of new era traditions. Before starting with \u2018Why graphic designing is considered important in\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\"><b>Digital marketing?\u2019<\/b><\/a>\u00a0We first need to understand that what is Graphic designing?<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"col-md-5 ml-auto align-self-md-center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border what is Graphic designing wow zoomIn\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/what-is-graphic-designing.jpg\" alt=\"\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\" \/><\/div><div class=\"col-md-12\"><p class=\"justify\">Graphic designing is an art of making a fusion between creativity and information. Graphic designing can said to be a still form of infotainment. It is a trick to keep a constant interest of the viewer in the content and arise his\/her keen interest in searching more.<br \/><br \/>It is a visual process of communication through images, graphics and sometimes words too. The aim is to feed the info-hunger of the viewers and provide them all the necessary knowledge in a stimulating way. This is the best way to provide more information in less time and with clear and concrete words.<br \/><br \/><em>Graphic designing plays a crucial role in digit marketing too. Some of the headers under which it provides its assistance are:<\/em><\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-5 align-self-md-center\"><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><img class=\"img-fluid img_border Creating Brand Identity wow zoomIn\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/brand-identities.jpg\" alt=\"\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\" \/><\/div><div class=\"col-md-7 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>1) Creating Brand Identity<\/strong><\/h2><p class=\"justify\">In the jiffy of globalization, no one can\u2019t deny the importance of brand identity in global market. Through graphics, a company makes its own individual identity and stays in a distinct status within hoard of competitors. A good brand identity can attract a number of potential traders and customers.<\/p><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-12 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>2) Helps to Convey Brand Message<\/strong><\/h2><p class=\"justify\">In the world of numerous complexities, businesses have become cumbersome more than ever. Technical jargons are out of reach of people than ever. Message conveyed in words attracts very less people and may not be able to retain their interests. Here graphics come to rescue. Graphics can provide each necessary information in a creative way. A good graphic attracts near about 85% more people and has proven to retain their interest and people tend to read more if they are fascinated by the graphics.<\/p><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-5 align-self-md-center\"><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><img class=\"img-fluid img_border Creates Strong Impression wow zoomIn\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/creates-strong-impression.jpg\" alt=\"\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\" \/><\/div><div class=\"col-md-7 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>3) Creates Strong Impression<\/strong><\/h2><p class=\"justify\">A good graphic not only delivers the information but creates a strong impact on people. People tend to get more involved in graphics than words. Extrapolations say that around 85% of people are attracted to graphics and indulge in business seeing their graphic potentials only. Words might be forgotten, but a message through a video or graphic is far more intimidating to the scavenging minds.<\/p><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-7 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>4) Preserving Customer Interest<\/strong><\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Web of today has become so swift that even minute information isn\u2019t out of its reach. Since people have limited time today, they rely on the graphics to understand the stories. Now if people find these graphics cumbersome, less readable or less attractive, they might jump to other sites. To maintain their interest in your graphics, it is must to develop creative, readable and involving visuals.<\/p><\/div><\/div><div class=\"col-md-5 align-self-md-center\"><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><img class=\"img-fluid Preserving Customer Interest wow zoomIn\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/preserving-customer-interest.jpg\" alt=\"\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\" \/><\/div><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-5 align-self-md-center\"><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><img class=\"img-fluid Graphics are the Story Tellers wow zoomIn\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/the-story-tellers.jpg\" alt=\"\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\" data-wow-delay=\".2s\" \/><\/div><div class=\"col-md-7 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>5) Graphics are the Story Tellers<\/strong><\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Good visuals with perfect graphics can narrate a whole story and can leave an impression of eternity in readers\u2019 minds. A perfectly woven graphic along with carefully stitched words narrates the success stories of the firm and creates a personal bond between the potential clients and the company.<\/p><\/div><\/div><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-md-7 ml-auto align-self-center\"><div class=\"tw-web-analytics-content\"><h2><strong>Techies Infotech<\/strong><\/h2>Graphic designing is no doubt an essential part of the corporate world.
