					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[The Art of Keyword Research: Finding the Right Keywords for Your SEO Strategy]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/?p=18585</link>
		<pubDate></pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=18585</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-weight: 400;">As the digital landscape becomes increasingly crowded, finding ways to stand out from the competition has become more challenging than ever. This is where the art of keyword research comes into play. By understanding the language and search habits of your target audience, you can uncover the keywords that will drive the right traffic to your website and improve your search engine rankings. In this article, we'll explore the ins and outs of keyword research, from brainstorming keyword ideas to tracking and analyzing keyword performance. Get ready to master the art of keyword research and take your SEO strategy to the next level.</span>

<b>Understanding Your Target Audience</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Before you can begin researching keywords, it's important to identify your target audience. Who are the people you want to reach with your content and products? What are their needs and pain points? What motivates them to make a purchase or engage with your brand? By answering these questions, you can create a clear picture of your ideal customer.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Once you've identified your target audience, it's time to conduct research to learn more about them. This can include analyzing your website and social media analytics, conducting surveys or focus groups, or reviewing industry reports and studies. The goal is to gather as much data as possible to understand your audience's behavior, preferences, and habits.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">With the data you've collected, you can create buyer personas, which are fictional representations of your ideal customers. Buyer personas can include demographic information, such as age, gender, and location, as well as psychographic information, such as values, interests, and motivations. By creating detailed buyer personas, you can tailor your keyword research and content strategy to meet the needs of your target audience.</span>

<b>Brainstorming Keyword Ideas</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">One of the best sources for keyword ideas is your own knowledge and expertise in your industry. Consider the terms and phrases you use when describing your products or services. What are the common questions or concerns that your customers have? Brainstorm a list of keywords that reflect your knowledge and expertise.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Another great source of keyword ideas is your competitors. Analyze their website and content to identify the keywords they are targeting. This can give you insight into the language and terminology that resonates with your target audience. You can also use tools like SEMrush or Ahrefs to analyze your competitors' keywords and identify opportunities to differentiate your keyword strategy.</span>

<b>Utilizing Keyword Research Tools</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Keyword research tools can make the process of finding the right keywords for your SEO strategy faster and more efficient. Here are some popular keyword research tools to consider:</span>
<ul>
 	<li aria-level="1"><b>Google Keyword Planner</b></li>
</ul>
<span style="font-weight: 400;">Google Keyword Planner is a free tool that provides data on search volume, competition level, and suggested bid for specific keywords. It also provides keyword ideas based on a website or seed keyword, and allows you to filter by location, language, and other parameters.</span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_modified><![CDATA[2023-05-15 12:38:07]]></wp:post_modified>
		<wp:post_modified_gmt><![CDATA[2023-05-15 12:38:07]]></wp:post_modified_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status><![CDATA[open]]></wp:comment_status>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to increase conversion with web designing practices ?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-increase-conversion-with-web-designing-practices/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 21 Mar 2020 00:04:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=260</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Each website has only the first few seconds to entice users with a convincing and attractive landing page before they leave. And if you fail to grab their attention, something is lacking with your website, and conversions will never happen.

Without a significant conversion rate, all the traffic to your site makes little sense. If you want your website to have a staggering ROI, it is essential that you start working on conversion rate optimization.

According to&nbsp;<a href="https://credibility.stanford.edu/guidelines/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">research from Stanford University</a>&nbsp;75% of the crowd say a website’s design is the most crucial criterion for deciding if a company is credible or not. So it’s very important that your design looks eye catchy, professional and is easy to navigate. .

Furthermore, 94 per cent of first impressions are based entirely on website design. Before your user reads a single word on a web page, he or she already has an impression of your digital marketing company.
<h4>Importance of web design practices</h4>
Many experts or marketers already know the value of content-based strategies for creating leads like SEO, social media, or creating lead magnets.

But they often focus on building a website that’s also visually appealing. And while all those content-based strategies are still exceptional tools to create leads, web design can actually have a substantial effect on your conversion rates.

But the simple aesthetic features of your website also plays a vital role in conversion rate optimization.

According to GoodFirms,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.goodfirms.co/resources/web-design-research-small-business" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">38.5% of users&nbsp;</a>will leave a site with an old design. And 34.6% will disappear due to bad content modules.So if you want the majority of users to read your articles, blog posts, your content should have exceptional quality. It should be fun to look at, too. Not taking the time to design your website’s layout could cost you more than one-third of your potential leads.

We will go through some important website design practices that will provide a boost to the conversion rate of your website. If you want more product sales or business leads, then start paying attention NOW.
<h4>Use consistent branding throughout the site</h4>
Marketers often misunderstand how consistent branding benefits. More specifically, they’re not aware of how great&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">branding enhances conversions.</a>

For example, Apple is an organization that has mastered the fine art of branding. It’s not just about the specific Apple logo; every component of Apple’s website conveys its brand values: sleek design, essential tools, and elegance.

Before you start working on a web design project, decide what you want to present. Base it on your business values, beliefs, and target users.
<h4>Colour matters</h4>
When you’re deciding the colour scheme of your website, don’t take the decisions lightly. The colours you choose play a vital role in making your website’s look pretty. They also make your users feel a certain way.

In other words, your font and button colours should be in high contrast with the background, like a white background with black text, for example. And the product items that you want to highlight, such as subscribe buttons, should be in a colour that stands out from the rest of your website. .
<h4>Utilize white space</h4>
The human eye naturally gets attracted to unique things. For example, a tall guy gets so much attention compared to short people. In a similar sense, when it comes to CTAs, visitors would notice something uniqu
<h4>Minimize text</h4>
Stop filling your sites with so much content. There should be very minimal text on the homepage and your landing pages of your site. This is a major issue while analyzing websites. Sure, you’ve got a lot of words or stories to tell. You want to tell your website users all about you,<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/digital-marketing-agency-vs-freelancers-vs-team.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;digital marketing agency&nbsp;</a>digital marketing agencyyour brand, and your products. That’s good. You simply need to learn how to summarize that story in just a few sentences — or even better, just a few words.
<h4>Optimize the speed of the website</h4>
Users are usually very impatient when it comes to surfing the web. They need a fast solution to the issue they are facing. According to research, a delay of 1 second in the site loading time can cost you up to 7% in the conversions, which is quite big! This means when it comes to the speed of your website, every second is very precious, and therefore, solving the problems with no time is mandatory.

There are some free tools to know page speed and troubleshoot the related issues:-
<ol>
 	<li>Google PageSpeed Insights</li>
 	<li>Sucuri</li>
 	<li>GTmetrix</li>
 	<li>KeyCDN</li>
 	<li>Pingdom</li>
</ol>
<h4>Video landing page</h4>
A landing page is a standalone web page mainly built to&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/avoid-video-marketing-mistakes.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">advertise your products or services&nbsp;</a>effectively. Until now, designers were making the use of infographics and text in the landing pages to get users, but now is the era to go for the video landing pages. In fact, according to the latest research, video landing pages can enhance the conversion rate by 80%. The reason for this increment is that the video tells you the story about your product, which was not provided with static images. So, when a user watches a video, he/she gets emotionally attached to it, which offers an opportunity for conversion.
<h4>Optimize your design for mobile devices</h4>
According to Alexa rankings, 80% of the popular sites are optimized for mobile devices. That’s because mobile platforms are becoming the new normal. More than half of the website pages are served to mobile devices across the globe. Mobile Internet traffic has officially surpassed system usage. That trend is continuing to grow. 94% of users will judge a website based on a responsive design. So if elements of your site design aren’t responsive, they need to be fixed or modified immediately. A mobile-optimized website is not only important for the customer experience, but it’s important for SEO aspects as well.
<h4>Remove sliders and carousels</h4>
At one time, website design best practices welcomed the use of sliders and carousels. Now, however, they’re recognized as a source of friction. According to SiteTuners, all carousels and sliders do is bloat your website, waste your users’ time, and push down the navigation and other important content. If you’re utilizing rotating banners, consider eliminating them to enhance conversions
<h4>Prioritize SEO</h4>
We briefly touched on this aspect earlier when we mentioned mobile-friendly websites. But everything you do on your site&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/top-five-website-optimization-techniques.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">site needs to revolve around SEO.&nbsp;</a>needs to revolve around SEO. 93% of all Internet experiences begin with a search engine. So your SEO strategy must go far beyond just adding essential keywords to your content.
<h4>Final thoughts</h4>
Here, we at Techies Infotech, have tried to give some of the most interesting web design tips which help you to boost the conversion rate. We’re utilizing these techniques, and we have found some exceptional outcomes with that.
<h2>Why choose us?</h2>
Techies Infotech, the best&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing company in India.&nbsp;</a>builds, manages, and provides digital support to the various clients across the globe. We are committed to helping you enhance your business growth and gain an excellent online reputation with unique digital marketing services for your business. It does not matter whether you are a newcomer or startup or a well-established digital marketing company in India. Our highly skilled professionals are versed and refined at uplifting all kinds of businesses in the digital world. We, at Techies Infotech, strategically work upon a master plan using all efficient platforms to attain your expected business goals in a promising time.]]></content:encoded>

That\u2019s good. You simply need to learn how to summarize that story in just a few sentences \u2014 or even better, just a few words.<\/p><h4>Optimize the speed of the website<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Users are usually very impatient when it comes to surfing the web. They need a fast solution to the issue they are facing. According to research, a delay of 1 second in the site loading time can cost you up to 7% in the conversions, which is quite big! This means when it comes to the speed of your website, every second is very precious, and therefore, solving the problems with no time is mandatory.<br \/><br \/>There are some free tools to know page speed and troubleshoot the related issues:-<\/p><ol><li>Google PageSpeed Insights<\/li><li>Sucuri<\/li><li>GTmetrix<\/li><li>KeyCDN<\/li><li>Pingdom<\/li><\/ol><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>Video landing page<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">A landing page is a standalone web page mainly built to\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/avoid-video-marketing-mistakes.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">advertise your products or services\u00a0<\/a>effectively. Until now, designers were making the use of infographics and text in the landing pages to get users, but now is the era to go for the video landing pages. In fact, according to the latest research, video landing pages can enhance the conversion rate by 80%. The reason for this increment is that the video tells you the story about your product, which was not provided with static images. So, when a user watches a video, he\/she gets emotionally attached to it, which offers an opportunity for conversion.<\/p><h4>Optimize your design for mobile devices<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">According to Alexa rankings, 80% of the popular sites are optimized for mobile devices. That\u2019s because mobile platforms are becoming the new normal. More than half of the website pages are served to mobile devices across the globe. Mobile Internet traffic has officially surpassed system usage. That trend is continuing to grow. 94% of users will judge a website based on a responsive design. So if elements of your site design aren\u2019t responsive, they need to be fixed or modified immediately. A mobile-optimized website is not only important for the customer experience, but it\u2019s important for SEO aspects as well.<\/p><h4>Remove sliders and carousels<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">At one time, website design best practices welcomed the use of sliders and carousels. Now, however, they\u2019re recognized as a source of friction. According to SiteTuners, all carousels and sliders do is bloat your website, waste your users\u2019 time, and push down the navigation and other important content. If you\u2019re utilizing rotating banners, consider eliminating them to enhance conversions<\/p><h4>Prioritize SEO<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">We briefly touched on this aspect earlier when we mentioned mobile-friendly websites. But everything you do on your site\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/top-five-website-optimization-techniques.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">site needs to revolve around SEO.\u00a0<\/a>needs to revolve around SEO. 93% of all Internet experiences begin with a search engine. So your SEO strategy must go far beyond just adding essential keywords to your content.<\/p><h4>Final thoughts<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Here, we at Techies Infotech, have tried to give some of the most interesting web design tips which help you to boost the conversion rate. We\u2019re utilizing these techniques, and we have found some exceptional outcomes with that.<\/p><h2>Why choose us?<\/h2><p>Techies Infotech, the best\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">digital marketing company in India.\u00a0<\/a>builds, manages, and provides digital support to the various clients across the globe. We are committed to helping you enhance your business growth and gain an excellent online reputation with unique digital marketing services for your business. It does not matter whether you are a newcomer or startup or a well-established digital marketing company in India. Our highly skilled professionals are versed and refined at uplifting all kinds of businesses in the digital world. We, at Techies Infotech, strategically work upon a master plan using all efficient platforms to attain your expected business goals in a promising time.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"1d77","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"41644db","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"376","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Benefits of collaborating with White Label PPC Agency]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/benefits-of-collaborating-with-white-label-ppc-agency/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 04 Feb 2020 00:06:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=265</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[White label PPC reselling is a new term that is associated with taking PPC services from a company and selling it to your clients with your brand name or label. The concept of White label PPC agency can be understood by understanding the normal PPC model.

Pay-per-click (PPC) is a model for advertising on the internet by which you can drive more traffic on your websites. It is also known as cost-per-click (CPC). Here, one who wants to advertise makes payment to a publisher that can be website owner, a network of websites or a search engine on clicking of advertisement.

Commonly it is associated with first-tier search engines like Bing Ads and Google Ads. Advertisers make bidding on phrases of keywords that are meaningful to their target market. Alternatively, instead of using a bidding system, content sites mostly have fixed charges for price per click. By PPC, websites show banner ads in the form of advertisements with agreed content to show ads.&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/tips-for-success-in-social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Social media networks</a>&nbsp;like Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook, and Pinterest are currently using the PPC model. Websites can also provide PPC ads that are called sponsored ads or sponsored links.

According to Wikipedia, in 2014, of the total US$66 Billion of Google’s annual revenue, online advertising or PPC(Adwords) attributed about US$45 billion.

Further, a service for an advertisement that business to business companies can rebrand, buy and resell by themselves is known as white label PPC. To refer, the white-label service provider offers white label services to agencies that later manage PPC campaigns of their business clients as well as sell to them.

Services for white-label PPC can include consultancy services, reports, PPC campaigns, and so on. In simple terms, you can resell managed digital advertising services under your brand to local businesses.
<h3>WHY SHOULD WE COLLABORATE WITH WHITE LABEL PPC AGENCY?</h3>
White-label PPC campaigns are beneficial for your business as well as your clients for the company. It offers you the highest level of campaign management and optimization if having proficient digital advertisers.

It’s an excellent way to provide the best possible&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-vs-ppc-which-is-better.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PPC services to your clients</a>&nbsp;effectively and quickly to expand service offerings. By handling all the details of PPC campaign management, the white label partner helps you focus on delivering outstanding customer service and core business operations.
<h4>AIDS TO EXPAND SERVICE OFFERINGS</h4>
Outsourcing white label PPC agency lowers the risk of losing clients to the competition, simultaneously helps you to enhance your service offerings. It is helpful to all whether you are an independent consultant or a web developer, small digital marketing agency or a traditional advertising agency. It gives all solutions under your brand by working under the cloak of secrecy, so clients never know that you have associated with the third party.
<h4>SERVICES BY EXPERT PPC TEAM</h4>
Employees working at a white label PPC agency are trained experts having many years of valuable and practical experience. Usually, a team of PPC professionals hired by White label service providers are diverse and are veterans to work in association with different industries. By such you take services from the expert PPC team to obtain results in focus to ROI.
<h4>DO NOT NEED TO EXPAND MUCH ON TRAINING AND RECRUITMENT</h4>
Partnering a white label PPC agency is the right solution if you are unwilling and lack the resources to invest in hiring a full-time PPC team. Eventually, it cuts down the cost of training employees for PPC and saves the money that you need to expend for recruiting new employees for building a PPC team.
<h4>EFFICIENCY AND TIME MANAGEMENT</h4>
By availing your competent PPC team in a shorter time for best solutions, hiring white label PPC agency improves efficiency and time management. Ultimately, you get rated as a top-rated PPC solution provider by running a campaign within days rather than weeks.
<h4>RENDERS SOLUTION OF HIGH QUALITY</h4>
Irrefutably, the solutions you provide by outsourcing services by white label PPC agency are of high quality. By such, you can&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/increase-traffic-on-landing-page.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">generate better website traffic</a>&nbsp;as well as get a reasonable rate of conversion by generating quality leads. White label PPC agency monitors for data analysis and optimization that helps you to obtain steady ROI by PPC campaigns.
<h4>OFFERS YOU FLEXIBILITY</h4>
It gives you the option to quickly hire a bigger team for PPC professionals to meet your demand and alternatively, you can reduce the services if according to your current needs. The flexibility it offers to grow a team of PPC professionals within some time fades away from your stress and panic.
<h4>BOOST REPUTATION OF YOUR BUSINESS</h4>
Outsourcing by white label PPC agency offers you to bag PPC campaigns with even multinational audience that otherwise you would have refused due to lack of expertise. Besides, it showcases your clients that you are the service provider to boost the reputation of your business.
<h3>Our success stories</h3>
<h4>Increasing brand awareness for Vardaan hospital</h4>
One of our clients i.e., Vardaan hospital, approached us to run a video marketing campaign on YouTube and Facebook. The objective of the campaign was to get brand awareness. With a budget of INR 20,000, we achieved 125k impressions and 50.8k views on the video.
<h4>Lead generation campaign using Google Ads</h4>
Another client of ours approached us to start a lead generation campaign for a newly launched service in the region. We chose Google Ads and worked on a landing page for better conversions. With a budget of INR 45000, we achieved 2.3k clicks on the landing page with 317 leads.
<h4>Increasing brand awareness for Dr. Shayna</h4>
Dr. Shayna approached us to run a video marketing campaign on Youtube and Facebook for the objective of brand awareness. The campaign ran from 23 Dec to 31 Dec, and we achieved 117K impressions and 18.7K views under the budget of 10K.
<h4>Promotion of Google Map listing for Kapurthala Lakme Salon</h4>
Kapurthala Lakme Salon approached us to promote their Google Map listing. They were having budget of Rs. 16, 295, and we achieved 25, 705 impressions as well as 900 clicks for them. Also, in our achievement, there were 61 verified calls and 1263 Map actions with 113 conversions.
<h3>ABOUT TECHIES INFOTECH(INDIA)</h3>
Techies Infotech is among the top digital marketing companies in India that helps you to get ROI by PPC campaigns through a white label PPC agency.

We at Techies take pride in leveraging your business by PPC campaigns that is the most result-oriented method to get higher traffic on your website to generate a better conversion rate.

Besides, whether you need web development, social media marketing, or&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/schema-markup-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO services in India</a>, we have a proficient team to render solutions up to your satisfaction.

Our services have continuously helped enterprises from different sectors to stay ahead of their competition in the market.

We ensure you to work as rocket fuel for you to multiply your income as we have a reputation for offering the best quality&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing services in India.</a>

If you are an established company or just a startup, contact us, providers of result-oriented PPC services in India and throughout the world.]]></content:encoded>

By handling all the details of PPC campaign management, the white label partner helps you focus on delivering outstanding customer service and core business operations.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>AIDS TO EXPAND SERVICE OFFERINGS<\/h4><p>Outsourcing white label PPC agency lowers the risk of losing clients to the competition, simultaneously helps you to enhance your service offerings. It is helpful to all whether you are an independent consultant or a web developer, small digital marketing agency or a traditional advertising agency. It gives all solutions under your brand by working under the cloak of secrecy, so clients never know that you have associated with the third party.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>SERVICES BY EXPERT PPC TEAM<\/h4><p>Employees working at a white label PPC agency are trained experts having many years of valuable and practical experience. Usually, a team of PPC professionals hired by White label service providers are diverse and are veterans to work in association with different industries. By such you take services from the expert PPC team to obtain results in focus to ROI.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>DO NOT NEED TO EXPAND MUCH ON TRAINING AND RECRUITMENT<\/h4><p>Partnering a white label PPC agency is the right solution if you are unwilling and lack the resources to invest in hiring a full-time PPC team. Eventually, it cuts down the cost of training employees for PPC and saves the money that you need to expend for recruiting new employees for building a PPC team.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>EFFICIENCY AND TIME MANAGEMENT<\/h4><p>By availing your competent PPC team in a shorter time for best solutions, hiring white label PPC agency improves efficiency and time management. Ultimately, you get rated as a top-rated PPC solution provider by running a campaign within days rather than weeks.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>RENDERS SOLUTION OF HIGH QUALITY<\/h4><p>Irrefutably, the solutions you provide by outsourcing services by white label PPC agency are of high quality. By such, you can\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/increase-traffic-on-landing-page.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">generate better website traffic<\/a>\u00a0as well as get a reasonable rate of conversion by generating quality leads. White label PPC agency monitors for data analysis and optimization that helps you to obtain steady ROI by PPC campaigns.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>OFFERS YOU FLEXIBILITY<\/h4><p>It gives you the option to quickly hire a bigger team for PPC professionals to meet your demand and alternatively, you can reduce the services if according to your current needs. The flexibility it offers to grow a team of PPC professionals within some time fades away from your stress and panic.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>BOOST REPUTATION OF YOUR BUSINESS<\/h4><p>Outsourcing by white label PPC agency offers you to bag PPC campaigns with even multinational audience that otherwise you would have refused due to lack of expertise. Besides, it showcases your clients that you are the service provider to boost the reputation of your business.<br \/><br \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Our success stories<\/h3><h4>Increasing brand awareness for Vardaan hospital<\/h4><p>One of our clients i.e., Vardaan hospital, approached us to run a video marketing campaign on YouTube and Facebook. The objective of the campaign was to get brand awareness. With a budget of INR 20,000, we achieved 125k impressions and 50.8k views on the video.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>Lead generation campaign using Google Ads<\/h4><p>Another client of ours approached us to start a lead generation campaign for a newly launched service in the region. We chose Google Ads and worked on a landing page for better conversions. With a budget of INR 45000, we achieved 2.3k clicks on the landing page with 317 leads.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>Increasing brand awareness for Dr. Shayna<\/h4><p>Dr. Shayna approached us to run a video marketing campaign on Youtube and Facebook for the objective of brand awareness. The campaign ran from 23 Dec to 31 Dec, and we achieved 117K impressions and 18.7K views under the budget of 10K.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>Promotion of Google Map listing for Kapurthala Lakme Salon<\/h4><p>Kapurthala Lakme Salon approached us to promote their Google Map listing. They were having budget of Rs. 16, 295, and we achieved 25, 705 impressions as well as 900 clicks for them. Also, in our achievement, there were 61 verified calls and 1263 Map actions with 113 conversions.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>ABOUT TECHIES 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Top reasons to build a Mobile app for your Business]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/top-reasons-to-build-a-mobile-app-for-your-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 16 Mar 2020 00:03:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=277</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Being multi-channel has become one of the prominent features to excel in this modern digital world. It has become a significant business challenge to create an effective presence in the channels that further connect you with prospective customers.

If you are looking forward to coming in contact with your target audience in terms of business, then you should undoubtedly consider developing mobile apps for your business as it serves as one of the most robust tools.

This is because every individual in today’s world has access to a smartphone, and this market is consistently growing. As one of the best&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/mobile-app-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">mobile app development companies in India,</a>&nbsp;Techies Infotech vouches for the development of the mobile application for your business.

Therefore, our team of the best mobile app developers have created this post to make you aware of the top reasons why you should consider building a mobile app for your business.
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Boosts Sales</h4>
Mobile apps have emerged as a new and powerful channel through which you can enhance your company’s profitability. By putting bonus, promotion and discount notifications, you can stimulate your customers to make the purchases.

You can directly approach your users who have already installed your app. For instance, you can send special offers to your clients who are closer to your store or office using geolocation technologies offline.

Yet another benefit of the app is the convenience of making payments through mobile, which is growing at a fast pace.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Building audience</h4>
Irrespective of the location of your customers you can establish a relationship with them. There is no need for your clientele to remember your web address because the app installed on their device serves their purpose.

Based upon the functionality, the user can even access it without the internet. Every user who installs your business app gets into your informational space. Subsequently, it is great to use different methods to enhance the number of installations, such as offering bonuses and discounts in return.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Marketing and communication channels</h4>
Mobile applications drive the audience’s attention to your&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/mobile-app-branding-strategies.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">brand through different marketing</a>&nbsp;campaigns. This further enables you to expand the prospective audience of clients and foster loyal relationships with them.

The fact remains that launching a personalised mobile app serves as the advertising step as it enables you to utilise different marketing tools. For instance, you can post news on relevant articles or even send out press releases.

Most important of all you can receive valuable feedback from your customers through running polls, conducting surveys and also enabling the users to report errors and so forth.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Optimises processes of business</h4>
Building a mobile app enables your employees to have international interactions, observe and manage the processes, exchanging data and files, and gathering statistics, and so on.

Mobile applications are the best possible native solutions for enterprises and even automates multiple business activities. Developing products targeted only for the internal use of the company is quite a usual practice.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Enhances customer loyalty</h4>
Allowing your customers to book a table, place an order or pay for their order through an app installed on their smartphones makes the business powerful enough to amplify the loyalty.

Incorporating loyalty programs within the mobile application and sharing valuable promotions, discounts and bonuses with the customers. You can reap maximum benefits by customising tools by transmitting push notifications regarding new discounts and promotions.

You can provide the users exclusive offers and special bonuses who have installed the app. In case people require additional information regarding your company or its products and services that you provide, they can always access it round the clock through the mobile app. Persistent interaction amplifies loyalty and further an excellent commitment to optimises sales.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Serves as a source of valuable analytics</h4>
By leveraging a mobile application, you can gather massive useful information for future assessment. For example, you can learn about the products that your customers purchase the most.

Also, you can keep a track as to how much time they spend on the application. Not only this, but you can also view what all functions are mostly in use and which are the ones that are least used.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Get the best mobile apps from our expert mobile app developers at Techies Infotech</h3>
If you too believe that getting a mobile app for your business can drive your sales and&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">advertise your brand exponentially,</a>&nbsp;then you are thinking right.

We at Techies Infotech have a committed team of mobile app developers who are experienced and are well versed with the latest technologies in the industry to serve you with the best mobile app for your business.

Our mobile app developers in India are proficient in developing iOS and Android apps for your devices. We build apps that inspire your clients and steer sales for your Organisation. Your satisfaction is our primary objective.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Tips for Success in Social Media Marketing]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/tips-for-success-in-social-media-marketing/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Dec 2019 00:04:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=320</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[A large part of Digital Marketing revolves around social media marketing. Irrespective of the fact as to whether it is a B2C firm or a B2B firm, social media is something which seamlessly integrates into the campaign as well as organic traffic optimisation requirements.

For those who have even the remotest of the clue as to what digital marketing trends are and how does the entire digital marketing experience works, one must have noticed that some of the best backlinks and quality traffic are generated through the social media handles alone.

However, acing the entire social media marketing thing isn’t as easy given the multiple filters involved and the complexity of understanding what would the audience want and then what would finally click with the right people so that our purpose of driving quality traffic or lead generation gets solved.

In this blog, we will discuss a few critical things which&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">social media marketing companies&nbsp;</a>should keep in mind in order to excel at their work.
<h3>Know your Audience</h3>
A very cliched thing to say and yet we have seen how even the most experienced ones tend to falter here. And faltering at gauging the audience right isn’t surprising.

This is because not all of us have enough money to go about with detailed audience surveys or in-person interviews or focus groups. But, we also need to realise that in the Age of the Internet, we really do not have any dearth of data. We just have to find the right data set.

Hence, before anyone decides on any of the campaigns or even the content calendar, make sure that detailed research is done and a detailed psychographic and demographic profile of the audience type is put on paper.

From there, one needs to go reverse and zero in on what could probably be the likes and dislikes of such a person and what would they be interested in.
<h3>Choose your platform wisely</h3>
A lot of people randomly choose the advertising platform with the reasoning being- “everyone is doing it”. However, that isn’t a correct approach to take. Rather, understand what kind of business you are in and what kind of people would be eventually buying your product or engaging with your service.

Once that is established only then should be the platform finalised. Also, always keep in mind that social media marketing isn’t about just getting leads. It is about generating quality leads!

So, while Google works perfectly for a B2C lead generation campaign, the optimisation wouldn’t be as much for a B2B IT firm and maybe they should look at LinkedIn and Quora instead.
<h3>Choose the correct filters</h3>
This is about the audience and makes more sense as a natural extension of point number one. Once the audience has been defined, no matter&nbsp;<a href="https://www.searchenginejournal.com/biggest-social-media-sites/308897/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">what platform you choose,&nbsp;</a>you will have to identify and finalise the traits or interest areas or activities they could engage in in order to target the right set of people.

Make sure that the options you choose are in sync with your audience definition. You may even list down the probable options and then go back and compare and validate it with adequate research.

Please understand that the right targeting in social media marketing is actually more than halfway to a good campaign result.
<h3>Consistency Matters-Paid promotions over time</h3>
Now this one is a hack you should definitely try out. Spending a large chunk of money for a limited number of days does not yield many results but a moderate amount of money spread over a larger period of time does.

Hence, whenever you are going for social media marketing, always look out at the tentative reach that the campaign manager shows. It isn’t totally accurate but it gives an idea good enough!
<h3>Social Media to Use</h3>
Keep reading and keep yourself abreast about the algorithmic changes that the social media handles go through. For instance, Facebook was once all about text, then it started giving more weight to images and now it is videos.

Same with Google Display network too which provides an outlet to advertise on partner sites too! Hence, always make sure that your budgetary allocation or even organic posts are more in tandem with the prevalent media.
<h3>Keep Track of your ROIs</h3>
Do it daily- literally every day you should keep a tab on the kind of reach and engagement your post is getting and analyse it critically! One needs to understand that while reports do look like a nausea-inducing bunch of numbers, they actually have a lot of hidden insights. So, always keep track of whatever you are doing, whatever you are spending and what is coming out of it.

While we could have suggested a few courses which you could have taken and worked on, yet we thought that it would be better if we suggested the few hacks which actually makes all the difference.

Do use these in your daily SMM and we would love to know how well these worked for you.

It is also possible that you may be just beginning with social media management and hence might not feel as confident about the operations.

Our suggestion would thus be to engage with a good social media marketing company which will guide you through the process. The engagement with such a social media management firm will give you an added advantage of the experience of multiple professionals bundled into one and would thus help you with not just strategizing well but also an effective execution.

At Techies Infotech, we provide holistic solutions for your digital needs. Be it an interactive website development on the platform of your choice or providing&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing strategies&nbsp;</a>and optimized content or managing your social media and paid campaigns. We also provide creative services in the form of graphics as well as video development. And finally, for those who are looking at learning about all things digital or in other words the Internet of Things (IoT), we have custom curated e-learning courses too.]]></content:encoded>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Digital Marketing Agency vs Freelancers vs In-House Team]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/digital-marketing-agency-vs-freelancers-vs-in-house-team/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 18 Feb 2020 00:02:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=324</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[The business world is continuously changing and has shifted so much in the past few years to the extent that it’s less essential than ever before to have a physical working space. It is possible to create a successful brand with a pool of talent that is spread internationally, thanks to how the gig economy has modified the way business is done.

While considering digital marketing services, you have several choices, and you need to work on the one that is most appropriate for your digital marketing requirements.

One of the most vital pieces to developing a successful business is making sure that you have a long-term and strong marketing approach. Who you choose to build your marketing strategy will make all the difference. You can go for a digital agency or a freelance marketer or an in-house team.

As we know, each project is different, and there’s no single point to answer, which is the most suitable option to hire - freelancers or digital marketing firms or in-house teams. Here we have evaluated some factors on which you can make your decision.
<h3>Cost</h3>
The costs are an essential factor in this decision. In the long run, your organization needs to be profitable. However, the cheapest solution is not always acceptable.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
When you&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">hire a digital marketing agency,</a>&nbsp;you’ll be paying per project or month. Usually, they work on a contract basis, and they cost quite well than a freelancer but less than an in-house team in the long-run. Despite the fact that a company’s hourly rate would be higher than your full-time employee, you won’t be needing to pay for extra costs, taxes, benefits, or have to go for the other costs associated with full-time groups.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
From several aspects, having an in-house team sounds quite attractive. That all sounds good until you have to consider the costs and the substantial budget that you need for a marketing team. Recruiting full-time top-tier marketing professionals will be tough because you need to be offering very competitive salaries and facilities.

When you’re hiring an in-house team, you also have to consider the turnover cost where a team member leaves after you’ve spent time and money training them and paying their salaries.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancers</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Freelancers are usually well-rounded experts. It is perfect hiring a freelancer is far less expensive than hiring an in-house team or a digital marketing agency. When hiring an in-house team, you are not only ready to pay the salary, but you also have to pay for any training required and other additional facilities. Then there is always a risk that they leave you after some time for a better opportunity. If your company doesn’t have a handsome budget, then you should go for a freelancer.
<h3>Capabilities and Expertise</h3>
Capabilities and expertise are also important factors for your decision.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Hiring a digital marketing agency is great if you’re looking for all types of services ready for you to grab at the same time. You pay a fixed amount and get precisely what you need. The company’s employees are often highly regarded, and agencies also tend to attract subpar execution brilliance, with highly skilled professionals tending to prefer to freelance or working in the right operational role.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Due to technology evolving at full tilt, having all the expertise you might need in the same place is becoming more and more unlikely. If you’re looking to improve your services, for example, it’s better for you to hire a social media specialist, PPC specialist, an SEO specialist….etc, instead of just one marketing team with fewer resources.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancer</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Just like a company, freelancers work with different customers who bring them an exceptional insight of varying business structures and industries. If the freelancer you are working with specializes in content writing, this means that they have worked with some different brands in the specific areas of content writing.
<h3>Control and Management</h3>
In addition to figuring out how much cost you want to spend on your new marketing solution, you will also have to discuss the control and management of the expertise that varies depending on your decision.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
In the case of an agency, it is quite literally the agency’s responsibility to manage, plan, set goals, deadlines, make objectives, define standards, take care of the team and expect any possible glitches.

Another benefit is the fact that&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/outsourcing-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing companies in India</a>&nbsp;also deal with any further maintenance in regards to your project. For example, they will take care of future errors or any needed updates.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Managing a whole team is not easy, and it’s a costly option on a tight budget. It will also require your continuous involvement to get work done.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancer</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Independence is the norm for freelancers, and you won’t need to spend much time invested in the project, training them from scratch or overlooking their every step. They would be a great choice if you do not want to be involved in the nooks and crannies of your project and are only focused on excellent results.
<h3>Flexibility</h3>
Being flexible in the digital world is a huge benefit and can set yourself apart from passive competitors.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency and In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Both agencies and in-house employees have the same graph of flexibility. In the end, they are both full-time employees with less flexibility when it comes to when and how they can perform and the expertise they have.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancer</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
A freelancer works remotely, so they can quickly adapt to your schedule and routine. They can provide fast updates and fixes to your marketing campaigns. Since you are working with only one person, there is no corporate administration to cope with.

A recent study shows that 53 million Americans – almost 34 percent of the workforce – are now performing as freelancers, and it is their prime or supplemental source of income. In 2020, 40 percent of the U.S. workforce is expected to become freelancers.
<h3>Quality of Results</h3>
Quality of work is the key factor to consider. Collaborating with employees who serve high-quality work is essential.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Hiring a professional digital marketing company can be expensive. Still, you also get a good value for your cost in terms of quality of outcomes. Agencies make every possible effort to successfully launch a project and provide excellent quality work – even if it comes at a price.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
You can also hire a full-time employee who will give you exceptional results after some training sessions. The problem, however, is while there might be trained employees out there, they might not care too much about submitting exceptional outcomes because their work status often does not directly depend on the quality of the results.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancer</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Freelancers are their bosses. They work on their projects, manage their clients, and strive to turn in their very best every time. Their performance directly depends on client reviews and relationships, and to maintain that, they work hard to keep the client satisfied with extraordinary results.
<h3>Legal Security</h3>
Finding new experts for your digital marketing company or team is already enough work. There shouldn’t be any legal issues that might slow down the process or even affect your business. Therefore, it is all the more essential to deal with legal security.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Agency</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Companies are legal entities. Despite the fact that they provide “stable” cooperation, the procedure is usually tricky with cumbersome contracts and significant commitment.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>In-House</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
When you hire a full-time employee, you have to take care of the legal aspects of their employment. You have to pay bills, benefits, paid leave, facilities, health insurance, and much more, and the legal aspect of hiring new talent can be difficult and tiresome.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Freelancer</h4>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
Freelancers are free birds or private individuals and are the easiest when it comes to legal problems. You have no province to pay additional taxes, and you don’t have to go through lengthy, restricted contracts.
<h3>Who Should You Choose?</h3>
In short, every option provides a different section of the digital marketing industry. It can offer value when selected by the right digital marketing agencies in India.

To select who you should hire for your&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing services in India,</a>&nbsp;you need to think about your company’s objectives, model and team of persons to choose for yourself if you want to make a massive investment into the digital field where you could principally vet, find and hire a digital marketing company that already has all those services ready for you.
<h3>Why choose Techies Infotech - the Best Digital Marketing Company in India?</h3>
Techies Infotech provides effective digital marketing services in India that reap the desired results for business owners. We are big thinkers with a passion for making beautifully crafted digital experiences. Our team of highly skilled professionals believes that as a top-notch digital marketing company from India to overseas, it is our prime responsibility to do something special. Have some trust in us, and we will shift the trajectory of your business towards more success.]]></content:encoded>

You have to pay bills, benefits, paid leave, facilities, health insurance, and much more, and the legal aspect of hiring new talent can be difficult and tiresome.<\/p><ul><li style=\"list-style-type: none;\"><ul><li><h4>Freelancer<\/h4><\/li><\/ul><\/li><\/ul><p class=\"justify\">Freelancers are free birds or private individuals and are the easiest when it comes to legal problems. You have no province to pay additional taxes, and you don\u2019t have to go through lengthy, restricted contracts.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Who Should You Choose?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">In short, every option provides a different section of the digital marketing industry. It can offer value when selected by the right digital marketing agencies in India.<br \/><br \/>To select who you should hire for your\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">digital marketing services in India,<\/a>\u00a0you need to think about your company\u2019s objectives, model and team of persons to choose for yourself if you want to make a massive investment into the digital field where you could principally vet, find and hire a digital marketing company that already has all those services ready for you.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Why choose Techies Infotech - the Best Digital Marketing Company in India?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Techies Infotech provides effective digital marketing services in India that reap the desired results for business owners. We are big thinkers with a passion for making beautifully crafted digital experiences. Our team of highly skilled professionals believes that as a top-notch digital marketing company from India to overseas, it is our prime responsibility to do something special. Have some trust in us, and we will shift the trajectory of your business towards more success.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"1a9c","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"bda90e6","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"5a0f","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[SEO vs PPC - Which one is better?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/seo-vs-ppc-which-one-is-better/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 17 Dec 2019 00:03:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=342</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[It is a long-ago started debate, SEO vs PPC and still continues to be mind-boggling when it comes to picking one. It has always been a tough choice between the two: whether to go with buying your way right to the top of the search engines through pay-per-click (PPC) or nurturing your organic search engine marketing strategy through search engine optimization (SEO).

Deciding upon is really complicated. Therefore we at Techies Infotech, the best&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>digital marketing agency in India</strong></a>&nbsp;helps you in choosing a better strategy. Which is the right approach for you? If you are willing to invest to get immediate traffic on your website, then PPC can be your choice. But in case you are operating on a limited budget, then SEO makes more sense to chase the higher rankings.

Serving as the best digital marketing agency in India, we profess you to take the below discussed three questions into account when you face difficulty in choosing one: SEO or PPC for your business.
<h3>1. How extensive is your budget?</h3>
Prior to everything, you should consider the size of your advertising budget that your business can support. In case you are operating on a shoestring budget or have nothing to spend, then it is advisable to&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">adhere to SEO strategies</a></strong>. However, if you have a little budget to invest in PPC campaigns, then you can try it once as it offers numerous benefits such as:
<h2>Rapid testing</h2>
We recommend concentrating on attaining conversions, irrespective of the nature of the business, whether it is about selling the products, signing up for an email newsletter or some other action. This implies active testing to be conducted on website variants to enhance the rate of conversion. However, these tests need the traffic to yield data, so you might look forward to buying traffic using PPC advertising to achieve quicker results.
<h2>Shielding from SEO algorithm updates</h2>
One of the major challenges faced while using SEO is that its constantly changing algorithms. Whenever the algorithm changes, the pre-existing site that has been optimized can lose it’s tanking and profits, overnight. But if you have invested in traffic, you are guaranteed a stable flow of visitors, irrespective of the modifications by the Google and other search engines.

However, PPC learning comes with a twist. So, begin with minor, highly targeted campaigns and club your PPC campaign with your account on Google Analytics. It helps you analyze which all conversions are from PPC visitors and whether your Rate of Interest is positive or negative.
<h3>2. To what extent is the average CPC of your industry high?</h3>
Besides setting up your total budget for advertising, consider what your competitors are paying for the ads. Usually, PPC enables users to bid what they are willing to invest in the single keyword click, Cost Per Click (CPC). For example, if you want to target and reach out to the audience who search for the keyword ‘medical insurance online’, you access the Traffic Estimator available in the free&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://ads.google.com/intl/en_in/home/tools/keyword-planner/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Google External Keyword Research Tool</a></strong>&nbsp;and look for the average CPC for the phrase.

But an average CPC can vary from lowest to highest, depending upon the market trends. These high prices make it more complex for new advertisers to attain profit from PPC traffic. In such cases, SEO serves as a better choice.
<h3>3. What is the degree of competition of SERPs in your forte?</h3>
One should also identify how competitive the Search Engine Results Pages (SERPs) are your niche’s targeted keywords. To determine this, search for the competition level of these keywords through Google External Keyword Research Tool. Moreover, it also helps you discover the volume of advertisers bidding on your keywords and the standard CPCs.

However in the most aggressive industries, one may encounter the results pages for their targeted keywords to be influenced by authoritative websites. They can be almost impracticable to move without a considerable investment of funds and time. In such circumstances, it is advisable to pay for the traffic using PPC promotions. Nevertheless, it is not always required to come to a choice. When clubbed, SEO and PPC can prove to be quite powerful. Before coming to the decision, examine your business and its needs-based upon these three questions.
<h2>Which one to opt for your Business: PPC or SEO?</h2>
Well as discussed above, being the best digital marketing agency in India, Techies Infotech rests the decision upon the industry and budget of its clients. Preferably, both SEO and a well-planned PPC campaign deliver the best results for any business. You will see a number of clicks and leads coming your way and profits yielded by your business in PPC, whereas in SEO you need to be patient to get rewarded.
<h2>Consult the SEO and PPC Experts at Techies Infotech</h2>
One solution can never fit into two industries when it comes to their digital marketing, so get in touch with our SEO and PPC experts at Techies Infotech to determine the optimal mix for you. We ensure you the best digital marketing services in India, as we hub the professionals who are skilled and creative to establish a plan that widens your budget and generates positive ROI. We are dedicated to marketing your business so that you can focus on the rest of the aspects of your business.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"273d","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"5e9274b","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"7b32","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"6083","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p class=\"justify\">It is a long-ago started debate, SEO vs PPC and still continues to be mind-boggling when it comes to picking one. It has always been a tough choice between the two: whether to go with buying your way right to the top of the search engines through pay-per-click (PPC) or nurturing your organic search engine marketing strategy through search engine optimization (SEO).<br \/><br \/>Deciding upon is really complicated. Therefore we at Techies Infotech, the best\u00a0<a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"><strong>digital marketing agency in India<\/strong><\/a>\u00a0helps you in choosing a better strategy. Which is the right approach for you? If you are willing to invest to get immediate traffic on your website, then PPC can be your choice. But in case you are operating on a limited budget, then SEO makes more sense to chase the higher rankings.<br \/><br \/>Serving as the best digital marketing agency in India, we profess you to take the below discussed three questions into account when you face difficulty in choosing one: SEO or PPC for your business.<\/p><h3>1. How extensive is your budget?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Prior to everything, you should consider the size of your advertising budget that your business can support. In case you are operating on a shoestring budget or have nothing to spend, then it is advisable to\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">adhere to SEO strategies<\/a><\/strong>. However, if you have a little budget to invest in PPC campaigns, then you can try it once as it offers numerous benefits such as:<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Rapid testing<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">We recommend concentrating on attaining conversions, irrespective of the nature of the business, whether it is about selling the products, signing up for an email newsletter or some other action. This implies active testing to be conducted on website variants to enhance the rate of conversion. However, these tests need the traffic to yield data, so you might look forward to buying traffic using PPC advertising to achieve quicker results.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Shielding from SEO algorithm updates<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">One of the major challenges faced while using SEO is that its constantly changing algorithms. Whenever the algorithm changes, the pre-existing site that has been optimized can lose it\u2019s tanking and profits, overnight. But if you have invested in traffic, you are guaranteed a stable flow of visitors, irrespective of the modifications by the Google and other search engines.<br \/><br \/>However, PPC learning comes with a twist. So, begin with minor, highly targeted campaigns and club your PPC campaign with your account on Google Analytics. It helps you analyze which all conversions are from PPC visitors and whether your Rate of Interest is positive or negative.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>2. To what extent is the average CPC of your industry high?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Besides setting up your total budget for advertising, consider what your competitors are paying for the ads. Usually, PPC enables users to bid what they are willing to invest in the single keyword click, Cost Per Click (CPC). For example, if you want to target and reach out to the audience who search for the keyword \u2018medical insurance online\u2019, you access the Traffic Estimator available in the free\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/ads.google.com\/intl\/en_in\/home\/tools\/keyword-planner\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Google External Keyword Research Tool<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0and look for the average CPC for the phrase.<br \/><br \/>But an average CPC can vary from lowest to highest, depending upon the market trends. These high prices make it more complex for new advertisers to attain profit from PPC traffic. In such cases, SEO serves as a better choice.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>3. What is the degree of competition of SERPs in your forte?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">One should also identify how competitive the Search Engine Results Pages (SERPs) are your niche\u2019s targeted keywords. To determine this, search for the competition level of these keywords through Google External Keyword Research Tool. Moreover, it also helps you discover the volume of advertisers bidding on your keywords and the standard CPCs.<br \/><br \/>However in the most aggressive industries, one may encounter the results pages for their targeted keywords to be influenced by authoritative websites. They can be almost impracticable to move without a considerable investment of funds and time. In such circumstances, it is advisable to pay for the traffic using PPC promotions. Nevertheless, it is not always required to come to a choice. When clubbed, SEO and PPC can prove to be quite powerful. Before coming to the decision, examine your business and its needs-based upon these three questions.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Which one to opt for your Business: PPC or SEO?<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Well as discussed above, being the best digital marketing agency in India, Techies Infotech rests the decision upon the industry and budget of its clients. Preferably, both SEO and a well-planned PPC campaign deliver the best results for any business. You will see a number of clicks and leads coming your way and profits yielded by your business in PPC, whereas in SEO you need to be patient to get rewarded.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Consult the SEO and PPC Experts at Techies Infotech<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">One solution can never fit into two industries when it comes to their digital marketing, so get in touch with our SEO and PPC experts at Techies Infotech to determine the optimal mix for you. We ensure you the best digital marketing services in India, as we hub the professionals who are skilled and creative to establish a plan that widens your budget and generates positive ROI. We are dedicated to marketing your business so that you can focus on the rest of the aspects of your business.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"2da0","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"2ae2720","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"6a3","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[7 Important Mobile App Branding Strategies - What Makes It Effective?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/7-important-mobile-app-branding-strategies-what-makes-it-effective/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 27 Aug 2019 00:02:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=352</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[As per the recent surveys, a major section of people these days devote a&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/digital-marketing-in-2019.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">large percentage of their time to digital media</a>&nbsp;</strong>, and that too specifically on the mobile apps. However, if any enterprise is looking to execute a strong and successful branding strategy then the mobile-first approach is very important. Besides connecting and communicating with the customers, the enterprise should also surf for several techniques to uplift their brand’s image.

While serving as one of the best mobile application development company in India, for a while now, we believe that besides developing a mobile app to expand business or brand, it is also important to look out for ways to stand out from the crowd and make your users have an amazing experience. As one of the best app developers in India, we constantly strive to carry out the best and effective mobile app strategies to grab the users’ attention and also fulfill their expectations. So, let’s scroll down to explore the&nbsp;<strong>7 best mobile app branding strategies</strong>&nbsp;along with their effectiveness.
<h3>Choose User-Friendly Design</h3>
The mobile app branding strategies, similar to that of<strong>&nbsp;mobile app development strategy,</strong>&nbsp;should also prioritize the needs and expectations of their end-users. As one of the best app developers in India, we always strive to develop keeping the end-users in mind. It is the functionality, usability, and performance of the app that will directly influence the mobile app branding. However, while developing the app, a developer should not forget to perform A/B testing to comprehend the needs of the user and also analyze the experience perfectly.
<h3>Customizing App’s User Experience</h3>
In case the user experiences bugs or errors while using the app, then the user will be highly impacted. Subsequently, a brand must ensure to get their mobile app tested extensively to avoid any kind of problem to be confronted by the user. Furthermore, to enhance the users’ experience with the brand, the application can be personalized. We at Techies Infotech, provides service of<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/mobile-app-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;mobile application development in India</a></strong>&nbsp;have access to all the latest technologies such as Near Field Communication (NFC), Artificial Intelligence (AI) and machine learning which has certainly eased our task of understanding the preferences and choices of the users. Hence, utilizing the customer data gathered from different sources will help you get your app personalized which further enhances the user experience and brand image.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/mobile-app-branding-strategies-2.jpg" alt="mobile-app-branding-strategies">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>Select the appropriate icon for the Mobile App</h3>
Apart from the name of the mobile app, its icon also plays a vital role in connecting the users to the brand. Therefore, by making an unusual icon, it gets easier for the brand to stand out from the crowd. Also, the mobile app developer should use colour schemes in compliance with the brand’s colour scheme.
<h3>Empower users to Refer and Share the App</h3>
Social networks are one of the primary aspects to be focused by an enterprise while executing the mobile app branding. This is because a large number of users mostly explore different ways to share their experience with the recently downloaded mobile apps. Besides this, they also refer the app to their social media friends, enabling strong marketing. Therefore by allowing users to spread the word about the powerful mobile app through several digital channels, like text messages, social networks, and emails. This will further make the new users aware of downloading the app. This kind of promotions will certainly help the brand emerge as a popular one.
<h3>Consistent Approach</h3>
Just by creating a fancy mobile app, does not mean that you are done with the mobile app branding. However, while our app developers consider various things while developing a mobile app, such as images, logos, and typography. Not only this, while providing the best service in mobile application development in India, we ensure to deliver genuine and appropriate information to the users. It is the consistency that allows the user to remember and revoke the app over a considerable period.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/mobile-app-branding-strategies-3.jpg" alt="mobile-app-branding-strategies">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>Observe and Appraise Competitors</h3>
During the execution of mobile app branding strategies, our team of mobile app developers in India stay abreast of all the latest info in the industry. Moreover, they employ innovative schemes to popularize the brands. Therefore, it is always advisable to the app developers to observe the mobile app branding strategies that are executed by the competitors and also discover the ways to aim for higher scores.
<h3>Effectiveness of these Mobile App Branding Strategies</h3>
In a nutshell, a business or brand has an option to opt from a wide range of mobile app branding strategies. But, being the best mobile app developers in India, we at Techies Infotech believe that this mobile app branding is a continuous process. Therefore, we experiment with a lot of strategies that are effective in getting the best user experience. Furthermore, the aforementioned strategies are best in meeting emerging and changing user preferences.]]></content:encoded>

However, if any enterprise is looking to execute a strong and successful branding strategy then the mobile-first approach is very important.
