As one of the best app developers in India, we always strive to develop keeping the end-users in mind. It is the functionality, usability, and performance of the app that will directly influence the mobile app branding. However, while developing the app, a developer should not forget to perform A\/B testing to comprehend the needs of the user and also analyze the experience perfectly.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Customizing App\u2019s User Experience<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">In case the user experiences bugs or errors while using the app, then the user will be highly impacted. Subsequently, a brand must ensure to get their mobile app tested extensively to avoid any kind of problem to be confronted by the user. Furthermore, to enhance the users\u2019 experience with the brand, the application can be personalized. We at Techies Infotech, provides service of<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/mobile-app-development.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\u00a0mobile application development in India<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0have access to all the latest technologies such as Near Field Communication (NFC), Artificial Intelligence (AI) and machine learning which has certainly eased our task of understanding the preferences and choices of the users. Therefore, by making an unusual icon, it gets easier for the brand to stand out from the crowd. Also, the mobile app developer should use colour schemes in compliance with the brand\u2019s colour scheme.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Empower users to Refer and Share the App<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Social networks are one of the primary aspects to be focused by an enterprise while executing the mobile app branding. This is because a large number of users mostly explore different ways to share their experience with the recently downloaded mobile apps. Besides this, they also refer the app to their social media friends, enabling strong marketing. Therefore by allowing users to spread the word about the powerful mobile app through several digital channels, like text messages, social networks, and emails. This will further make the new users aware of downloading the app. This kind of promotions will certainly help the brand emerge as a popular one.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Consistent Approach<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Just by creating a fancy mobile app, does not mean that you are done with the mobile app branding. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to rank in 2019- the complete SEO checklist]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-rank-in-2019-the-complete-seo-checklist/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 22 Apr 2019 15:15:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=357</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[If you own a business and you look forward to rank your page in 2019, then understanding the Local Google search engine is more vital than ever. Since the Google algorithm prioritizes hyperlocal results, considering the local search marketing is a must. As a matter of fact, digital marketing can be intricate. Thereupon, good local SEO includes both on-site and off-site techniques. It also demands careful reputation management as reviews are now considered as an important factor in ranking on Google for 2019. So, we have put together this&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">local SEO</a></strong>&nbsp;checklist to allow businesses to attract more customers and rank higher in SERPs.
<h2>On-Page SEO Checklist</h2>
<h3>1. Perform Keyword Research</h3>
It is very important to understand the terms that people generally use when searching and the intent behind that search. These factors form one of the most important&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/schema-markup-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO strategies</a></strong>. Ensure that the searcher’s intent and difficulty is being considered. So, select 2 -3 keywords per page and try to start the process with the lower-volume keywords.
<h3>2. Try to infuse your keyword into your Page’s URL</h3>
When you add the keywords to your URL, it forms one of the main ranking signals. According to the recent researches, the shorter URLs receive higher rankings as compared to other URLs. Hence you should refrain from stuffing your URL with the keywords.

<strong>Note:</strong>&nbsp;Since changing a URL that has already been authorized, leads to very serious consequences. So you should avoid doing this if your page has links.
<h3>3. Make your title tag compelling by adding your keyword</h3>
Although, adding the keywords in the title tag is important, yet it is not enough to enjoy a higher rank. Nowadays search engines evaluate in the click-through rate on the results and even while determining ranks. Therefore an attractive and powerful title will encourage more people to click on your page.
<h3>4. Make your meta description powerful by adding your keyword</h3>
Since the search engines do not consider the content of the meta description while ranking, so infusing your keywords in it and drafting a compelling meta description can aid with your CTR.
<h3>5. Ensure and use only one keyword in the H1 tag</h3>
Although the value of the H2, H3,…., H6 tags for SEO is questionable, yet including your primary keyword in your H1 tag is highly recommended. Just ensure that there is only one H1 tag on the entire page

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/seo%202.jpg" alt="How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>6. Use your keyword thrice and make sure you have a minimum of 100 words/page (although 500+ is ideal)</h3>
Ensure that you utilize your primary keyword thrice, each URL having 100 words i.e. minimum (but the more it is the better it is). You can still rank with less, which means it is not important to load your site with unnecessary content. But it is always recommended to create a new page only if you have a content of at least 100 words.
<h3>7. Add descriptive ALT tags and filenames to your pages</h3>
Considering other factors, the search engines see the images merely by reading the ALT tag and the filenames. So try to be explanatory when you name your images.
<h2>Off- Page SEO Checklist</h2>
<h3>1. Use software to analyze your link profile</h3>
Enter your domain name into the software and check out your domain score. Also, look the number of domains you have that are pointing to your site. Then compare it with those of your competitors. Moreover, check if the backlinks are from contextually relevant sites and explore various other analyses.
<h3>2. Assess your competitors’ link profiles</h3>
One of the easiest methods of getting started with link building is by assessing your competitors’ link profiles. Once you discover that where are they seeking their authoritative backlinks from, it will be easier for you to understand their strategy.
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>
<h2>Other Important SEO Checklist</h2>
<h3>1. Check with Google Console for crawl errors, duplicate content errors, missing titles and many more</h3>
This is a free tool powered by Google so that the website owners can get data on the search performance of their websites. Through this, it will be easier for you to find any technical issues with your site such as duplicate content, find data on search rankings, visibility, CTR and more.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/seo%203.jpg" alt="How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes">&nbsp;&nbsp;
<h3>2. Claim your brand’s name on as many social networking sites as possible</h3>
In case of reputation management, you should not only ensure that your account name is not shared with anyone else but also if you are a new website or company, you can often own the first page of a search for your brand.
<h3>3. Employ an SEO audit tool to cross-check everything</h3>
Since performing an SEO audit manually is quite taxing and intricate, there are various SEO audit tools that can help with the protocol. This will further speed up the process by identifying the errors and offering the solutions for the same. Perhaps, you are left with a good time that can be invested in planning the overall strategy rather eliminating the broken links
<h3>Final Thoughts</h3>
Since SEO is a continuous process, it would be difficult to include the important thing in one’s checklist. Therefore we at Techies Infotech are committed to offering the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">best SEO services in India.&nbsp;</a></strong>Having said that our team of experts is adept in tackling the complete SEO checklist to allow you to enjoy higher rankings. As the best SEO company in Amritsar we assert to perform all the possible SEO tasks to keep you ahead of your competitors.]]></content:encoded>

Since the Google algorithm prioritizes hyperlocal results, considering the local search marketing is a must. As a matter of fact, digital marketing can be intricate. So, we have put together this\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">local SEO<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0checklist to allow businesses to attract more customers and rank higher in SERPs.<\/p><h2>On-Page SEO Checklist<\/h2><p>\u00a0<\/p><h3>1. Perform Keyword Research<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">It is very important to understand the terms that people generally use when searching and the intent behind that search. Ensure that the searcher\u2019s intent and difficulty is being considered. So, select 2 -3 keywords per page and try to start the process with the lower-volume keywords.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>2. Try to infuse your keyword into your Page\u2019s URL<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">When you add the keywords to your URL, it forms one of the main ranking signals. According to the recent researches, the shorter URLs receive higher rankings as compared to other URLs. Hence you should refrain from stuffing your URL with the keywords.<br \/><br \/><strong>Note:<\/strong>\u00a0Since changing a URL that has already been authorized, leads to very serious consequences. So you should avoid doing this if your page has links.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>3. Make your title tag compelling by adding your keyword<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Although, adding the keywords in the title tag is important, yet it is not enough to enjoy a higher rank. Nowadays search engines evaluate in the click-through rate on the results and even while determining ranks. Therefore an attractive and powerful title will encourage more people to click on your page.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>4. Make your meta description powerful by adding your keyword<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Since the search engines do not consider the content of the meta description while ranking, so infusing your keywords in it and drafting a compelling meta description can aid with your CTR.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>5. Ensure and use only one keyword in the H1 tag<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Although the value of the H2, H3,\u2026., H6 tags for SEO is questionable, yet including your primary keyword in your H1 tag is highly recommended. Just ensure that there is only one H1 tag on the entire page<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/seo%202.jpg\" alt=\"How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>6. Use your keyword thrice and make sure you have a minimum of 100 words\/page (although 500+ is ideal)<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Ensure that you utilize your primary keyword thrice, each URL having 100 words i.e. minimum (but the more it is the better it is). You can still rank with less, which means it is not important to load your site with unnecessary content. But it is always recommended to create a new page only if you have a content of at least 100 words.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>7. Add descriptive ALT tags and filenames to your pages<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Considering other factors, the search engines see the images merely by reading the ALT tag and the filenames. So try to be explanatory when you name your images.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Off- Page SEO Checklist<\/h2><p>\u00a0<\/p><h3>1. Use software to analyze your link profile<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Enter your domain name into the software and check out your domain score. Also, look the number of domains you have that are pointing to your site. Then compare it with those of your competitors. Moreover, check if the backlinks are from contextually relevant sites and explore various other analyses.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>2. Assess your competitors\u2019 link profiles<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">One of the easiest methods of getting started with link building is by assessing your competitors\u2019 link profiles. Once you discover that where are they seeking their authoritative backlinks from, it will be easier for you to understand their strategy.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>\u00a0<\/h2><h2>Other Important SEO Checklist<\/h2><p>\u00a0<\/p><h3>1. Check with Google Console for crawl errors, duplicate content errors, missing titles and many more<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">This is a free tool powered by Google so that the website owners can get data on the search performance of their websites. Through this, it will be easier for you to find any technical issues with your site such as duplicate content, find data on search rankings, visibility, CTR and more.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/seo%203.jpg\" alt=\"How to avoid the 8 most common video marketing mistakes\" \/><\/div><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>2. Claim your brand\u2019s name on as many social networking sites as possible<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">In case of reputation management, you should not only ensure that your account name is not shared with anyone else but also if you are a new website or company, you can often own the first page of a search for your brand.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>3. Employ an SEO audit tool to cross-check everything<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Since performing an SEO audit manually is quite taxing and intricate, there are various SEO audit tools that can help with the protocol. This will further speed up the process by identifying the errors and offering the solutions for the same. Perhaps, you are left with a good time that can be invested in planning the overall strategy rather eliminating the broken links<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Final Thoughts<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Since SEO is a continuous process, it would be difficult to include the important thing in one\u2019s checklist. Therefore we at Techies Infotech are committed to offering the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best SEO services in India.\u00a0<\/a><\/strong>Having said that our team of experts is adept in tackling the complete SEO checklist to allow you to enjoy higher rankings. As the best SEO company in Amritsar we assert to perform all the possible SEO tasks to keep you ahead of your competitors.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"1ef4","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"dc0e89c","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"58c7","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

		<title><![CDATA[How Digital Marketing can Help you Grow your Business or Brand]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-digital-marketing-can-help-you-grow-your-business-or-brand/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 21 Aug 2019 00:01:47 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=361</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>How Digital Marketing can Help you Grow your Business or Brand</strong></h2>
<p align="justify">Irrespective of the size of the business, every owner running either small or large-sized business is confusing to make the right choice between the traditional and digital marketing. However, the restraint funds designated for the marketing budget makes it even more difficult for both small and medium-sized businesses. Unfortunately, in the end, many opt for traditional marketing due to the lack of availability of resources and the appropriate tools required for measuring the ROI of digital marketing.</p>
But the real challenge is to choose the right combination of the marketing techniques. There are several questions confronted by a person while making the choice, such as which channel to use that will certainly give you the best ROI? How to analyze whether it is working or not? Whether to&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/outsourcing-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">outsource digital marketing</a>&nbsp;</strong>or not? And what complicates it, even more, is the answer to these questions. Though traditional marketing has its own merits and demerits, digital marketing has outperformed the former. Moreover, it is not an easy task as it comprises of creation and measurement of campaigns with altogether a different approach that changes the complete mindset.

As per the surveys, a large number of people are active on their mobile phones these days, at least 4 hours daily on an average. Therefore digital marketing has a wider potential and reaches as compared to traditional marketing. As the best digital marketing agency in India, it is our responsibility to keep you abreast of all the latest trends and also the reasons for switching to digital marketing from traditional marketing. Subsequently, below-mentioned is the list defining how digital marketing helps in the growth of any business or brand.
<h2>No Geographical Boundaries</h2>
<p align="justify">How practical is it to reach wider masses through traditional marketing which is not constrained by the boundaries? It is one of the nerve-wracking tasks if thought about. But with the power of digital marketing, you can certainly do this and that too without any complications. All you have to do is to select your preferred city or location and you are good to be visible with a flexible reach and the type of audience. As being a renowned web developer, we not only offer<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;web development company in India</a></strong>&nbsp;but also we know the requirement of our customers and their businesses. We take complete care of website to be SEO friendly and make completely SEO friendly website. Thus these rank on google very fast.</p>
And the best part is you can outsource this task to the best digital marketing agency in India to get more proficient results. lts.
<h2>Economical</h2>
<p align="justify">Considering small and medium businesses, they do not designate a larger amount for marketing yet intend to have wider reach at the lowest possible cost. For instance, a normal ad on television of about 30 seconds, costs more than INR 3,00,000 when telecasted during the normal day hours.</p>
However, a small business cannot afford such an ad does not mean that they cannot reach a wider mass at a nominal cost. Therefore here arises the need for digital ads that serve both the purpose of targeting the bigger audience at low cost. Outsourcing such a task to the best digital marketing agency in India will help you attain results efficiently.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/grow-business-with-digital-marketing-2.jpg" alt="Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know">&nbsp;
<h2>Measurable Analytics</h2>
Yet another best merit of digital marketing is its measurable analytics. Once adopted digital marketing, enables you to analyze which channel gets you what amount of sales dissimilar to traditional marketing. Unlike digital marketing, traditional marketing does not allow you to analyze the channel that generates the maximum ROI for you.

Hence digital marketing enables you to measure every click by the user and also examine the users’ behaviour and buying patterns. Besides that, it also gives a detailed analysis of the targeted audience to make super-targeted ads. This is because the volume of data you collect through Digital Marketing is irreplaceable.
<h2>Higher Revenue</h2>
<p align="justify">In contrast to traditional marketing, digital marketing gets you higher revenue with the help of diverse channels. Irrespective of the size of the business, small, medium or large every enterprise employing Digital marketing techniques holds 3.3 times better potential of expansion. Moreover, we at Techies Infotech, as one of the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best SEO company in India</a></strong>&nbsp;have helped businesses realize their dreams of generating higher revenues.</p>

<h2>Super Targeted Audience</h2>
Have you ever wondered how specific can you be with digital marketing? For instance, if you are looking forward to targeting the women folk aged 24-34, residing in Delhi and that too specifically for designer wear, then digital marketing is one best tool that will help you implement this strategy. This means you can precisely target the people as per the nature of your business or brand. With digital marketing, you can customize your campaigns, ads and other marketing techniques as per the requirement of your business. You are empowered to post tailor-made offers and ads concerning the market demands. Besides customer satisfaction, it also generates additional revenue for the business.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/grow-business-with-digital-marketing-3.jpg" alt="Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know">
<h2>Make A Shift And Feel The Difference</h2>
<p align="justify">With considerable experience as the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">best digital marketing agency in India,</a></strong>&nbsp;we at Techies Infotech have witnessed several enterprises and brands making use of digital techniques and strategies to not only attract a good number of customers but also to engage quality traffic that further leads to conversion. Once adopted, digital marketing will certainly make your business or brand experience exponential growth. Since marketing is all about targeting the potential customers, therefore digital marketing is the best and the most trending choice.</p>]]></content:encoded>

Besides that, it also gives a detailed analysis of the targeted audience to make super-targeted ads. This is because the volume of data you collect through Digital Marketing is irreplaceable.<\/p><h2>Higher Revenue<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">In contrast to traditional marketing, digital marketing gets you higher revenue with the help of diverse channels. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why Content Marketing Strategy is a Must for SEO in 2019?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/why-content-marketing-strategy-is-a-must-for-seo-in-2019/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 17 May 2019 15:18:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=364</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>Why Content Marketing Strategy is a Must for SEO in 2019?</strong></h2>
Similar to other inconsistent things in life, consumers’ behaviour is also the same. In today’s scenario, businesses or brands are investing blindly into marketing with a view to just anticipate or perhaps keep abreast with the changing preferences of the buyers. However, content marketers always take the lead since user engagement implies the course of effective content marketing.
Since the change in customer behaviour is consistent, content marketing is considered to be important in 2019. Unlike the previous researches, the current studies show that with the lack of effective content marketing strategy, no business can keep up with the demands of the customers and its competitors.
<h2>What do you understand by Content Marketing?</h2>
<p align="justify">Content marketing is a strategy that empowers the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;inbound marketing</a></strong>&nbsp;process. In inbound marketing and sales, it becomes easier for the customers to discover your business organically and particularly through thoughtful and engaging content online. This is marketing strategy that involves the creation of effective content that attracts the customers and directs them through the sale process. There is a set sales funnel followed by a content marketing strategy. The funnel is like the awareness stage placed at the top, followed by the consideration stage and finally runs down to the sales.</p>

<h2>Overlapping of Content Marketing and SEO</h2>
<p align="justify">The content for any business is always created in compliance with its objectives. If it is done with utmost care and effectiveness then optimizing your content emerges as one the major content marketing strategies that are discoverable with the help of the SEO. Most importantly they have common goals of attracting a good number of audience and accomplishing company goals by following a similar mechanism.</p>

<h2>1. Keyword optimization in the content</h2>
This means optimizing the keywords while the content is being published. Now, here content acts as the mediator. This is because whenever a new article is written, a new keyword is assigned to Google to track. Employing a number of keywords implies that&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">attracting your target audience</a></strong>&nbsp;becomes relatively easier.

All these factors are certainly helpful in maximizing your business.
<h2>2. Google Indexing of Content</h2>
There is a direct relation between the number of pages in the content and the ranking in the Google listing. The more the content, the more Google Search Engine Listing. This means Google gets a number of chances to index your content.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/content-2.jpg" alt="state of digital marketing in 2019">&nbsp;
<h2>3. SEO Content Authority</h2>
One can conveniently enhance the authority of the content if the content is effective and attractive. This further helps in increasing<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;Google rankings.</a></strong>&nbsp;Comprehensive content together with inbound links, keywords, infographics and so on, increases the user experience which ultimately increases the Google search metrics.
<h2>Importance of Content Marketing Strategy in SEO</h2>
Below listed are some factors that prove that content marketing strategy is essential for SEO in 2019
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li><strong>SEO requires content and Content Marketing offers the content-</strong>SEO without content is impossible. For SEO one needs articles, keywords, substance, words, verbiage. As a matter of fact, content is the key in the SEO world. And when we talk about content marketing, the content is the first thing that we register. Now, when we combine the two, the practical application of the SEO content accounts for the most important aspect of content marketing.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li><strong>SEO requires keywords and Content Marketing implies the usage of keywords-</strong>Keywords are another important feature of SEO. It is irrefutable that this fundamental concept of SEO that is keywords is responsible for researching, utilizing and tracking the ranking in the SERPs. However, in content marketing, the strategical application of the keywords takes place. Content marketing constitutes of quality content which is drafted for humans and also uses the keywords that are targeted.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li><strong>SEO urges for backlinks and Content marketing inserts backlinks-</strong>&nbsp;SEO demands for backlinks and one can achieve through quality content via content marketing. However, the best way to build links for effective SEO is by creating superior content. This is the secret to continuous SEO success. If you want to have an effective SEO then infusing this imperative element of content marketing is a must.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
 	<li><strong>SEO requires continuous output and content marketing demands consistency-</strong>&nbsp;Google is always in search of fresh content. If you are aware of SEO, then you might also know that the fresh content rapidly gets indexed and is registered at higher SERPs as compared to the previous content. However, when the fresh content is displayed on the site with significant authority, then it is certain to have a boost in SERP. Therefore, good SEO then implies the consistent output of the content. By consistency, one means that content marketing is operational and it is carried in the right way. This has been proven as one of the effective ways of converging SEO and content marketing</li>
</ul>
<h2>Final Thought</h2>
As one of the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best SEO companies in India,</a></strong>&nbsp;Techies Infotech have drawn the first-hand experience that both SEO and content marketing goes hand in hand. These two are no longer divergent departments with incoherent efforts. The above discussions clearly portray the success of content marketing comes with the successful application of SEO features. Putting it in other words, if you write content and there is no substantial traffic on it, then it is of no use. So, in order to make it discoverable, you require SEO.

&nbsp;<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/content-3.jpg" alt="state of digital marketing in 2019-3">]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Boost your Website SEO with Schema Markup]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/boost-your-website-seo-with-schema-markup/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 22 May 2019 15:19:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=369</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>Boost your Website SEO with Schema Markup</strong></h2>
With the invasion of Voice Search technology in the industry and the growing influence of the RankBrain algorithm on the Google’s core Search algorithm, the need to place webpage in context has become more essential to strengthen the search visibility and ultimately the SEO results.
<h2>What is meant by Schema Markup?</h2>
<p align="justify">Schema Markup also known as structured data is the language used by the search engines for their unique systematic vocabulary. It is a code language that makes the search engines understand your content more efficiently. Further, this allows the user to gain better and accurate information that is displayed in the snippets, located right beneath the page title.</p>
Schema Markup has gained more importance in the age of<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;RankBrain and Hummingbird.</a></strong>&nbsp;The quality of the search result depends upon the ability of the search engines in interpreting the context of a query. However, schema can also provide context to a webpage that is ambiguous.
<h2>Is Schema Markup efficient in enhancing your search rankings?</h2>
<p align="justify">It has not yet been proved that there is a direct relationship between the microdata and the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">organic search ranking&nbsp;</a></strong>. Nevertheless, rich snippets certainly display your webpages more prominently in SERPs. This is because the improved visibility helps in enhancing the click-through rates.</p>
Recently research by acme has shown that less than 33% of the Google search results comprises of a rich snippet with Schema.org markup. Further, this lends a huge opportunity to the rest to make up for the gap. Moreover, as we all know there are quite a few things that can stir up the SEO today and Schema Markup is one of them.
<h2>Uses of Schema</h2>
Below-mentioned are some of the important uses of Schema Markup -
<ul>
 	<li>Events</li>
 	<li>People</li>
 	<li>Recipes</li>
 	<li>Business organizations</li>
 	<li>Videos</li>
 	<li>Reviews</li>
</ul>
Perhaps, if you have any type of data on your website, you have a good chance since there might be associated itemscope, itemprop and itemtype with it. Now that you have learned the importance of structured data for the SEO, let us understand how you can employ this on your website.

Before we get into the execution part, let’s see which structured data type is useful to you. Some of the common uses are as follows -
<h2>Blog</h2>
If you own a blog, you can utilize webpage schema to inform Google about your website, company’s name, its logo and even the article schema related to your article and blog posts.
<h2>Local Business</h2>
It is for the websites related to the local businesses, you can apply local business schema in addition to the website schema.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/boost-2.jpg" alt="boost your website with schema markup">
<h2>E-Commerce</h2>
It is for the websites carrying out E-commerce, product schema can be put to use that includes the details regarding your product, name, price, reviews and so on.
<h2>Infusing Schema in your webpages</h2>
<h4>Employing Microdata</h4>
Microdata is a set of tags that helps in making annotes of HTML elements together with machine-readable tags much simpler. Microdata is also considered to be a great area for the beginners to start with as it is quite easy to use. However, there is a drawback in using microdata and that is you have to mark every individual thing within the body passage of your webpage. Therefore, you can already think that it will end up getting disordered.

Always remember, prior to adding schema to your webpages, you should discover the items types of the content to be included on your web page. For instance, decide what is the niche of your&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-content-marketing-strategy.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">web content</a>&nbsp;</strong>. Is it food, music, travel, technology, fashion or something else? After you have found out the item type, you can now identify the way of tagging them up in your web content.
<h4>Using RDFa</h4>
RDFa stands for Resource Description Framework in Attributes. Fundamentally, RDFa is an extension to HTML5 with an aim to help users with the marking up of the structured data. Moreover, it is taken to be a recommendation from W3C that is a web standard and it can be applied in linking structured data vocabularies all together.

This is important if you are looking to add structured data that expands beyond the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://schema.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Schema.org</a></strong>&nbsp;limits. But, what is more, exciting is that RDFa is not much different from Microdata. So, if you are aware of working with Microdata, RDFa will also be easier for you to work with.
<h2>Final thought</h2>
Structured Data is an important aspect of the SEO and it is something that should be considered in case you want to stay updated with the modern SEO practices. Initially, you should check whether your website is utilizing the markup data or not. Secondly, figure out the easiest method of doing this and employ Google’s structured data testing tool and examine your homepage and even the other pages.

With a considerable time of serving as the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best SEO Company in India,</a></strong>&nbsp;Techies infotech is aware of all the expertise of how and what necessary steps to take to implement markup data.]]></content:encoded>

It is a code language that makes the search engines understand your content more efficiently. Further, this allows the user to gain better and accurate information that is displayed in the snippets, located right beneath the page title.<br \/><br \/>Schema Markup has gained more importance in the age of<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.com.au\/blogs\/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\u00a0RankBrain and Hummingbird.<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0The quality of the search result depends upon the ability of the search engines in interpreting the context of a query. However, schema can also provide context to a webpage that is ambiguous.<\/p><h2>Is Schema Markup efficient in enhancing your search rankings?<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">It has not yet been proved that there is a direct relationship between the microdata and the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">organic search ranking\u00a0<\/a><\/strong>. Nevertheless, rich snippets certainly display your webpages more prominently in SERPs. This is because the improved visibility helps in enhancing the click-through rates.<br \/><br \/>Recently research by acme has shown that less than 33% of the Google search results comprises of a rich snippet with Schema.org markup. Further, this lends a huge opportunity to the rest to make up for the gap. Moreover, as we all know there are quite a few things that can stir up the SEO today and Schema Markup is one of them.<\/p><h2>Uses of Schema<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Below-mentioned are some of the important uses of Schema Markup -<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li>Events<\/li><li>People<\/li><li>Recipes<\/li><li>Business organizations<\/li><li>Videos<\/li><li>Reviews<\/li><\/ul><p>Perhaps, if you have any type of data on your website, you have a good chance since there might be associated itemscope, itemprop and itemtype with it. Now that you have learned the importance of structured data for the SEO, let us understand how you can employ this on your website.<br \/><br \/>Before we get into the execution part, let\u2019s see which structured data type is useful to you. Some of the common uses are as follows -<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Blog<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">If you own a blog, you can utilize webpage schema to inform Google about your website, company\u2019s name, its logo and even the article schema related to your article and blog posts.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Local Business<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">It is for the websites related to the local businesses, you can apply local business schema in addition to the website schema.<\/p><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/boost-2.jpg\" alt=\"boost your website with schema markup\" \/><\/div><h2>E-Commerce<\/h2><p>It is for the websites carrying out E-commerce, product schema can be put to use that includes the details regarding your product, name, price, reviews and so on.<\/p><h2>Infusing Schema in your webpages<\/h2><h4>Employing Microdata<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Microdata is a set of tags that helps in making annotes of HTML elements together with machine-readable tags much simpler. Microdata is also considered to be a great area for the beginners to start with as it is quite easy to use. However, there is a drawback in using microdata and that is you have to mark every individual thing within the body passage of your webpage. Therefore, you can already think that it will end up getting disordered.<br \/><br \/>Always remember, prior to adding schema to your webpages, you should discover the items types of the content to be included on your web page. For instance, decide what is the niche of your\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-content-marketing-strategy.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">web content<\/a>\u00a0<\/strong>. Is it food, music, travel, technology, fashion or something else? After you have found out the item type, you can now identify the way of tagging them up in your web content.<\/p><h4>Using RDFa<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">RDFa stands for Resource Description Framework in Attributes. Fundamentally, RDFa is an extension to HTML5 with an aim to help users with the marking up of the structured data. Moreover, it is taken to be a recommendation from W3C that is a web standard and it can be applied in linking structured data vocabularies all together.<br \/><br \/>This is important if you are looking to add structured data that expands beyond the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/schema.org\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Schema.org<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0limits. But, what is more, exciting is that RDFa is not much different from Microdata. So, if you are aware of working with Microdata, RDFa will also be easier for you to work with.<\/p><h2>Final thought<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Structured Data is an important aspect of the SEO and it is something that should be considered in case you want to stay updated with the modern SEO practices. Initially, you should check whether your website is utilizing the markup data or not. Secondly, figure out the easiest method of doing this and employ Google\u2019s structured data testing tool and examine your homepage and even the other pages.<br \/><br \/>With a considerable time of serving as the<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\u00a0best SEO Company in India,<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0Techies infotech is aware of all the expertise of how and what necessary steps to take to implement markup data.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"2eaa","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"3fcbbcf","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"1d95","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

		<title><![CDATA[7 Hacks to Increase Traffic on Your Landing Pages]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/7-hacks-to-increase-traffic-on-your-landing-pages/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 17 Jun 2019 15:21:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=372</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>7 Hacks to Increase Traffic on Your Landing Pages</strong></h2>
Landing pages play a vital role in any business in generating awareness and displaying their products or services. Although people invest ample amount of time and money in landing pages, yet they could not yield the substantial traffic or leads.However, the exceptionally great landing pages can also be disregarded, if not optimized timely by SEO Specialists and properly to be displayed on search engine results pages (SERPs).

As a matter of fact, if you have a budding business, the probability is that you might experience a successful time, but every penny and minute you spent, should carry some worth. Consequently, the question is how to generate brand awareness while following your budget constraints and also save on some time that can be invested somewhere else.To be the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best SEO Company in India</a></strong>&nbsp;or to be the best SEO Service provider in India, traffic is required on your web pages. Below runs the list of 7 hacks to increase traffic on your landing pages:
<h2>1. Get your brand/business listed in the online directories and review sites</h2>
<p align="justify">This is a quite easy, yet effective strategy. To be the best SEO agency in India, all SEO specialists have to do is to get the business listed on famous and relevant platforms such as Google, Facebook, Yelp and so on.Although, a number of people think it is not that important, according to the research, 91% of people consistently or frequently check for the online reviews, whereas 84% also bank upon the reviews as much as any personal recommendation. Since the buyer’s remorse is for real, so by providing reviews via various online platforms helps in building the credibility and also simplifies the decision-making process for the potential customers.</p>

<h2>2. Enhance your social media presence</h2>
<p align="justify">These days, people search for company reviews not only on Google or Bing, but they also surf social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. As per the ongoing trend, the customers make the purchases from the brands or companies that are transparent, relatable and active on social media. This implies that to be the best SEO Company in India, stay active on social media through regular posts, valuable content keeps your audience engaged and also helps them choose the best.</p>

<h2>3. Re-evaluate your keyword strategy</h2>
Keeping a consistent tab on the keyword strategy is a must to increase the traffic on the landing pages. For instance, if you own a beauty salon then consider “beauty salon” or “beauty service” as a primary keyword for SEO. You can also begin your keyword research with Google Trends. Once you have entered your desired keyword i.e. “beauty salon” in the search bar, you can download the CSV list of related queries.Once the keyword list is curated, you should start infusing them in your headers and footers, content body and tags.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/hack-2.jpg" alt="increase traffic on landing page">&nbsp;
<h2>4. Optimize your website</h2>
Is your website responsive and optimized for mobile phones? Even today a number of people use low-speed internet connectivity on their phones, and in congested areas, your internet speed can drop substantially. However, last year Google laid hands on the “Speed Update” to give faster loading mobile sites&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">a better SEO rank.</a></strong>&nbsp;So, do not allow slow mobile speed to be your failure.

It has also been seen that simple sites are often smaller, fast-loading and also offer a better user experience. Minimalistic, flat and pageless designs are the easiest of all the ways to speed up the websites and ultimately increase the traffic on your landing page.
<h2>5. Start Blogging</h2>
These days, blogging is considered great for any business to portray theirs though leadership and yield credibility. It lends an online presence that can further help in engaging the audience searching for solutions to a specific query or problem.Draft your blogs and infuse the keywords at appropriate places such as your header, body content, and tags. Always remember the more the better, but be cautious of not spamming your blog due to overstuffing of keywords.
<h2>6. Backlinking at its best</h2>
As we all know the importance of backlinks in SEO. According to Google, backlink still leads in the list of factors that determine the search rank. But that does not mean that you can make up with any link. This is how the current working of the backlinking is. It has often been seen that the low-quality links can be misinterpreted for potential spams, which results in degrading your website. Only the high-quality backlinks that have been procured through great content are those that are extremely effective in elevating your website’s ranking.
<h2>7. Targeting Local Searches</h2>
Almost half the searches are considered to be made by the people who make local searches on their respective devices. Some of the high-end ones are – local addresses, shops, and contact numbers. So, in case you want to stay profitable, you should not overlook the local SEO. This also means creating and optimizing local landing pages. As per the SEO experts’ SEO stats, 72% of the people who search for local businesses, in real end up visiting the stores within a five-mile radius. Thereupon, neglecting local SEO is like putting so much at stake.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/hack-3.jpg" alt="increase traffic on landing page">&nbsp;
<h2>Bottom Line</h2>
Techies Infotech is offering&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO services in India</a>&nbsp;</strong>. Since we at Techies Infotech have one of the best SEO professionals in India, understand how important it is to stay abreast of your business’s specific SEO trends to keep the sales flowing. Therefore we have been serving India as one of the best SEO companies, for a long time now. With the advancing time, we have also realized that although optimizing SEO takes time, but is well worth it for the companies’ ranks’ elevation.

From social media posts, writing blogs to appropriate placement of keywords, we consider every minute details to help to increase the traffic on your landing page. Above mentioned are just a few important steps to be considered, whereas there is a huge list of such steps to optimize your site through amazing and effective SEO hacks. Although people invest ample amount of time and money in landing pages, yet they could not yield the substantial traffic or leads.However, the exceptionally great landing pages can also be disregarded, if not optimized timely by SEO Specialists and properly to be displayed on search engine results pages (SERPs).<br \/><br \/>As a matter of fact, if you have a budding business, the probability is that you might experience a successful time, but every penny and minute you spent, should carry some worth. Consequently, the question is how to generate brand awareness while following your budget constraints and also save on some time that can be invested somewhere else.To be the<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">\u00a0best SEO Company in India<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0or to be the best SEO Service provider in India, traffic is required on your web pages. Below runs the list of 7 hacks to increase traffic on your landing pages:<\/p><h2>1. Get your brand\/business listed in the online directories and review sites<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">This is a quite easy, yet effective strategy. To be the best SEO agency in India, all SEO specialists have to do is to get the business listed on famous and relevant platforms such as Google, Facebook, Yelp and so on.Although, a number of people think it is not that important, according to the research, 91% of people consistently or frequently check for the online reviews, whereas 84% also bank upon the reviews as much as any personal recommendation. Since the buyer\u2019s remorse is for real, so by providing reviews via various online platforms helps in building the credibility and also simplifies the decision-making process for the potential customers.<\/p><h2>2. Enhance your social media presence<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">These days, people search for company reviews not only on Google or Bing, but they also surf social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. As per the ongoing trend, the customers make the purchases from the brands or companies that are transparent, relatable and active on social media. This implies that to be the best SEO Company in India, stay active on social media through regular posts, valuable content keeps your audience engaged and also helps them choose the best.<\/p><h2>3. Re-evaluate your keyword strategy<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Keeping a consistent tab on the keyword strategy is a must to increase the traffic on the landing pages. For instance, if you own a beauty salon then consider \u201cbeauty salon\u201d or \u201cbeauty service\u201d as a primary keyword for SEO. You can also begin your keyword research with Google Trends. Once you have entered your desired keyword i.e. \u201cbeauty salon\u201d in the search bar, you can download the CSV list of related queries.Once the keyword list is curated, you should start infusing them in your headers and footers, content body and tags.<\/p><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/hack-2.jpg\" alt=\"increase traffic on landing page\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>4. Optimize your website<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Is your website responsive and optimized for mobile phones? Even today a number of people use low-speed internet connectivity on their phones, and in congested areas, your internet speed can drop substantially. However, last year Google laid hands on the \u201cSpeed Update\u201d to give faster loading mobile sites\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a better SEO rank.<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0So, do not allow slow mobile speed to be your failure.<br \/><br \/>It has also been seen that simple sites are often smaller, fast-loading and also offer a better user experience. Minimalistic, flat and pageless designs are the easiest of all the ways to speed up the websites and ultimately increase the traffic on your landing page.<\/p><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>5. Start Blogging<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">These days, blogging is considered great for any business to portray theirs though leadership and yield credibility. It lends an online presence that can further help in engaging the audience searching for solutions to a specific query or problem.Draft your blogs and infuse the keywords at appropriate places such as your header, body content, and tags. Always remember the more the better, but be cautious of not spamming your blog due to overstuffing of keywords.<\/p><h2>6. Backlinking at its best<\/h2><p>As we all know the importance of backlinks in SEO. According to Google, backlink still leads in the list of factors that determine the search rank. But that does not mean that you can make up with any link. This is how the current working of the backlinking is. It has often been seen that the low-quality links can be misinterpreted for potential spams, which results in degrading your website. Only the high-quality backlinks that have been procured through great content are those that are extremely effective in elevating your website\u2019s ranking.<\/p><h2>7. Targeting Local Searches<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Almost half the searches are considered to be made by the people who make local searches on their respective devices. Some of the high-end ones are \u2013 local addresses, shops, and contact numbers. So, in case you want to stay profitable, you should not overlook the local SEO. This also means creating and optimizing local landing pages. As per the SEO experts\u2019 SEO stats, 72% of the people who search for local businesses, in real end up visiting the stores within a five-mile radius. Thereupon, neglecting local SEO is like putting so much at stake.<\/p><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/hack-3.jpg\" alt=\"increase traffic on landing page\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><h2>Bottom Line<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">Techies Infotech is offering\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">SEO services in India<\/a>\u00a0<\/strong>. 		<title><![CDATA[How Techies Infotech is Placing Amritsar on the IT Map of India]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-techies-infotech-is-placing-amritsar-on-the-it-map-of-india/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 Jun 2019 15:35:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=375</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>How Techies Infotech is Placing Amritsar on the IT Map of India</strong></h2>
With the rapid growth in the Indian economy, the IT industry is playing a major role in this progress. Moreover, the fast-paced growth in the expansion of the socio-economic infrastructure has emerged to be of great support in the progress of the Indian information technology industry.

Furthermore, Punjab is the fastest emerging essence of the Indian IT, Amritsar being the topmost in the race. Considering this fact, Techies Infotech, best<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;SEO Company in Amritsar,</a></strong>&nbsp;is serving the people of Amritsar and has also lately sprouted as the best IT company in the city. Being the best web development and digital agency in Amritsar, our team is committed to delivering high quality, cost effective, reliable result-oriented web and e-commerce solutions within the prescribed deadline to not only the clients of the city but also across the nation. As we are serving as a complete IT solution company, we offer the below-mentioned services with utmost diligence.
<h2>Best Digital Marketing Company in India</h2>
<p align="justify">At Techies Infotech, our technology and&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing experts</a></strong>&nbsp;are streamlined towards helping our clients in enhancing their business performance. In accordance to which, our team of proficient members aids our clients, by developing better engagement plans with their global customers. This further helps them in selling their products and services effectively and efficiently throughout the globe. This ultimately leads to the growth of the existing or startup businesses which has definitely helped Amritsar rise economically.</p>
Our efforts are directed towards enabling the startups and brands to address the customers’ requirements and develop best in class skills and aptitudes with the application of digital, branding and commerce capabilities. Besides that, our main team has considerable experience in running campaigns for market-driven companies. Furthermore, our managing team is too experienced in monitoring and working on not only the national but international projects too.
<h2>Web Development services in Amritsar</h2>
<p align="justify">We are quite delighted to be tagged as one of the few companies who provide the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best web development services in Amritsar,</a></strong>&nbsp;in reference to the client requirements at really competitive prices. We are engaged in providing the best web solutions to all small, large or medium businesses. Not only this, but we also consider the freshness of the site that our client is looking for in his portal. Thereupon, we at Techies Infotech have completed hundreds of projects successfully, making our clients contented with the results delivered.</p>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/amritsar-2.jpg" alt="Techies Infotech is Placing Amritsar on the IT Map of India ">&nbsp;
<h2>How we stand out from the crowd?</h2>
Our mission at Techies is to promote and place Amritsar digitally on the IT landscape of India. Thereupon, our approach towards dealing with any project is also unique. We address your business requirements efficiently and deeply to keep up with our brand tag as the best IT company in India.

To begin with, we take the consumer/market insight into consideration, so as to create a unique business strategy that aids you in distinguishing your offering from that of your competitors. As well as offering digital marketing services, we also provide<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/video-production.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;video production services in Amritsar</a></strong>&nbsp;for our clients, to showcase their portfolio or patients testimonials. Because of our dedicated and skilled video editors and shooting experts, we stand as the best video production company in Amritsar. Furthermore, we employ such technologies that allow our clients to develop brand equity and business value globally. Deployment of the following techniques aids us in striving for business growth and brand value generation.
<ul>
 	<li><strong>Insight:</strong>We employ research, analytics, and creativity to obtain a cleat and intense knowledge of unfulfilled needs and opportunities concerned with the brands, customers or markets, to establish certain worth for businesses.</li>
 	<li><strong>Strategy:</strong>As we all know, brands are the living assets for any business. We establish a strategic and innovative substructure for the future by clearly outlining their purpose, identity, and role. This begets identification, uniqueness, loyal clientele and value for the business.</li>
 	<li><strong>Technology:</strong>With the help of strategic plotting, technology platforms, and internal actions, we put forth the brand experience in the market and intensify capabilities such as brand management and internal marketing.</li>
</ul>
<h2>How have we placed Amritsar on the IT Map of India</h2>
We at Techies Infotech, aim towards lending you a digital voice that helps you get noticed. Carrying this mission throughout our journey and maintaining the same for now and for the future, we have delivered various successful IT projects. Every project had a different intricacy which made our professionals even more proficient in their skills. Besides dispensing unique web solutions, our expertise in digital marketing has too helped the people of Amritsar and even Punjab to reach a wider mass and evolve as a successful company.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/amritsar-3.jpg" alt="Techies Infotech is Placing Amritsar on the IT Map of India ">

Our specialization in web designing and development, search engine optimization and web marketing, e-commerce, multimedia solutions, content writing, graphics and logo designing, has helped us achieve the tag of the best IT company in Amritsar. However, our web solutions evolve with the upcoming modifications in the industry which have made our clients stay abreast of the marketing trends. Not only this, but our team is also competent in Google Adwords, PPC, Google Analytics and other such expertise that are only deemed to get you the best results for your business.

Besides this, Techies Infotech has too taken an initiative to help Amritsar’s youth excel collectively in the digital industry. Being an active member of the Amritsar Founders Association, we believe in enabling the youth of the city to seize the right opportunity, right here in their own city and strive hard to make it large. This association is the biggest step towards the digitalization of the city on the map of India by engaging the right brains on the right track. We at&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/about-us.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Techies Infotech</a>&nbsp;</strong>ensure that we build brand equity sincerely. Above all, we are proud to serve the nation digitally with the help of our dedicated team of technology and marketing consultants.]]></content:encoded>

We at\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/about-us.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Techies Infotech<\/a>\u00a0<\/strong>ensure that we build brand equity sincerely. Above all, we are proud to serve the nation digitally with the help of our dedicated team of technology and marketing consultants.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"657f","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"bf62973","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"469e","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/corporate-video-production-everything-you-need-to-know/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 20 Jul 2019 15:42:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=383</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know</strong></h2>
<p align="justify">Although several companies these days are coming up with a video, only the videos with a purpose manage to attain conversions. However, videos can only be termed effective when they convey the right message and evoke the interest of the viewers in taking a call to action. This means showcasing your company profile or telling your brand story that seeks the attention of the audience and also targets them emotionally with your business. Consequently, for the achievement of a business, it is very crucial to get your hand on qualitative<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/video-production.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;video production services in India.</a></strong></p>
With the advancement of Digital Technology, has cropped up the development of various video production services such as animated videos, music videos, documentaries, infographics, and corporate videos. Several companies have taken their brand to the next level with the aid of corporate video production services, considering the concerns of their targeted audience.
<h2>What is Corporate Video?</h2>
<p align="justify">Corporate Video is a kind of high-quality video that is produced by the company itself or by an outsourced organization that conveys the story of the brand which is displayed to the targeted audience. There is always a purpose defined behind every corporate&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">video production in India</a></strong>&nbsp;that exhibits the products, services, training of the employees, promotional videos, demonstrative videos and many more informative videos.</p>
Creating a video for the corporate comprises of a few processes such as brief client meeting, development of a script, storyboard, client profiling, production, and delivery. These videos upgrade the level of productivity of a corporate. Moreover, the professional videos crafted taking the clients’ tastes and interests into account enables the audience to stay longer on your website leading to more traffic and revenue generation.

However, if the video fails to display the idea that connects with the audience then the purpose of the video is annulled.
<h3>Importance of Corporate Video Production</h3>
<h4>Proficient Exhibition of Products and Services</h4>
<p align="justify">Corporate Videos that efficiently showcase your brand’s product or services will inevitably lend an emotional connection to the audience, further leading to credibility development among the targeted audience.</p>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/corporate-2.jpg" alt="Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know">&nbsp;
<h4>E-Commerce is on the hike</h4>
Since most of the people these days are shopping online, so the companies should strive to build engagement by offering the appropriate information to their customers.

Although a website with great content or images is deemed to boost the traffic, an effective corporate video talks about the business steering relatively more traffic and engagement to the site. This is because when a live demo is given for a product or service, people tend to get attracted faster.
<h4>Analyzes the target audience</h4>
<p align="justify">To enhance traffic and conversions through your site, it is highly important to understand the tastes and interests of the target audience, to incorporate the video efficiently.</p>

<h4>Best way to Exhibit Your Brand</h4>
Indeed, a video showcasing the brand story that is informative with a pinch of creativity works wonders in seeking the attention of the visitors. Moreover, a great corporate video helps you get the highest SERP results. This is because Google ranks the content that is widely shared and liked by the users. Therefore, adding a video to your website is an&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO&nbsp;</a></strong>friendly move.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/corporate-3.jpg" alt="Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know">
<h4>Helps you stand out from the crowd</h4>
<p align="justify">An attractive and informative video surely helps you build trust among the viewers which further influences the traffic and conversions for your services or product. For instance, monitor the ads on social media and curate them accordingly. This is because the content that is fresh and unique drives engagement and attraction on your page. So, it is equally important to be creative and confident while creating content for social media ads.</p>

<h4>Significance of a graphic designer in corporate video production</h4>
<p align="justify">While a graphic designer creates and manoeuvres the images, the video editors produce a story employing those images, titles, logos, maps and so on. The designers are responsible for creating captivating and unique logos and images for the brand that distinguishes your brand from that of your competitors.</p>
Further, all these things help create a professional corporate video. Consequently, a graphic designer is an unavoidable element in corporate video production as both the editor and the designer collectively work towards the editing and release of the marketing video. Together they work on the results and are cautious of delivering a magnetic message to the respective audience.
<h4>Hire the Best Video Production Company in India</h4>
<p align="justify">According to the current scenario, videos are no more considered as a luxury but a necessity when it comes to marketing. Subsequently, Techies Infotech has witnessed corporate videos emerging as an essential element in your road to online success. Therefore, we at Techies have equipped both our video producers and graphic designers with the latest technology and strategies to help you get a proficient corporate video.</p>
Being one of the best corporate video production company in India, we have a team that is skilled, proficient and committed to delivering the best value for the video produced. Not only these we strive to communicate an effective message through the videos as per the requirements of our clients helping them build their credibility, enhance engagements and also transmit relevant information in the market.
So, get in touch with us and lend dynamism to your business.]]></content:encoded>

This means showcasing your company profile or telling your brand story that seeks the attention of the audience and also targets them emotionally with your business. Several companies have taken their brand to the next level with the aid of corporate video production services, considering the concerns of their targeted audience.<\/p><h2>What is Corporate Video?<\/h2><p align=\"justify\">Corporate Video is a kind of high-quality video that is produced by the company itself or by an outsourced organization that conveys the story of the brand which is displayed to the targeted audience. There is always a purpose defined behind every corporate\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">video production in India<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0that exhibits the products, services, training of the employees, promotional videos, demonstrative videos and many more informative videos.<br \/><br \/>Creating a video for the corporate comprises of a few processes such as brief client meeting, development of a script, storyboard, client profiling, production, and delivery. These videos upgrade the level of productivity of a corporate. Moreover, the professional videos crafted taking the clients\u2019 tastes and interests into account enables the audience to stay longer on your website leading to more traffic and revenue generation.<br \/><br \/>However, if the video fails to display the idea that connects with the audience then the purpose of the video is annulled.<\/p><h3>Importance of Corporate Video Production<\/h3><h4>Proficient Exhibition of Products and Services<\/h4><p align=\"justify\">Corporate Videos that efficiently showcase your brand\u2019s product or services will inevitably lend an emotional connection to the audience, further leading to credibility development among the targeted audience.<\/p><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/corporate-2.jpg\" alt=\"Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know\" \/><\/div><div class=\"h10\">\u00a0<\/div><h4>E-Commerce is on the hike<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Since most of the people these days are shopping online, so the companies should strive to build engagement by offering the appropriate information to their customers.<br \/><br \/>Although a website with great content or images is deemed to boost the traffic, an effective corporate video talks about the business steering relatively more traffic and engagement to the site. This is because when a live demo is given for a product or service, people tend to get attracted faster.<\/p><h4>Analyzes the target audience<\/h4><p align=\"justify\">To enhance traffic and conversions through your site, it is highly important to understand the tastes and interests of the target audience, to incorporate the video efficiently.<\/p><h4>Best way to Exhibit Your Brand<\/h4><p>Indeed, a video showcasing the brand story that is informative with a pinch of creativity works wonders in seeking the attention of the visitors. Moreover, a great corporate video helps you get the highest SERP results. This is because Google ranks the content that is widely shared and liked by the users. Therefore, adding a video to your website is an\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">SEO\u00a0<\/a><\/strong>friendly move.<\/p><div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/corporate-3.jpg\" alt=\"Corporate Video Production - Everything You Need To Know\" \/><\/div><p>\u00a0<\/p><h4>Helps you stand out from the crowd<\/h4><p align=\"justify\">An attractive and informative video surely helps you build trust among the viewers which further influences the traffic and conversions for your services or product. So, it is equally important to be creative and confident while creating content for social media ads.<\/p><h4>Significance of a graphic designer in corporate video production<\/h4><p align=\"justify\">While a graphic designer creates and manoeuvres the images, the video editors produce a story employing those images, titles, logos, maps and so on.
