					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why is digital marketing more important than ever during COVID 19?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/why-is-digital-marketing-more-important-than-ever-during-covid-19/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 28 Apr 2020 12:06:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=1935</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Amongst all of the worries, problems, and uncertainty in the world at the moment with COVID-19, you will be beginning to ensure that your trade or business is ready for the challenges ahead.

We already experience a behavioral shift, with persons avoiding not only work, but hotels, restaurants, stores, and other public sectors where they might spend money. With users staying indoors–and presumably online–digital marketing may well be a business’s best option during coronavirus.
<h3>Why digital marketing?</h3>
The advertising market is a world of its own, and we all understand that marketing prices need to be optimized in the current situation so that maximum gain is obtained at minimal costs. Digital Marketing is the best way to receive exceptional results at optimized costs than marketing on online channels.

According to some studies, 94 percent of the FORTUNE 1000 bands are already facing breakdown due to COVID-19, and digital is the only answer. According to comscore.com, visits to sites, online platforms, and apps increased by 61% in 2020 compared to last year.
<h3>Build a profoundly impacting digital asset now</h3>
The first and foremost step to combine your digital marketing activities is to have an exceptional digital asset that’s eye-popping and engaging for your consumers. More consumers know your brand online, more consumers recall it and hence buy from your site.

A full-fledged web asset means it can be a significant platform of all your digital activities. Otherwise, you have a webpage like the thousands of thousands out there with merely no advancement.

Experts say that, on average, users are spending 1–2 hours more online during COVID-19. This is an excellent time to develop the asset and start popularizing the brand so that it can get business-enough traction by the time the current situation becomes normal.
<h3>Create a digital business model</h3>
With the help of an online asset, now you have to digitize your customer interactions so that they can engage, navigate, and communicate better online. Start your brand’s online business potential. Even if you don’t have it right now, build one, and create a new medium to generate revenues online.

So, these schemes will not only make inexpensive online revenue channels but also expand the reach of businesses that were traditionally seen as local.
<h3>Use social media marketing to convince people to comply with social distancing</h3>
Medical practitioners and other concerned healthcare experts can share data with friends and family members on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and other social media channels. Also, don’t forget you can send messages, emails to friends and family as well.

If you are a professional healthcare marketer, you have great potential to educate your society through scale about social distancing. Your first step will be to convince your medical centre or practice leadership that your company not only can, but should, take a leadership role during this pandemic crisis, and “join the fight.”

The US Surgeon General, Dr. Jerome Adams, understands the importance of social media to help get data out about the COVID-19 crisis. He was recently asked during a Good Morning America interview how to get younger people of America to take the coronavirus crisis seriously.
<h3>Utilize digital platforms to inform your patient base with essential information and advice</h3>
Beyond spreading awareness among the wider community, you should guide and inform your patients throughout the COVID-19 pandemic crisis. Beyond the fact that it is the best thing to do, your essential information will enhance your authority and your relationship with your patients at a time when they need it most.

In addition to some of the points we’ve already mentioned above, you can utilize social media and HIPAA compliant email to help guide patients with additional suggestions, such as how to:
<ul>
 	<li>Boost your immune system</li>
 	<li>Deal with problem and stay positive</li>
 	<li>Cope with stress or sleeplessness</li>
 	<li>Protect their family members</li>
 	<li>Pass the time</li>
 	<li>Care for and speak to small children at home</li>
 	<li>General information and stats as they become available</li>
</ul>
<h3>Impact of COVID19 on the eCommerce industry</h3>
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Hygiene items became the most significant selling items online</h4>
The eCommerce industry has witnessed a spurt in pharmaceutical items purchases due to the coronavirus crisis. With the closure of offline stores, shops, and malls, consumers have turned to online stores to get what is now known as virus protection gear. This includes items like masks, gloves, and daily use of hygiene products like sprays, sanitizers, etc.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Spurt in online medicine purchases</h4>
Similarly, the purchases of medicines have increased rapidly post the outbreak. Consumers are generally looking for medications for cold, cough, and fever, as expected, due to the virus’s fears. Online purchases of medications have enhanced by at least 198% over the period. Online stores selling pharmaceutical items had a run for money during this period.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Sale of online groceries picked up</h4>
Online grocery purchases, too, have enhanced during this crisis. It is not shocking to see consumers ordering online to fill their home kitchen or pantry to meet the worst-case scenario. Non-perishable grocery items have seen an increment of 69% in their sales. In contrast, shelf-stable things like rice, oatmeal, and pasta sales increased by 58%.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Weak user sentiment has dampened demand</h4>
As authorities grapple with the onslaught of the crisis, economies are battered by the closure of industry and the stoppage of production by the wide-scale lockdown. It is not shocking then to see user sentiment turning disappointed.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Supply disruptions have affected items’ availability</h4>
Production and supply of items have taken a hit amid fears of the spread of this disease. Industry production has entirely stopped. Distribution channels are busy in supplying the necessary items.

And, authorities have stopped movements. How can eCommerce stores under such circumstances source users’ demands? It is natural as a result that eCommerce stores, too, are closing.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3>Impact of COVID-19 on local businesses</h3>
The COVID-19 crisis remains a health and humanitarian concern, but the local business impact on various companies is now profound.

As authorities make important interventions in response to this crisis, local businesses are quickly adjusting to the changing needs of their consumers and suppliers, while navigating the financial and operational queries.

With every local industry, function and geography affected, the amount of potential change to think through can be difficult.
<h3>Impact of COVID-19 on healthcare industry</h3>
The crisis has stretched the healthcare industry of even the most developed nations, and is expected to cause economic problems unparalleled in recent history. The COVID-19 pandemic is harming health systems internationally.

The fast increasing demand on healthcare facilities and workers threatens to leave the health industry overstretched and unable to operate efficiently and effectively.
<h3>Impact of COVID-19 on pharma industry</h3>
CoronaVirus (Covid-19) has almost impacted every industry, causing damage to the overseas market. The pharma industry is no exception. Let us understand the impact on the pharma industry.
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Cost of drugs and raw materials</h4>
The impact Covid-19 has created in China and the lockdown in India, USA, and other nations, further enhances the chances of shoot up in the price of raw materials and drugs.

13% of the brand and generic manufacturers are based out of China and according to the FDA, as of 2018, 24% of medications and 31% of medical elements were imported from India.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Supply chain</h4>
According to a recent survey, emergency care, anesthesia care, and pain management medicines mostly get affected due to shortage.

The crisis might cause a shortage and increase in demands of some medicines such as Hydroxychloroquine and Chloroquine, which are most needed during these pandemic times.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Real World Data</h4>
New drug development is estimated to cost $2.6 billion which is 1 billion in 2013. On top of the cost involved, the time taken for development &amp; clinical trials, might bring in more focus towards RWD.

Around 95% of the organizations are using RWD or will be utilizing it by 2021. Data accessibility and security problems are a few of the challenges in utilizing RWD, but it can be sorted out and will get more popularity as organizations and the health industry from here on might look to bring in innovative measures in clinical trials.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3>Impact of COVID-19 on food &amp; restaurant business</h3>
According to data from the National Restaurants Association of India (NRAI), the Indian food and restaurant market directly employs close to 7.3 million people.

Restaurateurs across the different nations are suffering the effects of the crisis on their business and their health. Some have been getting diverse attacks in the middle of the night. Most fear that if this problem doesn’t abate soon, they will not be able to pay out salaries for the month of April and May. This thing will provide a ripple effect down the chain.
<h3>How is Team Techies helping businesses during COVID-19?</h3>
Following lockdown orders, Techies Infotech, the best digital marketing company in India, is performing operations on a cloud platform connecting all our team experts and clients seamlessly.

Working remotely from our homes, we are focusing on productive efforts to keep you updated. Whether it is our programmers, content writers, SEO experts, developers, or designers or the front end staff, we are working exceptionally and in tandem, making sure we deliver services just like normal days.

To bring the whole team on a single page, we are regularly organizing virtual meetings, discussing the progress, the productivity of the work, and mapping the future course of action.

Realizing the fact that the COVID crisis has created a lot of troubles and confusion and you may have many queries about our mode of functioning, we want to assure you that our team of best digital marketers is here for you all the time.
<h3>Build a digital presence without paying extra on advertisements</h3>
Running a lead ad on social media platforms and Google ads aren’t the only ways to gain businesses online. There is a whole new world called organic that doesn’t need any extra amount but only smart plans. This is exceptionally best for your post-COVID-19 digital marketing phase.

First of all, optimize your site with the top essential keywords, research some of the most popular domains that publish content relevant to your market and push blogs, articles there, do third party forum posting, put rich content on PR websites and generate backlinks.

Start the same with no time because many of your rivalries are sitting idle discussing on balance sheets. By the time the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://www.mohfw.gov.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">COVID-19</a></strong>&nbsp;phase stabilizes, perform these activities, and gain fast rankings.
<h3>Closing Comments</h3>
While these are incredibly tough times for every person in the nation, smart social media and digital marketing services can still influence patients in a positive, profound way. It’s very essential to approach your marketing plan with some sensitivity. Sure, you could face fear at key touchpoints to make a few more revenues.
However, that kind of approach leads to reputational damage you’ll be cleaning up years after this pandemic has run its course.
<h3>Why choose Techies Infotech?</h3>
The more intuitive your tools, the faster you can get exceptional results and learn what’s right and what isn’t. Don’t invest in complex solutions that make you dependent on IT expertise.

Techies Infotech, the&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">best digital marketing company in India,</a></strong>&nbsp;provides intuitive and streamlined workflows that allow your business teams to quickly find the assets and consumer insights they need and deliver the best digital experiences during COVID-19.]]></content:encoded>

With users staying indoors\u2013and presumably online\u2013digital marketing may well be a business\u2019s best option during coronavirus.<\/p><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Why digital marketing?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">The advertising market is a world of its own, and we all understand that marketing prices need to be optimized in the current situation so that maximum gain is obtained at minimal costs. Digital Marketing is the best way to receive exceptional results at optimized costs than marketing on online channels.<br \/><br \/>According to some studies, 94 percent of the FORTUNE 1000 bands are already facing breakdown due to COVID-19, and digital is the only answer. There is a whole new world called organic that doesn\u2019t need any extra amount but only smart plans. This is exceptionally best for your post-COVID-19 digital marketing phase.<br \/><br \/>First of all, optimize your site with the top essential keywords, research some of the most popular domains that publish content relevant to your market and push blogs, articles there, do third party forum posting, put rich content on PR websites and generate backlinks.<br \/><br \/>Start the same with no time because many of your rivalries are sitting idle discussing on balance sheets. By the time the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/www.mohfw.gov.in\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">COVID-19<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0phase stabilizes, perform these activities, and gain fast rankings.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Closing Comments<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">While these are incredibly tough times for every person in the nation, smart social media and digital marketing services can still influence patients in a positive, profound way. It\u2019s very essential to approach your marketing plan with some sensitivity. Sure, you could face fear at key touchpoints to make a few more revenues.<br \/>However, that kind of approach leads to reputational damage you\u2019ll be cleaning up years after this pandemic has run its course.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Why choose Techies Infotech?<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">The more intuitive your tools, the faster you can get exceptional results and learn what\u2019s right and what isn\u2019t. Don\u2019t invest in complex solutions that make you dependent on IT expertise.<br \/><br \/>Techies Infotech, the\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best digital marketing company in India,<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0provides intuitive and streamlined workflows that allow your business teams to quickly find the assets and consumer insights they need and deliver the best digital experiences during COVID-19.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"1d77","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"6164914","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"376","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Tips to increase sales of an e-commerce store]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/tips-to-increase-sales-of-an-e-commerce-store/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Mar 2020 12:06:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=1936</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>What is an E-Commerce Store?</h2>
E-Commerce stores or platforms refer to a software application that aids online businesses to manage their website, sales, marketing, products and services provided.

It is a type of platform that allows the companies to function in their way by integrating their tools and centralising their operations. Studies suggest that by the year 2021, the number of digital buyers will increase from 1.66 billion in 2016 to 2.11 billion users. So, there is no going back if you plan to start an ecommerce site or already have one.

It is the best native solution for making money online and increasing profitability, even if you own a brick- mortar store. Starting with an eCommerce website will not guarantee the sales and profit, you need to include some tactics to earn money.
<h3>Tips to increase your e-commerce sales</h3>
<h4>Create Brand Awareness</h4>
The selling of e-commerce rises with an increase in brand popularity. The type of branding done can either make or break your business. A blog of “smallbizgenius” suggests that almost&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://www.smallbizgenius.net/by-the-numbers/ecommerce-statistics/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">61% of the buyers</a></strong>&nbsp;didn’t finish the marketing process because they didn’t trust the brand much.

Organisations must be crystal clear that consumers trust each other more than the buyer’s trust one another as “Oberlo” found out that 81% of consumers believe other people before deciding on making a purchase. So, it becomes critically important for you to follow steps for doing good branding.

For this, businesses must stuff their websites with high-quality content, prefer tie-ups with other business organisations and never neglect paid ads. Following these simple tactics can help you build trust among users which will ultimately grow your sales.
<h4>Target your audience</h4>
Every business grows if it targets the right audience. For targeting the right audience, one must be very thorough with their organisation's audience. Your organisation must start with having detailed information about users that can be done by making customer personas.

Customer personas must include information like location, age group, their area of interest, and what platform they prefer to use for surfing. You must be very thorough with this information to have one-to-one engagement with customers which will profoundly positively impact the sales.

Make sure you enhance your portal and remain updated for retargeting the audience and keeping the present users happy.
<h4>Social Media Presence</h4>
We are living in the social media era, where your presence on social media becomes essential to attract every user. Studies suggest that people usually prefer platforms that are present on social media and often see your reviews on social platforms. To quote this, according to a survey conducted by “Big Commerce”, stores with social media presence drove 32% more sales than those not present.

So, make sure you do strategic marketing on&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/tips-for-success-in-social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">social media platforms</a></strong>&nbsp;as people surf these platforms for entertainment and gaining information. According to Kinsta, 74% of buyers depend on social media reviews for their purchasing decisions. So, ecommerce platforms can post content containing info about product launches, events, giveaways and anything related to the niche or the happy customer feedbacks as well that will increase the engagement.
<h4>Email Marketing</h4>
Ecommerce platforms must induce this marketing technique to reach a large mass of people as mentioned by “Wolfgang Digital”. According to them, email marketing drives 20% organic traffic to the ecommerce platforms. So, make sure you implement proper email marketing and add a call to actions to the automated emails so that people can land on your page.

Email marketing not only helps you increase brand awareness among your new customers but retargets the previous audience. Statista and B2B ecommerce market both pen down the success rate of email marketing. According to Statista,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://www.onlinemarketinggurus.com/blog/email-marketing-statistics" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">61% of consumers</a></strong>&nbsp;like to receive emails of brands and get updations. Try to have an effectively managed email marketing strategy to get good results and increased sales.

Email marketing also helps in the repurchasing of products and retaining more customers for your organisation.
<h4>Use different techniques to showcase your product</h4>
Your product showcasing method acts as an asset if implemented rightly. Try to add images of your product and don’t forget to add the reviews and product description. Reviews help you increase your sales because buyers often trust other buyers. A blog by “Disruptive Advertising” wrote that 88% of consumers and shoppers make their purchasing decision only after reading the detailed description of the product.

<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Videos of products</a></strong>&nbsp;can add feathers in your hat and ensure customer loyalty for your business. Authenticity can never be compromised if you want to set a benchmark for competitors.
<h4>Mobile-Optimized Website</h4>
Since the majority of people, especially the 92% Millenials, prefer browsing on phones while they purchase any product. Studies suggest that over 4 billion people(almost half of the global population) use the internet and out of these, 92.6% prefer mobiles for shopping.

So, it becomes necessary to have a mobile-optimised&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/increase-conversion-with-web-designing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">website to increase the reach</a></strong>&nbsp;and engagement. By good optimisation, we refer to the increased speed and enhanced user experience on mobile.

The loading speed of the pages on the mobile should be quick; else you may regret it because users quickly get frustrated and leave the site. Your check-in experience and other call-to-action buttons must function correctly.
<h4>Offer live chat support</h4>
Customers usually prefer to revisit the site, especially the eCommerce stores where they had the experience of one-to-one engagement.

But those buyers whose queries are not tackled by the website may fail to convert, and they leave your site. The stats suggest that&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://www.pwc.com/us/en/retail-consumer/publications/assets/pwc-retailing-2020.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">80% of the customers</a></strong>&nbsp;even if they were loyal left the website because of the bad user experience.

So, try to add the live chat support feature on your platform and never ignore a single customer’s queries. An individual customer can cause a loss of crores as every user is a king for eCommerce sales and profit.

Providing excellent customer service cannot be beaten, and the only competition you have is yourself.
<h4>Implementation of customisation selling</h4>
Every customer is a profit for the business and to fulfil their demands is a shared vision that is followed. Ecommerce platforms are massive-scale integration platforms and have a lot of competition.

A content which is more indexed on any of these social media platforms would thus stand to gain from it.

A survey conducted by “Big Commerce” found out that 53% of online consumers land on your page if you provide customisation and personalisation experience to the users. So, to have a leg up on your competitor, you need to include the feature of customisation for making large scale profit. Implement the customisation option on your website and see what miracles happen to your sales because customers love to land to a page that makes them a priority.
<h4>Creative marketing tactics</h4>
Use creativity while building your eCommerce portals but don’t forget the excellent structuring of websites. Use of all the on-page elements like headers, titles, footers, content quality, and URLs must be incorporated wisely.

Make sure your link building and readability is maximum, and minimise the errors that may hinder the customer engagement.
<h4>Follow omnichannel marketing approach</h4>
On average,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/intl/en-gb/marketing-resources/omnichannel/omnichannel-era-age-assistance-new-frontier-retail-success/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">52% of ecommerce portals</a></strong>&nbsp;have omnichannel marketing capabilities, and it is considered as the future of ecommerce marketing. Omnichannel marketing refers to marketing in which the user using any platform gets a seamlessly excellent and integrated experience.

These sales are directly proportional to the implementation of omnichannel marketing. The better the way you do omnichannel marketing, the better are the results you get.
<h4>How can Techies Infotech help you increase your sales?</h4>
Techies Infotech, being the best&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO company in India</a></strong>, works seamlessly to bring the best results for eCommerce portals. We have the expertise of making your website get a better position on Google browser with proficient SEO services around the globe.

We know how helpful the above potent features are, and we work to help you increase your sales and generate more significant revenue.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"27b0","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"2be0247","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"3629","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"3dae","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h2>What is an E-Commerce Store?<\/h2><p class=\"justify\">E-Commerce stores or platforms refer to a software application that aids online businesses to manage their website, sales, marketing, products and services provided.<br \/><br \/>It is a type of platform that allows the companies to function in their way by integrating their tools and centralising their operations. Studies suggest that by the year 2021, the number of digital buyers will increase from 1.66 billion in 2016 to 2.11 billion users. So, there is no going back if you plan to start an ecommerce site or already have one.<br \/><br \/>It is the best native solution for making money online and increasing profitability, even if you own a brick- mortar store. Starting with an eCommerce website will not guarantee the sales and profit, you need to include some tactics to earn money.<br \/><br \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tips to increase your e-commerce sales<\/h3><h4>Create Brand Awareness<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">The selling of e-commerce rises with an increase in brand popularity. The type of branding done can either make or break your business. A blog of \u201csmallbizgenius\u201d suggests that almost\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/www.smallbizgenius.net\/by-the-numbers\/ecommerce-statistics\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">61% of the buyers<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0didn\u2019t finish the marketing process because they didn\u2019t trust the brand much.<br \/><br \/>Organisations must be crystal clear that consumers trust each other more than the buyer\u2019s trust one another as \u201cOberlo\u201d found out that 81% of consumers believe other people before deciding on making a purchase. So, it becomes critically important for you to follow steps for doing good branding.<br \/><br \/>For this, businesses must stuff their websites with high-quality content, prefer tie-ups with other business organisations and never neglect paid ads. Following these simple tactics can help you build trust among users which will ultimately grow your sales.<\/p><h4>Target your audience<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Every business grows if it targets the right audience. For targeting the right audience, one must be very thorough with their organisation's audience. Your organisation must start with having detailed information about users that can be done by making customer personas.<br \/><br \/>Customer personas must include information like location, age group, their area of interest, and what platform they prefer to use for surfing. You must be very thorough with this information to have one-to-one engagement with customers which will profoundly positively impact the sales.<br \/><br \/>Make sure you enhance your portal and remain updated for retargeting the audience and keeping the present users happy.<\/p><h4>Social Media Presence<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">We are living in the social media era, where your presence on social media becomes essential to attract every user. Studies suggest that people usually prefer platforms that are present on social media and often see your reviews on social platforms. To quote this, according to a survey conducted by \u201cBig Commerce\u201d, stores with social media presence drove 32% more sales than those not present.<br \/><br \/>So, make sure you do strategic marketing on\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/tips-for-success-in-social-media-marketing.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">social media platforms<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0as people surf these platforms for entertainment and gaining information. According to Kinsta, 74% of buyers depend on social media reviews for their purchasing decisions. So, ecommerce platforms can post content containing info about product launches, events, giveaways and anything related to the niche or the happy customer feedbacks as well that will increase the engagement.<\/p><h4>Email Marketing<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Ecommerce platforms must induce this marketing technique to reach a large mass of people as mentioned by \u201cWolfgang Digital\u201d. According to them, email marketing drives 20% organic traffic to the ecommerce platforms. So, make sure you implement proper email marketing and add a call to actions to the automated emails so that people can land on your page.<br \/><br \/>Email marketing not only helps you increase brand awareness among your new customers but retargets the previous audience. Statista and B2B ecommerce market both pen down the success rate of email marketing. According to Statista,\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/www.onlinemarketinggurus.com\/blog\/email-marketing-statistics\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">61% of consumers<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0like to receive emails of brands and get updations. Try to have an effectively managed email marketing strategy to get good results and increased sales.<br \/><br \/>Email marketing also helps in the repurchasing of products and retaining more customers for your organisation.<\/p><h4>Use different techniques to showcase your product<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Your product showcasing method acts as an asset if implemented rightly. Try to add images of your product and don\u2019t forget to add the reviews and product description. Reviews help you increase your sales because buyers often trust other buyers. A blog by \u201cDisruptive Advertising\u201d wrote that 88% of consumers and shoppers make their purchasing decision only after reading the detailed description of the product.<br \/><br \/><strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Videos of products<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0can add feathers in your hat and ensure customer loyalty for your business. Authenticity can never be compromised if you want to set a benchmark for competitors.<\/p><h4>Mobile-Optimized Website<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Since the majority of people, especially the 92% Millenials, prefer browsing on phones while they purchase any product. Studies suggest that over 4 billion people(almost half of the global population) use the internet and out of these, 92.6% prefer mobiles for shopping.<br \/><br \/>So, it becomes necessary to have a mobile-optimised\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/blogs\/increase-conversion-with-web-designing.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">website to increase the reach<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0and engagement. By good optimisation, we refer to the increased speed and enhanced user experience on mobile.<br \/><br \/>The loading speed of the pages on the mobile should be quick; else you may regret it because users quickly get frustrated and leave the site. Your check-in experience and other call-to-action buttons must function correctly.<\/p><h4>Offer live chat support<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Customers usually prefer to revisit the site, especially the eCommerce stores where they had the experience of one-to-one engagement.<br \/><br \/>But those buyers whose queries are not tackled by the website may fail to convert, and they leave your site. The stats suggest that\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/www.pwc.com\/us\/en\/retail-consumer\/publications\/assets\/pwc-retailing-2020.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">80% of the customers<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0even if they were loyal left the website because of the bad user experience.<br \/><br \/>So, try to add the live chat support feature on your platform and never ignore a single customer\u2019s queries. An individual customer can cause a loss of crores as every user is a king for eCommerce sales and profit.<br \/><br \/>Providing excellent customer service cannot be beaten, and the only competition you have is yourself.<br \/><br \/><\/p><h4>Implementation of customisation selling<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Every customer is a profit for the business and to fulfil their demands is a shared vision that is followed. Ecommerce platforms are massive-scale integration platforms and have a lot of competition.<br \/><br \/>A content which is more indexed on any of these social media platforms would thus stand to gain from it.<br \/><br \/>A survey conducted by \u201cBig Commerce\u201d found out that 53% of online consumers land on your page if you provide customisation and personalisation experience to the users. So, to have a leg up on your competitor, you need to include the feature of customisation for making large scale profit. Implement the customisation option on your website and see what miracles happen to your sales because customers love to land to a page that makes them a priority.<\/p><h4>Creative marketing tactics<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Use creativity while building your eCommerce portals but don\u2019t forget the excellent structuring of websites. Use of all the on-page elements like headers, titles, footers, content quality, and URLs must be incorporated wisely.<br \/><br \/>Make sure your link building and readability is maximum, and minimise the errors that may hinder the customer engagement.<\/p><h4>Follow omnichannel marketing approach<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">On average,\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/www.thinkwithgoogle.com\/intl\/en-gb\/marketing-resources\/omnichannel\/omnichannel-era-age-assistance-new-frontier-retail-success\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">52% of ecommerce portals<\/a><\/strong>\u00a0have omnichannel marketing capabilities, and it is considered as the future of ecommerce marketing. Omnichannel marketing refers to marketing in which the user using any platform gets a seamlessly excellent and integrated experience.<br \/><br \/>These sales are directly proportional to the implementation of omnichannel marketing. The better the way you do omnichannel marketing, the better are the results you get.<\/p><h4>How can Techies Infotech help you increase your sales?<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Techies Infotech, being the best\u00a0<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/digital-marketing-solution.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">SEO company in India<\/a><\/strong>, works seamlessly to bring the best results for eCommerce portals. We have the expertise of making your website get a better position on Google browser with proficient SEO services around the globe.<br \/><br \/>We know how helpful the above potent features are, and we work to help you increase your sales and generate more significant revenue.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"2d7b","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"72fb77e","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"10a","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[SEO Trends in 2020 - What You Should Do to Rank on the Top?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/seo-trends-in-2020-what-you-should-do-to-rank-on-the-top/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 24 Jan 2020 00:05:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=281</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Search Engine Optimisation is a long term solution to every digital marketing need. One can say that paid campaigns yield better results any day which will not be entirely wrong. But then, isn’t our long term goals about reducing the dependency on money burning methods and improving the organic ROIs.

The catch, however, is that unlike&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-vs-ppc-which-is-better.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">PPC or paid campaign management</a>, Google keeps changing its algorithms for search engine optimisation pretty frequently. However, with each changed algorithm, the entire digital community pumps up for research and figures out what would work best.

It is with this in mind, we have prepared a list of 5 major SEO Trends in 2020 which you cannot choose to ignore if you want your website on the top ranks of the first search page.

Listing them for you below:
<h3>Search Intent and Code Optimisation</h3>
There has been a huge argument about the relevance of the keywords being used. The SEO community, however, feels that more than just the keywords, Google has now started giving relevance to the search intent.

To put it in perspective, an optimisation for “acne” as a keyword would now be less relevant to go for than optimisation for “how to cure acne” for a cosmetology firm. However, for a science blog, “acne” would make more sense.

Now, one can say that why should not focus on both. Well, the answer to that is that optimising for a keyword takes time and the resources are and will always be limited. In such a situation, the best way is to focus on what is immediately relevant.

Now one would say that it is nearly impossible to know the search intent because we do not really know the customer. Well, agreed but then we do know the kind of intent the customer would have when they come to our business. That is precisely the kind of purpose which long-tail keywords also solve.

Artificial Intelligence has now enabled&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">the businesses to find&nbsp;</a>the exact combination of keywords which their prospects search for. Multiple tools are available in the market for the same which one could use from.

Other than this, the utilisation of Convoluted data networks, plugins, caching mechanisms and script organisation can also help fasten the entire process. This SEO trend in 2020 can help you in staying ahead in the marketplace.
<h3>Video Content Optimisation</h3>
Video content optimization is one of the important SEO trends in 2020. The entire social media is running towards creating and engaging with more video content. Initially, text optimisation could do well, then it turned to image optimisation and now is the era of videos.

If one looks at the consumption statistics, then video content is consumed 85% in excess of an image or text-based data. Hence, putting up video content and then Youtube, as well as website optimisation in tandem with that, would yield faster and more reliable results.

So, what are the things one could&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/importance-of-videos-production-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">optimise while considering video content?</a>&nbsp;Well, the channel name would be amongst the first things to optimise. Second would come to the keywords you use for your channel.

The channel description will have an important role to play as well and finally the kind of text that you put in on each and every video.

The good news is that not a lot of businesses are doing it right now given that video content creation takes time. So, if you are the first one who ends up exploiting this benefit, the first-mover advantage is going to be yours for sure!
<h3>Voice Search Optimisation</h3>
Let us have a look at a few statistics, to begin with:
<ol>
 	<li>Close to 38% of the users use voice search to&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/seo-ranking-complete-checklist.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">find local business</a></li>
 	<li>17% of the people who visited the stores had found them through voice search</li>
 	<li>24% of the users make daily voice search</li>
</ol>
These statistics are simply hard to ignore when it comes to optimize for search engine optimisation. Voice search is pretty quick and one can do it anytime, even when they are on the go.

Also, for users who have a hard time typing, either due to a disability or due to habit, voice search can be of great assistance. Plus, be it Google or Facebook or even the local networks, there is an increasing pressure towards promoting voice search even for the non-smart or feature phones.

In such a case, it makes absolute sense to optimise for voice search as well.
<h3>Social Media Indexing</h3>
It goes without saying that social media is known to generate some of the best backlinks. Social media channels themselves keep trying out on improving their algorithms so as to increase their importance in the search engine space.

A content which is more indexed on any of these&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/tips-for-success-in-social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">social media platforms</a>&nbsp;would thus stand to gain from it.

The effort required isn’t as much either. One just needs to monitor the best time to post, post content which engages the audience and leaves backlinks as and when required.
<h3>CTR Optimisation for Google Rankbrain</h3>
Finally, optimise your website for Google’s search engine algorithm Rankbrain and for this you will have to work on your website’s CTR or click-through rate. And how does one have a better CTR- by either writing engaging ad copies if running ads or simply optimising the snippet content.

A user clicks only when they find that the content on your website could be of use to them. So, while you can give a touch of sales to your entire snippet or meta tags yet, make sure that it remains relevant for the user and doesn’t sound too pushy.

In the end, Google appreciates just one thing- the relevance of your content for the user and so, if you can do that at all the possible points of engagement with your prospects, you will definitely nail the SEO monster with ease!

A lot of you might think that building an in-house capability would make sense. However, there is a reason that dedicated digital marketing firms which help with these causes or dedicated SEO agencies exist.
<h3>Techies Infotech - Leading SEO Company in India</h3>
Based in Chandigarh(Punjab), Techies Infotech is among leading digital marketing companies in India and helping businesses to get ROI by their SEO solutions.

SEO has become pivotal for every website these days, for which Techies Infotech is the right place to get all solutions under one roof.

Moreover, our SEO strategies are up-to-date, complying with algorithms of search engines and result-oriented to get you higher organic traffic on your website for long-term benefits.

We are practical and believe in generating leads via digital medium for the prosperity of your enterprise.

Technicians working at techies are proficient at giving you a quick solution if you need services related to website development or support, mobile application development, PPC, social media marketing, or&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/schema-markup-for-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">SEO services in India</a>.

Either meet us at the office in India or outsource anywhere in the world for leveraging your business with digital marketing services.

If you are still not convinced, request a free consultation from our&nbsp;<b>SEO experts at Techies Infotech(India).</b>]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Приглашаем Ваше предприятие к взаимовыгодному сотрудничеству в направлении производства и поставки <a href="https://redmetsplav.ru/store/molibden-i-ego-splavy/molibden-mpch-2/truba-molibdenovaya-mpch/" / rel="nofollow ugc"> РўСЂСѓР±Р° РјРѕР»РёР±РґРµРЅРѕРІР°СЏ РњРџР§  </a> и изделий из него. 
 
 
-	Поставка катализаторов, и оксидов 
-	Поставка изделий производственно-технического назначения (детали). 
-       Любые типоразмеры, изготовление по чертежам и спецификациям заказчика. 
 
 
<a href="https://redmetsplav.ru/store/molibden-i-ego-splavy/molibden-mpch-2/truba-molibdenovaya-mpch/" / rel="nofollow ugc"></a>

			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Приглашаем Ваше предприятие к взаимовыгодному сотрудничеству в направлении производства и поставки <a href="https://redmetsplav.ru/store/nikel1/zarubezhnye_materialy/germaniya/cat2.4603/provoloka_2.4603/" / rel="nofollow ugc"> РџСЂРѕРІРѕР»РѕРєР° 2.4521  </a> и изделий из него. 
 
 
-	Поставка катализаторов, и оксидов 
-	Поставка изделий производственно-технического назначения (чаши). 
-       Любые типоразмеры, изготовление по чертежам и спецификациям заказчика. 
 
 
<a href="https://redmetsplav.ru/store/nikel1/zarubezhnye_materialy/germaniya/cat2.4603/provoloka_2.4603/" / rel="nofollow ugc"></a>

			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Приглашаем Ваше предприятие к взаимовыгодному сотрудничеству в направлении производства и поставки <a href="https://redmetsplav.ru/store/nikel1/rossiyskie_materialy/nikelevye_splavy/47nd_1/" / rel="nofollow ugc"> 47РќР”  </a> и изделий из него. 
 
 
-	Поставка карбидов и оксидов 
-	Поставка изделий производственно-технического назначения (детали). 
-       Любые типоразмеры, изготовление по чертежам и спецификациям заказчика.

%D0%BE%20%D1%87%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D0%BC%20%D0%B8%20%D1%81%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D1%8F%D0%BC%20%D0%B7%D0%B0%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%B7%D1%87%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0.%20%20%20%3Ca%20href%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fredmetsplav.ru%2Fstore%2Fnikel1%2Frossiyskie_materialy%2Fnikelevye_splavy%2F39n_-_gost_10994-74_1%2Fizdeliya_iz_39n_-_gost_10994-74_1%2F%3E%3Cimg%20src%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fredmetsplav.ru%2FuploadedFiles%2Feshopimages%2Fbig%2F20121225234900206_204.jpg%22%3E%3C%2Fa%3E%20%20%20%3Ca%20href%3Dhttps%3A%2F%2Fmarmalade.cafeblog.hu%2F2007%2Fpage%2F5%2F%3FsharebyemailCimzett%3Dalexpopov716253%2540gmail.com%26sharebyemailFelado%3Dalexpopov716253%2540gmail.com%26sharebyemailUzenet%3D%25D0%259F%25D1%2580%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B3%25D0%25BB%25D0%25B0%25D1%2588%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BC%2520%25D0%2592%25D0%25B0%25D1%2588%25D0%25B5%2520%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D0%25B5%25D0%25B4%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D0%25B8%25D1%258F%25D1%2582%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B5%2520%25D0%25BA%2520%25D0%25B2%25D0%25B7%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B8%25D0%25BC%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B2%25D1%258B%25D0%25B3%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B4%25D0%25BD%25D0%25BE%25D0%25BC%25D1%2583%2520%25D1%2581%25D0%25BE%25D1%2582%25D1%2580%25D1%2583%25D0%25B4%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B8%25D1%2587%25D0%25B5%25D1%2581%25D1%2582%25D0%25B2%25D1%2583%2520%25D0%25B2%2520%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B0%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B2%25D0%25BB%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BD%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B8%2520%25D0%25BF%25D1%2580%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B7%25D0%25B2%25D0%25BE%25D0%25B4%25D1%2581%25D1%2582%25D0%25B2%25D0%25B0%2520%25D0%25B8%2520%25D0%25BF%25D0%25BE%25D1%2581%25D1%2582%25D0%25B0%25D0%25B2%25D0%25BA%25D0%25B8%2520%255Burl%253Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fredmetsplav.ru%252Fstore%252Fnikel1%252Frossiyskie_materialy%252Fnikelevye_splavy%252F50np%252F%2520%255D%252050%25D0%25A0%25D1%259C%25D0%25A0%25D1%259F%2520%2520%255B%252Furl%255D%2520%25D0%25B8%2520%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B7%25D0%25B4%25D0%25B5%25D0%25BB%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B9%2520%25D0%25B8%25D0%25B7%2520%25D0%25BD%25D0 			<wp:comment_date><![CDATA[2023-07-07 21:45:22]]></wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt><![CDATA[2023-07-07 21:45:22]]></wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Лучшие ветеринарные клиники рядом с вами - [url=https://veterinarnyekliniki.ru/]ветеринарнаЯ клиника тверь[/url]: 
 
Вот несколько советов о том, как обнаружить и выбрать самую лучшую ветеринарную клинику близко к вашему местоположению: 
 
Спросите: Попросите приятелей, родственников или людей в вашем окружении, у которых есть домашние животные, предложить ветеринарные клиники, которым они полагаются. 
 
Поищите обзоры в Интернете: Поищите в Интернете отзывы о ветеринарных клиниках, чтобы узнать, что другие владельцы животных говорят об их опыте ветврачей. ТОП и лучшие ветеринарные клиники России по оценкам и ветеринарных врачей -  [url=https://veterinarnyekliniki.ru/]ветеринарные клиники в области[/url] ф 
 
Рассмотрите близость: Выбирайте ветеринарную клинику, которая будет легка для вас и вашего питомца. 
 
Проверьте оборудование и комфорт внутри ветклиники: Убедитесь, что в ветеринарной клинике есть необходимое оборудование и препараты для обеспечения качественного ухода за вашим питомцем, например весы, ЭКГ и рентгеновские аппараты. 
 
Проверьте часы работы клиники: Убедитесь, что часы работы  ветклиники совпадают с вашим расписанием, и что она предоставляет неотложную помощь. 
 
Ветеринар сертификаты: Убедитесь, что ветеринар имеет сертификат и  компетентность, чтобы обеспечить высококачественный уход за вашим питомцем. 
 
Посетите клинику: Планируйте посетить ветлечебницу, чтобы встретиться и осмотреть учреждение лично. 
 
Спросите об услугах  ветклиники: Спросите о ветеринарных услугах, таких как осмотр, вакцинация и хирургия, чтобы быть уверенным, что клиника обеспечивает уход, необходимый вашему питомцу. 
 
Спросите о стоимости: Спросите о стоимости услуг и о том, предлагает ли клиника скидки или принимает страховые полисы для животных. 
 
Соблюдение этих рекомендаций поможет вам найти  ветеринарную клинику, которая обеспечивает высококачественное обслуживание вашего питомца и отвечает вашим потребностям.]]></wp:comment_content>

			<wp:comment_date><![CDATA[2023-08-07 02:32:51]]></wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt><![CDATA[2023-08-07 02:32:51]]></wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[Best pipe inspection camera - [url=https://plumbcamera.com/]plumbing camera cost[/url]: 
 
When selecting a camera for pipe and plumbing inspection, think about the following aspects: 
 
1. Image quality: Search for a camera with excellent resolution capabilities (at least 720p) and good low-light sensitivity to ensure sharp images in dark pipes. 
2. Waterproof rating: Pick a camera with a waterproof rating of at least IP67 or higher to shield it from water damage during inspections. 
3. Camera head size: A smaller camera head will enable you to inspect narrower pipes, while a larger head may be required for bigger pipes. 
4. Flexibility: Go for a camera with a flexible rod or tilt function to aid easier navigation through bends and corners. 
5. Length: Select a camera with an adequate length of cable or rod to reach the areas you require to inspect. 
6. Light source: Ensure the camera has a adequate light source, either integrated or detachable, to brighten the inside of the pipe. 
7. Controls: Go for a camera with easy-to-use controls, such as joysticks or buttons, to operate the device during the inspection. 
8. Recording capability: Some cameras come equipped with recording functionality; if this feature is important to you, verify the camera has enough storage capacity and that the video files are easily transferable. 
9. Brand reputation: Purchase from a reputable brand known for producing reliable equipment. 
10. Budget: Determine your budget before making a purchase and weigh the features against the cost. 
 
Bear in mind, these are just examples, and it's crucial to research each option thoroughly based on your specific requirements and budget. Additionally, consult with industry professionals or read reviews from other plumbers to gain more insight into their experiences with different cameras. [url=https://plumbcamera.com/]plumbing snake with camera[/url] 
 
By considering these factors, you can find the best camera for your pipe and plumbing inspection demands. Always prioritize safety and follow proper safety protocols when conducting inspections.]]></wp:comment_content>

Не забывайте, что даже выбирая дешевый отель, вы можете наслаждаться интересными экскурсиями, которые предлагает место, куда вы направляетесь. Оцените удобную локацию отеля, чтобы максимально эффективно провести свое время.

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Benefits of Outsourcing Digital Marketing Service]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/benefits-of-outsourcing-digital-marketing-service/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 13 Jul 2019 15:37:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=379</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2 align="center"><strong>Benefits of Outsourcing Digital Marketing Service</strong></h2>
As a matter of fact, operating a business is a time taking task. There will come a time when one realizes that looking after and doing everything by oneself seems no more practicable. Thereupon, there arises the need of employing some more hands, but at times it is not even necessary. In that case, outsourcing your&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/grow-business-with-digital-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">digital marketing</a></strong>&nbsp;to expert companies is the best solution.

This proves to be relatively cheaper and highly convenient than hiring a full-time, digital marketer. Moreover, by outsourcing these services you are certain to get proficient and focused results, while you are left with adequate time and energy to do what you are good at- expanding the business.
<h2>Making a strong and consistent social media presence</h2>
<p align="justify">Handling your business’s social media accounts is a time-consuming process, which results in the outdated results when you are unable to keep up with the time commitments. However, inappropriate management of social media can be adverse for your brand. Presume yourself as a customer and land up to your social media pages.</p>
What does it convey to your clients? Therefore, it is very crucial to be precise and persistent through every digital platform you promote yourself on with relevant graphics and content - that proficiently showcases your product and services to the customers. Hence, digital marketing agencies ensure the aforementioned results to be delivered with diligence as their work speaks for themselves.
<h2>Better insights and analytics</h2>
<p align="justify">Even though you get hold of an extra understanding about your business by toiling hard day in and day out, yet there is always something that needs to be addressed. For example, what are the factors responsible for getting visitors to your site and becoming aware of what all is required for your business optimization?</p>
Consequently,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blogs/best-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">outsourcing your digital marketing</a></strong>&nbsp;to the concerned consultants enables you with a new outlook on how to approach your marketing on any given day.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/benifits-of-digital-marketing-2.jpg" alt="benifits-of-digital-marketing-2 ">&nbsp;
<h2>Better Return On Investment (ROI)</h2>
When digital marketing is outsourced, it is certain to reap benefits from the funds invested efficiently. This is because the marketing experts aim to get you leads, which keeps them engaged in enabling you to get the results you have paid for. This inevitably, allows you to save your time and money while expanding your business both offline and online with the experts.
<h2>Keeps you abreast of latest industrial trends</h2>
As we all know that the digital marketing experts always strive to imbibe new skills and enhance their existing abilities and approaches, it is reasonable to keep a tab on the ever-evolving and expanding field of digital marketing. However, with industrial connections like these digital marketing agencies are definitely beneficial when it comes to laying hands on big and important changes in the industry as a whole.
<h2>Focus more on your core business</h2>
Irrefutably, outsourcing digital marketing to an external agency saves you time and energy to concentrate on your main business. Since, this is the epoch of outsourcing; there are a number of companies who are outsourcing the non-core activities to third parties. Besides saving time and energy, these agencies equip you with the new ideas and development strategies.

With the appropriate and correct information by you, the digital marketing consultants plan, develop and execute a technique that brings results. Thus while the experts are busy in implementing the promotional plans for your business, you are left with enough time to concentrate on the key areas of your business.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/benifits-of-digital-marketing-3.jpg" alt="benifits-of-digital-marketing">
<h2>Reckon on ongoing marketing optimization</h2>
Since the concerned digital marketing agency constantly strives to prove ROI by delivering committed end results, they stay engaged in consistently optimizing your strategy for the best outcomes. Outsourcing your digital marketing means, there is reduced risk of stagnancy or negligence.
<h2>Access to the latest digital marketing tools</h2>
Many business’ marketing departments are either deprived of technology or possess a mixed range of inconsistent marketing technologies. Perhaps the digital marketing agencies have access to almost every latest technology with the competency to pick the best one according to the needs of the client.

Therefore hiring a digital marketing consultant who can guide you about the latest technologies and their implementation are of big value to your business.
<h2>All set to make a change? Hire Techies Infotech - Best Digital Marketing Agency in India</h2>
There is no doubt that outsourcing your digital marketing is a game changer that enables you to get great results conveniently. Moreover, it allows you to devote your time and energy to what you are best at. But, the challenge is to pick the right agency for digital marketing. Subsequently, you should only opt for a reputed and professional digital marketing agency by closely scrutinizing its portfolio before outsourcing your projects.

Techies Infotech is looked upon as one of the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">&nbsp;best digital marketing agencies in India</a></strong>&nbsp;that is powered by a team of proficient digital marketing executives, who are committed to solving every query regarding this niche. Besides this our successful completion of numerous projects has helped emerged with great competency to place ourselves in the list of top digital marketing companies in India. So, what are you waiting for! Hire us and elevate your business to new heights.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[post_sidebar]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Video SEO: How to ace Google Ranking for Youtube Videos]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/video-seo-how-to-ace-google-ranking-for-youtube-videos/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 07 May 2020 12:06:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=1937</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3>Introduction</h3>
In the times of the 21st century, video marketing has taken up an essential place in the businesses. It is one of the most integral parts of business strategy, and indeed, it has been successful in garnering great results to the ventures.

It has been recorded that after seeing a video, customers are 65-84% more likely to buy a product. In this time of video dominance, YouTube has come out to be the second-highest search engine after the mighty Google. It has around 1.9 billion monthly users, and this is the same reason why businesses are so much attracted to YouTube.

But, the better the platform, the more complex its functionality. To ace the views and results on YouTube, you need to follow various strategies. And what would be better than joining the second best with the first best? So here, in this blog, allow us to refurbish your knowledge on how to rank youtube videos on Google.
<h3>Tip 1: Carry out keyword research</h3>
The first step of every SEO strategy is finding the right keyword to target. So, plunge into it! You need to know the right keywords to rank both on Google and YouTube. There are two methods through which you can generate quality keywords:-
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>YouTube search suggest feature</h4>
This is, by far, one of the easiest ways of getting quality keywords. All you need to do is type a keyword in the search box. You will get a lot of recommendations for auto-completion. Well, all the suggestions you are getting are the potential keywords for your SEO strategy.

It was easy, wasn’t it? Let’s move on to the second part.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Google search</h4>
When it comes to Google, you just need to make peace with how it works, and half of your struggles are gone. Understand that Google doesn’t always rank all the videos of YouTube. There are particular keywords if used, to get listed on Google.

Some of those words can be reviews, tutorials, how-to, fitness, sports, etc. Do you know that if your YouTube videos rank on Google as well, there are 2-5x chances of more reviews, leading to more chances of conversions?

Make sure that the keyword you are using has the right amount of searches for it; say around 100-1k searches per month at least.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
Doing keyword research

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/google-search.png" alt="Doing keyword research"></li>
</ul>
<h3>Tip 2: Optimize video tags</h3>
Tags are one of the factors taking you to the side-bar of recommendations. So make sure that you have optimized your tags properly to get your videos in good ranks.

Here are some of the steps you can follow to optimize your tags properly. Check out:
<ul>
 	<li>
<h4>Relevant to your topic</h4>
There are many general and specific keywords. Make sure you use your keywords according to your central theme only. Use the keywords describing your video the best.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Add the misspellings</h4>
Let’s face the fact that people CAN commit various typos while searching for something. Make sure you add some misspelled keywords on purpose to take up the chances of rankings.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Add singulars and plurals</h4>
Along with the typos, people can also get confused between singulars and plurals. Add both in your keywords.</li>
 	<li>
<h4>Don’t overuse the tags</h4>
Now don’t create a whole mess with numerous and uncountable tags. Just use the relevant 10-12 tags, and that’s it!
<h4>Reference</h4>
Applying optimized video tags:

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/video-tags.png" alt="optimized video tags"></li>
</ul>
<h3>Tip 3: Create a keyword-rich playlist</h3>
Another productive strategy for your youtube SEO strategy can be creating a keyword-rich playlist. It can increase your view time and retention. Now the question arises on how to create a keyword-rich playlist. Well, here is the solution.

First of all, it is not rocket science. All you have to do is to go through your videos and sort out the videos with the common topics. When you find all the videos with everyday issues, create a playlist for them. That’s it!

Now, if you are new to youtube and don’t have multiple videos of the same or common topic, don’t worry! You can add videos of other channels to your playlists. This way, you might get the benefits of others’ SEO strategy as well. Isn’t it clever!
<h4>Reference:</h4>
Playlist for the concerned client.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/playlist.png" alt="Playlist for the concerned client">
<h3>Tip 4: Optimize your channel page</h3>
Your channel page is the landing page on YouTube. If it is optimized correctly, it can attract more engagement and subscribers. It can bring a direct impact on the ranking of your videos. To maximize your page, make sure that it is built professionally.

The next thing you have to make sure is that your channel page should contain the keywords you are targeting. It can bring great help to the SEO strategy.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
Optimized channel page for the client.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/optimized-channel.png" alt="Optimized channel page for the client">
<h3>Tip 5: Encourage users to comment</h3>
Comments are one way for YouTube to consider a video to be having a good response. Always encourage more and more comments on your videos as it can send a signal of your popularity and can help rank on both Google and Youtube.

One way you can encourage the reviews is by asking one question at the end of the video and asking them for the answer in the comments.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
User comments on the client’s video

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/user-comment.png" alt="User comments on the client’s video">
<h3>Tip 6: Length of the video</h3>
It is always suggested to make the videos of at least 2 minutes of length. The algorithm is simple. The more seconds you add to your video, the more are the chances for it to rank on both the engines. It will increase the watch time of your videos and hence increase the chances of ranking.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
The optimized duration of the video.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/video-duration.png" alt="The optimized duration of the video">
<h3>Tip 7: Description</h3>
Make sure that you add the call to action button and link to your website in the description. These are the two most essential components of any Youtube Description. Try to write a description of at least 200 words. Use the keywords and their synonyms in the content. But yes, do not copy the content for different videos. And as I said before, do not overuse the keywords; it would be like slapping your efforts. Video transcripts, too, can be added in the description.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
The optimized duration of the video.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/description.png" alt="The optimized duration of the video">

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/custom-thumbnail.png" alt="custom thumbnail">
<h3>Tip 8: Leverage social media</h3>
Social media is, by far, the best way to promote your videos. Synchronize your YouTube account with your social media, and whenever you post a video, run it through your social media accounts.
It will gain a lot of viewership.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
Social Media promotion of the Youtube videos

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/social-media.png" alt="Social Media promotion of the Youtube videos">
<h3>Tip 9: Find topics with traffic potential</h3>
Look for the burning topics of the time. Before planning a video, do market research and find out what the people are watching.

Draw out a list of all the topics prevalent, try to connect the dots with your products, and then craft a video to stay in sync with the trends.
<h4>Reference:</h4>
Video title optimization

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/video-title-optimization.png" alt="Video title optimization">
<h3>The lifecycle of great YouTube marketing</h3>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/youtube-marketing.png" alt="The lifecycle of great YouTube marketing">
<h3>Case Study</h3>
<h4>Name of the client: Vardaan Medical Centre</h4>
<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/vardaan-medical-center.png" alt=" Vardaan Medical Centre">
<h4>The Results</h4>
More than 30k views

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/30k-views.png" alt="More than 30k views">

High rankings

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/high-ranking2.png" alt="High rankings">

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/high-ranking3.png" alt="High rankings">

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/images/high-ranking4.png" alt="High rankings">
<h3>Closing Comments</h3>
Youtube is indeed one of the most powerful tools when it comes to video marketing. One just needs to make peace with the way things work out here. But hey! We know that you got a lot of other stuff to do. So why don’t you pass on the load to us?

Let us tell you that Techies Infotech has been the best video marketing agency in India and, with its holistic approach, has left a perineal mark on the video marketing industry.

Still, thinking about what to do? Pick up your phone and give us a ring!]]></content:encoded>
