		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"3309","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"87fa7f6","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"290e","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"6f2f","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h3>Introduction<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">In the times of the 21st century, video marketing has taken up an essential place in the businesses. It is one of the most integral parts of business strategy, and indeed, it has been successful in garnering great results to the ventures.<br \/><br \/>It has been recorded that after seeing a video, customers are 65-84% more likely to buy a product. In this time of video dominance, YouTube has come out to be the second-highest search engine after the mighty Google. It has around 1.9 billion monthly users, and this is the same reason why businesses are so much attracted to YouTube.<br \/><br \/>But, the better the platform, the more complex its functionality. To ace the views and results on YouTube, you need to follow various strategies. And what would be better than joining the second best with the first best? So here, in this blog, allow us to refurbish your knowledge on how to rank youtube videos on Google.<\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 1: Carry out keyword research<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">The first step of every SEO strategy is finding the right keyword to target. So, plunge into it! You need to know the right keywords to rank both on Google and YouTube. There are two methods through which you can generate quality keywords:-<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li><h4>YouTube search suggest feature<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">This is, by far, one of the easiest ways of getting quality keywords. All you need to do is type a keyword in the search box. You will get a lot of recommendations for auto-completion. Well, all the suggestions you are getting are the potential keywords for your SEO strategy.<br \/><br \/>It was easy, wasn\u2019t it? Let\u2019s move on to the second part.<\/p><\/li><li><h4>Google search<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">When it comes to Google, you just need to make peace with how it works, and half of your struggles are gone. Understand that Google doesn\u2019t always rank all the videos of YouTube. There are particular keywords if used, to get listed on Google.<br \/><br \/>Some of those words can be reviews, tutorials, how-to, fitness, sports, etc. Do you know that if your YouTube videos rank on Google as well, there are 2-5x chances of more reviews, leading to more chances of conversions?<br \/><br \/>Make sure that the keyword you are using has the right amount of searches for it; say around 100-1k searches per month at least.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Doing keyword research<\/p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/google-search.png\" alt=\"Doing keyword research\" \/><\/li><\/ul><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 2: Optimize video tags<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Tags are one of the factors taking you to the side-bar of recommendations. So make sure that you have optimized your tags properly to get your videos in good ranks.<br \/><br \/>Here are some of the steps you can follow to optimize your tags properly. Check out:<\/p><ul class=\"arrow-list\"><li><h4>Relevant to your topic<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">There are many general and specific keywords. Make sure you use your keywords according to your central theme only. Use the keywords describing your video the best.<\/p><\/li><li><h4>Add the misspellings<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Let\u2019s face the fact that people CAN commit various typos while searching for something. Make sure you add some misspelled keywords on purpose to take up the chances of rankings.<\/p><\/li><li><h4>Add singulars and plurals<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Along with the typos, people can also get confused between singulars and plurals. Add both in your keywords.<\/p><\/li><li><h4>Don\u2019t overuse the tags<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Now don\u2019t create a whole mess with numerous and uncountable tags. Just use the relevant 10-12 tags, and that\u2019s it!<\/p><h4>Reference<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Applying optimized video tags:<\/p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/video-tags.png\" alt=\"optimized video tags\" \/><\/li><\/ul><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 3: Create a keyword-rich playlist<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Another productive strategy for your youtube SEO strategy can be creating a keyword-rich playlist. It can increase your view time and retention. Now the question arises on how to create a keyword-rich playlist. Well, here is the solution.<br \/><br \/>First of all, it is not rocket science. All you have to do is to go through your videos and sort out the videos with the common topics. When you find all the videos with everyday issues, create a playlist for them. That\u2019s it!<br \/><br \/>Now, if you are new to youtube and don\u2019t have multiple videos of the same or common topic, don\u2019t worry! You can add videos of other channels to your playlists. This way, you might get the benefits of others\u2019 SEO strategy as well. Isn\u2019t it clever!<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Playlist for the concerned client.<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/playlist.png\" alt=\"Playlist for the concerned client\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 4: Optimize your channel page<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Your channel page is the landing page on YouTube. If it is optimized correctly, it can attract more engagement and subscribers. It can bring a direct impact on the ranking of your videos. To maximize your page, make sure that it is built professionally.<br \/><br \/>The next thing you have to make sure is that your channel page should contain the keywords you are targeting. It can bring great help to the SEO strategy.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Optimized channel page for the client.<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/optimized-channel.png\" alt=\"Optimized channel page for the client\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 5: Encourage users to comment<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Comments are one way for YouTube to consider a video to be having a good response. Always encourage more and more comments on your videos as it can send a signal of your popularity and can help rank on both Google and Youtube.<br \/><br \/>One way you can encourage the reviews is by asking one question at the end of the video and asking them for the answer in the comments.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">User comments on the client\u2019s video<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/user-comment.png\" alt=\"User comments on the client\u2019s video\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 6: Length of the video<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">It is always suggested to make the videos of at least 2 minutes of length. The algorithm is simple. The more seconds you add to your video, the more are the chances for it to rank on both the engines. It will increase the watch time of your videos and hence increase the chances of ranking.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">The optimized duration of the video.<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/video-duration.png\" alt=\"The optimized duration of the video\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 7: Description<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Make sure that you add the call to action button and link to your website in the description. These are the two most essential components of any Youtube Description. Try to write a description of at least 200 words. Use the keywords and their synonyms in the content. But yes, do not copy the content for different videos. And as I said before, do not overuse the keywords; it would be like slapping your efforts. Video transcripts, too, can be added in the description.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">The optimized duration of the video.<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/description.png\" alt=\"The optimized duration of the video\" \/><br \/><br \/><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/custom-thumbnail.png\" alt=\"custom thumbnail\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 8: Leverage social media<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Social media is, by far, the best way to promote your videos. Synchronize your YouTube account with your social media, and whenever you post a video, run it through your social media accounts.<br \/>It will gain a lot of viewership.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Social Media promotion of the Youtube videos<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/social-media.png\" alt=\"Social Media promotion of the Youtube videos\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Tip 9: Find topics with traffic potential<\/h3><p class=\"justify\">Look for the burning topics of the time. Before planning a video, do market research and find out what the people are watching.<br \/><br \/>Draw out a list of all the topics prevalent, try to connect the dots with your products, and then craft a video to stay in sync with the trends.<\/p><h4>Reference:<\/h4><p class=\"justify\">Video title optimization<\/p><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/video-title-optimization.png\" alt=\"Video title optimization\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>The lifecycle of great YouTube marketing<\/h3><p><br \/><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto d-block\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/images\/youtube-marketing.png\" alt=\"The lifecycle of great YouTube marketing\" \/><\/p><div class=\"dashed\">\u00a0<\/div><div class=\"h20\">\u00a0<\/div><h3>Case Study<\/h3><h4>Name of the client: Vardaan Medical Centre<\/h4><p><img class=\"img-fluid mx-auto 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How react-native reduces development costs?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-react-native-reduces-development-costs/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 29 May 2020 00:06:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ld-wp.template-help.com/wordpress_prod-18249/v1/?p=1938</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h3>Introduction</h3>
With the passage of the time, two of the mobile operating systems have prevailed to the top and have become perhaps the only two mobile OS’s which are dominating the market. These are Android and iOS.

In previous times, developers have suffered a lot while making the same apps for both the systems differently. There was a difference in the language, a difference in development, and it was tough to find a template which is workable similarly on both the platforms.

But as time passed on, we developed the WORE (Write once, run everywhere) theory which helped in making standard code for both the platforms. The apps so made were called the hybrid apps and reduced the costs of development to a great extent. But the problem arose as of it wasn’t giving a good feel in the usage and the looks.

There began a search for a solution which would not just reduce the developing costs of the applications but would also give them a native feel. While searching for that, we landed upon the system of React Native which indeed was a blessing in disguise and is still being used to reduce the costs of development and is giving satisfaction while being in use.

Here are the ways by which React Native is reducing the development costs of the companies. Have a look.

Shorter mobile app development time

Now that the efforts have almost reduced to half, we have shifted from developing two types of codes to development of just one, the time being used for the development has diminished drastically.

We are living in a world where what the world sees is what the world buys. Hence, marketing needs to have more investment in finances, human resources and time. By&nbsp;<strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;"><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/mobile-app-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">developing the apps through React Native,</a></strong>&nbsp;the apps are made faster and give you more time to market and earn the economies.

Hence, we can say that the less time needed to develop an app gives you more time to market it for a profitable business. Overall, if you are developing a high-quality app, which has cross-platform compatibility and has been given the right time to market can save you finances of more than 40%. That’s huge!

Easier to maintain

Mobile apps made with react native are immune to glitches and bugs to a great extent. They need less maintenance as compared to the native apps which need constant troubleshooting and patching. Cross-platform apps can be altered without versioning and hence make the maintenance a lot simpler.

Reusable components

The apps made using react native have the reusable native components which can be applied directly to compile with the native elements of both iOS and Android apps. This is because both the platforms have their counterparts on react native and it, hence, becomes a lot easier, faster and cheaper to create a variety of apps.

Simple integration

<strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;"><a href="https://instabug.com/blog/top-react-native-mobile-apps/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">React Native app</a></strong>&nbsp;doesn’t just help you make apps on both the systems with common code, but it gives a lot of other benefits as well. Apps made on this platform can be integrated with other compatible apps without any hassle, which further reduces the efforts required by the developers to integrate the mobile apps in the respective native apps in the device, without disturbing the performance of the application to even a minute extent.

No additional resources

Another benefit of cross-platform applications made with react native is that there is no requirement of the additional resources to make the app run on different platforms. Hence, it means that app development companies need not maintain different tech teams for different stacks. It saves a lot of money and naturally brings down the cost of&nbsp;<strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;"><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/mobile-app-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">app development.</a></strong>

One solution for UI/UX

The first impression is the last impression. And when it comes to an application, the user interface and the app’s interaction with the user is what makes the first impression. And when it comes to making an app for multiple platforms, it becomes essential to be discreet about the choice of the UI/UX.

But, when an app is built with react native, the need to worry about the choice of UI/UX and costs related to it are gone. A single app is made for the cross-platform compatibility without the worry of discreet UI/UX.

This also amends the problems related to fluctuations of the data streaming and improves the graphics of the app on a drastic scale.

Scalability and availability

When an app is made for the cross-platform, it becomes effortless to push it up on the Apple store and Google play store. It further helps in the expansion of the reach of the mobile app and that too in a quick period. When an app is readily available for installation, it can bring a great aid in the monetization.

In addition to this, as such apps are relatively easier to create and can even be created with the use of the recycled codes, it significantly reduces the costs of the app development.

Easy debugging

React Native has enabled debugging through DevTools of Chrome. This further helps in the smoother development of the application. This method is beneficial and saves some extra hours of the developers, and it brings us to our previous point, which says that time saved is the money earned.

&nbsp;
&nbsp;
<h3>Wrapping up</h3>
The demand for seamless and high-quality apps is increasing day by day and the right people for the right job are difficult to find. Well, if you are in the hunt for a professional&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/mobile-app-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">React Native app developers,</a></strong>&nbsp;then hearty felicitations to you for you have clicked the right site.

Techies Infotech is one of the most excellent&nbsp;<b>app development companies</b>&nbsp;which has been providing its extremely professional and genius services from more than a decade. So, wait no more and ring us a bell now. Let us tell you how can we save your time, money and business, all at the same time.]]></content:encoded>

These are Android and iOS.<\/p>\n<p>In previous times, developers have suffered a lot while making the same apps for both the systems differently. There was a difference in the language, a difference in development, and it was tough to find a template which is workable similarly on both the platforms.<\/p>\n<p>But as time passed on, we developed the WORE (Write once, run everywhere) theory which helped in making standard code for both the platforms. The apps so made were called the hybrid apps and reduced the costs of development to a great extent. But the problem arose as of it wasn\u2019t giving a good feel in the usage and the looks.<\/p>\n<p>There began a search for a solution which would not just reduce the developing costs of the applications but would also give them a native feel. While searching for that, we landed upon the system of React Native which indeed was a blessing in disguise and is still being used to reduce the costs of development and is giving satisfaction while being in use.<\/p>\n<p>Here are the ways by which React Native is reducing the development costs of the companies. Have a look.<\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Shorter mobile app development time<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Now that the efforts have almost reduced to half, we have shifted from developing two types of codes to development of just one, the time being used for the development has diminished drastically.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">We are living in a world where what the world sees is what the world buys. Hence, marketing needs to have more investment in finances, human resources and time. By&nbsp;<\/span><strong style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\"><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/mobile-app-development.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">developing the apps through React Native,<\/a><\/strong><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">&nbsp;the apps are made faster and give you more time to market and earn the economies.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Hence, we can say that the less time needed to develop an app gives you more time to market it for a profitable business. Overall, if you are developing a high-quality app, which has cross-platform compatibility and has been given the right time to market can save you finances of more than 40%. That\u2019s huge!<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Easier to maintain<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Mobile apps made with react native are immune to glitches and bugs to a great extent. They need less maintenance as compared to the native apps which need constant troubleshooting and patching. Cross-platform apps can be altered without versioning and hence make the maintenance a lot simpler.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Reusable components<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">The apps made using react native have the reusable native components which can be applied directly to compile with the native elements of both iOS and Android apps. This is because both the platforms have their counterparts on react native and it, hence, becomes a lot easier, faster and cheaper to create a variety of apps.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Simple integration<\/span><\/p>\n<p><strong style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\"><a href=\"https:\/\/instabug.com\/blog\/top-react-native-mobile-apps\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">React Native app<\/a><\/strong><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">&nbsp;doesn\u2019t just help you make apps on both the systems with common code, but it gives a lot of other benefits as well. Apps made on this platform can be integrated with other compatible apps without any hassle, which further reduces the efforts required by the developers to integrate the mobile apps in the respective native apps in the device, without disturbing the performance of the application to even a minute extent.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">No additional resources<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Another benefit of cross-platform applications made with react native is that there is no requirement of the additional resources to make the app run on different platforms. Hence, it means that app development companies need not maintain different tech teams for different stacks. It saves a lot of money and naturally brings down the cost of&nbsp;<\/span><strong style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\"><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/mobile-app-development.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">app development.<\/a><\/strong><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">One solution for UI\/UX<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">The first impression is the last impression. And when it comes to an application, the user interface and the app\u2019s interaction with the user is what makes the first impression. And when it comes to making an app for multiple platforms, it becomes essential to be discreet about the choice of the UI\/UX.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">But, when an app is built with react native, the need to worry about the choice of UI\/UX and costs related to it are gone. A single app is made for the cross-platform compatibility without the worry of discreet UI\/UX.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">This also amends the problems related to fluctuations of the data streaming and improves the graphics of the app on a drastic scale.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Scalability and availability<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">When an app is made for the cross-platform, it becomes effortless to push it up on the Apple store and Google play store. It further helps in the expansion of the reach of the mobile app and that too in a quick period. When an app is readily available for installation, it can bring a great aid in the monetization.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">In addition to this, as such apps are relatively easier to create and can even be created with the use of the recycled codes, it significantly reduces the costs of the app development.<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"color: #29293a; font-family: Teko, sans-serif; font-size: 22px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit;\">Easy debugging<\/span><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">React Native has enabled debugging through DevTools of Chrome. This further helps in the smoother development of the application. This method is beneficial and saves some extra hours of the developers, and it brings us to our previous point, which says that time saved is the money earned.<\/span><\/p>\n<div class=\"dashed\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div class=\"h20\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<h3>Wrapping up<\/h3>\n<p class=\"justify\">The demand for seamless and high-quality apps is increasing day by day and the right people for the right job are difficult to find. Well, if you are in the hunt for a professional&nbsp;<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.co.in\/services\/mobile-app-development.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">React Native app developers,<\/a><\/strong>&nbsp;then hearty felicitations to you for you have clicked the right site.<\/p>\n<p>Techies Infotech is one of the most excellent&nbsp;<b>app development companies<\/b>&nbsp;which has been providing its extremely professional and genius services from more than a decade. So, wait no more and ring us a bell now. Let us tell you how can we save your time, money and business, all at the same time.<\/p>","drop_cap":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"689d","elType":"section","settings":{"gap":"no","padding":{"unit":"px","top":"25","right":"0","bottom":"20","left":"0","isLinked":false},"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"d8dcc06","jet_parallax_layout_image_tablet":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_image_mobile":{"url":"","id":""},"jet_parallax_layout_speed":{"unit":"%","size":50,"sizes":[]},"jet_parallax_layout_type":"scroll","jet_parallax_layout_direction":"1","jet_parallax_layout_fx_direction":"fade-in","jet_parallax_layout_z_index":"","jet_parallax_layout_bg_x":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_y":50,"jet_parallax_layout_bg_size":"auto","jet_parallax_layout_animation_prop":"transform","jet_parallax_layout_on":["desktop","tablet"]}]},"elements":[{"id":"b74","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]]]></wp:meta_value>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why should you choose React Native over Native &amp; Hybrid apps?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/why-should-you-choose-react-native-over-native-hybrid/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 10 Jun 2020 11:10:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2351</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>Introduction</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>In the thriving world like that of ours, technology is changing and developing every minute. The applications which were previously used have gone obsolete, and new ones are overpowering them</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>In this world of absolute development, mobile apps play an essential role. Where initially, apps were built natively for iOS and Android, then came the hybrid technology to create apps of both the platforms together. However, both native and hybrid had their pros and cons.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Then came the react-native technology, which changed the map of app development and steered a storm in the market. Here in this blog, we shall talk about how react-native can be better than native and hybrid apps.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>What is React Native?</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>React native is the mobile app development framework, which is used to make both iOS and Android apps in one go. The apps so created are half hybrid and half native, taking the merits of both. Standard code is generated for both the OS by using JavaScript and can be extended with specific codes.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The statistics show that with such a favourability of React Native, it has acquired the third position in the global market after Node.js and TenserFlow having more than 13.1% of the global market share.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>Merits of React native</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:list -->
</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Cost of the app development</b></li>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The cost of mobile app development when it comes to React Native is much lower than when it is being developed with a hybrid framework. The costs incurred are the expenses of the components needed to be developed, the number of developers and the total number of working hours.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>When it comes to development with React Native, not only the components to be developed are reduced, there is a decrease in several developers required and gradually brings a reduction in the working hours as well.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Where on the one hand, while developing the native/ hybrid apps, the developers needed to be proficient in many languages, including Java, Swift, C#, etc. But when it comes to React Native, a developer needs to be proficient in JavaScript, making it almost half the hassle.</p><p><b style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">Ease of finding developers</b></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>With time, the developers have understood the need to shift to the language of React Native and hence, since the launch of this framework, the community of the developers is ever increasing.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>With more human resources present in the market, it is pretty easy to choose from, hence providing ease of finding the developers</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:list -->
</p>
<p><b>UI/UX focussed development</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The way the user interacts with the app is fundamental. It creates a long-lasting impression on the mind of the user and decides the fate of the app in the coming future. Hence, the bottom line remains that a useful UI is utterly essential.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>When it comes to React Native, it tops the chart for providing the most interactive and fascinating user interface. It bears a lot of premade libraries and components which offer exquisite minimalist design language. Moreover, as React Native focusses on JavaScript, it is already known for providing the global standard designs for the app development.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<p><b>Third-party plugin support</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>When it comes to extending the benefits, no one wants a setback. If a framework allows the use of third party extensions, it is just the cherry on the cake. When it comes to React Native, there is a library of extensions for the customisations. The extensions aim at making things better and smoother in all the verticals.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Different libraries are available for various tasks across the React Native development cycle. You can get analytics, link wearables, create intuitive UI’s and almost everything which is manly possible to customise in an app’s environment. React Native is among top 6 most used libraries among developers along with the likes of Unity 3D and Node.js.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<p><b>Speed of development</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>This time has cut-throat competition, and everyone is in the race to win the place. At this time, if the development of the app is slow, it can take you miles back. Hence, the speed of app development is essential.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>When the apps were to be developed natively, the codes had to be generated separately for both the platforms. This not only increased the complexity of the process but also took a lot of time.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>But, with the oncoming of React Native, the app development has gone faster and the time used to develop them has reduced almost to a half. This gives an extent of the market economy’s upper hand to your business.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<p><b style="font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.02em;">Reusability of code</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:group -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The most significant advantage of using React Native framework is the reusability of the code. The same code can be reused to make some other similar apps. This not only provides convenience to the development, but also leads to less time usage, and saving of the money.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><b><i>Reusability is there in JavaScript, and ReactJS as well.</i></b></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<p><b>Smoother transition from a web app</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>If the PWA is made using React, it is elementary to transfer it to a mobile application. The transition so done would be extremely easy and feasible.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>PWA and React Native have been the two revolutions in the market of web app development and mobile app development, respectively. Merging them into one has proven to provide one of the best results where the former can be changed into the latter with enhanced efficiency and better results.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>With such an ease of transition, React Native has successfully acquired the top position among the number of cross platform mobile frameworks used by the software developers. It holds more than 42% market share under its working.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<p><b>Rigorous updates</b><br></p>
<ul>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The main aim of React Native is the holistic approach towards the improvement. Hence, now and then the apps come with the rigorous updates which improve the efficiency of the app multiple times.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Where on the one hand this can be as a merit for the application users, some think of it to be extremely displeasing for they have to update the apps again and again. But the end line remains that the app improves and no matter after how much displeasure, they find it joyous while using the updated apps.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>Conclusion</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The bottom line remains that React Native has been the technology which has revolutionised the concept of mobile app development. Not only does it reduce the cost and time, but it also provides the benefits of SEO, algorithm friendly and out of the box UI/UX.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>So, what are you waiting for? Grab your phone and ring a bell to Techies Infotech, the best React Native app development company. Explore the hidden benefits with us and take your business to the zenith.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>FAQ</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>How is React Native different from Hybrid Apps?</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Unlike hybrid apps, react native apps operative natively beyond the web-based UI elements which are known to be sluggish and slow.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>What are the advantages of React Native for the startups?</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html -->
</p>
<ul>
<li>Lessened Cost</li>
<li>Reduced time-to-market</li>
<li>Low development efforts</li>
<li>A native app-like feel and look.</li>
</ul>
<p>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html /-->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html /-->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:html /-->

<p></p>
<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>

Standard code is generated for both the OS by using JavaScript and can be extended with specific codes.<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>The statistics show that with such a favourability of React Native, it has acquired the third position in the global market after Node.js and TenserFlow having more than 13.1% of the global market share.<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><strong>Merits of React native<\/strong><\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:list --><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Cost of the app development<\/b><\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><!-- \/wp:list --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>The cost of mobile app development when it comes to React Native is much lower than when it is being developed with a hybrid framework. The costs incurred are the expenses of the components needed to be developed, the number of developers and the total number of working hours.<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>When it comes to development with React Native, not only the components to be developed are reduced, there is a decrease in several developers required and gradually brings a reduction in the working hours as well.<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>Where on the one hand, while developing the native\/ hybrid apps, the developers needed to be proficient in many languages, including Java, Swift, C#, etc. But when it comes to React Native, a developer needs to be proficient in JavaScript, making it almost half the hassle.<\/p><p><b style=\"letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Ease of finding developers<\/b><\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:html --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>With time, the developers have understood the need to shift to the language of React Native and hence, since the launch of this framework, the community of the developers is ever increasing.&nbsp;<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>With more human resources present in the market, it is pretty easy to choose from, hence providing ease of finding the developers<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:list --><\/p>\n<p><span style=\"font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\"><b>UI\/UX focussed development<\/b><\/span><br><\/p>\n<ul>\n<\/ul>\n<p><!-- \/wp:list --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>The way the user interacts with the app is fundamental. 							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to drive leads and sales through Pinterest]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-drive-leads-and-sales-through-pinterest/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 03 Jul 2020 10:48:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2387</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>When I spell the word social media, what comes to your mind? Facebook, Instagram and Snapchat! That’s it! But there are some other platforms which have the potential of being called the most powerful social media platforms, one of which is Pinterest. A platform that has 270 million active users every month won’t you call it a successful platform?&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>With such a vast user database, small business and startups have been using it for quite a long time to scale up their business while the more prominent players have been ignoring it. So, today in this article, we will provide detailed insights on <strong>how Pinterest can generate leads</strong> better than other social media platforms!</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">WHY PINTEREST?</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Let’s talk some pure facts! With more than 270 million active monthly users, half of the US adults in the age group 18-25, <strong>use Pinterest every month</strong>. Users are from all over the globe with 50% users and 75% of all new signups, coming from outside of the US.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>60% of the pins are based on business and entrepreneurship, about brands and products, and surprisingly, 47% of users have purchased those products which they pinned. 39% of the users are active retail shoppers. E-commerce sites have claimed that they got 33% more traffic from Pinterest than other social media platforms.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">TRICKS TO DRIVE SALES</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Earlier people ignored this platform as it was dominated with the posts of DIY and recipes. Today, every type of business uses <strong>Pinterest to generate leads</strong>. Just like using analytical tools, you check the performance of the campaigns and ads, and you can do the same with Pinterest</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>Pinterest Conversion Optimization and Video adoptions:</strong>This option will optimize the promoted pins and increase the number of signups on your website. After installing the Pinterest Tag on your website, you can track the visitors who viewed the pin and then came to your site. This will help you know about the type of pins bringing more conversions.&nbsp;</li>
<li><strong>Adjust your calendar to reach people earlier:</strong>There are six months left for Christmas, but still, there might be people searching for Christmas party ideas. Therefore, you can launch a timely campaign where you can upload the related content and draw the traffic right from the starting!</li></ol><p style="letter-spacing: 0.28px;"><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">USE RICH PINS</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>If you want to stand out, use rich pins. You might upload tons of pins on your page, but you have to showcase the best of them. Those pins that catch the eye-balls of the visitor. These are those pins that will provide all the details like the pricing, website link and product details, all at one place, no need to hover multiple websites.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">TELL A STORY</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Who doesn’t love to hear stories? But only those who bring goosebumps! Storytelling is an art, and you have to become an artist if you are targeting a broader audience through Pinterest. Gone are those days when salespeople used to narrate the same pitch to every customer, in that same boring tone.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Today, customers need some customized features and extra, which can be conveyed only through graphics. Thus, tell about your brand and products in an entirely creative way.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">ROLE OF INFOGRAPHICS IN PINTEREST</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Rather than reading lengthy content, people are now habitual of reading the information through a poster. Therefore, infographics play a crucial role in Pinterest. You can include the essential information with the most creative way of using infographics.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">POST HIGH-QUALITY IMAGES</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>The only thing that matters on Pinterest are the graphics. Always upload high-quality images, especially in the portrait style. Avoid landscape style pictures and stick to three colours: red, green and orange.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">TARGET RELEVANT AUDIENCE&nbsp;</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Segment your market and identify the audience. Are you targeting the kids, youngsters, or old? Male or female? Further, plan your campaign based on the trends, geographics, likes, dislikes and lifestyles. You can’t make a plan that will suit every age group! Be specific and then get the fastest results.&nbsp;</p><p><strong style="letter-spacing: 0.02em;">PROMOTIONS AND CONTESTS</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Creating engaging content is the need of the hour and that too constantly. Evolve as many customers as you can. Through contests, you can sell your products at discounted prices to the winners. Promotions can evolve around seasonal discounts and sales. You can also offer a 200$ gift card. To participate in the contests, people must be required to either sign up on your website or enter their email id. It will help you generate an email list at least.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>PIN YOUR BRAND</strong></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Before clicking that ‘Proceed for payment’ button, people want to know more about your company. They want to know about your social media status, several customers, etc. Therefore, if you are using Pinterest for generating leads, tell a convincing and exciting story about your brand through pins.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:heading -->
</p>
<h2><strong>CONCLUSION</strong></h2>
<p>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Thus, Pinterest is one of the emerging platforms that will surely beat Instagram and other social media platforms in terms of marketing. It is better to start today with Pinterest marketing. Using the perfect <strong>digital marketing strategies</strong>, one can easily produce leads and increase traffic on websites. The user database and its increasing popularity is a proof that this platform can surely ramp up your sales.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p><strong>Techies Infotech</strong> is one of those <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>digital consultancy agencies</strong></a> that has never ignored any social media platform. We fully utilize the Pinterest platform and generate leads for our clients.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Our experienced digital marketing team will handle all your social media platforms including pinterest and generate leads in the shortest time.&nbsp;</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Our graphic designing team will develop the best high-graphic infographics and posters that will suit best to your pinterest page.</p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
</p>
<p>Request consultation from our <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/contact-us.html"><strong>experts today!</strong></a></p>
<p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<p></p>]]></content:encoded>

They want to know about your social media status, several customers, etc. Therefore, if you are using Pinterest for generating leads, tell a convincing and exciting story about your brand through pins.&nbsp;<\/p>\n<p><!-- \/wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:heading --><\/p>\n<h2><strong>CONCLUSION<\/strong><\/h2>\n<p><!-- \/wp:heading --><\/p>\n<p><!-- wp:paragraph --><\/p>\n<p>Thus, Pinterest is one of the emerging platforms that will surely beat Instagram and other social media platforms in terms of marketing. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Increase your eCommerce sales by 10% with Email marketing]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/increase-your-ecommerce-sales-by-10-with-email-marketing/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 24 Jul 2020 11:18:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2455</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Introduction</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Do people read emails today? Yes, but only if the mail seems to be essential for them too. Apart from the official mails that people receive, the decision to open up an email primarily depends on two factors - a catchy subject line and the content in it! The number of active email users is said to reach 4.3 billion in 2023. Surprisingly, 293.6 billion emails are sent and received everyday.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Email marketing is still the best way to reach out to the customers, increase website traffic, lead generation, and further increase the customer base. For every $1 spent on email marketing, the average ROI is $42. But the question arises, what to write in that mail that will excite each reader to open it up, read it and get to our website?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Today, we will walk you through email marketing tactics that can increase your sales by 10%.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Build your email list</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Email marketing requires a lot of databases. Building an email list is the most critical task. Every time a visitor comes to your website, you can ask for a sign up to collect their contact details.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You can also offer free materials like PDFs or Ebooks, and through the download option, ask them to give their email ids. You can also circulate survey forms on social media groups to get the database.&nbsp; 49% of the customers would love to receive promotional emails from their favorite brands.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Start a welcome email series</strong>.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Whenever new subscribers sign up for your newsletter, they want to know about your services and how you are different from competitors in the market. So, instantly send a welcome email after they visited your website and signed up.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You must submit at least 2-3 welcome emails where you show all your products and services with jaw-dropping offers, facilities, etc. Try to get a hint about the taste of the customers and later segment your email list based on the customer's taste.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>According to a survey, these welcome emails have 86% higher open rates than other regular mails and generate up to 320% more revenue than separate promotional emails.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Use personalization to target different segments</strong>.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You cannot serve the same dish to everyone and expect them to react the same way! Through welcome emails and surveys, you can get an idea about the customers' likes and dislikes. Through the data collected, you can segment the email list and then further prepare personalized emails. E.g., if you own an online fashion store, you can start sending emails based on gender. A woman would like to see more about women apparels while men about men apparels. If you give personalized email subject lines, it will surely generate 50% higher open rates.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you send the same email to all the subscribers, they will surely unsubscribe your newsletter. Email segmentation will surely increase your open rates, engagement, and reduce the bounce rate as well! 47% of the email recipients will open your email just by glancing over the subject line. So, keep in mind that the subject line must not contain more than 60 characters.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Offer exclusive discounts to loyal customers.</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There might be many people who will just read your email once, shop from your website, and never return. But there will be quite a few of them who will surely like to read each email and buy your product/service frequently.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You must focus primarily on such loyal customers. You can even have a loyalty program under which you can offer them more discounts. This will foster your relationship with the customer and will further increase your sales and brand awareness.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Send promotional sales emails to all subscribers</strong>.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If your subscribers still haven't taken the step from window-shopper to consumer, then it is time to start sending holiday or seasonal themed promotional emails. You can include the coupon code system, give exclusive offers, and some other freebies to attract the customers. Adding a call-to-action button in the emails will increase the lead generation by 28%.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Email marketing tools</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Various tools come handy while doing email marketing. These tools will track the analytics, conversion rate, and open rates and suggest trending keywords that you can include in the email subject lines and content inside.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you have an email list having thousands of emails, you can customize your emails and send them to them at the same time. So, let's have a look at all of them:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Google Analytics</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Google analytics has revolutionized the digital marketing industry. Without this tool, doing SEO, PPC ads, and making strategies wouldn't have been possible. After you send out the emails to your subscribers, you must know how many people opened your email, clicked on the links, and how many unsubscribed!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The feature is known as beyond the click tracking. For this, we add trackable URLs. Using the Google Analytics URL builder, we generate a URL with the necessary UTM (Urchin Tracking Module) tags.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Google Analytics also provides you an array of reports -</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Real-time reports</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It will tell you the number of active users who visited your website through the email sent.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Campaign Report</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is used to investigate and know about the overall performance of your email campaigns, new users obtained, the number of pages visited by people, and the percentage of leads generated.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Behavior flow report</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Google will help you know about those pages which visitors visit the most after they land at your website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Grammarly</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>"To err is human," but not the case with computers. Engaging and exciting content is that which doesn't have any grammatical mistakes and is quite dynamic. Grammarly rectifies all the grammatical errors in your content and helps you correct them. It will also suggest synonyms for common archaic words that will make your content more catchy! It is also used to develop the email subject lines.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Mailchimp</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Through regular email services like Gmail and yahoo, you can send only limited emails per day. Mailchimp solves this problem. Using it, you can integrate your email list (can be in xlsx or CSV format) and click on the send button.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It also allows you to design personalized emails through templates. You can also schedule the timing of sending emails, and it will automatically send them.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>HubSpot Email Marketing</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No need to wait for designing unique posters/flyers to send personalized emails as HubSpot marketing tool will do that for you! It will automatically tailor the emails for you based on your requirements, like for surveys, form submission, or any web activity. With the easy drag-and-drop option, we use HubSpot to drop personalized emails to the subscribers with just one click.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>MailGenius</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>While sending a large number of emails simultaneously, mails might reach the spam folder rather than reach the inbox. MailGenius makes sure that it reaches the inbox and eliminates all those errors by running a deliverability test. Our team always uses this tool to ensure that mails reach the recipient's inbox.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Litmus</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is such a versatile tool that can test and track the emails of websites and mobile devices like Android, Apple, and Windows. By putting the email through your website's landing page, we will get an overlay of that email with complete results for every link.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>A/B Testing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is sending one variation of your campaign to a subset of your subscribers and a different variety to another subset of subscribers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is sending one variation of your campaign to a subset of your subscribers and a different variety to another subset of subscribers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is practiced to know which campaign gets us the best results. A/B tests can be used to identify which email subject lines generate more click open rates. Other factors that make an impact are</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>Call to action</li><li>Testimonials</li><li>The layout of the message</li><li>Personalization</li><li>Body Text</li><li>Headline</li><li>Closing Text</li><li>Images</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Based on the email campaign statistics, you can derive various hypotheses and track them accordingly. E.g., if our customers don't like to scroll down, we put the Call-To-Action at the top, which will grab their attention and result in an upsurge in conversion. Similarly, if the readers open your newsletter on their smartphone, we will increase the CTA button's size to make it easier for them to click on it and get more conversions.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>One of the best strategies is to test one element at a time. We identify the best variation by just focusing on one element and leaving the rest. After that, you have to wait for the optimum amount of time to get enough data to get the results. After performing every variation, in the end, we get the best subject line, calls-to-actions, images, etc.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Conclusion</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Email marketing is as important as social media marketing nowadays. You can even include the links to your social media accounts in the emails, which will eventually help you increase your followers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>After reading the email, the subscriber must feel that it was made just for me according to my choices.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Techies Infotech has been providing the <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html">best digital marketing services</a> all across the nation and overseas. We have a trained team of professionals who specialize in email marketing. We ultimately help you to become a big brand online.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[eCommerce SEO strategy]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/ecommerce-seo-strategy/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 24 Aug 2020 12:47:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2496</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>"The first page of Google captures 71 percent of search traffic clicks and has been reported to be as high as 92 percent in recent years" This is the power of SEO, and for eCommerce marketing, it matters the most! SEO done right will rank your site higher than your competitor so that consumers can organically find you.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Traffic creates sales, and SEO creates traffic. If you are a Fortune 500 company or just a startup, you can't miss SEO. 49% of the eCommerce websites said that they rely on SEO most of the time to increase sales and traffic. In this article, we will discuss the strategies that focus specifically on the eCommerce industry.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Why SEO for eCommerce matters</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>What if your eCommerce website doesn't rank at the top? You will lose a lot of users, and your product might not be findable on the web! This is where SEO comes into action. The only way to reach out to a broader audience without running ads is SEO. Once people start visiting your website, you can impress them with your products and services. It will help you improve the brand image and force the customers to visit your site again and again!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though ads are said to be more efficient in brand building and bringing the traffic, the moment you stop paying, there will be little or no traffic! SEO will work for you every time and save a lot of money!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Keyword research for eCommerce Sites</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>700,000 Google searches every 60 seconds! Such a huge number! Along with this, 100,500 digital words are processed every day. To rank your website on the top, there will be some golden words (targeted keywords) getting the most clicks.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Thus if you want to reach a more significant section of customers, you must make an extensive list of targeted keywords. Keyword research includes two primary steps: Listing all pages on your site and mapping appropriate keywords to each page. For eCommerce sites, the category page and product page must be paid special attention in terms of optimization.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Amazon suggest</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Now before you head towards using some advanced tools, first visit your competitor's website - Amazon. Go to amazon.com and in the search box, type your product name, and get the list of all the keyword suggestions. All those long-tail keywords tend to convert better and are quite competitive. The keywords suggested by Amazon can work great for category pages.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Use keyword tool dominator</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Keyword tool dominator is one such amazing tool that can scrape Amazon's search suggestions and would also suggest some more long-tail keywords. After this, we have the best tool, Google Keyword planner. Through the search volume and CPC, you can decide your targeted keywords.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>eCommerce website architecture</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>What is site structure and why does it matter?</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Site architecture means how the pages on your website are arranged, and it matters the most for eCommerce sites because there can be several pages dedicated to each product! Therefore, the site structure should be smooth so that it is easy for the user to navigate and jump to the desired pages.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Optimizing the pages</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The most crucial navigation features are the main menu, additional menus, search functions, and home page structure. Don't populate the main list with tons of categories as it might be very confusing for the user and for search engines to crawl the site. To manage the left categories, you can have an additional menus option. The search option will help the customers in looking for the exact product the customer is looking for!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Optimizing the URLs</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Regarding the URL structure, they should have a logical and natural flow. One must use hyphens rather than spaces or underscores. Try to keep the URL below 70 characters. Another aspect related to this is the use of breadcrumbs. Using breadcrumbs will reduce the number of clicks to reach a higher-level page. It also improves the discoverability of the different sections and pages.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Optimizing Title Tag</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Add modifiers like “Buy!”, “Exclusive deals” and “Cheap prices” to get more long tail traffic. Some other common terms are :</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Review</li><li>Best</li><li>Online</li><li>Free Shipping</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Use click magnet words like “X% off”, “Best Price”, “Discounted Price”, “Overnight Shipping” and “Lowest Price” to increase Click-Through-Rate (CTR)</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Optimizing Description tag</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Increase the CTR by including the phrases like “Great Selection”, “Fresh Arrivals”, “All Items on Sale”, “FREE Shipping”, and “Exciting Offers</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>On-Page SEO for eCommerce sites</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first and foremost step is to optimize the meta titles, descriptions, and H1's. Though many sites use a templated approach and use the same content for every web page, it is recommended to write unique and well-optimized tags for the most important one! While writing the meta titles, include your primary keyword along with some long-tail keyword variations. Always try to mention your USP (price, offer, free return, shopping, etc.).&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>URLs can be optimized in the following way:</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>yourdomain.com/category-name (category page)</li><li>yourdomain.com/category-name/subcategory-name (subcategory page)</li><li>yourdomain.com/category-name/subcategory-name/subcategory-name (sub-subcategory page)</li><li>yourdomain.com/category-name/subcategory-name/subcategory-name/product (product page)</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Writing product descriptions</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The next step is to write unique descriptions for product pages and category descriptions. Doing this will tell the visitors more about the category and help Google understand more about the page. Google ranks the pages according to an algorithm in which content matters the most. So, if your page or any product has no substance, the rank will go down.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>LSI keyword</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Latent Semantic Indexing (LSI) are those words and phrases that are closely tied to the main keywords. The easiest method of finding such words for eCommerce sites is to use the same process used by your competitor site. So, if Amazon is your biggest competitor, then search any product and find those unique keywords used by them. Another tool to be used is Google Keyword Planner. It will suggest such words and phrases.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The final step is to spread these words and phrases in the product description and category page content.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Use short and keyword-rich URLs</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Reports suggest that short URLs rank higher on Google’s first page than longer ones. Though eCommerce sites’ URLs are usually longer due to the presence of categories and subcategories, you must try to keep&nbsp; it under 50 characters. Also, try to stuff the keywords in the URL.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Get rich snippets displayed in Google through product review</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>By implementing schema markup on eCommerce product pages, rich snippets can be generated. It is a special code that gives search engines a deeper understanding of your page’s content. For this, you can use Structured Data Markup Helper.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Technical SEO for eCommerce sites</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Delete the unnecessary pages</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The major problem faced is that eCommerce sites have thousands of pages because each product has its dedicated page, and then you must have unique content for it too! So, rather than writing so much content, you can delete those pages that aren't producing any sales over the years and combine them into one! You can use Google Analytics to check whether or not these pages are driving much traffic.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Improving site speed</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The second most crucial problem is site speed. It is officially one of the components of Google's algorithm. The rate decreases due to bloated code, using large image files, and slow hosting and servers. The best solution can be first to upgrade the hosting and further invest in a CDN. CDN will make your site more secure from attacks. Using the compression extensions, you can optimize the images.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Solving the issue of duplicate content</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This problem occurs if the site creates unique URLs for every version of a product or category page Or you have copied some portion of the content and used it at many places. If those pages get indexed by Google, it will rank down the site. The possible solution can be to noindex those pages so that they aren’t brought in search engine traffic. Another alternative that is used by experts, is the use of canonical tags. After the search engine encounters a canonical tag, it will treat the pages with duplicate content as separate pages.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Content marketing for eCommerce sites</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Through analytical tools, find out which topics are trending the most. You can start a blog section on them and then further market the same content on social media and newsletters.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Spread the content on various platforms</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Rather than producing dozens of articles every week, begin marketing the content via various channels like email lists, online forums and communities, Q/A sites, bloggers and influencers, and social media networks.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Secondly, product guides can ramp up your sales. It is basically about teaching the people how to use your product or service. Answering all the readers' doubts and giving the intricacies of the project can improve your sales and brand image too!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Tools used for SEO</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Free SEO Tools</strong>:&nbsp;</h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>These include Google Structured Data Testing Tool, Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google AdWords Keyword Planner, Google Tag Assistant, SEO Site Checkup! Through these tools, you can easily track and monitor the keywords, make reports, visualizations, etc. But these tools won't give you more suggestions on improving the SEO.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>Paid SEO tools:&nbsp;</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>SEMrush: It is one of the most trending tools that look after all the aspects of digital marketing - SEO, paid traffic, social media, content, etc.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Moz Pro Keyword Planner: It offers the best keyword suggestions through rankings, trends, volume search, etc.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ahrefs: Many marketing and SEO experts recommend this tool because it provides the exact keywords that can ramp up your ranking. It also gives suggestions on how you can improve the overall rankings.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Conclusion</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With the right set of strategies and advanced tools, you can improve your website's ranking and increase your sales. When you implement the above plans in the right way, you will see a surge in traffic on your website, more conversions, and repeat visitors.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Techies Infotech is a state-of-the-art digital marketing agency in India that looks after all the components of marketing - content, SEO, PPC ads, social media, etc. We have a team of experts looking after individual departments. We use the most advanced tools and provide real-time information with detailed reports about the progress made. Contact us anytime, and you will get the best deal with the best team!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
