					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[React Native vs Native mobile app development - What to choose for app development!]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/react-native-vs-native-mobile-app-development-what-to-choose-for-app-development/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 02 Oct 2020 08:16:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2612</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>React Native vs Native mobile app development - What to choose for app development!</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Traditionally, native languages have been used to write mobile applications. However, nowadays, cross-platform development is immensely gaining popularity with a significant market share. The ongoing wave of the growing adoption of React Native has made the developers’ community think whether or not React Native can be a right replacement for mobile app development to a full native ?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Launched in 2015, React Native presently has a full-fledged community of more than 2 thousand active contributors with over 3 lac weekly downloads on average from npm. Facebook, Skype, Uber etc. are notable global brands, which have incorporated React Native. The key reason for the extensive adoption of React Native is its ease of cross-platform environment and exclusive technological style helpful in accomplishing it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though React Native has gained success in a very short span of time, yet there are people who still prefer native mobile applications. The followers or supporters of Native stand by its advantageous performance and high strength as compared to hybrid platforms.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though settlement aspects do exist between Native and React Native, yet thorough consideration is mandatory while making a right selection between both of the technologies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In this article, you get to weigh in the aspects that make React Native and Native different from one another and a thorough comparison between the two prominent technologies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Comparing traditional native with react native mobile apps –</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4><strong>What is native app development?</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In contrast to web applications or websites, native app development demands specific technologies and skill-set from a developer. These are platform-specific apps that do not run over a browser. Hence, there are no concerns related to compatibility or browser behaviour while creating these apps.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>To access these apps, the users should download them via app stores like Google Play and App store of Apple. Once you install the app on your mobile, it can be used by tapping over the respective icon that appears on the mobile screen. By utilizing mobile OS’s native features, the native app developer can implement app functionalities and deliver a better user experience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros of native app development –</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Native app development caters some significant advantages that encourage app developers to give it preference over React Native. Here listed the key advantages of using native app development for your development projects –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Native web apps offer great speed </strong>– Though native app development is a time taking process, yet the apps feature a great speed as compared to React Native based apps</li><li><strong>Access to APIs helps developers make great apps – </strong>APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) help making an app look and perform great with native qualities. With these APIs, the app can access frameworks and tools available on certain platforms. Based on the SDK platform, these APIs offer integration of hardware and software, allow media sharing even without network connectivity etc.</li><li><strong>Native web apps have easily identifiable native appearance and feel – </strong>Being created on Native environment, the apps developed on this framework feature native look and feel</li><li><strong>Easy availability of documentation – </strong>In contrast to React Native, Native app development has easy documentation availability benefits to developers. Those who are not much familiar with testing and setting up Native applications can also succeed in app development with its thorough documentation.</li><li><strong>Robust app development – </strong>Native apps are known to be more reliable, efficient, and robust as compared to React Native apps.</li><li><strong>More secure – </strong>As Native apps are developed in a proper native environment and thorough coding, these are more secure than React Native apps.</li><li><strong>Demands low maintenance – </strong>The development and writing two different code for iOS and Android is certainly time taking in Native app development. But, if we look at long-term benefits, Native apps demand for low maintenance and thus reduce the cost of maintenance in the future.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Cons of native app development – </strong>Though programmers greatly rely on the performance and usability of native app development, yet there are some certain drawbacks that have to be considered before choosing it for your development project.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Two applications to be developed</strong> – This is a thing to note about native app development that you cannot use one application to run on iOS and Android both platforms. For instance, an application created on Swift cannot be run on iOS and Android both, similarly, an application created on Java cannot be run on both. So, two different native applications for two different platforms.</li><li><strong>Consumes a lot of effort &amp; time – </strong>To create a great app on Native, you have to spend a lot of time and expertise. As the development is based on native languages, the development process is usually slow. Moreover, if you want native apps for iOS and Android both, you need two separate applications to be developed.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>What is React Native?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A cross-platform open-source framework, React native is quite popular among the development community for creating Android and iOS applications. The best thing about developing apps on React Native is; they run over both the platforms effortlessly.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Ultimately, it saves a lot of development time for developers as they don’t need to create two apps for Android and iOS, but one app for both the platforms. There are several plus points about React Native that contribute to the popularity of React Native app development. Here, we are discussing few notable advantages of React Native –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":4} -->
<h4>&nbsp;<strong>Pros of React Native –</strong></h4>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Time saving on development process - </strong>React Native saves app development time for developers by 40%.</li><li><strong>Single code base - </strong>In React Native, around 70 percent code is shareable across iOS and Android cross-platforms. This way, developers find an ease in developing apps using this platform.</li><li><strong>Fast app loading</strong> - As React Native framework saves files, developers are not required to reload the whole application while making changes or editing.</li><li><strong>Open-source platform – </strong>Being an open-source framework, React Native enables developers to freely access it for application development. To understand the React Native framework, developers can evaluate codes to enhance their development process.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Cons of React Native – </strong>React native has numerous advantages that have contributed to its success and today, the platform is adopted by market leaders including UberEats, Facebook and the list goes on. Along with plus points, there are certain minuses that are equally important to be explored before choosing the better one between Native and React Native development. Here are certain drawbacks of React Native –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Limited third-party library – </strong>As React Native features minimal third-party library, developers have to depend on native libraries that is only possible by incorporating native modules. Ultimately, it increases expense, effort and time on development.</li><li><strong>Improper native elements – </strong>An app made on React Native cannot access the device’s native elements such as camera and voice recorder in the React Native directly. It makes development more complex.</li><li><strong>Does not support all APIs of Native – </strong>No doubt, React Native supports some important APIs of Native, but not all APIs. This limitation leads developers to look upon native modules for other functionalities and APIs to access.</li><li><strong>Design issues – </strong>Android and iOS platforms follow certain design parameters, but React Native works entirely different. The graphical features get automatically transformed here with different placement from one another. In this condition, a developer has to create separate code to match design guidelines.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Factors to consider when choosing the right platform for mobile app development</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The time a business owner thinks of getting a mobile app developed for his business, the prime objective is to present the products and services to end-users in the best way.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Besides, the mobile app can smartly address the needs of consumers by responding to maximum target audience. Therefore, if you plan to get a mobile app developed on React Native or Native platforms, you should consider following factors before finalizing the right platform –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>&nbsp;Budget of your mobile app development</li><li>Timeframe for developing the app</li><li>UI/UX experience you expect to have in your app</li><li>Performance</li><li>Complexity level</li><li>&nbsp;Your business size</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>When to choose Native app development -</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>When you look for an app with native functionalities, you should consider Native app development. For example, to develop complex apps like gaming apps, native app development will be the best option.</li><li>When you focus on a single app development platform like iOS or Android to build your app, Native is the best choice to go with.</li><li>When you have good resources to provide required support to various logistical requirements to run two streams of mobile development altogether with perfect sync.</li><li>When you look for direct accessibility over the capabilities of a device, you must rely on native</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>When to choose React Native</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>&nbsp;</strong>If you plan to create a cross-platform application for certain purpose</li><li>When you seek a solution to create an MVP or prototype quickly</li><li>If you seek logistical advantages of a hybrid framework with single codebase to support app development process</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Why is React Native better for startups</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>React Native has several great aspects that encourage startups to choose this platform for app development. Following are key reasons to support React Native for startups –</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Can easily work with other solutions – </strong>The great quality of React Native is that; it works brilliantly with other leading technologies like Django. This way, you can find functionalities from other technologies in your app by incorporating React Native in your mobile app.</li><li><strong>Remarkable development with active community support – </strong>Being a framework of Facebook, React Native is rapidly growing and improving with every passing day. The support of the active community of React Native is another great aspect of choosing this framework for your mobile app development that perfectly fits your startup environment.</li><li><strong>Determining native UX experience – </strong>With React Native, you can deliver your app’s MVP version in a faster way and that is quite a beneficial thing for the growth of your business. The ReactJS UI library and native environment of React Native enables developers to develop responsive UI for mobiles. It is also a way to get access over features of other devices such as GPS and maps to deliver an advanced user experience.</li><li><strong>Time &amp; money saver – </strong>Usually, startups don’t have a high budget for a mobile app and for app development at a limited budget, React Native is the best option to go with. In React Native app development, a developer writes a code one time and using that, he can run the app on Android as well as on iOS platform. This way, the development process becomes faster and flawless. Writing 2 different codes for iOS and Android makes the app development quite expensive. But, it is not the case with React Native.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Companies using React Native</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Although React Native is a new technology, yet the performance and great features of this platform are encouraging businesses to adopt it for their mobile app development projects. Presently, several leading tech giants of the world have already adopted React Native which include Facebook, Instagram, Bloomberg, Pinterest, and F8.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Why choose Techies Infotech for React Native app development?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In mobile app development, React Native has found a note-worthy position already as more and more businesses are inclined towards it for app development. Though the success of your <strong>cross-platform app development</strong> depends on your selection of a good <strong>React Native app development company</strong> that has a proven track record of delivering the best <strong>react native app development services</strong> in the market.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If you are looking for such a reliable platform to address your React Native app development needs for your business, then Techies Infotech can help you with the best solutions.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[HOW TO KEEP YOUR SHOPIFY STORE SECURE?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-keep-your-shopify-store-secure-techies-infotech/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 14 Oct 2020 07:18:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2625</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Shopify, or we can say, “the all-in-one commerce platform,” has transformed the businesses worldwide. This incredible platform has uncovered a galore of opportunities by lending exceptional services to start, run, and grow business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Being the knight in shining armor, the Shopify platform has empowered the world technologically, economically, and socially by bridging gaps. However, being an excellent platform, it is no less risk-prone to cyber threats. With malicious practices and data breaches exponentially growing, data security and protection is an aspect worth voicing and addressing at initial stages.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A small hole can sink the entire ship; the world knows that. So, if you want to have a future in commerce and Shopify is your platform choice, make sure you get rid of the Shopify security issue barrier as early as possible.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Read to learn the ways of securing your Shopify store effortlessly.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>How to secure your Shopify store?</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Activate SSL certificate</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Before you start working on your Shopify store, check whether the SSL(Secure Socket layer) certificate is enabled at the platform or not. Earlier, the process was entirely manual, where organizations had to buy annual licenses through the respective domain provider. However, Shopify made it simple by supporting the SSL certificate as part of their platform.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An SSL certificate is an absolute necessity when it comes to securing your Shopify store. It effortlessly routes all the traffic through HTTPS instead of HTTP, which is a far more secure way for customers to access your platform. Therefore, it is necessary to double-check whether the certificate has been enabled or not.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Keep strong passwords</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The fundamental aspect of securing your Shopify store is using a strong password as the defense against malicious practices. People often say that strong and long passwords are difficult to remember and, therefore, end up using common and simple to crack passwords.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In today’s era, compromising with security is no less than putting one’s business at the stake of shutting down. So, it has become more critical than ever to use strong passwords in the present cyberattack era. However, to ease your load, you can incorporate password managing apps built to keep security and encryption as their central focus.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Using password managers brings a plethora of benefits like it allows you to increase the difficulty of passwords; it stores all your secure information in one place, and many more. So, rather than putting your Shopify store at stake, use such password managers instead.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Enable two-factor authentication</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The foremost step before getting into other details of securing Shopify is the usage of two-factor authentication. This procedure enables an extra security layer to prevent malicious attacks from hackers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The first step of authentication includes your username and password. The second step that makes the security tighter is something very personal to the owner, not known to anyone else. It is a random code generation that is only known to the owner. Thus, this makes your Shopify platform much more secure than ever.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Set roles for access</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Unmonitored access, given to anyone and everyone, can be really harmful and can cause a more significant threat to security. To secure your Shopify platform, it is imperative that higher authorities set certain access limitations within their software. To do this, the project manager can restrict access roles among the working team differentiating the ones who can view, edit, and modify.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, defining every employee's roles, along with their authorization access, helps make the Shopify store safe from data breaches. For setting permissions at your Shopify store, you have to go to Settings &gt; Account &gt; Staff Members. Thereafter, you can add the respective team member, and then to restrict their access, click on their name.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Always start with giving “least privilege” access, and then with time, you can increase their access permissions as per the job requirements.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Limit the apps’ access</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Another Shopify security issue tends to occur due to unauthorized application access to your store. Specific applications introduce bugs to the store, which can ultimately delete the entire product making the platform highly unreliable.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Be cautious enough while you install applications to your stores. Start with reading their review and do tonnes of research before getting into actual action with the application. Last but the most vital step is giving the right permissions to these applications.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>However, it is best that you have a good backup of your Shopify to limit the security issues and restrict the unethical practices.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Backup your content</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Contrary to many beliefs, content does not remain safe on the cloud after it entirely gets deleted. Similarly, once the data gets deleted from Shopify, it is gone forever. However, Shopify enables you to import backed up data like CSV files, but all this seems useless when the entire product, along with its images, are deleted.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, what is the better alternative? Backing up entire data manually should be your go-to solution, or an app doing the task automatically for you can be another option. Rewind is an excellent example if you are hunting for such a data-backing app.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>How can Techies Infotech help?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>All your efforts and time invested goes in vain if a single data attack occurs on your Shopify platform. With increasing cyber-attacks, data protection and security have become critical concerns for every enterprise.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Hence, to have a trustworthy customer engagement on your Shopify store, it is recommended to follow the above practices. In the matter, this seems too much, and you want to outsource your Shopify development and security tasks, Techies Infotech is your go-to solution. We have mastered the skills of making your Shopify platform highly protected that offers trustworthy experience to your experience.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, if you are hunting for the finest Shopify development and security outsource, connect with us right away! For more information, you can visit https://techiesinfotech.co.in/.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

Including any of those particulars on a Facebook wall or standing update 
may not appear like a giant deal, but it might provide an id thief 
with the final piece of the puzzle wanted to hack into your checking 
account. The thief might even use the victim's identity if 
she is arrested, causing an innocent person to collect a prolonged criminal record.
It looks as if each time we flip around, they're inflicting epidemics and doing good in our guts and solving 
quantum equations.]]></wp:comment_content>
			<wp:comment_approved><![CDATA[0]]></wp:comment_approved>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Important things to consider when planning a mobile app for your business]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/important-things-to-consider-when-planning-a-mobile-app-for-your-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 27 Oct 2020 12:47:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2642</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="font-weight: 400;">The decision of having a mobile app for your business always comes up with great outcomes. Whether it is a B2B business or a B2C company, a mobile app can benefit you in many ways. For a B2B business, a mobile app can enhance the operational excellence. On the other side, for B2C business, the app helps gaining new sales leads, great brand exposure, and a direct platform for your audience.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Although mobile apps have tremendous benefits for a business, yet to reap the maximum advantages, you must plan the development of the app adequately and take necessary steps to review your idea in advance.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">If mobile app development is a thing that you are not much familiar with, take services from a reputed </span><b>mobile app development company </b><span style="font-weight: 400;">like Techies Infotech. Hire our expert mobile app developers for your business app development project and ensure to have the maximum benefits from it.</span>

<b>Reasons to have a mobile app for your business –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Mobile presence is a need of today for every business. Today, almost every individual uses a mobile phone while connecting with their known ones or to seek solutions to their concerns on the web. Therefore, it might be a mistake if you forget to have a mobile app for your business.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Considering today’s market scenario, the mobile presence makes a business become more relevant to their audience. There has been a remarkable increase in app types and varieties for business that consumers download from app stores.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">As per a reported</span> <span style="font-weight: 400;">estimation</span><span style="font-weight: 400;">, between 2016 and 2020, yearly downloads will double to roughly 284 billion. Moreover, the demand for having a custom business app is continuously growing as more and more businesses are leaning towards a mobile app considering its benefits.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Another survey conducted by</span> <span style="font-weight: 400;">ContractIQ</span><span style="font-weight: 400;"> discovered that 62% of businesses already have an app or are in the process of building one. Of those, 20% use their apps for branding purposes, 30% have revenue generating apps, and 50% use them for support and engagement. </span>

<b>Following listed few certain reasons for businesses to choose mobile app –</b>
<ul>
 	<li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Deliver more value to your customers</span></li>
 	<li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Improve brand awareness among target audience</span></li>
 	<li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Better connectivity with your customers</span></li>
 	<li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Personalized &amp; direct platform</span></li>
 	<li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Increased ROI</span></li>
</ul>
<b>Common mistakes to avoid to have a great mobile app for your business –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">If you have already made your mind to have a great mobile app for your business, then make sure to avoid certain mistakes that people commonly make while planning for the app.</span>

<b>Mistake #1 - Creating an app that does not solve problems of end-users - </b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">The most common mistake that most of the business owners make is to create a business app that fails to solve the problems of its users exactly. Here, you need to understand that with your business mobile app, you are going to compete with many other similar apps. To gain trust and interest of end users, your app has to prove its relevance and worth to consumers.</span>

<b>Mistake #2 - Creating app that lacks focus &amp; exact purpose -</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Another mistake that is common among business owners while creating a mobile app for business is to have an app to present all kinds of solutions, like one app for all potential problems you may think of. This kind of app is usually distracted from a focus and hence fails to solve users’ problems. Several options often lead the app to be less user-focused, less intuitive and make users confused.</span>

<b>Mistake #3 - Not taking expectations and user-behavior of iOS and Android users into account - </b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">This is another common mistake that numerous business owners make while planning a mobile app for their business. A number of business owners get a mobile app developed for one platform only even if they want to address consumers from both platforms like iOS and Android. Here, this thing is required to understand that users of both the platforms have different expectations and when designing apps, you have to take all kinds of user behaviors into account.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">In the beginning, you can certainly use one mobile app for both platforms, but ensure you are familiar with the user groups and platforms preferred by them.</span>

<b>Important things to consider when planning a mobile app –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">A mobile app for a business can play a critical role in the success of your brand. Therefore, you must pay required attention to each and every aspect when planning for a mobile app for your business. Following mentioned, key pointers to consider for having a strong mobile app for your business – </span>

<b>Identify a clear concept –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Every business app is built on a certain concept. When you plan to have a mobile app that would represent your brand, you must have a clear concept in mind.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">To identify a clear concept, you should have clarity on the purpose of the app. Try to find answers to things like what you try to achieve from this app, or how will your users engage with this app, or even what would be the core features of the app, etc.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Identifying the core concept and features, you can stay targeted on track throughout the development of your app and avoid making whopping mistakes.</span>

<b>Thoroughly understand your business’ audience –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">With a mobile app, you would certainly want to connect with a certain audience that might be interested in your products or services. Having a clarity of your business’ audience will help the developer make an app that is more relevant to that audience.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">A thorough understanding of your business’ audience enables the app developer to think from users’ perspective rightly. And keeping their perspective in mind, he/she can develop a mobile app to target them appropriately.</span>

<b>Determine app goals –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">An advance planning with app goals is highly crucial for developing a powerful mobile app for a business. This is a way to keep the app developers on the right track, avoid feature issues, and assist you whenever a critical business or technical decision is required to be made.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">In determining app goals, you should consider finding answers to questions like do you seek a new revenue generation stream, are you trying to empower your audience with solutions to their problems, or if your business needs additional support?</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Besides, there can be many other goals that have to be determined early while planning a mobile app for your business.</span>

<b>Create a proper flowchart for your app –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">While planning a mobile app for your business, a flowchart can streamline the development process. With a flowchart, you can easily make a readable, concise and simple presentation of your app. It would show the way your team of developers would start and complete the development of the app.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">A quality app flowchart includes concept of the app, features, workflow, budget, deadlines, various development process steps, and team members.</span>

<b>Consider app design –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Design of the app holds great value in making it a success. Therefore, while planning the app for your business, you make sure to consider an interface that is user-friendly. After all, your app is all about users and if it fails to become user-friendly, it will be of no use for them. Like hundreds of other such apps, your business app will also end up being listed on the app store with no luck.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">So, to get a great design of your app, you should remove all irrelevant aspects which are not required from there. With less distraction to users, you can improve user experience and encourage adoption of your app.</span>

<b>Determine security for the mobile app –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Everyone cares for data protection and if your mobile apps would seem unsafe or vulnerable to security threats to users, they won’t prefer using it anyhow. Hence, you should also give utmost value to app security when planning a mobile app for your business.</span>

<b>How to receive payments –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">For businesses planning to have an eCommerce app, payment gateway is the most important aspect to consider. As an eCommerce app acts the role of an online store of a business, it involves payments from/to customers. Therefore, it is mandatory to consider how to receive payments with quality and secure payment gateways when planning for a business app.</span>

<b>Is your app future-proof?</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Though to ensure a quality user-experience is the most critical point to consider when developing an app, it is also mandatory to give required importance to make your app future-proof. As the technology is growing very fast, your future-proof app will help your business stay strong and reap benefits even in future.</span>

<b>Platforms to support –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">In the current era, iOS and Android are two leading mobile app platforms of the market. Therefore, consider the platforms that will be supported by your mobile app when it is released in the app stores.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">In this stage, you should ensure that your app can run on iOS and Android both platforms as it helps you reach out the maximum audience simultaneously.</span>

<b>A smart promotion and marketing plan for your app –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Once your mobile app is created and released in the app stores, what next! Well, to get popular, it would require a proper promotion and marketing plan. By adequately marketing on different marketing channels, you can boost the visibility of your app and encourage users to download and use it.</span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">Therefore, a smart promotion and marketing plan for your app has to be taken into account when planning a mobile app for your business.</span>

<b>Where to find a result-driven business app to determine your success –</b>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">A mobile app has exceptional benefits with great potential of boosting revenue for your business. To have a high-end result-driven business app to determine your success, Techies Infotech can be the best platform to find matchless mobile app development solutions in India. </span>

<span style="font-weight: 400;">To discuss your mobile app requirement, you can write us an email or drop a message here as we provide free of cost consultation on app development for businesses.</span>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[IsoCare App: Techies Infotech’s Technological Benevolence for City’s Covid19 Patients]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/isocare-app-techies-infotechs-technological-benevolence-for-citys-covid19-patients/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 24 Apr 2021 08:50:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2678</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[District Administration, on April,16 launched IsoCare App, developed by <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/">Techies Infotech</a>, for home quarantined Covid19 patients. A training session, under the direction of Mr. Himanshu Aggarwal, ADC Amritsar and Mr.Sandeep Rishi, Additional Commissioner MC, was conducted where Mr. Anurag Byala, CEO(Techies Infotech), familiarized the District Magistrates and officials of Municipal Corporation with the functioning of IsoCare App. District Administration has launched this application as the pilot project and is determined to widen its reach after the successful completion of Phase-1.

IsoCare App by Techies Infotech has bestowed the city with technological specter to fight Covid19. This app is embedded with features like; patient registration, vitals monitoring, live health monitoring, patient questionnaires, live chat, alarming system and reporting.

<img src="https://newtechiesui.deepdiveinnovations.dev/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IsoCare-App-by-Techies-Infotech.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 770px) 100vw, 770px" srcset="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IsoCare-App-by-Techies-Infotech.jpg 770w, https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IsoCare-App-by-Techies-Infotech-300x175.jpg 300w, https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IsoCare-App-by-Techies-Infotech-768x449.jpg 768w, https://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IsoCare-App-by-Techies-Infotech-370x216.jpg 370w" alt="IsoCare App by Techies Infotech" width="770" height="450" />
<p style="letter-spacing: 0.28px;">This app will facilitate the home quarantined patients to approach and get immediate medical attention in case of any medical emergency including; fluctuation in Blood Pressure, Blood Sugar and Oxygen levels. Amandeep Hospital, Amritsar and Shree Guru Nanak Dev Hospital, Amritsar have already been using this app to monitor their patients.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.28px;">Making this application approachable to all the commoners is, surely, going to revolutionize patient care and monitoring and will definitely empower it with finesse.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Another Feather to Techies Infotech’s Cap: Joint Venture with UHBVN]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/another-feather-to-techies-infotechs-cap-joint-venture-with-uhbvn/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 24 Apr 2021 10:49:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2702</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Techies Infotech, a leading provider of high-end digital marketing solutions, takes pride in announcing its success to secure Social Media Management and Grievance Redressal tender with UHBVN (Uttar Haryana Bijli Vitran Nigam Limited) after going through an arduous bidding process. To ensure the effective and round-the-clock social media support, our agile team is working strenuously at UHBVN Panchkula office.

This integration is aimed at streamlining UHBVN’s social media and grievance redressal services. And, the team Techies has executed a far-reaching and ambitious social media strategy to increase brand awareness through an impeccable online presence. And, our assertive social media campaigning is fetching unexceptional results that can be perceived after viewing the recognition and appreciation of UHBVN's Twitter Page grabbing.

Additionally, Techies Infotech has chalked out a functional and sturdy grievance handling action plan for speedy redress of grievance. Our diligent team works 24/7 and is committed to resolve consumer complaints within 48-72 working hours. A well-organised system has been evolved for regular tracking, monitoring, and follow-up of complaints for quick and favorable resolution.

<a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/">Techies Infotech</a> is working closely with UHBVN to improvise its online presence, marketing, and sales efforts.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[The state of video marketing in 2020]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/state-of-video-marketing-in-2020/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 05:43:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2726</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2><strong>INTRODUCTION</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Human psychology says that our brain will choose the shortest path to do any task. If I tell you to read a 1000 word article or to watch a short 3-4 minute video analysis, what will you choose? 99% will opt to pick up the next option.</p>
It’s a fact that videos provide greater appeal, much detail insights, and engage more customers at one time! It cannot be easy to make an interactive article, but videos can surely interact with the audience.

From the last few decades, video marketing has emerged as an essential component of lead generation, traffic generation, and sales. It has revolutionized the whole marketing industry. If you are still unsure about it, let us glance over the statistics and then decide who’s more powerful: words or video?
<ul>
 	<li>68% of people prefer to know about the intricacies of a new product or service by watching a short video.</li>
 	<li>48% agreed on sharing the video content with their friends more than any other type of content.</li>
 	<li>After watching a video, 95% of the information is retained by the viewers.</li>
 	<li>80% of marketers are happy to use video marketing as it increases traffic to their website and generates leads.</li>
 	<li>88% more time is spent browning websites that have videos.</li>
</ul>
Still not satisfied? Okay, let’s look at the top three video platforms: YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram.
<h2><strong>INTERNET USERS EVERYWHERE ENJOY VIDEO CONTENT</strong></h2>
<h3>YouTube</h3>
It has over 2 billion users, about one-third of the total internet users across the world. 250 million hours a day is spent watching YouTube on TV screens. 87% of video marketers have used <b>YouTube as a channel of promotion.</b> 500 hours of video is uploaded on YouTube every minute.
<h3>Facebook</h3>
Still, the number 1 platform for consumers to watch videos from brands on social media. 84% of video marketers have used Facebook video as a channel of promotion. Seventy-five million people visit <b>Facebook’s video platform.</b>
<h3>Instagram</h3>
1 in 4 consumers purchased after seeing a Story on Instagram. 51% of video marketers have used Instagram as a channel of promotion. 44% are drawn to Instagram stories which are for a limited time.
<h2><strong>DEMAND FOR VIDEO CONTENT IS INCREASING</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">If you think that video content is just for entertainment purposes only then, it’s a myth! According to a survey, 54% of consumers like to see the video content of their favorite brands. Nowadays, brands invite superstars and social media influencers to do their promotional videos. This attracts a lot of viewers and ultimately ramps up the sales.</p>
Brands say that their audience skips the written and audio content and prefers to watch a short video on their product. Thus, video marketing is soon going to become the king of the industry.
<h3>VIDEO AS A POWERFUL MARKETING TOOL</h3>
Just like having a website and an app was considered to be a true sign of a brand, video channels on significant platforms are today considered as the new trust factor. Apart from increasing the engagement exponentially, video marketing has improved brand trust.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>POWER OF SOCIAL MEDIA</h3>
A person might not have a bank account but will surely have a social media account! The growing popularity of <var></var>ideo content on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or even blogs, has forced the customers to buy product videos rather than reading long paragraphs about it! 73% of consumers agreed that a brand’s <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html">social media activities </a></strong>had influenced them.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>VIDEO MARKETING = PROFIT</h3>
88% of the companies are quite happy with the ROI of their video marketing efforts on social media. By putting up the video content on all social media platforms, blogs, and websites, it has led to an increased number of sales. Even in affiliate marketing, companies and individuals have started taking the help of video marketing.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>USING VIDEO MARKETING AS LEAD GENERATION TOOL</h3>
The more engaging the content is, the more are the <b>chances of lead generation.</b> Out of all the social media platforms, Instagram is on the top as the fastest growing platform where using video content can surely lead to an increase in sales.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>USING VIDEO MARKETING AS PURCHASING DECISIONS</h3>
To check the genuineness of the product and to eliminate those last doubts before making the payment, product videos have always convinced the customers to buy the product. Therefore, it is one of the most powerful marketing tools available as of now in the market.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>CONCLUSION</strong></h2>
So, the statistics speak up all! <strong>Video marketing </strong>can’t be ignored if you target some high lead generation figures and want to become a brand. It will surely require a good investment in the form of resources, employees, young actors, and collaborations, but the outcomes are surprisingly unimaginable.

It can take your business to great heights if appropriately used with planning. Many companies make videos just for the sake of it! Therefore, keeping the trend in mind and type of videos that customers like, you can also follow the path and scale your business.

For video marketing, it is better to contact an experienced agency that can help you in making the best videos. <b>Techies Infotech</b> is one of the best <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/video-production">Video production company in Australia</a></strong> and a pioneer in providing high-quality videos for marketing.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why choose React Native for mobile app development?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/react-native-for-mobile-app-development/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 06:13:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2731</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">In this digital era, all visitors want quick information. Most of the brands want to provide an exceptional mobile app experience to their consumers. There are various mobile app development frameworks available with many attractive features, and React Native is one of them.</p>
React Native is the <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/mobile-app-development.html">best cross-platform mobile app development </a></strong>framework like PhoneGap, and it is very efficient in building an extensive app for Android and iOS smartphones. If you want to save your precious time, money, and staff resources at a higher level, then React Native is an ideal business solution.

Ever since its official launch in March 2015, React Native has got quick awareness and interest in the programmers’ community. It has become the market leader in the new-gen of cross-platform app development within no time. This programming language also got 83,200 stars on Github in December 2019.

It is a progressive technology, providing traditional and advanced methods of hybrid mobile app development. For several years of work, the framework was utilized in some renowned apps such as Instagram, Walmart, Skype, UberEats, Airbnb, Tesla, Baidu Mobile, SoundCloud Pulse, Tencent QQ, and many others.

We’ll explain why React Native is worthy of being among the most trending technologies across the globe. And why this powerful tool is worthy of being utilized in your brand.
<h2><strong>What is React Native?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">React Native is an open-source framework for mobile app development, and tech giant, Facebook launched it. When it comes to choosing, entrepreneurs always move to React Native.</p>
There are so many big names already utilized in this framework and never failed a day. Many tech giants, including delivery.com, Facebook, Pinterest, Vogue, Bloomberg, and many more, have turned towards React Native for iOS and Android platforms

You also gain advantages in cost when choosing React Native. This framework lays the ground open to various formats for a consumer to get access to the specific app. In 2020, mobile apps will be gaining revenue of $188.9 billion, with the help of in-app advertising and app stores. Moreover, the enhancing demand for aesthetic appeal and seamless navigation of mobile applications have made it very important to embrace <b>React Native for app development.</b>
<h2><strong>Some incredible React native features turning a best for mobile app development</strong></h2>
Below are the top reasons listed for choosing React Native:
<h3>Offers cross-platform mobile app development</h3>
It allows you to utilize the same code for building both Android and iOS apps. Thus, it provides the same performance results without any extra modifications.

Within no time, you can develop a mobile application for your brand. The need for different languages like Swift, JAVA, C++, or any other is no longer required.

All you need is an expert JavaScript developer that has the complete knowledge of native UI library, APIs, and cross-platform mobile app development.
<h3>Amazing performance</h3>
It may not be as fast as the best native apps developed with programming languages such as Objective-C, Java, Kotlin, and C#. But, you will get excellent performance as it provides you native components like View, Image, and Text.

You can improve your React Native app performance by utilizing native code. Yes, React Native allows you to use native code, too. For an amazing performance, you can develop some exceptional features in your app utilizing native code and some features with React Native.

With the help of this framework, the reputed app developers can experience a 30% shorter development time which also improves the performance.
<h3>Animations</h3>
Animations play an essential role in enhancing the user interface of the mobile application or a web app. Today, almost every app includes animated elements.

If you perform a comparison of React Native and other frameworks, React Native provides highly smooth animations as the code converted to native views before rendering.
<h3>Rich UI</h3>
React Native lets you develop exceptional, eye-catching UIs with the help of pre-built declarative components, such as Button, Slider, Picker, Switch, and so on.

You can also build customized components with TouchableNativeFeedback and TouchableOpacity. There are several iOS and Android-specific parts available to make it work proficiently on Android and iOS mobiles.
<h3>Less usage of memory</h3>
It is very much compatible with 3rd party plugins, and React Native tools give smoother run-time. With the lucrative framework, with its well-diversified parts, the 3rd party involvement is made much easier.

Without utilizing WebView, a developer can easily connect the part to the plugin via the native part. This phase is directly connected with app outcome features that allow it to provide a much quicker response.

The React Native for iOS and Android platforms utilize much less memory space, as there is no cross-bridge linking, and the code structure is used during run-time.
<h3>The single code base for iOS and Android</h3>
It means that a single code base is used for multiple mobile operating systems. Components are reutilized anytime into existing code without any recoding and recompiling the app.

The framework is open-source to be compatible with different platforms and suitable for the whole community of programmers. It allows building native modules in a comparable language and linking it to React Native codebase in a more natural way.
<h3>Transforming a web page to the mobile app is super easy</h3>
With fragmented subparts and intuitive code overlays, React Native is interfaced wholly and smoothly. That means any programmer can easily understand the code base that is run by the application.

There’s no requirement of a core developer team to maintain the app. In times of changing employees and seeking outer boundaries, one can easily involve in the development process, and the situation does not put any stoppage on the development of the app
<h3>Top companies using React Native</h3>
There are some examples of those who have substantially adopted this framework. There are many more companies moving toward React Native, and brands are actively switching their development to this iconic mobile app development framework. Some examples are:
<ul>
 	<li>Facebook</li>
 	<li>Instagram</li>
 	<li>Tesla</li>
 	<li>Walmart</li>
 	<li>Skype</li>
 	<li>Discard</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Why choose Techies Infotech for React Native app development?</strong></h2>
As you notice, React Native is a fast-growing technology and keeps its position among the other renowned names. This tool saves time by reducing development efforts and scaling a project team. If you are also seeking to build a mobile app through this framework, all you need to connect with the best developers.

Techies Infotech, the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/mobile-app-development.html">Mobile App Development Company Melbourne,</a></strong> offers quality-assured, structured design, and stringent coding practices. What makes us unique is our ability to build innovative and highly efficient user interfaces that provide client satisfaction due to our standardized communication process and result-oriented solutions. Our key features are:-
<h3>Clear communication</h3>
Here at Techies Infotech, we streamline communication between our clients and teams by making a communication strategy that schedules and describes all daily, weekly, and monthly calls and meetings.
<h3>Efficient project management</h3>
To avoid budget overruns, prevent schedule slips, and minimize project issues, we are working on agile methodologies to make sure the product we’re working on meets our clients’ expectations.
<h3>Scaling on demand</h3>
We believe our clients should have as few problems as possible. When conditions change, and you need to enhance the size of your team, we include as many people as required to provide every task completion on time.
<h3>Consistent delivery</h3>
For the expected outcome, we utilize advanced software development methodologies and techniques, including the scaled Agile framework depending on the project size and type. This approach allows us to deliver your tasks on time while neglecting emergency work, rework, and schedule slips.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to choose a mobile app development company?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/choosing-mobile-app-development-company/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 07:03:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2736</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">According to a survey conducted by GSMA, real intelligence data validates that approximately 66.5% of the world population owns mobile devices, and the number of people with smartphones marks up to 35.13% or 2.17 billion of the world's population.</p>
The statistics mentioned are vindicating enough to give a definitive cause of the increasing unprecedented <b>demand for mobile applications</b> in recent times. As the use of mobile phones is exponentially increasing, saying that opening up the laptop or putting the query into the computer is a thing of the past. People look for mobile apps rather than opening Google every time and making the process unnecessarily long. So, to catch up with such a fast-paced, growing generation, you should be present on every online platform, making your business's mobile app an imperative inclusion to skyrocket your sales and meet the vast audiences. But, here's a loophole that we get stuck into. Yes, we are on the same page; that is, we fail to decide which <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/mobile-app">mobile app development company</a></strong> is the best to choose for building your app.

Here’s a list of factors that you need to look out for before you make a choice regarding the selection of an ideal mobile app development company because not any and every company can meet your goals.
<h2><strong>Tips for choosing the right mobile app development company</strong></h2>
<h3>Know your business and right app requirement</h3>
The foremost step is to be thorough with your set of requirements before you go out in search of a <b>mobile app company.</b> We can call it the process of introspection that needs to be followed, which includes asking yourself multiple questions like whether you want a specific platform mobile app like Android or iOS? Whether you need a hybrid or a native app? What are the probable estimates of your user base and targeted customers?

It would be best if you were very specific and definite about your requirements and the end goal in your mind before approaching the <b>mobile app development company.</b>
<h3>Budget establishment</h3>
Establish your budget before approaching the mobile development company, and then you can negotiate as per the offer. Either you go with the fixed price model or the customized price model. Both the models will have a price dependent on the scope, requirements, features, and timeline of the app required by the client.

The difference is: in the fixed price model, the company sets the array of features, and you get to pay that price depending on its delivery. However, talking about the customized plan, clients give their set of features, and a negotiation on the charges is done. So, make a wise decision about which model will better go for your requirements.
<h3>Look for referrals and feedback of the company</h3>
Feedbacks and referrals are the sure-shot ways of identifying an ace IT company for mobile development. You need to go through the company's online reviews and, if possible, keep a check on present and past clients' feedback.

You get crystal clear information about the pros and cons of the company. Also, you get to analyze the quality of the services offered by the company. So, it is imperative to hinge on the credentials accompanied by years of experience a company is into delivering the respective service, and surely you will make an optimal selection.
<h3>App designing standards</h3>
The way your mobile app looks plays a critically essential role in determining the success of your business. So, you ought to have a design that represents your brand and enhances the user experience.

For having unique, user-friendly, and best designs for your mobile app, one must gain insights into the experience and <b>skills of the app developers.</b> Make sure the mobile company you select has proficient and skilled UI/UX designers capable of delivering the state of the art personalized mobile apps to the clients. If you are looking to get your mobile app developed, don’t overlook the company's portfolio, you will get the idea of their design standards.
<h3>Delivery management system</h3>
Lack of communication between the client and the respective company can often result in a product that is useful to none. So, it is imperative to select the company which has an optimal delivery management system. By the delivery management system, we are not talking about product delivery.

It refers to the on-time delivery of every progress made for your app, including features, layout, buttons, CTAs, and its integrations. To have a flawless and effective mobile app, the company must keep you posted about the development process.

So, choose the company that is known for pioneering the delivery management system.
<h3>Trusted QA and testing measures</h3>
Having a mobile app that causes regular interruptions due to technical errors and bugs often leads to the loss of users. And you don’t want such errors to bring a downfall in your company’s sales. Try to <b>choose a mobile development company</b> that follows the upgraded manuals, resulting in automated quality assurance and testing measures. By practicing stringent testing measures, the developed product will be free of technical errors, and you won’t fear to lose your potential customers.
<h3>Technical maintenance and support</h3>
Even after the delivery of the mobile app, the products may face some technical issues after that. So, it is vital to include the factor, whether the company offers the availability of technical maintenance and support after developing the app or not.

Catering to your customers’ feedback requires the relaunch of the upgraded version of the app. Hence, make sure your company provides the privilege of technical support and maintenance even after they deliver the final product.
<h2><strong>Choose Techies Infotech</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">If you are looking for a <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/mobile-app-development.html">mobile app development company in Melbourne</a></strong> that can build a highly secured and user-enhancing mobile app, then you have landed at the right place. <b>Techies Infotech Australia</b> helps your business to drive your sales and advertise your brand exponentially.</p>
We at Techies Infotech have a committed team of mobile app developers, UI/UX designers. They are experienced and are well versed with the latest technologies in the industry to serve you with the best mobile app for your business.

Our mobile app developers are proficient in developing iOS and Android apps for your devices. We build apps that inspire your clients and steer sales for your organisation. Your satisfaction is our primary objective.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to recover your business from COVID-19 impact with Digital marketing services]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-recover-your-business-from-covid-19-impact-with-digital-marketing-services/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 23 Jul 2020 07:34:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techiesinfotech.co.in/blog/?p=2452</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Already there were some speculations about the world economy going into recession; the pandemic pushed all the nations more towards it! The world bank and IMF reports had already talked of a global slowdown and how every country was suffering from low exports.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The pandemic proved to be the final nail in the coffin when all the states imposed the lockdown, and every business came to a halt!&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Now it's been more than three months of lockdown, and it is quite observable that online businesses still could save themselves by<strong> digital marketing</strong>. While those who didn't deal with online sales could not earn anything, those having a website and selling services rather than products made a decent amount.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Therefore, having a website today for your business and marketing your services or product online is the need of the hour. In this article, we will discuss <strong>how digital marketing can help your business revive</strong>r from the enormous losses due to the pandemic.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How has COVID-19 impacted different businesses?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The pandemic has impacted the MSME by a massive capital of Rs 380 lakhs, while the chemical sector itself has faced a hit of 12 crores 90 lakhs. The industry, which provides employment to over 114 million people and contributes to more than 30 percent of the GDP, is going through one of the tough phases.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Thus actions are required immediately. Not only the GDP, but the employment rate has also decreased exponentially. Inflation is increasing every quarter, and most countries are on the verge of facing a recession. Experts say that it will be worst than all other economic crisis happened earlier.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>The need for digital transformation for your business</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>How can I have a more agile supply chain? Can I make Manufacturing more competitive in higher cost environments? Can I shift my supply chain to new geography without a considerable cost or risk?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The list of such questions is endless, yet the answer remains the same – Digital Transformation. This is the time to adopt new digital tools to manage supply chains and throw away those spreadsheets. Include AI, machine learning, robotic process automation in your business, and ramp up your sales.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are supply chain software to manage purchasing, supply chain, inventory, and provide real-time data. There are platforms like Fictiv and MacroFab that allow users to upload design data, get instant pricing, perform DFM (design for Manufacturing) on-the-fly, and then select the right manufacturing option for every project.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Do you want to grab this opportunity to take full advantage of maximum online users during the lockdown or still wait for the vaccine to be developed and conditions get back to normal? Digital marketing itself is the vaccine for treating the problems faced by businesses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Impact of COVID-19 on digital marketing&nbsp;</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Though there has been a decrease in digital marketing spending, this lockdown is the best time to invest. The CPCs have fallen along with an increase in CTRs and CVRs. People are more focused on running social media ads, especially on Instagram.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>The more prominent e-commerce companies had initially stopped spending on google analytics, but now with some unlock down, companies have again started spending vigorously.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>How can digital marketing help you survive your business?&nbsp;</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Digital marketing is the only option left to help you survive your business during this pandemic, and after that too! Having an online presence is not enough to generate leads. You have to snatch away the traffic from your competitors and bring them to your website.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>According to a survey, 40% claimed that they saved around 28% of capital when shifted from traditional marketing to digital marketing. Digital marketers get better Cost-per-Lead (CPL) compared to other marketing channels. Using modern tools, you can easily track your lead and convince them to buy the product.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Apart from this, it also lays stress on improving brand awareness. It gives a chance to listen and interact with the customers, which helps to get a better insight into customer satisfaction and demand.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Digital Marketing leverage</strong>s social media signals, social proof, and testimonials from actual consumers who have previously purchased, joined or availed of a product or service marketed by a particular brand or business.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Last but not least, the coming era is of "Internet of Things," which means inclusion in this interconnected grid, giving you an access window to reach targeted audiences belonging to this online grid.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Do not reduce your digital marketing budget&nbsp;</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We know that you might be cutting down on every sector of your business, which might include digital marketing to maintain positive cash flow. Surprisingly, this is the best time to spend more and get ahead of your competitors. E.g., people during the lockdown are spending more of their time on social media than ever before.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>So, if you increase your budget on<strong> </strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>social media marketing</strong></a>, PPC ads will surely generate leads. The bids for the keywords have also come down, and therefore you can get keywords at a lower price.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Audit your content</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Most people are searching for COVID-19 and related topics like sanitizers, vaccines, online services, home delivery, lockdown services, etc.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Therefore, if you can twist your content around the latest issues, it will generate better traffic. Here also, SEO will help you increase the sales and rank your site better.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Focus on your online reviews</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here, you have to focus on local SEO. Local SEO can be easily improved through online surveys. Reports can be positive or negative. If you think that only positive reviews will fetch more customers, then you are going wrong! Customers want to know the genuine reviews, and the presence of negative reviews will show the genuineness of the product.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Please send an email to all the customers who bought your product or service and ask them to review it.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Invest in PPC Advertising</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This is the right time to <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/pay-per-click.html"><strong>spend on PPC advertising</strong></a>. Using Google Analytics, you can know the trending keywords and modify your ads.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Having a trained digital marketing team will be required who can follow the best practices like A/B testing to ramp up the CTR. Cost per clicks have decreased to a large extent, and you should grab this opportunity to get more sales.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Local SEO</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>While national SEO focuses more on ranking in searches across the country, local SEO prioritizes appearing on SERPs in a specific location. This strategy relies on marketing your brand, products, and services to local leads and customers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It includes the following strategies:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Create a Google My Business Account</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It will help you get all the statistics related to your website. Through analytics, you can prepare your plan.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Create content based on local news stories or events</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You can write blogs on local news, activities, or events. You can also organize charity events, make a video, and post on social media.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Optimize your website for mobile</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Most of the time, people visit your site on mobile. Therefore, you must optimize the website so that there is no lag in loading the website on mobile.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Social Media marketing strategy</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Facebook and Instagram saw a 70% increase in usage while Snapchat saw a 47% surge during this lockdown. Therefore, this is the time to know your audience and market your brand.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Experiment with a new type of content like video and Instagram reels. After the ban on Tik-Tok, Instagram captured the same market by introducing reels. Making short videos on your products or services will surely attract more audience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Listen to your audience. Through the option of polls on Facebook and Instagram, get an insight into your audience's needs. Keep an eagle's eye on the comments of your post, reviews, and if there are any grievances, try to solve them as soon as possible.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Conclusion</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Digital marketing is the oxygen supply to businesses today, and there is no other alternative to save them. You have to tap all the possible avenues available, which can happen only if you have an experienced and trained digital marketing team. We, at <strong>Techies InfoTech</strong>, provide top-notch digital marketing and advertising services.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Our <a href="https://techiesinfotech.co.in/services/digital-marketing-solution.html"><strong>digital marketing Services</strong></a> focuses exclusively on different aspects of digital marketing. We have a separate social media marketing team that will make a detailed proposal on generating leads and running ads on all the online platforms.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>We will run PPC ads along with audits within your budget. So, it is time that you win over this pandemic with <strong>our digital marketing services</strong>.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
