					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[10 IMPORTANT SEO TOOLS TO IMPROVE YOUR RANKING]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/seo-tools-to-improve-ranking/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 09:20:41 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2739</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">Search engine optimization is one of the essential digital marketing skills, yet some say it takes enough time to master. If you want to perform content writing and make profits with your online business, you need website traffic. And to get organic traffic, you need a Google ranking for specific keywords. Almost 60% of B2B marketers say that SEO has the most significant impact on lead generation; this isn’t something you want to ignore. Instead, it’s an internet marketing skill that you need to embrace.
There’s a vast SEO knowledge you can find online. This includes complete SEO guides, expert roundups on how to get website traffic, and amazing YouTube videos. However, the best way is to leverage SEO tools that can help you master SEO and enhance your Google rankings for a low monthly cost. So whether you need to do keyword research, competitive research, audit your website, or want to see how well your brand ranks on Google, you should utilize one of the best SEO tools.</p>

<h2 class="h20"><strong>10 IMPORTANT SEO TOOLS</strong></h2>
<h3>SEMrush</h3>
SEMrush is one of the best competitor analysis tools that help users enumerate their rivalries as well as their content. It offers robust metrics and allows users to get high performing web pages, content, and keywords. It has been continuously helping many eCommerce site owners and entrepreneurs to <b>understand the SEO strategies </b>of their rivalries. This makes it one of the most popular and advanced SEO tools among small and medium-sized enterprises.
SEMrush includes three paid plans. The Pro plan costs $99.95, the Guru plan costs $199.95, and the business plan costs $399.95. It also consists of a quote-based enterprise plan that you can customize according to the specific requirements of the entrepreneurs.
<h3>Authority labs</h3>
Authority Labs is another highly successful SEO tool that includes a super-easy user-friendly interface. With this tool, you can easily manage multiple sites and optimize your SEO campaigns. It also helps you gain location-specific rank tracking to laser target your consumers. Users can also track the SEO campaigns and plans utilized by their rivalries in the market.
Authority Labs comes with four different costing plans, including the plus plan costs $49, and the pro plan is $99. Other more useful plans include pro plus at $225 and the enterprise plan at $450. Apart from this, you can also get a 30-day free trial; no credit card required.
<h3>Ahrefs</h3>
Ahrefs is one of the most favorite SEO tools in the industry. Not only is it the second-quickest web crawler (only behind Google), but it has the most advanced user interface out of all tools on this list. It’s mainly utilized for competitive analysis, backlink audits, keyword research, URL rankings, and more.

Like SEMrush, Ahrefs also provides organic search reports to get the traffic reports of your competitors’ sites. You can check the tool by opting for the 7-day trial for $7. After that, you can get the subscription plans to start from $99 and range up to $999.
<h3>Long-tail pro</h3>
Long Tail Pro is a keyword research tool that helps you get less competitive keywords. These keywords can help you gain high-performing online traffic, whatever your niche. It provides lots of exceptional keyword suggestions, along with the keyword competitiveness score.

This SEO tool is the best option for beginners and startups. This tool includes three different pricing plans, along with 10 days of the money-back guarantee. The agency plan is $98 per month, the pro plan is $45, and the starter plan is $25.
<h3>SEObility</h3>
SEObility is a powerful all-in-one SEO tool that helps you monitor your site, which comes with the best features for SEO optimization. With its daily updates and link developing tools, SEObility helps brand owners improve their search engine rankings with ease.

The basic plan, introduced for learners, is available at free of cost. The Premier plan is available at 30 days of a free trial. After the trial, the monthly plan costs $50. The final agency plan is $200 and is the best option for large websites and <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html">digital marketing agencies.</a></strong>
<h3>Serpstat</h3>
Serpstat is the best option for SEO and digital marketing solutions. From optimizing your SEO to running your advertisements and content marketing campaigns, it provides you everything. The Serpstat tool does keyword research, PPC analysis, competitor research, and so forth. The dashboard is simple and easy to use to avoid complexity.

Plus, it also helps website owners to keep a record of the backlinks of their rivalries. Serpstat provides four different pricing plans that include monthly and annual subscriptions. The lite plan is $69 per month, the standard plan is $149, the advanced plan is $299, and the enterprise is $499. You can also get a 30-day free trial.
<h3>SEOquake</h3>
Ubersuggest needs no introduction. It is created by the marketing guru Neil Patel and holds a stellar reputation in the digital world.
It is a free keyword research SEO tool that helps you find many long-tail keywords to enhance your content’s outreach. It is free of cost.
<h3>WooRank</h3>
WooRank is a famous website review tool and SEO strategy checker. It provides you with lots of valuable records that help you enhance your website traffic, leads, and revenue. This tool is the best choice for everyone, be it digital marketers, webmasters, and digital marketing companies.
WooRank includes three different plans and a 14-day free trial. The pro plan is $59.99 per month, the premium plan is $179.99, and the enterprise plan is $249.99 per month.
<h3>SpyFu</h3>
SpyFu allows users to find the most searched and relevant keywords utilized by their competitors. It also shows every ad campaign used by the competitors and their organic searches.
SpyFu provides three different costing plans with unlimited access to search for relevant results. The pricing plans begin from $33 per month and range up to $199 per month.
<h2><strong>How Techies Infotech can help?</strong></h2>
You can choose some free versions of the tools to determine if these are the best tools for your conversion goals and if one or more works great for you, you always have the option to switch to a paid plan. But there are some cons of switching to paid SEO tools:
<ul>
 	<li>All of these tools do not provide accurate data</li>
 	<li>They are highly expensive</li>
 	<li>They cover only some limited areas of information</li>
 	<li>Some tools lack advanced keyword research functions</li>
</ul>
So overall SEO tools are not at all worth the precious money you invest. Because they are very expensive and imprecise. Moreover, these tools are on the expensive side and will cost you a huge amount of money every month. So it is not feasible for the clients to purchase these tools and it is better to invest your money in hiring a digital marketing agency for an exceptional SEO experience.

Techies Infotech, the best <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution">digital marketing agency in Australia </a></strong>understands that every business is different. That’s why our highly skilled SEO specialists provide the best SEO solutions.
<div class="h20"></div>
</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[10 Digital Marketing Ideas to Consider During the Coronavirus (COVID-19)]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/digital-marketing-ideas-during-coronavirus/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 10:30:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2743</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">The times have taken an adverse turn, and a pandemic has fallen upon us. Where empty roads and deserted shops now trail the towns, the market has drifted down to the depths.
But, as it is a saying, ‘The show must go on,’ and so should we. So, here we present to you some fantastic digital marketing ideas which can let you explore the world while staying quarantined at your place. Have a look!</p>

<h2><strong>10 Digital Marketing Ideas</strong></h2>
<h3>Brush off your to-do list of digital marketing?</h3>
<p class="justify">Now that commuting to work is off the books, and there has been a shrink in your meetings and a relaxation in your corporate timetable, perhaps this is the right time to check-in on the stuff you couldn’t do in your routine.</p>
Look into your website. See if it needs a redesign, re-plan your business strategies. Plan your further moves. You can even get conversion rate optimization at this time. Also, if you are thinking about your business, what about <b>enhancing your SEO strategy</b> for a wider reach.
<h3>Do not switch to the panic mode in a panic situation</h3>
We know that the times are callous, and the businesses are drowning to the abyss of the oceans. But in this situation too, we should keep our hopes high. REMEMBER! We are market drivers. If we fall, we take the world with us. We have to keep our strength and optimism on our front guards.

China has been an example of how the cases of COVID-19 can increase and then fall to bring a normal situation back. Let’s keep our hopes high and wait for the right moment.

Now, even if your income drains away and you have to take government assistance, I’d prefer to keep some digital marketing activity going on because we should not die in the eyes of the web. This is the real deal!
<h3>Create a bond with your clients</h3>
The typical life of an ordinary person has been affected the most. There are the clouds of gloom and despair hovering in the sky. Be the knight in shining armor for your clients. Help your clients in these times of need.

Lend them a hand in the tasks which go out of your business profiles. Create personal relations with your client base. Don’t you think it will help you once the pandemic ends?
<h3>Keep your social media hyper-active</h3>
As the people have been confined to the walls of their home, they are finding their way out through social media. Since the lockdown happened, there has been an increased usage of social media and video streaming apps. Well, isn’t this the golden opportunity to spread brand awareness? Well, jump up on occasion and attract the maximum returns.

Share some engaging content, let your name blink time and again with more engaging content which people would love to see. And once the lockdown ends, you will have a whole new potential public to spread your magic on.
<h3>Bring more sense to your local SEO</h3>
Now that the travels have been restrained, we are staying in the local areas, and so is our potential public. This is the right moment to strengthen your local SEO strategies to optimise the ‘near me’ searches. At this kind of time, when people are looking for more convenience, this could prove fortune for your future.

Another way to <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html">enhance your local SEO </a></strong>is by improving your online reputation management. Get good local reviews for your business to create a sense of trust in people. Encourage online reviews as much as you can.
<h3>Become philanthropic</h3>
Let’s face reality; people are in need, and they are looking upon businesses like that of ours. Let’s jump into the arena and lend a hand. Try to make the contacts with the production or distribution units of various medicines and sanitizers, try to get into contact with the local shopkeepers.

Help in the delivery of the products and earn the blessings of people. They will remember you, and your efforts would be paid off by making the people loyal to your brand.
<h3>Prepare your business for a possible jerk</h3>
The world is suffering much. And no matter how good you have planned, let’s face reality; there is going to be a depression in the market economy. Prepare yourself for that.

Keep adequate funds on your call, set the drafts of various campaigns so that you have to give one command, and your actions are out there to amend the condition.
<h3>Make your online presence noticeable</h3>
As people have become prisoners of their homes, their internet time has increased a lot. Make sure they can find you when they open up the web. There are chances that the boredom of the homes compels people to search for new businesses on Google. Make sure you are available to catch their searches.

There has been a large number of cancellations of the face to face meetings, and it has been hampering the workings of the companies. Make sure you are available on the web to manage your team and your clients even in these hard times.
<h3>Prepare thrust for your big jump</h3>
In this particular time, catch the golden opportunity to prepare yourself for the coming days. Streamline your tasks, manage your work, complete the previous stack, cover the work in advance. Monitor the behaviour of the market, try to predict the future of the market, and prepare your workings in advance.

And once the pandemic gets over, launch your strategies with full throttle. While the other businesses are busy seeing the situation, steal the world from them under their noses.
<h3>Use PPC advertising</h3>
The more the people are on the internet, the more are the chances of you being discovered. Take the situation to your advantage and increase your <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html">PPC Advertisements. </a></strong>While confined in homes, Google searches have increased by 75%. Won’t that be the most excellent time to be discovered?

Show your product to be a pandemic-necessity. Let the people know how your product can help them in these times. Attach your campaigns with the sentiments of people and steal their hearts with your products.
<h2><strong>How are big businesses taking advantage of the situation?</strong></h2>
Big businesses are becoming examples of how one can mould the marketing strategy to remain in touch with the clients, even in the times of pandemic. Here are some cases.
<h3>KFC</h3>
KFC intelligently designed an Instagram post promoting social distancing while advertising their chicken. It used a Mindy graphic to promote their drive-thru deliveries along with their ‘industry-leading sanitation hand washing policies’.
<h3>Google</h3>
Google has always been the knowledge enhancer for the people. The marketing of Google at the times of CoronaVirus Pandemic has been similar. Google, on Instagram, promoted a step-by-step infographic on the ideal way of washing the hands and to honour Dr Ignaz Semmelweis, the first person to identify the benefits of washing hands with soap.
<h2><strong>Wrapping up</strong></h2>
Remember ‘Tough times end; tough people don’t.’ This is the right moment for the most robust business around the corner. Don’t let the pandemic affect your business. The internet has infinite possibilities and opportunities. Use it for your benefits, and your business will thrust to the heights.

Remember that this is the right moment to enhance your business; and if you are still feeling confused on how to utilise this vacant time for productivity, contact us, Techies Infotech , the best <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution">Digital Marketing company in Melbourne </a></strong>, available for your service, regardless of the ongoing conditions. Give us a ring today!]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How AI is impacting the future of web designing]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/ai-impacting-future-of-web-designing/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 11:17:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2748</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">Artificial Intelligence or AI has been substantially growing for years now. Moreover, AI is being utilised for every different kind of application and technology. While serving with the best <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/web-design-and-development" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>web designing services in Melbourne,</strong></a> our experts at Techies Infotech, profess that AI technology very well reshapes the way the consumers are targeted. However, several brands and websites have been employing AI chatbots to enhance communication with visitors. Furthermore, this technology is being leveraged to examine big data. Also, AI has been helping business owners and webmasters get a competitive edge in their respective industries.
And now, AI is completely transforming the way we design and develop websites. Not only this, it is undoubtedly going to impact the approach with which we plan in the upcoming future. Conventionally, all sites were developed using HTML. Nevertheless, the coding has transformed and become more elegant over previous years. Websites have emerged as more visually appealing as compared to those in the past. Despite the technology being in its initial stages, ADI or Artificial Design Intelligence is being utilized for web design and development. The idea behind ADI is that the maximum of web designs can be automated leveraging AI technology.</p>

<h2><strong>The Growth of ADI Systems</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">With the leaps in technology, AI has swiftly circulated into the online landscape, enabling the web designers to put together its applications into websites and build improved functionality and user experience. One of the initial instances of AI and Web Design is the Grid. It was designing software that ran on AI, allowing the web designers and website owners to enjoy the latest look, a bespoke website based on their particular project requirements, business activity, or personal priorities.</p>
Also, AI is not only about substituting intelligence, but the crucial part of its architecture is to perform its functions as humanely as possible. Moreover, an AI-based chatbot communicating with a human user will not just be able to provide appropriate replies, but answer them in as humanely manner as possible as to develop distinguishing replies for every query. Also, AI is not only about substituting intelligence, but the crucial part of its architecture is to perform its functions as humanely as possible. Moreover, an AI-based chatbot communicating with a human user will not just be able to provide appropriate replies, but answer them in as humanely manner as possible as to develop distinguishing replies for every query.
<h3>AI for enhancing UX</h3>
<p class="justify">AI now controls various essential features of web design and holds a deciding position in the UX. With AI’s recent interferences in web design, our team of the best web designers are empowered to modify their online face in a more intelligent and experienced manner for the clients.
This technology has strengthened the designers to make interfaces that are relatively engaging, responsive, and eventually, more human. AI has undoubtedly transformed the <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/web-design-trends-in-2020.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>face of the latest web design</strong></a> and rapidly created many regular parts of human-machine cooperation. Both advanced AI algorithms and intricate machine learning processes have bridged the gap between human cognisance and machine mechanisation.</p>

<h3>AI for enhancing UI</h3>
<p class="justify">Likewise, User Interfaces (UIs) were made better using extensive learning and versatile AI, that is competent in holding decisions regarding web designs independently. It operates by training the program to comprehend the principles of design and enabling it to monitor the current pages of the respective website. While offering the best web design solutions, our experts put together the two procedures, and the AI is empowered to imitate free thoughts and generate functional and captivating web designs restricted to human proficiency. Some of the web development platforms like Wix strongly Utilization ADI to handle the design of its User Interface.</p>

<h3>AI-powered suggestions and Upgraded Tools</h3>
<p class="justify">There are various AI-based product solutions that utilise social evidence to impact purchase decisions. These tools offer suggestions immediately as the customers communicate with the web portal and provide valuable information under their web searches. Extensions and plugins can trace customer history and provide suggestions per the relevant searches.</p>

<h3>AI acting as a Web Design Diagnostic Tool</h3>
<p class="justify">With the advancement of time and technology, speedily changing trends, and stringent standards of search engines like Google, the quality of your web design has emerged as an essential factor in the eventual achievement of your digital footsteps.</p>
But while you might be capable of attaining the best <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/7-Key-Principles-That-Make-A-Web-Design-Look-Good.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>quality designs,</strong></a> you should also make sure it stays maintained by running tests at regular intervals. Nevertheless, because of the consistent recurrent tests, the source code gets transformed, which further puts a load to the procedure.

However, our web designers leverage AI-powered analytics tools that could further empower you to observe the quality of your designs, the real-time performance, and attain real value on how to improve them. The designers use AI-based diagnostic tools, that efficiently remove the demand for A/B testing and provide enhanced site design results.
<h2><strong>Get the best AI-powered web Designs at Techies Infotech</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">As the best web development company in Melbourne, we believe that AI is the future. Either way, this technology has infringed and is still invading the marketplace to become the upcoming trend, and web design is no exception.</p>
However, many platforms have already resorted to AI technology for designing and developing websites. Our team of best web designers are skillful in adapting to this latest trend and incorporating it into the web designs for our clients.

</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why are mobile apps important for a business?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/why-are-mobile-apps-important-for-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 11:40:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2752</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Nowadays, it’s quite reasonable that everyone utilizes iOS and Android smartphones for their day-to-day activity. The importance and influence of smartphones in our daily life can’t be ignored.
Mobile phones have transformed from a simple communication platform to a major point of attention for individuals and businesses alike due to their advanced features. All this is a result of the enhancement in technology and access to high-speed internet. All this happened through innovation in <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/web-design-and-development" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>mobile app development.</strong></a>
These days you’ll find that many small scale industries you interact within your daily life have their dedicated mobile app — be it the corner cafe or the beauty salon downtown. These agencies are ahead of the game when it comes to taking their digital marketing to the next level.
Not so easily convinced? There are some ways that your business will reap the advantages of having a mobile app developed for your customers.</p>

<h2><strong>Advantages of Mobile apps for businesses</strong></h2>
<h3>Massive chance to grow your business</h3>
<p class="justify">Today, people are witnessing a drastic change with digitalization on the Internet through sites in Internet business and are now encouraged by mobile applications. With the help of mobile apps, you can enhance the regional market to the international market.</p>

<h3>Build &amp; cultivate customer loyalty</h3>
<p class="justify">Mobile apps provide a more direct and instant connection between your business and consumers. This connection creates a relationship between your trade and the consumer that evolves to brand loyalty. One clear example is Starbucks. With the help of their star point system, they keep their customers coming back to get more rewards each time.</p>

<h3>Increase your visibility</h3>
<p class="justify">You can <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/business-to-top-of-local-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>improve your visibility</strong></a> by providing promotions and discounts in your app and keeping your user engaged. By doing this, you are more likely to reach your customers in those 162 minutes the average American spends on their mobile app.</p>

<h3>Increasing sales</h3>
<p class="justify">A mobile app can incorporate different kinds of loyalty programs. Each program can be built to make your users visit again and spend more time than usual. The users can utilize the rewards in different ways, like tiered layers, which provides the customers with better incentives once they migrate from one level to another.</p>
Gamification is also an essential area where rewards are granted to winning users, and the ability to offer discounts and prices to your users for pre-defined things – like sharing an image or a notification.

Another exciting feature to raise engagement among users is the scratch-and-win feature, which is profitable for both customers and vendors.
<h3>Build Brand and Recognition</h3>
<p class="justify">A mobile app is a new billboard symbol. You can do what you want with it; you can make it stylish, functional, hip, informative, or shocking. But what you want to do is build an app that has features your users will love, while at the same time is well branded and exceptionally designed.</p>
The more often you can get users involved with your app, the sooner they will be inclined to purchase your product and/or service.

In advertising, this is known as the “effective frequency”: as a rule of thumb, hearing and/or seeing your brand approximately 20 times is what will get you honestly noticed.
<h3>Improves efficiency</h3>
<p class="justify">Features like integrated shopping carts with food ordering and scheduling enable brand owners to house these characteristics like a digital footprint within the app.</p>
A bakery with an online food ordering system incorporated within their app will see an extraordinary rise both online and in-app ordering.

Retail trade with an e-commerce system collaborated will enhance productivity and eventually <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-to-boost-ecommerce-sales-with-instagram.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>improve overall sales.</strong></a> Through mobile apps, digital marketing companies will get a chance to increase user engagement with inbuilt scheduling software that notifies users regarding the schedule.
<h3>Increases accessibility to customers</h3>
<p class="justify">Mobile apps increase business accessibility to potential users, as more than a billion of the global population are mobile smartphone users. With an app, a brand owner can send discount notifications and promotional offers to all its customers at the same time.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Stand out from the competition</h3>
<p class="justify">These days mobile apps at the small industry level are still rare, and this is where you can take a big step ahead of your rivalries. Be the first in the community to provide a mobile app to your clients. They’ll be surprised by your forward-thinking approach!</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>The bottom line</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Ninety per cent of digital marketing agencies planned to increase investment in mobile apps in 2016. If you don’t, there’s a good chance you’ll be left behind your rivalries.</p>
And no, a mobile app may not save your trade, but it is a sure way of securing a strong presence in the digital market. Your brand logo will be placed on their mobile phone screens by default.
<h2><strong>Why Choose Techies Infotech?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Techies Infotech, the best <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>digital marketing agency in Melbourne,</strong></a> adopt forward-thinking solutions in building mobile apps, technologies, and business systems to be on the cutting edge and to make more value for our customers.</p>
As this is the era of high - tech technology and tough competition, we are very much in touch with the requirements of our customers.

Our expertise in Mobile application development ensures our customers evolve their brands to win today and keep moving forward for the upcoming era.

Our team of experts creates exceptional customer experiences that boost productivity, convenience, and loyalty, regardless of device or operating system.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to boost your SEO ranking with schema markups?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/boost-your-seo-ranking-with-schema-markups/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 May 2021 11:59:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2758</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2><strong>What is schema markup?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Schema markup refers to the code or semantic vocabulary of tags that indicate the meaning of your data and not only what it says. This code language helps Google crawlers and bots to understand what your content is about efficiently.
It is put on the website so that search engines provide informative results to the website users in the form of snippets that lie right beneath the page title.
The addition of schema markups in your HTML coding helps you to enhance the display of your web pages on SERP.
Schema markup is recognised by various search engines like Bing, Yahoo!, Google and Yandex. There is no evidence that schema markup affects the display positioning result much, but it increases the visualisation of your website.</p>

<h2><strong>How vital is schema markup?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Schema markup is primarily essential in the era of "Hummingbird" and "RankBird". As of now, there has been no direct relation of rich schema marking with the ranking of a page, but there is evidence of increased click-through rates (CTR).
However, rich snippets also help in a prominent display of your webpages on Google’s SERPs. Proper implementation of schema markup only enhances the user experience, which automatically decreases the bounce rate and increases organic engagement.
Structured data has more understandability and efficiency, so many studies suggest that it works best for the website containing several subpages. Schema markup done efficiently will <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">generate positive results</a></strong> for one’s business in the long run.</p>

<h2><strong>How to make rich schema markups?</strong></h2>
<h3><strong>Align them according to Google's guidelines</strong></h3>
Google is continually evolving and bringing new algorithms for deciding the rank of a particular website on its browser. So, it becomes mandatory to follow all the updated guidelines declared by Google. Your schema markup should align with Google's guidelines to make sure you avoid any spamming which may harm the ranking of your website.
<h3><strong>Always test your schema markup</strong></h3>
Google has this fantastic automated tool where you can check schema markup before going live. Use the structured data testing tool instead of playing the guess games about the schema markup. The testing becomes critically essential before making your website live as it will protect you from getting penalised.
<h3><strong>Choose the perfect schema markup</strong></h3>
Structured data can mark up several items and products that include event, organisation, person and creative event. Don't go for any markup schema; try to have thorough knowledge about which type which benefits your niche the most.

Depending on this, you can choose from the following schema markups and for your reference we are showcasing how Techies Infotech in Melbourne has helped various clients to <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/outsourcing-seo-service.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">boost their SEO</a></strong> using schema markup:
<h3><strong>Organisation schema markup</strong></h3>
This type of markup is advantageous for enhancing the visibility of an organisation at Google's SERP. It is the method of structuring the information that includes the company's official name, logo, contact info, and social profiles.
<div align="center">

[caption id="" align="alignnone" width="450"]<img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/amandeep-hospital-organizational-schema.png" alt="Amandeep Hospital Organizational Schema" width="450" height="449" /> How to boost your SEO ranking with schema markups?[/caption]

</div>
&nbsp;
<h3><strong>Breadcrumbs markup</strong></h3>
The markup lists all specific path links that land on the current page. This is the best markup schema for enabling the users to view your location, and also it helps to reduce the bounce rate of the website.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/narad-hospital-breadcrumb-schema.png" alt="Narad Hospital Breadcrumb Schema" /></div>
&nbsp;
<h3><strong>Article schema markup</strong></h3>
This schema markup helps to increase the readability and understandability. The article schema markup is the structured microdata for displaying the crisp description of blog posts and news.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/sonai-furniture-article-schema.png" alt="Sonai Furniture Article Schema" /></div>
&nbsp;
<h3><strong>Local business schema markup</strong></h3>
Such schema markups are beneficial for the local companies and organisations. One must be very particular while displaying this <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">piece of content to bring</a></strong> more and more local users to your business. The information must include the company name, logo, address, timings, features and contact info.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/vardaan-local-business-schema.png" alt="Vardaan Local Business Schema" /></div>
<h2><strong>Also, showcasing some other examples of schema markup are:</strong></h2>
<h3><strong>Schema product and offer markup</strong></h3>
As the name suggests, the schema markup involves the crisp but exact user engaging information related to a particular product and offer. The product information includes status, price, name, and offers as well
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/product-schema.png" alt="Product Schema" /></div>
<h3></h3>
<h3><strong>Person schema markup</strong></h3>
Such markup schema displays the structured data of an individual personality, including his/her name, birth date, education &amp; family info, and address.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/person-schema.png" alt="Person Schema" /></div>
<h3></h3>
<h3><strong>Video schema markup</strong></h3>
Adding video schema markup is the best possible solution to let Google crawlers and bots know about the video updation. Since it is difficult for the bots to index the video content, it becomes critically important to put video schema markup.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/video-schema-markup.png" alt="Video Schema" /></div>
<h3></h3>
<h3><strong>Event schema markup</strong></h3>
This markup includes information related to the event that can be a seminar, concert, lecture delivering or webinars. The markup information consists of the date, event price, and location.

&nbsp;
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/event-schema.png" alt="Event Schema" /></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>How to implement rich schema markup?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Here’s is a list of steps to follow for implementing rich schema markup:</p>

<ul>
 	<li>To start with, use Google's Structured data markup helper.</li>
 	<li>From the drop down list of categories, choose the appropriate category that is suitable for displaying your data markup.</li>
 	<li>Paste the URL of the page you want to markup and click start tagging. This will end you landing on a page providing the next phase workspace for the markup process. Your webpage will be seen on the left side and data items on the right pane.</li>
 	<li>Highlight the required elements that you want to markup and select an appropriate component from the tooltip. This adds the selected item in the "Data Items" on the right pane.</li>
 	<li>You can highlight and select the items multiple times to markup other items.</li>
 	<li>The next step is to click "CREATE HTML" on top of my data items where you will get HTML of your page with appropriate microdata.</li>
 	<li>The last step is to add the schema markup to your webpage. To do so, you need your source code or CMS and add the highlighted snippets to the required sections in the code. Refer to the yellow markers on HTML source code with microdata markup to find the schema markup. Else, you can download the automatically-generated HTML file by clicking the “Download” action.</li>
</ul>
Check the appearance of your page with added schema markup using the structured data testing tool. Also, you can preview and inspect every added markup element and the content by pasting the HTML code in the structured data testing bar.
<h2><strong>Wrap up</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Schema markup has considerably become a vital SEO innovation that will last in trend for longer. For every business, whether small scale or large, schema markup can do miracles as they act as a catalyst for boosting the existing SEO practices. Proper usage of schema markup will give you a leg up on your competition.</p>
<p class="justify">Being a proficient <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/seo-service" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO company in Melbourne</a></strong>, we work seamlessly and have gained expertise in how to structure your data using schema markup.</p>
<p class="justify">Choosing the right schema markup is not the way of enhancing your visibility, but proper implementation and testing will pave the way to fruitful results from the website.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[What are the important factors in On-Page SEO?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/important-factors-in-on-page-seo/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 13 May 2021 03:55:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2762</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Organic reach has proven to be one of the most important elements contributing to the success of the business. The organic reach works as per the matra of SEO been used on the page. While On-Page SEO required good technical know-how, people starting getting fascinated with the off-page SEO.</p>
<p class="justify">But the end line remains that the magic which On-Page SEO can do has never been seen in any other ways of organic reach enhancement.</p>
<p class="justify">Here, in this blog, allow us to inform you about the important On-Page SEO Factors, so that you may remove the cataract of misconceptions and work well on the Organic Reach Enhancement.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Understanding SEO</strong></h2>
Before knowing about the factors of SEO, let’s first have a quick view of what is SEO and what is its work.
<h3>What is Google Ranking?</h3>
<p class="justify">SEO or Search Engine Optimisation is a process in which a web page or the content is made so much pleasing to the search engine bot that it ranks it well on the SERP.</p>
With an effective SEO Strategy, the Search Engine Ranking or Google Ranking (in the majority of cases) would get enhanced and the content would be shown on the first tabs of the search engine results.
<h3 class="justify">What does Google look for in SEO?</h3>
<p class="justify">While ranking a page, Google performs a series of tasks, which are broken down as follows. Firstly, Google lets its bot crawl the web pages to look for the genuineness of the information.</p>
Then, Google selects the right contents, and index the page.Lastly, when a user enters a word to search, at the same moment, Google checks for the keyword in millions of pages to bring out the effective results.
<h3>How does Google Search Ranking Works?</h3>
<p class="justify">When a person searches for something over the internet, they type the keywords. If the site or the content has such keywords in it, Google identifies it and presents it to the onlooker. But, the search engine isn’t always about the keywords. It also looks for the quality of the content.</p>
According to Google itself, the major factors which <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>influence the ranking</strong></a> of content on the search engine are:
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>Purpose of the Page</li>
 	<li>Expertise in the Content</li>
 	<li>Content Quality</li>
 	<li>Website Information</li>
 	<li>Website Reputation</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="justify">Let us clear the air by saying that there is never a 100% guarantee of making a site rank #1 on Google. This is because the guidelines and formats of Google SEO keep on changing.</p>

<h3 class="justify">What are On-Page and Off-Page SEO?</h3>
<p class="justify">In this informative blog, you would hear two terms again and again. Let us clear the meaning of those first.On-Page SEO includes the factors present on the website which could be customized to make your site rank well.</p>
On the other hand, Off-Page SEO, as the name suggests includes all those activities done offline to make the site in good rankings.For overall growth, both the terms are highly necessary for the business.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Important Factors of SEO</strong></h2>
<h3>EAT</h3>
<p class="justify">EAT stands for Expertise, Authoritativeness and Trustworthiness. It is a framework used by Google Raters to assess the content of the webpage and the website as a whole.Google always favours high-quality content. It makes sure that pages with good quality content are rewarded perfectly, and hence ranks them decently.</p>
<a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/what-is-eat-and-its-role-in-seo.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>EAT plays a major role</strong></a> in the Google Search Engine Rankings. Hence, it is of utter importance to consider EAT while forming the strategy of SEO.
<h3>Title Tag</h3>
<p class="justify">The Title Tag, in the HTML file, is applied in the head section of the webpage. It provides an initial cue to what the page is all about. It gives a brief context of what the subject matter is being discussed.</p>
Moreover, while making the Title Tag, some Keywords could be targeted. The title tag has a considerable impact on organic ranking. Hence, it should always be kept in the count while making the SEO Strategy.
<h3>Meta Description</h3>
<p class="justify">Meta Descriptions have been an important part of SEO. Meta Descriptions provide an outline of what the whole text is all about.</p>
If meta descriptions are perfectly made, it can help optimise
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>Click-through rate (CTR)</li>
 	<li>Perception of Quality of Results</li>
 	<li>Perception of what your site is going to offers</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
<h3>Headlines</h3>
<p class="justify">The headline is the first thing read by the potentially interested people. Hence you have to make such a headline that the person finds it magnetic and gets compelled to read the whole text. The more the readability, the better the rankings.</p>

<h3>Header Tags</h3>
<p class="justify">Header tags are the elements of HTML, which are used to identify the heading and subheadings. Header tags do not affect your rankings directly, but still, they serve an important purpose and leave an impact on SEO Ranking indirectly.</p>
Here is how:
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>It makes the content more readable and enjoyable for the visitors</li>
 	<li>It makes the content a keyword-rich context for the search engines.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
<h3>SEO Writing</h3>
<p class="justify">SEO Writing can be defined as writing the content keeping in mind the greater audience and the search engines.There are various strategies behind <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>writing SEO content.</strong></a> It is not merely a game of keyword stuffing and fills in the blanks.</p>
Remember that you are writing for the public. Hence, the content needs to be good, understandable and rich with information as well.
<h3>Keyword Cannibalization</h3>
<p class="justify">If you have multiple pages ranking for the same keyword, then that situation is called keyword cannibalization. This situation is a great disaster for the website.</p>
If such a thing happens, you are just competing with yourself on Google. Make sure that such a situation never occurs and each of your pages rank for a distinct keyword.
<h3>Content Audit</h3>
<p class="justify">Most of the content creators focus on creating new content and merely forget about the auditing of the previous contents. The terms of Search Engine keep on changing. And if we do not audit the previously made content according to the new terms, we are just wasting our energy.</p>
Auditing the previous content is important because
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ol>
 	<li style="list-style-type: none;">
<ul>
 	<li>It helps to evaluate if your previous content is eligible according to the updated terms and ranking well or not.</li>
 	<li>It helps identify whether the information in your content is still correct or not.</li>
 	<li>It also helps to evaluate if any content needs any kind of updation or not.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
<h3>Image Optimisation</h3>
<p class="justify">Images are an important part of any <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>SEO Strategy.</strong></a> Where an image can enhance the looks of your website, on the other hand, they can also slow its speed. Hence, it is of utter importance to make the optimise the images.</p>
Images can provide better ranking opportunities, enhance attractiveness and if optimised correctly, they can also enhance the speed of the website. Make sure to use descriptive texts and alt texts for all the images.
<h3>User Engagement</h3>
<p class="justify">Getting a user on your site is one thing, avoiding him to bounce to another page is something which must be kept in mind. If the site has good speed, has catchy images and has quality content, the user engagement would surely be more.</p>

<h2><strong>Closing Comments</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Perfection is what comes with individuality. And here we are, the perfect <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>SEO Company in Melbourne</strong></a> to swoon away your business.</p>
<p class="justify">SEO can sometimes be technical and one knows the tricks if one works with it regularly. Avail our SEO Services in Melbourne and let your business rank well on the Search Engines.</p>
<p class="justify">Let us take your business to the unwithered heights.</p>
<p class="justify"><a href="https://iamtechie.com/contact-us">Contact us now!</a></p>]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[What is E-A-T and its role in SEO?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/what-is-eat-and-its-role-in-seo/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 13 May 2021 04:19:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2767</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Everyone in the business industry wants to generate leads online. Often businesses tend to have a solution to a problem and try to practice SEO themselves or an incompetent company, but could not get their website ranked among the top Google search results.</p>
<p class="justify">As everyone knows, Google keeps updating its algorithms to provide relevant search results for its end users.</p>
<p class="justify">Apparently, Google officially announced that it will use the E-A-T algorithm as one of the major factors to <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>rank a website in top search results</strong></a>.</p>
<p class="justify">So, how could this algorithm affect your website ranking? Let’s dive in to learn more!</p>

<h2><strong>What is E-A-T?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">E-A-T is an acronym of Expertise, Authority, and Trust (or page quality) – three factors that Google uses to rank the websites in its search results. Expertise, Authority, and Trust are the major factors for higher ranking and every website should leverage it, but when done precisely it can highly impact your Google search rankings.</p>
<p class="justify">Techies Infotech is a leading <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>SEO company in Melbourne</strong></a>, constantly updating its practices to ensure higher search ranking for its clients. Often, people use their internet knowledge of SEO or hire an incompetent <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/hire-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>digital marketing company in Melbourne</strong></a> to achieve higher rankings and fail to get the desired results.</p>
<p class="justify">We, on the other hand, will help you to get <strong>RESULTS</strong> with our years of experience in the SEO industry and especially if you are operating a <strong>YMYL</strong> website.</p>
<p class="justify">Are you operating a YMYL website? Let’s find out.</p>

<h2 class="justify"><strong>What are the YMYL websites?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">YMYL is again an acronym for <strong>Y</strong>our <strong>M</strong>oney, <strong>Y</strong>our <strong>L</strong>ife. YMYL websites are those who publish content related to medical, politics, finance, legal, eCommerce, and news falls under the YMYL category. All these categories impact human lives and could be responsible to manipulate their life decisions.</p>
<p class="justify">Techies Infotech Melbourne’s portfolio comprises of many YMYL sites that are benefited by our SEO services. We have successfully utilized the E-A-T concept to ameliorate their ranking and subsequently, we can do it for you!</p>
<p class="justify">Now this leaves us with a question that is E-A-T only effective in YMYL sites?</p>
<p class="justify">The answer is NO.</p>
<p class="justify">E-A-T is effective and essential for every website. People often practice the latest compliance for a certain period and ditch them afterward to implicate new compliances. Remember, SEO is not an overnight process, it is a long term process. However, if done by digital marketing companies like Techies Infotech in Melbourne; it can create a huge impact and generate results efficiently!</p>

<h2><strong>How does E-A-T affect SEO and website ranking?</strong></h2>
<h3>Expertise</h3>
<p class="justify">Google search engine will look for a certain level of expertise in your published content. You can reflect your content as niche-savvy content by producing original and resourceful ideas.</p>
To bring it in a context, Imagine three people working out for six months straight. One of them deems to be more fit than the other two and comes out to be an individual with adept knowledge which makes him acknowledged as an Expert.

The same scrutiny is used in the Google ranking. How you write your <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>content impacts your search ranking</strong></a> and manipulates the chances of your website content to be acknowledged as expert content.

Techies Infotech uses skilled resources to ensure precise content and expertise to ensure that your website is ranked on the top of search results.
<h3>Authoritative</h3>
<p class="justify">Being authoritative means the source is trusted to be accurate and reliable. There could be many sources claiming to be experts of their domain but only a few of them can reflect their authoritativeness. Authoritativeness can be proved by getting high-quality backlinks from valuable websites, getting positive feedback from <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/lead-generation-with-google-my-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>Google My Business</strong></a> reviews, the proof of authenticity of the information or content, and many more. Google constantly looks for external sources like news, awards, certification of your website to measure the authoritative index of your website.</p>
Additionally, users not only want to trust the expertise of these people or brands, but they also want to be sure that they’re the best person to go to, in a context similar to our workout regime example from before.

Techies Infotech is an innovative Digital Marketing and SEO company in Melbourne, we can help you to reach your goals faster. Whether it’s to grow your site engagement, converting your subscribers or to generate new leads we can help you to climb the ladder of success more efficiently.
<h3>Trustworthiness</h3>
<p class="justify">If we can rely on a source, to be honest, and truthful then it will be manifested as a high trustworthiness website. Google measures trust by evaluating the no. of backlinks to the site, and it’s previous examples of trustworthy content. Getting your brand/website visible from a plethora of websites gives you an edge for a high trustworthiness score.</p>
Remember, Google keeps updating its algorithms to determine the page quality. It can be hard for incompetent users to follow through the new regulations. Trust is hard to gain, but once achieved it can act as a cornerstone for your business.
<h2><strong>Hire best SEO company in Melbourne - Techies Infotech</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Get guidance from Melbourne’s one of the most successful Digital Marketing and SEO company - Techies Infotech to dominate your industry online and offline simultaneously. We can help you with services like Digital Marketing, Creative designing, Video and content production, Web and App development to take your business at the pinnacle of success.</p>
One of <a href="https://iamtechie.com/portfolios" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>our clients</strong></a> Frankston Peninsula Taxis saw a 25% growth in their business and a double amount of website visitors within a couple of months of the business. Moreover, we implemented the E-A-T strategy in SEO and it showed a positive trend in terms of website visits and conversion rate.

In SEO, a plethora of aspects is still unadapted by other agencies, which include rich SEO snippets, organized data, E-A-T, Vernacular content and many more!

Often, the so-called ‘experts’ fail to deliver solutions that go parallel with new technology. However, Techies Infotech- Melbourne customizes every digital marketing and SEO strategy according to the client’s business and its goals. If you’re ready to step-up your marketing game, then contact us to discuss the potential of your services after combining it with our innovative marketing strategies]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How voice search affect search engine optimization (SEO)?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-voice-search-affects-seo/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 14 May 2021 04:39:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2771</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">When the user uses voice command rather than typing to search on the internet, an app, or a website, then it is called voice-enabled or voice search. This method of search is a more interactive dialogue system and involves several rounds to interact by allowing a system to ask to clarify. Some of its examples are Google voice search, Siri, Amazon, Alexa, and Cortana that all have open-domain keyword queries on any information.</p>
A mechanism that it includes for input is Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), and there can also be the inclusion of a text-to-speech tool for output. Sometimes before performing the search, the user needs to activate virtual assistance. Before detecting keywords and context of the sentence, the search engine recognizes the language spoken by the user. Then according to the output, the device gives out results either by displaying or speaking.

According to a survey by SEO experts, in 2018 of all Google search queries, one-fifth, i.e., 20% of searches consisted of voice commands. Whereas voice search queries on Bing and Baidu were 25% and 10%, respectively.

Further, according to popular voice search SEO website <a href="https://backlinko.com/voice-search-stats" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>backlinco.com</strong></a>, of all adults, searching on Google, 41% use voice search, of which 55% are teenagers. It states that voice search has inclined 35 times in usage since 2008. Besides, one-fourth of Windows 10 searches are voice searches, and this trend is going to grow as 65% of people using voice assistant devices like Google Home and Amazon echo are happy to use these tools. Also, in 2020, 50% of all searches are going to be voice searches.

The main reasons for the rapid growth of voice search are it is 3.7% quicker than typing, so it gives back answers quickly. Secondly, most of the searches come from a mobile phone by which people prefer to do voice searches over typing. Lastly, people are using it for its convenience; most of them are happy to give voice command rather than painful typing.

However, it would help if you had voice search optimization by having relevant content to search engines for the specific query. It is better if you have a <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>responsive web design</strong></a> and structured data markup that does not affect the appearance of your content for users; indeed helps you to create metadata for your content. As the trend of voice search by mobile phones is inclining, so voice SEO would be an essential factor in the coming years.
<h2>What Changes Do You Need To Make In Seo For Voice Search Optimization?</h2>
<p class="justify">Consideration of voice search queries has become an essential aspect for both small and big businesses that are <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/business-to-top-of-local-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>looking to optimize for local SEO</strong></a>. But most of the companies are using the same strategies for voice search optimization to become equally competitive. If you want to stay ahead of the competition, you should have specific strategies when developing content.</p>

<h3>Change`s You Need For Voice Search</h3>
<p class="justify">You need to consider the changes that voice search SEO requires than regular SEO. For this you should know the following questions for voice search: .</p>

<h3>How people do voice searches?</h3>
<p class="justify">Voice searches are longer and conversational than search results by typing. Try to build your content around longer keywords, keep it natural, and put questions for keywords. According to Google, of all searches on Google Assistant, 70% use natural language. You might type "make a cupcake," but for voice search are more likely to put an original query "How to make a cupcake?".</p>

<h3>Where people do voice searches?</h3>
<p class="justify">The convenience of voice search lets people search at public places like restaurants, railway stations, or gym. A few years ago, if you had got a fever, you might have to type hospital near me. But nowadays, you are available with voice search and LTE location technology, allowing you to search wherever you are present. For voice search, your query would be, "where is the hospital nearby me right now?".</p>

<h3>How people get search results by voice search?</h3>
<p class="justify">Voice search has made Google an answer engine from a search engine. Features on SERP, like featured snippets and knowledge graphs, have <a href="https://www.wordstream.com/blog/ws/2017/04/26/google-ranking-click-through-rate" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>dropped organic click rate</strong></a> by 37%. As you do not need to visit the site for your query, you all get it in search results.</p>
Google also has this answer-focused technology. Back in the days, people would type banana calories and get answers in many search results, but now with voice search, people put questions like "how many calories in one medium banana?"
<h3>Why need direct answers in our content?</h3>
<p class="justify">If your content does not give direct answers to people's queries, it will not appear on the front page.</p>

<h3>Do Keyword Research Appropriate For Voice Search</h3>
<h4 class="justify"><strong>Add question keywords</strong></h4>
<p class="justify">You must consider that people type and speak differently; you may type a query on the search engine "voice search device," but when searching by voice command, you would loudly say, "which is the best voice search device?".</p>
<strong>Keep keywords natural and conversational</strong>
<p class="justify">As discussed above, you should look for the natural and conversational keywords that people use while putting queries.</p>
<strong>Keep long-tail keywords</strong>
<p class="justify">Further, keep your keywords long because voice searches tend to be longer than text searches. Sprinkle long keywords having 5+ words in your content.</p>

<h3>Ideal Content Development And Site Structure</h3>
<p class="justify"><strong>Develop your content: </strong>Map questions that can provide the experience of comprehensive information to customers. Also, this ensures the customer that you are available at any stage for customer needs by voice search. So for the customer's journey, you need to consider points like awareness, evaluation, purchase, customer support, interest, and loyalty. To refer:</p>
<strong>Awareness: </strong>Which is the best Samsung mobile phone? .

<strong>Evaluation:</strong> Which is a better Samsung Galaxy S2 or Samsung Galaxy S3?

<strong>Awareness:</strong> Which is the best Samsung mobile phone? .

<strong>Purchase:</strong> What is the cost of a Samsung Galaxy S3?

<strong>Customer Support:</strong> What if the phone has a problem within six months of purchase?

<strong>Interest:</strong> Is there a feature of voice command?

<strong>Keep your answers concise:</strong> For voice search queries, Google returns short answers with an average of 29 words, so try to keep your answers brief.

<strong>Include FAQs:</strong> As told earlier, that question keywords are in trend, and google returns concise answers for the voice searches. These factors make search results to come from FAQ page by 1.7 times than desktop results. So keeping general and simple answers like "what are the benefits of car insurance" on the FAQ page helps you with voice search.

<strong>Develop content relevant to featured snippets:</strong> You must know that featured snippets give out 40.7% of voice search results. It has become more critical to optimize your content for featured snippets for voice assistant devices like Alexa search results and Google Home, as these only give out the single answer. So if not optimizing your content for featured snippets means you are not supplying material to voice assistant devices.
<h3 class="justify"><strong>Use natural language and long-tail keywords</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">As already discussed, voice search tends to be more natural in the form of personal queries, so keep your content natural to be relevant for voice search.</p>
<p class="justify">Further, by including <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/long-tail-keyword-importance.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>long-tail keywords</strong></a>, your content becomes more significant to specific user queries. Try to embed keywords with 5+ words according to user questions for better optimization.</p>

<h3 class="justify"><strong>Develop a site structure</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Further, try to organize your questions for site structure. Include informational intent(how-tos, guides, etc.), navigational intent(services, customer service info, store locations, press releases), and transactional intent(product information, product stories, comparisons, videos).</p>

<h3>Have Structured Data Optimization</h3>
<p class="justify">Voice search only returns one result that is the best-optimized answer to the searcher's query. So it would help if you make content relevant to a search engine for a specific question. Also, submit a sitemap to ensure pages are easy to crawl.</p>
Use structured data markup that helps to create metadata to help google bots. It gives a boost in voice search results but does not affect your ranking directly.
<h3>Mobile-Friendly Means Site Friendly</h3>
<p class="justify">Keeping in an account that most voice searches, in reality, come from mobile devices, so voice search optimization is beneficial for mobile-first optimization. Voice search results take 3.8 times faster than other methods. Users expect quick results, so pages on a mobile phone should be optimized to open in lesser time.</p>
Moreover, you should summarize your content by structured data and use AMP optimized pages to rank higher on mobile search results. Further, register in <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/lead-generation-with-google-my-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Google My Business</a></strong> to optimize your content and site in local search results as most of the voice searches by mobile are location-based queries.
<h3>Build Up A Domain Authority</h3>
<p class="justify">Voice search result of Ashraf Domain Rating on average is around 77%, whereas Average Page Rating on a site with traditional SEO is only 21.1%. Voice search results came as a single result, and the displayed result is mostly from the most trusted source with an authoritative domain.</p>

<h3>Try To Include Long Content</h3>
<p class="justify">On average, the word count of a Google page result on search is 1900, which is about 400 words less than the result page displayed on voice search. So, a page with longer content has more chances to rank on voice search results. Besides, try to avoid fancy and jargon words instead of writing in a 9th-grade reading level.</p>

<h3>Try To Rank Videos In Search Results</h3>
<p class="justify">Google has recently added video featured snippets, so video results are more likely to pop up by natural language queries that include voice searches. Try to rank your videos in Google if you want to <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">rank your content</a></strong> up in the search engine for voice search results.</p>

<h3>Create Alexa Skills or Google Actions</h3>
<p class="justify">Building custom skills in Alexa or creating actions on the Google App makes your content more accessible for home assistant users. These actions are useful and get better results to voice command users by making it possible for users to communicate back-and-forth with your app or content.</p>

<h3>Be Prepared For Future Developments</h3>
<p class="justify">Please keep track of the developments of Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and other players that are upgrading their features to make voice search more popular. So by updating yourself for the requirements of voice search optimization, you can rank higher on voice search results. In the future, Google has plans to add new features in search console, i.e., voice query data. By this, you can analyze how users are reaching your site through voice search.</p>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Web Design Trends 2020 - Things You Should Not Ignore]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/web-design-trends-in-2020/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 14 May 2021 04:51:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2775</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">While 2020 is just around the corner, the changes in web design are also following. With 2020, we should also welcome the changing trends as the web designers are coming up with new ideas.</p>
We at Techies Infotech, offer the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/website-design-and-development-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">web design company in Melbourne </a></strong>to help our clients stay abreast of every new trend in the web industry. So, to keep your website stay ahead in the league, let us help you with some web design trends of the upcoming year.

The following discussed are the new web design trends that will certainly give you clear and uncluttered websites, while being rich in content and visuals.
<h2><strong>Web Design Trends</strong></h2>
<h3>Dark Mode</h3>
<p class="justify">Besides looking ultra-modern, web designs with dark mode are easy on the eyes and make colours and patterns pop. These themes are best suited for OLED screens that also help in saving power and expanding the screen’s life span. Moreover, dark themes enhance the visibility of different accentuated colours for really dynamic web designs.</p>

<h3>Imperfect personality</h3>
<p class="justify">The next big trend in web designs is the imperfect, hand-drawn designs that add emotion and humanity to the websites that are craved by the users after they see perfect yet impersonal graphics that predominate web designs for years.</p>
By adding hand-drawn graphics to the website, it gains realness. Distinguished and trendy icons drawn by hands reflect your brand perfectly and help you stand apart from the crowd.

So, it's time to use graphics with rough edges and open shapes to showcase the liveliness of your brand. The team of best web designers in Sydney at Techies Infotech is adept in adding messy-looking elements to your web designs.
<h3>Immersive 3D elements</h3>
<p class="justify">It is a fact that 3D visuals have always fascinated the audience. And the best part is that now you can have 3D designs without NASA-tier equipment, the gateway to many designers.</p>
Till the time virtual reality becomes a more conventional and affordable, super pragmatic 3D that is often reprising the entire screen and is the most favourable way to develop an immersive experience for your site.

It is not only beneficial for visuals but also for UX-interactive 3D designs that promote the users to <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/digital-marketing-trends-in-2020.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">stay longer on the website</a></strong>.
<h3>Soft shadows, layers, and floating elements</h3>
<p class="justify">This upcoming trend adds depth to your website. With 3D effects, as discussed above, toning it down is also a requirement for some. This effect can not only be used with graphics but also with photos and text.</p>
It also produces a lightweight effect on the designs that seems like the elements are floating above each other- a stark contrast from the typical, impervious flat design where the layers seem to be flat.
<h3>Solid Frames of wide space</h3>
<p class="justify">Gone are the days of full-bleed layouts. Currently, web designers are inclining towards solid structures and experimenting with various ways to employ ample white space to add more structure and clean frames to your web designs.</p>
In 2020, we will witness the wide frames of white space adding a solid framework to your web designs. This creates a perfect basis for the visual glow. Precisely structured frames encompassing your websites establish a structure and aids in focusing and segregating every part of a page.
<h3>Luminous Color Schemes</h3>
<p class="justify">As we are advancing towards 2020, our web designers at Techies are all set to serve you with the best web designing services in Melbourne, using luminous colours to make the designs pop from the screen. Usage of neons and highly saturated colours clubbed with dark shades lends a glowing appearance to your website.</p>
Talking about duotones, they particularly make the web designs shine like a sparkle. Although it is bold, resorting to neon and stark colours make your website look vivacious.
<h2><strong>Get your Hands On These Web Designs 2020 with Techies Infotech</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Serving as the best web designing company in Melbourne, our designers have already embraced this futuristic approach. Empowering your website with alluring visuals and colours, 3D effects, and graphics photography is the objective of our company.</p>
So allow our team of the best web designers in Australia to lend a more <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/future-of-web-development-five-design-and-development-trends-in-2019.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">modern looking web design</a></strong> to your site that will certainly be user-friendly with minimalistic navigation and less tiring for your visitors’ eyes with dark theme designs.

With the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020, Techies Infotech is here to facelift your website with the best web development services in Sydney.]]></content:encoded>

		<link>https://iamtechie.com/white-label-seo-what-is-it-and-how-it-is-beneficial/</link>
