		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">When it comes to digital marketing, leveraging is one of the most important aspects of it. And this is likely to happen by making the most out of your business using SEO or Search Engine Optimization.</p>
We at Techies Infotech have been serving as the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html">SEO company in Melbourne</a></strong> and completely understand the need for professional SEO to be successful.

Here comes the role of white label SEO services that helps you outsource SEO services to a professional agency, to assist you with the expert guidance.

But first, let us understand what White Label SEO exactly is?
<h2><strong>Overview of White Label SEO</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">White Label SEO is subcontracted SEO services provided at reduced prices that further helps in maximizing your business profit. Being the best SEO company in Melbourne, Techies Infotech hub the most crucial resource to provide efficient services so that you have ample time and money to invest in developing a service or product.</p>
White labelling comprises of SEO programs, online marketing campaigns, and paid search campaigns. Moreover, you also reap the benefits of learning something new from the professionals in the industry to analyze, create content and reports.

Although any other agency does the tasks for you, the brand name used is of your own company.
<h2><strong>Benefits of Using White Label SEO</strong></h2>
<h3>Proficient Marketing Team working on the projects</h3>
<p class="justify">By opting for White Label SEO services, you create enough room for yourself to concentrate on creating your business structure. Since SEO is a time-consuming and complicated affair, once you hire a professional agency for it you are relieved from spending time and energy on it.</p>
This keeps you relaxed from working on the improvement of your products and getting more clients. With our best SEO services in Melbourne, we ensure you with efficacy.
<h3>Attain Economies of Scale</h3>
<p class="justify">Yet another important aspect of any business is the economies of scale. Once your business achieves fame, there are more quality links to promote.</p>
This is the time where you need an expert workforce to handle the SEO part. White Label SEO helps you with the best solutions as they have pre-established strategies that generate opportunities for your business.

These services are capable to use your marketing to deliver positive results.
<h3>No need to purchase SEO Tools</h3>
<p class="justify">If you intend to do SEO internally, you will require the latest SEO tools, which can be a way too expensive affair for you. However, if you choose <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/outsourcing-seo-service.html">white label SEO services</a></strong>, the company already has access to these tools that help you save on the expenses.</p>
We at Techies offer the best SEO service in Sydney and have access to every latest SEO tool such as SEO analysis, PPC advertising, and web designing. The competency of these tools will certainly upgrade your company’s worth.
<h3>Better Quality Control</h3>
<p class="justify">Since link building needs proficiency and skills, hiring a white label SEO service agency ensures qualitative links. These links transmit powerful messages to search engines that exhibit competence and efficiency.</p>
Quality link assures improved ranking and allure more potential customers for your business. This SEO service is highly reliable and efficient enough to provide you with the best.
<h3>Provide customized Solutions</h3>
<p class="justify">The distinguishing feature of any White Label SEO provider is its ability to deliver tailored solutions for any type of business in compliance with its forte.</p>
Initially, the agency evaluates the relevant website and compiles a report stating what works for it and what does not. Utilizing this report, the agency makes a plan defining strengths, weaknesses, strategies, and improvements.

This aids your business in maintaining particular and high-quality links. Resultantly, your business can attain heights on its own that would have otherwise complicated to accomplish.
<h3>Improve customer experience</h3>
<p class="justify">Having a great SEO, your clients will be more satisfied. Furthermore, white label SEO enables you to focus on your customer support.</p>
This SEO service enables your customers to rapidly search for the products and services like <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/long-tail-keyword-importance.html">keyword research</a> </strong>and visibility expansions is a part of white label services.

This will certainly make it easier for your business to look for customers that in turn improves customer satisfaction.

However, as the best SEO company in Melbourne, we have a team of SEO specialists who can run effective SEO campaigns for your business. To get us on board you can consult our experts for reliable and best in the industry services.

Let us do it for you. This is because at the end of the day you need to concentrate on other aspects of your business without ignoring SEO. Our strategies, tools, and experience make us stand apart from the league.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Digital Marketing Trends 2020 - Everything You Need to Know]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/digital-marketing-trends-in-2020/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 15 May 2021 04:22:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2782</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<h2><strong>WHY DIGITAL MARKETING WILL GROW IN FUTURE?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">In today’s world, generation is techno-savvy and surrounded with gizmos, such that the digital medium has become most accessible than any other medium for marketing. Digital marketing is the latest trend and digital platform to generate revenue for prosperous outcomes and is increasing rapidly regardless of small or big enterprises.</p>
In the coming decade, this trend will significantly uprise to register and run every single service via internet and demand for digital marketing professionals will also increase. Perhaps, professionals have to be adaptable and upgrade themselves with technology and applications which are continuously changing. Our leading <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/hire-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agency in Melbourne</a></strong> provides expert service complying with the latest trends in digital marketing.
<h3>VOICE SEARCH</h3>
<p class="justify">It is easy to give commands by voice than typing words. With the advent of technology and the latest applications, most of the people are considering voice search as a useful service to search for information on search engines. Approximately 31% of smartphone users prefer voice search over typing and in future, it will grow as the new generation find it more convenient and prompt.</p>
Besides, voice search devices like Amazon Echo and Google Home have made its mark among the next generation and most of the people will shop for these devices in future. It was analysed that <strong><a href="https://quoracreative.com/article/voice-search-statistics-trends" target="_blank" rel="noopener">50% of all searches</a></strong> will be voice searches in the coming decade which makes voice search as the biggest online marketing trend of 2020. This trend will also require a change in SEO because users will tend to use longer and accurate phrases than simple keywords. To refer, instead of saying “apple pie recipe” user will say,” how to make an apple pie?”.
<h3>SEO IN 2020</h3>
<p class="justify">With the introduction of new devices, <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO would need changes too</a></strong>, as most people will prefer voice search than other methods. Subsequently, terms will be more specific for the required result. Hence, your content should be adaptable to new changes to stand in existing search engines. Videos have become the more preferable source of information, for which you need to have a quality SEO to keep it in search results.</p>
Besides, for the best organic result, snippets should be preferred which will drive more clicks to your website. Nonetheless, position zero on SERP is the latest twist introduced by google where information is on the top of the search results directly answering the query of the user. For zero position one should have SEO with quality and in-depth content, keyword phrases with featured snippets as well as good on-page and off-page SEO. Our digital marketing agency in Melbourne is perfect solution provider complying with latest trends.
<h3>E-COMMERCE IS THE FUTURE</h3>
<p class="justify">What attracts people to buy from the internet? Many reviewers replied that medium with attractive pictures lures them more to do online shopping than any other form. Consequently, most of the businesses are opting <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media platforms</a></strong> to sell their products via e-commerce. However, it will require them to post most shoppable and lucrative posts for attracting the potential market.</p>
Posts would have native integration that makes sure it is easy to tag and shop product directly in your post by driving more traffic to product pages. There are many industries which are constantly making better strategies to give a surplus hike to business via e-commerce. To name a few:
<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>E-commerce for electronic goods</li>
 	<li>E-commerce for Cosmetics</li>
 	<li>E-commerce for Software products</li>
 	<li>E-commerce for Insurance policies</li>
</ul>
&nbsp;
<p align="justify">This trend is going to rise in the next decade with more than 60 per cent of businesses will choose e-commerce as a major medium for trade.</p>

<h3>VIRTUAL REALITY AND AUGMENTED REALITY WILL BE IN TREND</h3>
<p class="justify">Do you think advanced technology with impressive features will knock the door of every house? Yes, indeed! Virtual reality devices take the user to another vision by replacing reality whereas augmented reality devices add on to the top of reality, what the user is already seeing. Although they have the same designs but accomplish very different things and have different ways.</p>
HTC Vive and the Oculus Rift are examples of virtual reality which completely blocks surrounding and takes them to the virtual world when the user wears them. Besides, Microsoft hololens and various enterprise transparent smart glasses which adds information on top when the user wears them are the equipment of augmented reality.

These both are powerful technologies which have yet to make a mark among common users. AR is already being used by top companies like IKEA, where customers can easily see how furniture will look in their home settings by wearing a piece of augmented reality glasses. In the coming decade, its popularity will grow even more among common masses.
<h3>PERSONALIZATION WILL BE IN TREND</h3>
<p class="justify">What are your chances to buy, when surfing for products on the internet? The major problem which <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution">digital marketing</a> is facing that over 95 percent of users does not convert to become consumer after checking into the website. Reason being, nature and interest of the consumers, which website fails to capture.</p>
But, now through personalization, it is possible to engage the user on the website to show them products of their interest, by keeping a record of the pattern, that consumers typically like to buy. Websites like Amazon are already gaining customers through personalization. When a user who mostly likes to buy electronic equipment from Amazon checks for products, in result Amazon.com preferably shows electronic equipment to him. So most of the businesses will follow this technique in future for targeting more and more users.
<h3>GOOGLE ANALYTICS WILL BECOME A THING OF PAST</h3>
<p class="justify">Novelty is a key ingredient of progress. Businesses that are only dependent upon google analytics will be left behind. Due to the popularity of mediums like webinar, partnerships and affiliate marketing, companies would prefer to use analytic solutions to better tie-up with their databases, such as Amplitude. Companies will prefer a central place to tie up all data to make better-informed decisions. This will give them lifetime benefits instead of short-term incomes.</p>

<h3>COMMUNICATION CHANNELS AS CHATBOTS WILL BE PREFERED</h3>
<p class="justify">Nowadays, marketing emails have become less effective because click rates are rapidly going down. To overcome this problem, companies are leveraging more communication channels. Chatbots will become prominent, as some of it like ManyChat and MobilMonkey can connect Facebook Messenger with Instagram and Watsapp to gain popularity. Besides, tools which will push people to subscribe would be highly preferred to generate push notifications.</p>

<h3>ADVERTISEMENTS WILL INFLUENCE MOBILE USERS</h3>
<p align="justify">Where to have pop ads for abnormous outcomes? As consumers are mostly busy on mobile phones, companies are targeting them by mobile advertising. In future, this trend will touch new heights, as it is estimated that it will account for 30.5 percent of global ad spend which is expected to reach 1.3 trillion dollars.</p>

<h3>STREAMING VIDEO AD ENGAGEMENT</h3>
<p align="justify">Don't dwell deep to ask you, Why video ad engagement is successful? Simply, the reason for it becoming the dominant force in global marketing is its powerful connection with consumers. The volume of online text fades away the interest of reader whereas creative, conceptual and disseminated information by video can galvanize the audience to end up becoming a consumer.</p>
However, for marketing ROI in the next decade, you have to be more creative and conceptual. According to CISCO, video content will increase internet traffic by threefold in between 2016 to 2021. The market has realized that it can be a successful base for forming a relationship between consumer and their brand.
<h3>ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE</h3>
<p align="justify">Impact of artificial intelligence on the <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/trends-that-will-define-future-of-digital-marketing-in-2019.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">future of digital marketing</a></strong> will be exceptional. By predicting purchase trends and user behaviour pattern, artificial intelligence dwells deep for information. Further, by the use of accelerated mobile pages(AMP), load time will reduce to rank among the top search results of Google.</p>
As already discussed, AI will render personalized experience to the user, as he will see the list of items that he generally searches for. Artificial intelligence tools like Acrolinx will help the user to produce great content for the enterprise. Companies like Facebook, IBM, Caterpillar, Nestle are already using artificial intelligence. In the past marketers were apprehensive of Artificial Intelligence in digital marketing but in future, it will become the backbone of every successful business on the internet.
<h3>BIDDING IN GOOGLE ADS WILL BECOME SMART</h3>
<p align="justify">Due to artificial intelligence and automation, smart bidding will become more prevalent and may become the norm for PPC account managers. Recently, updates were announced at Google Marketing Live for Google Ads for which these changes are possible. This improvement will better optimize your bid to give you the most value of every conversion.</p>
Even, this will give you the ability to choose conversion actions at the campaign level, to optimize bids across several campaigns with desired conversion level and set bids to automatically change when the sale starts or stops.
<h3>DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION PROGRAMMES</h3>
<p align="justify">Transformation is an inevitable process of time. To overcome problems in digital marketing, many companies are installing digital transformation programmes. By such companies would get better-integrated strategies, testing and optimization.</p>
About 65 % of businesses either have or about to run digital transformation program in the coming years. This will improve digital skills, simultaneously integrating brand and product marketing in the business. Our digital marketing agency in Melbourne is expert and reliable to help businesses for digital transformation programmes.
<h3>SOCIAL INFLUENCER MARKETING</h3>
<p align="justify">This is another tactic which will trend in years to come. Social influencer marketing is a strategy to boost a follower base of social media influencer for hiking sales. It is not pushy and tends to be different from traditional marketing where advertisements slow down browsing speed and make it difficult for users to navigate the website.</p>
As followers trust in social influencer due to his engaging stories and other strategies, they end up becoming a long-lasting customer. A survey related to internet consumerism revealed, about ⅖ consumers made a purchase by social media influencer’s tweet, whereas ⅗ purchasers were influenced by famous YouTuber. Moreover, they target niche directly approaching the audience interested in their products and provide value to customers for their products.

Even, it is less costly and regularly avail huge discounts to customers. Here leads are genuine and the conversion rate is more.
<h3>SENTIMENT ANALYSIS</h3>
<p align="justify">The process to investigate the nature of information whether positive, neutral or negative is better known as sentiment analysis. Undeniably, sentiments and opinions in a workplace or society, influences our progress. As sentiment analysis algorithm has been introduced by Google, it will affect the way of interpreting backlinks. For which if your reviews are not positive then it will negatively affect the ranking of your website.</p>
Eventually, your content should have all the ingredients such as good user experience, emotional connection, reliability, authenticity and niche to successfully pass sentiment analysis.
<h2><strong>HOW TECHIES INFOTECH CAN HELP YOU ADAPT ALL THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRENDS?</strong></h2>
<p align="justify">Our digital marketing agency in Melbourne takes the onus to boost ROI of your business for marketing investments by par excellence strategies across the internet. Whether your business is small or big, our solutions are cost-effective and provide you with a better cost per lead to deliver prosperous outcomes. Our top priorities are to do brand awareness and to build a brand reputation of your business via social media marketing, email marketing and search engine marketing.</p>
We undertake strategies like search engine optimization, <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">content marketing</a></strong> and conversion optimization to generate revenue for your business. Tools which we use to garner your business are promising to raise customer retention, to give quick time value and assure comprehensive and organised information to customers. Our digital marketing agency in Melbourne tries to earn the trust of people for your business by well-planned, optimized and timely information.

We are committed to working like rocket fuel for your enterprise to get you most possible organic traffic on your site. Never feel we are far, just drop a call and we will get you solution in no time to multiply your income.

</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How SEO Services Can Benefit Your Business in 2019?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/seo-benefits-for-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 May 2021 04:24:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2787</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">Search Engine Optimization (SEO) has immense benefits for any size of the business, be it small or large. It creates brand awareness for your business since most of the search engine users rely more on a site that ranks on the first page of the major search engines results pages (SERPs).</p>
If you too are a business owner, you should use SEO to create a prominent web presence to exceed your competitors to attract new clients towards your business and take it to the next level. Subsequently, below listed are
<h2 class="justify"><strong>7 benefits of using SEO services for your business</strong></h2>
<h3>Results in better user experience</h3>
<p class="justify">A lot of factors are responsible for enhancing the website and improving the user experience. One of these factors is providing your users with the required information, that might include relevant images or videos to justify the text, simplify the navigation of web pages. This further leads to an increase in the number of clicks, leads, improvement of brand recall and maximum conversion rates. Therefore we as the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO company in Melbourne</a></strong> understand the requirements of the search engine sites that will improve your business’s search ranking.</p>

<h3>Serves as the primary source of leads</h3>
<p class="justify">While providing SEO services in Melbourne, Techies Infotech has understood the importance of inbound strategies in generating leads. Whether it is in business to business (B2B ), Business to Customer (B2C) or Non-profit organization, this scheme is successful for all. By inbound strategies we mean, SEO, social media marketing (SMM), content marketing and management and many other strategies.</p>

<h3>Gets you the higher conversion rates</h3>
<p class="justify">If your business site ranks top on any search engine for that matter, then it is for sure that you will get greater conversion rates. It makes it easy for your target audience to locate you and become aware of you as long as you keep up the same position. As more and more people will learn about your brand, there is a bigger possibility for the customers to seal the deal.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/seo-benefits-for-business-2.jpg" alt="seo-benefits-for-business-2" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>SEO encourages cost-efficiency</h3>
<p class="justify">As the best SEO company in Melbourne, we at Techies Infotech always keep a tab on every news related to SEO. Therefore, one of the latest reports by the Search Engine Journal exhibits the cost efficiency of the leads from inbound marketing is higher in contrast to outbound marketing. This is because SEO reduces the cost of the advertisement. For instance, if you already enjoy a top position in SERPs, then investing in pay per click (PPC) or advertising your page is not at all required. As much as the internet users will click your search links, you will be persistent in keeping the top position in the search results.</p>

<h3>SEO incites the local users to pay a visit to the respective physical store</h3>
<p class="justify">Our team of SEO experts at Techies Infotech, Australia believe that once a local customer conducts local research and find a physical store in the respective area, then he is more likely to pay a visit at the store or shop. For instance, an internet user searches for ‘Best Seafood Restaurant in Melbourne’. This will then display a wide range of results.</p>
Further, the user visits the restaurant of his/her choice and becomes the customer of that restaurant. Moreover, the study also supports this fact, by professing that 81% of the shoppers first, conduct their research online and then decide which store to visit.
<h3>SEO promotes brand credibility</h3>
<p class="justify">Whether ranking on the first, second, or third position of the SERP, the customers get an idea that the brand/business is one of the top players in the industry. It implies that you are famous and a lot of people have researched you, too. However, if you are placed at the lower position of the SERPs, then a user might think that either you are new to the industry or not a good brand.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/seo-benefits-for-business-3.jpg" alt="seo-benefits-for-business-3" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Creates Brand Awareness</h3>
<p class="justify">SEO assures that your product is easily discoverable by the major search engine sites via organic search. However, if you attain a top position in the SERPs, then the internet users will be enabled to locate you more often. This widens the chances of the user to click your link, that further redirects them to your website. Therefore, it is one of the primary benefits of creating brand awareness even more.</p>

<h2>Hire the best SEO experts in Melbourne</h2>
<p class="justify">Our team of SEO experts at Techies Infotech, toil day in day out to maintain our legacy as the best SEO company in Melbourne. Therefore, we do not miss out even a single opportunity to spread the brand awareness and brand equity of our clients. And in this operation, Search Engine Optimization has helped us to get our clients the best results. While providing <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/seo-service">SEO services</a> in Melbourne, we enable the respective websites of our clients to attain quantitative and qualitative traffic organically. Therefore, we at Techies Infotech assure you to avail our SEO services in Australia, once and see the difference for yourself.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Benefits of Hiring a Digital Marketing Agency]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/benefits-of-hiring-a-digital-marketing-agency/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 21 May 2021 04:43:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2790</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Unlike earlier times, Digital marketing is no more a new fad, but a tried and proven marketing technique that several businesses have adopted. The power of digital marketing is undeniable and the results generated are also tremendous.</p>
However, the real challenge is to find time and proficiency to execute these digital strategies along with the day-to-day business operations. But the good news is by outsourcing your tasks to digital marketing agencies keeps you at bay from strategizing and posting campaigns, arranging resources, time and most of all expertise to derive best results.
<h2 class="justify"><strong>7 top benefits of hiring a digital marketing agency</strong></h2>
<h3>Proficient Marketing Team working on the projects</h3>
<p class="justify">One of the major benefits of hiring a digital marketing agency is that you are certain to receive the expertise of an entire team of strategists, graphic designers, content writers, and <strong>SEO </strong>analysts.</p>
It is considered to be a far more wise decision rather than trying your hands on the skills of which you have no clue.
<h3>Cost-Effective</h3>
<p class="justify">Being one of the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/hire-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agencies in Australia,</a></strong> we at Techies Infotech assure our clientele to get the best results at the best prices ever. Moreover, the researchers have also discovered that the businesses counting upon the marketing agencies enjoy a lower cost per sales leads as compared to those who either perform these tasks of their own or elect to concentrate on alternative marketing strategies, such as outbound marketing.</p>

<h3>Get the benefit of more qualified leads</h3>
<p class="justify">With considerable experience in digital marketing in Australia, we do not believe in cold calling rather emphasizing on tracking the target audience to create superior solutions that are both fascinating and appropriate.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/benefits-of-hiring-a-digital-marketing-agency-2.jpg" alt="5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Compan" /></div>
<h3>Staying focused on your business</h3>
<p class="justify">Have you ever wondered how load shedding it is to hire the best web designing agency, allowing you to devote more time to the core areas of your business?</p>
We at Techies Infotech, have been serving as the best <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution">digital marketing</a> agency in Melbourne understanding how intricate and time-consuming it is for any business to run digital campaigns of their own.
<h3>Acquire a neutral viewpoint on things</h3>
<p class="justify">It is an undeniable fact that a leading marketing agency will certainly get you the valuable, useful and authentic guidance on strengthening your business facets.</p>
<p class="justify">However, putting your internal team on board for this project might result in a discrepancy of communication further leading to conflicts in interest and disagreements. Therefore hiring an agency to run these tasks is the exceptional way of gaining unbiased yet convenient recommendation.</p>

<h3>Get hold of the latest technology</h3>
<p class="justify">A trusted brand will always have access to the best tools, software and analytical data that will aid your business in enhancing productivity, efficiency, and performance. Also, you will not have to surf the internet for any updated software.</p>

<h3>Generates Measurable Results</h3>
<p class="justify">Every business looks forward to investing in a program that yields results for them. Subsequently, with a large number of digital marketing techniques and strategies, it can be complicated to identify the real <strong>ROI</strong>. Nevertheless, an agency assists by identifying the Key Performance Indicators (KPIs). These indicators enable you to analyze the performance of your marketing campaigns about your objectives.</p>
Moreover, they also allow you to determine the crucial metrics to be followed across several channels that analyze the effectiveness of every campaign. Not only this you can also access monthly or quarterly reports about your campaigns and a website audit that will help you make qualitative marketing decisions.
<h2><strong>Opting the Right Agency</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">If you are looking for the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agency in Melbourne</a></strong> to work with, then you should take your time to select the authentic ones. Although the market is loaded with a good number of businesses, but not every agency will fulfil what they claim.</p>
Since digital marketing is a time-consuming process, so picking the right firm is highly important. Therefore, the first and foremost thing to consider is that you should strike off the companies that promise to deliver instant results. While serving for a good time in Australia, as a digital marketing agency we have realized that one should consider every limitation and expertise of the venture before entering into a contract with them. At Techies Infotech we take it as our responsibility to inform our clients about the primary industries we cover and also share updated tools and techniques we use. If necessary, we also showcase our past and current projects to help you analyze our performance.

Furthermore, you can also find our performance online by checking for our web properties. Additionally, our project’s ranking on the search engines will also help you invest your trust in us. We help you take the best digital marketing decisions that suit your interests and budget frame.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Leveraging the power of Google My Business page to generate leads]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/lead-generation-with-google-my-business/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 22 May 2021 04:08:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2794</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">The primary concern of any business leader is to seek for the various methods to improve the success of the company. With the interest of the consumers steering towards the Internet and Google to search what they need, for them the <strong>Google My Business</strong> has emerged as a vital tool for a company’s growth. What do you understand by Google My Business, and how is it beneficial in generating leads.</p>
So, below lays the answer to both the questions. Just keep scrolling till the end to get a better idea of the importance of Google My Business in generating leads.
<h2><strong>Overview of Google My Business</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Google My Business (GMB) is a free internet-based service, specially crafted for local businesses to help them promote online. It is a valuable tool that allows the owners of the business to administer their appearance online across Google and excel their business.</p>

<h2><strong>What is the need for leveraging Google My Business?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">A high proportion of the population is using Google, which implies a huge potential audience viewing and accessing your profile. The more apparent you are, the more probability you have to show up your business in top SERPs which further widens your opportunities to seek people’s attention. However, believe it or not, it is a far better and more practical option than traditional advertisements.</p>

<h2><strong>What are the benefits of leveraging the power of Google My Business in generating leads?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Google My Business is an important tool that helps your business connect with the target audience also gives you useful information regarding current and potential clients. You can not afford to miss trying your hands on this tool. If you do so you are going to omit to seize the opportunity to maximize sales, exposure, and revenue for your company. So, let’s get down to the list of these benefits:</p>

<h3>Cost-efficient Source</h3>
<p class="justify">Google My Business is considered to be one of the most economical sources to list your business online. This is because various sites charge you on listing your business. Moreover, you can subscribe to it on a monthly or annual basis. Since it is free to use, GMB enjoys the power to attract a relatively large number of customers online.</p>

<h3>Physically Situated Business</h3>
<p class="justify">With the help of Google My Business, you can track the specific location of a business. Further, this enhances your visibility both on the Google search results and maps. It also aids the prompt customers to discover the physical location of your business. Additionally, this works as an optimization for the business too.</p>

<h3>Google Posting</h3>
<p class="justify">When the business is listed at Google My Business, the initial and the most important feature in it’s about section is the posts that you plan to upload. By uploading posts you make a move to lend <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">better visibility to your site</a></strong>. Also, you can draft and post articles on your website which are further visible at Google.</p>

<h3>Exhibit helpful information</h3>
<p class="justify">GMB allows you to showcase important information at the search results. It makes your viewers aware of your:</p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>Time of Operations</li>
 	<li>Preoccupied Periods</li>
 	<li>Directions</li>
 	<li>Nature of your business</li>
 	<li>Pictures of the business and any other information</li>
</ul>
This is because the customer is supposed to visit a page more frequently where complete information is on the display. Further, this information helps in getting the leads through Google.

</div>
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/leveraging-2.jpg" alt="7 Reasons Why You Should OLeveraging the power of Google My Business page to generate leads" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Google Messages</h3>
<p class="justify">GMB also enable you to reach your customers through Google messaging. Here you can conveniently transmit crucial messages to your customers through Google messaging feature available in GMB. This helps in maintaining the best communication channel with the appropriate clientele.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Understanding the needs of the customer</h3>
<p class="justify">There are in total three segments on which the digital marketing majorly operates, that are visibility, engagement and audience statistics. Such important information makes you aware and helps in taking decisions concerning your weaknesses and strengths.
However, with Goggle My Business you can enjoy all the three segments which further leads to the growth of your business.</p>

<h3>SEO (Search Engine Optimization)</h3>
<p class="justify">In case you are a novice in digital marketing, then it is highly advisable to initiate with listing your business with Google My Business. With the help of GMB, you can easily aim for the top ranks in the Google local listings. This further makes your<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> business search engine optimized,</a></strong> making it develop speedily in digital marketing.</p>

<h3>Initiate Google Hangout with the Clients</h3>
<p class="justify">GMB also enables you to begin Google Hangouts with your customers. Moreover, at a time you can chat with up to 15 to 20 customers using Google Hangout. For instance, you can answer their queries through hangout and foster a healthy relationship with your customers.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/leveraging-3.jpg" alt="7 Reasons Why You Should Outsource Your SEO Services" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Get Your Hands on Google My Business</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">As discussed above, Google My Business is an inevitable tool for any startup or local business to boost its business by the online promotion of their products and services. This is possible only due to the wide visibility of the business in search results which further widens the opportunities to maximize the number of leads and conversions.</p>
However, if you are a newbie to the industry, we at Techies Infotech, one of the best digital marketing services in Melbourne are equipped with a team of experts who can proficiently look into the management of your online presence. We operated in from verifying or optimizing Google My Business to complete <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing solutions in Australia.</a></strong> So what are you waiting for? Improve your online performance with <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Techies Infotech,</a></strong> today.

</div>

			<wp:comment_author_IP><![CDATA[93.124.103.30]]></wp:comment_author_IP>
			<wp:comment_date><![CDATA[2022-12-18 18:31:27]]></wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt><![CDATA[2022-12-18 18:31:27]]></wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[[b] 
<a href="https://seoprofisional.ru/bazy/progon-po-baze/zakazat-progon" rel="nofollow ugc">прогон хрумером заказать</a> 


Репетиция согласно основе микс 


Сказать об этом, собственно ведь это прогон, полагаю, далеко не нужно.

Впрочем, многие, допустимо, до самого этих времен 
никак не абсолютно осознают содержание исходной услуги.



К Примеру смотри, содержание прогона заключается во этом,
то что в посторонних сайтах, они называются донорами, располагаются гиперссылки в вашинский веб-сайт, 
но данное, во собственную очередность, положительно влияет в признаках вашего 
произведения во искательских концепциях.

Кроме этого, то что около 
вам скапливается справочная множество, совершается еще также развитие веб-сайта 
во искательской выдаче согласно разным запросам.
Кроме Того совершается повышение также иных определенных значимых характеристик.
Чувство имеются некоторых разновидностей, я ведь 
побеседуем об прогоне согласно «микс базе».




Таким Образом, вам сделали веб-сайт, 
что специализирован никак не только 
лишь с целью отечественных юзеров сети интернет,
но, допустимо, некто с целью их также совсем никак не специализирован, находясь вычисленным только в иностранную аудиторию узы.
Продвигать его все без исключения точно также следует, но, 
в случае если с целью данного применять только 
лишь основы со донорами с 
«.ru» сектора сети интернет, целевая публика вашего веб-сайта весьма никак не вскоре выяснит относительно ваше создание также станет выражать ко 
деревену заинтересованность.
В Случае Если ведь гиперссылки в вашинский веб-сайт станут 
возникать в этих веб-сайтах, какие приезжают 
в жители других стран, возникнет также увеличение трафика также развитие веб-сайта 
во этих поисковиках, какими они используют.
Ко данному добавится также рост ко этим признакам, какие значимы 
с целью этих искательских концепций, 
но никак не с целью, к примеру, «Яндекса»[/b]

ЛИБО В  [url=https://goo.su/4zRx]ТЕЛЕГРАММ  [/url][/b]]]></wp:comment_content>

		<title><![CDATA[7 Reasons Why You Should Outsource Your SEO Services]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/outsource-seo-service/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 22 May 2021 04:28:36 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2798</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Such is the present day scenario that every business regardless of its size requires immense efforts to implement digital marketing. However, out of all, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) can be specifically intricate due to the cut-throat competition on the top SERPs. Moreover, while carrying out these services, one confronts challenges like managing time, money and human resources to emerge and outshine in this digital world, which is the reason why companies often opt to outsource SEO services in order to get things swiftly and efficiently.</p>
But the real struggle is placing your trust upon the third party to whom you are outsourcing any aspect of a business since you might feel that they are not as passionate as you about your end goals. Although your concern is valid, that merely implies that any company taking this productive alternative into account should look upon only proficient providers.

Since outsourcing a specific aspect of a business to its expert is a really incredible way to enhance it. Therefore, SEO is a crucial aspect of marketing that has an unbelievable impact on your business and production levels for your marketing team, so outsourcing it to the adepts is always a better option. Although there are a plethora of reasons for outsourcing&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO services in Melbourne,</a></strong>&nbsp;yet below-mentioned are the top 7 reasons why you should opt for hiring a professional team for your SEO services.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Saves Time</h2>
<p class="justify">This is the foremost and most important benefit of outsourcing your SEO tasks, since optimizing the concerned pages and making the content rank higher in the SERPs is a time-consuming process. And it takes even more time when handled by the inexperienced. Consequently, hiring SEO professionals eases the task for your digital marketing campaigns will inevitably save you time which is the most valuable resource for your business.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/seo-outsourcing-2.jpg" alt="7 Reasons Why You Should Outsource Your SEO Services"></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Expert SEO Services</h2>
<p class="justify">Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is not a pushover. If you are new to the internet marketing industry and are not proficient in SEO, then do not commit the mistake of considering yourself as an expert. SEO is accounted as an intricate subject in itself; with little knowledge of it, no success is guaranteed. So, there arises the need for hiring the best SEO service provider, making the expert the decision maker on your behalf. The SEO service providers are not only competent in this field but also employ the latest and most powerful SEO marketing tools to cultivate improvements.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Affordable SEO services</h2>
<p class="justify">Outsourcing SEO projects is a relatively cheaper option when compared to in-house management of the same. Although you will be investing initially then you will be certain to reap the benefits from the improved SEO. Since digital marketing is an ever-evolving industry, it needs persistent passion and perseverance to stay alert to the SEO’s high dynamism. Besides this, outsourcing SEO tasks also help you save both manpower and time invested in constant training to keep it spinning.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Keeping a tab on the latest SEO trends</h2>
<p class="justify">To derive quality SEO results it is important to employ various tools and an understanding of changing trends. For instance, Google changes its search algorithm approximately 500 times in a year. In most cases, the modifications are minor yet significant.</p>
But we at Techies Infotech always keep abreast with the changing&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/digital-marketing-trends-in-2020.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing trends</a></strong>&nbsp;in the industry to serve Melbourne with the best SEO results. Staying constantly updated with the changing trends have definitely helped us emerge as one of the best SEO service providers in Australia.
<div class="h20"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/seo-outsourcing-3.jpg" alt="7 Reasons Why You Should Outsource Your SEO Services"></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Keeps you focused on our expert areas</h2>
<p class="justify">Outsourcing SEO projects to the relevant agencies allows you more room to concentrate on your own expertise. While you are not required to worry about keeping a tab on the SEO trends, you can invest all your time and energy into the other essential aspects of the business. So, seize the opportunity to perform for your company, concentrate on other competitive elements rather SEO, and enhance your in-house processes.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Access to a large digital marketing network</h2>
<p class="justify">SEO is usually a sect of a large set of services provided by a&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agency</a></strong>. In most cases, similar to Techies Infotech, the agencies also offer a complete solution to the best digital marketing services, where the executives are proficient in other parts of digital marketing as well. This implies when you outsource your business’s SEO services, you gain access to a wide network of digital experts who aid you in other requirements for digital marketing.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Timely Track of Detailed SEO Report</h2>
<p class="justify">A proficient SEO outsourcing agency is well-equipped with the tracking system for every SEO service offered by them. A detailed SEO report and follow-up on the marketing tasks are continuously updated by the experts. Therefore, hiring professional SEO services aids in building your reputation and website credibility.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2>Bring in the SEO Professionals</h2>
<p class="justify">Considering this competitive market space and a tough economy, we understand the value of every penny spent by you. Therefore, Techies Infotech brings to you the best SEO services in Melbourne that are cost-effective yet are certain delivers incredible results.</p>
With a competent team of SEO experts who always stay motivated and focused on delivering the best results, we ensure you to reap the maximum benefits of the trust and money that you invest in us. So, weigh all your options, make a wise decision and watch your results soar at a really economical price.]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[6 Ways to Hire Best Instagram Marketing Agency in Melbourne]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/best-instagram-marketing-agency-in-melbourne/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 24 May 2021 03:50:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2802</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">With the incredible growth in the Instagram monthly users, that is 1 billion, it has become highly important to include this in your<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> social media marketing strategy.</a></strong> Instagram has emerged as one of the best ways to boost your business as it directly connects you with the prospective leads, looking for your products or services.</p>
However, if you think that you are not proficient or do not have time to run a campaign, then you can hire a professional Instagram marketing agency to ease your task. Therefore, this post will showcase the 6 ways to discover the right Instagram marketing agency for your business. So without any further ado, let’s skim through the ways below.
<h2 class="h20"><strong>Choose the right Instagram Marketing Agency</strong></h2>
<h3>They Know their Clients better</h3>
<p class="justify">If you are looking for the right Instagram marketing agency for your business, then opt for the one that intends to learn well about their clients. The agency should accentuate your exceptional features and utilize them as the USP for the campaigns.</p>
Since every business requires a different strategy, so knowing well about the clients is a must for the agency to help the company achieve the desired results. Moreover, to explore more about a company’s code of conduct, you can go through their clients’ feedbacks.
<h3>They provide multiple services</h3>
<p class="justify">Whenever you are searching for an Instagram marketing company, your first concern is to pick a company that emphasizes particularly on the creation of the campaigns. You can also filter your search by only concentrating on the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> social media marketing Melbourne</a></strong> companies. Once you have found the company, you would think of expanding into other areas besides Instagram. For example, you just had a successful Instagram campaign, and now you desire to diversify through Facebook.</p>
Following which you will also require content marketing. Thereupon, if you are restricted to a social media marketing company, they may not possess the resources that are the pre-requisites for any additional services you require.This is the reason why hiring a full-time <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution"><strong>professional marketing company</strong></a> is a wise choice. With the time and expansion of your business, you will not have to be bothered about changing the agencies or hiring different companies for different tasks.

This will ultimately simplify the management of your campaigns, as they will all fall under one authority. Subsequently, when picking the right Instagram marketing agency, make sure they provide all other services as well.
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Must have a strong Portfolio</h3>
<p class="justify">Since the portfolio of any company gives you a better insight to any firm, you can select the right<strong> <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Instagram marketing company</a></strong> by considering the same. The portfolio helps you observe the social media campaigns, they have run in the past for their clients. Furthermore, you can also check for the results derived from these campaigns. In case you witness the positive results, it shows their capability of driving valuable results for their customers.</p>
Through this, you can also find out whether they have experience in your respective industry or not. If not, it does not imply that you cannot opt for them.Seek for diversity in their portfolio. If they have a league of clients coming from different industries, then you can spare them some time to explore your industry and the industry.
<h3>They track results</h3>
<p class="justify">Running a social media campaign without tracking the results is like washing the dirty linen without water. In order to improve and optimize the campaigns, it is important to monitor the results. Therefore, while selecting the right Instagram marketing firm, you should ensure that they have the right resources and routine of keeping a tab on the metrics of your social media campaigns.</p>
Metrics such as reach, growth, engagement, traffic and so on are the most valuable of all for your business. So, tracking them is highly important and one of the main characteristic feature of any good marketing firm.
<h3>They operate within the defined budget</h3>
<p class="justify">As a matter of fact, the budget is the most important factor in any business when it comes to operations. Thereupon, it is very crucial to look for the pricing of the Instagram marketing firms before hiring them. The biggest hurdle is when the companies do not disclose their pricing online and you have to contact them to inquire about the same. This further keeps you on hold till the time to hear back from them, which makes it frustrating and delays your decision-making process.</p>
So, always opt for the companies who have displayed their pricing online or are prompt in addressing the inquiries. Also, try and hire the company who strives to get you the best results while remaining in your budget constraint.
<h2><strong>Techies Infotech - Melbourne’s best Instagram Marketing Agency</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Investing in the right and credible Instagram marketing firm is counted as the best opportunity to boost your business. Subsequently, our team of proficient marketers, always stay committed to driving the valuable results for your every campaign.With substantial experience in marketing, we have evolved as a company that only works towards achieving perfection and worthwhile results for our clients.</p>
We look forward to helping your business grow!

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[6 Tips on How to Use Images to Improve your Content Marketing Strategy]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/6-tips-on-how-to-use-images-to-improve-your-content-marketing-strategy/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 May 2021 04:31:22 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2859</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">In case one wants to achieve greater results, one cannot do without adorning his content with the best and apt images. It is irrefutable that humans are visual beings. Therefore, generating eye-catching images to support your content will help you enhance the volume of your readers. Since visuals not only just increase the understandability of the messages, but also communicates its context, quite effectively.

Subsequently, treat your content the same way. Infusing the same in your marketing strategy will drive your sales and forces. Images are that part of a content that attracts your attention incontestably. They have an intense effect on your content marketing. This post showcases 6 tips on how to use images to improve your <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">content marketing strategy.</a></strong></p>

<h2 class="justify"><strong>Tips to Improve your Content Marketing Strategy</strong></h2>
<h3>Incorporate an image after every 100 words or so</h3>
<p class="justify">The recent studies have shown that every post with an image after every 100 words or so, is widely shared across the platform. This implies that if it is a 1000 word article, then there must be about 10 images. In other cases, you can follow the below-mentioned thumb rules to incorporate this tip.</p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>Place an image at the beginning of the post</li>
 	<li>Try to place an image after every couple of paragraphs</li>
 	<li>Add an image in every section</li>
</ul>
<h3>Prefer Colorful images</h3>
<p class="justify">As a matter of fact, these tweets that are decked with bright, colourful and saturates images are ought to get maximum engagement. Thereupon, for effective content marketing strategy, you should incorporate such colourful images in your content. Moreover, if you aspire to take it to the next level, then you can add images inspired by brand colours. For instance, Moz is a great example of a blog that employs consistent colour schemes as well as house font, almost in every image to intensify branding.</p>

<h3>Fun yet informative images</h3>
<p class="justify">In reality, readers love to have informative images rather content. This is because they find it relatively easier to understand through images instead of mere content. Subsequently, people find images such as graphs, charts and other forms of informative images, attractive. This is how one ends up creating their own marketing news by displaying such data visually.</p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>If you have a<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/creative-designing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> graphic designer</a></strong> on board or you can manage to outsource the data and get it transformed into infographics</li>
 	<li>If you cannot, just use Excel. Something is better than nothing.</li>
 	<li>Ensure that you add your logo to the images, as it helps you promote your brand.</li>
</ul>
<p align="justify">Always try and use the data-rich images that serve both the entertainment and informative, purposes of the content.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/content-marketing-strategy-2.jpg" alt="5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Compan" /></div>
<h3>Don’t opt for apparent stock images</h3>
<p class="justify">Instead of having an obvious image in connection with your topic, try and place images that are creative, funny, silly yet informative. The images that are not but obvious but are still related to your context are impactful. For instance, your post is about digital marketing. So, the obvious images for this post will be people working on a laptop or something like that. You should pick an image that is more creative, far from the obvious images and is also appropriate for the context of your post.</p>

<h3>Keyword-optimize your images</h3>
<p class="justify">Optimizing your images for the search is necessary. Though there are many on-page jacks you can work upon in order to rank your content, but images are the most important out of all. So below given are the methods to optimize your images:</p>

<ul>
 	<li>Utilize your target keywords and its variations in your images files’ names. So, for instance, if you targeting “ball pens” as a keyword, your images should be named as “ball-pens.jpg”, “best-ball-pens.png”, “how-to-choose-a-ball-pen.gif” etc.</li>
 	<li>Repeat the same with the alt text field for your content marketing images. Both the file name and the alt text should be explanatory of the images if possible. But in certain cases where the images are just for the fun sake, there you can use the target keyword in the file name to save.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Responsive images</h3>
<p class="justify">You will always be on the receiving end of the extra credits if your content images are<strong><a href="/Techiesinfotech.com.au/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> mobile-responsive</a></strong> (i.e. they automatically gets resized based upon the size of the screen/device). This easy tip will definitely help your content rank.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/content-marketing-strategy-3.jpg" alt="5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Compan" /></div>
<h2><strong>Upshot</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Images can bring a lot of difference in the number of viewers of your post. So we at <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Techies Infotech</a></strong> ensure that we offer your audience, not just compelling content but visually attractive content that is both compelling and competitive. As the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> best SEO company in Australia</a></strong>, we always work upon the thought line that images play a vital role in enhancing your content marketing strategy. Moreover, over a period time, while serving people in Melbourne, Melbourne and Frankston we realized that the strong usage of images is not only to make your content look good but it also improves the content marketing performance across the board.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[7 Key Principles That Make A Web Design Look Good]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/7-key-principles-that-make-a-web-design-look-good/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 24 May 2021 04:11:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2806</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">There are a number of businesses or brands that commit the repeated mistakes of overlooking the usability of their website. However, as a matter of fact, usability is considered to be one of the most important factors in the success of any website. It is believed that a website with great user-interface is deemed to drive sales and revenue for any business.</p>
A website is not only supposed to be good in the outlook but also offer a seamless experience to its visitors. This is the reason why usability is an inevitable part of any&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">web design</a></strong>.

This implies that great web design is the one that makes it easier for visitors to locate the required information hassle-free.

Although there are numerous characteristics of good web design, below runs the list of the best&nbsp;<strong>7 key principles that make a web design look good.</strong>

So without any further ado, let’s surf through these top traits of a user-friendly website.
<h2><strong>Key Principles that make a Web Design look good</strong></h2>
<h3>Compatible with Mobile Phone</h3>
<p class="justify">Since a major number of people employ their mobile phones to access the internet,&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">designing a responsive website</a></strong>&nbsp;that is mobile optimized has become a necessary aspect of any website design.</p>
The foremost step is to check the appearance of your website on a mobile phone. You can put Google mobile site tester to use, to figure this out.

In case your website cannot be accessed on mobile, you should strive for designing a mobile version of it. You can also&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/website-design-and-development-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">hire a professional web designing company</a></strong>&nbsp;for this task.
<h3>Well Thought Out Information Architecture</h3>
<p class="justify">Proper organization and display of any information on a website are accounted for one of the best traits of a user-friendly website. Nevertheless, it is always overlooked.</p>
However, in today’s scenario where a website offers a wide range of information and resources, this aspect has become even more important to be considered.

Planning, categorizing and careful presentation of information simplifies It for the visitors to locate the desired information. The key to lay your hands on this trait is by designing your website from the perspective of your users.

Furthermore, this should be an essential characteristic of your website if your company has ample information to offer.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/7-Key-Principles-That-Make-A-Web-Design-Look-1.jpg" alt="7-Key-Principles-That-Make-A-Web-Design-Look"></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h3>Speedy Loading</h3>
<p class="justify">A website that takes a long to load, is much more annoying for any website visitor. In actual, slow speed is looked upon as a major drawback for any website. Ensuring that your website loads within 4-6 seconds is essential for any user-friendly website. Moreover, it also affects your&nbsp;<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SERP ranking.</a></strong></p>
Slow loading speed is one of the major reasons why visitors leave a website. Since the users’ expectations have transformed over the years, a typical customer will spare only a couple of seconds for the page to load.

If not loaded in time, it is most likely that the visitor will navigate away to the competitor’s site leaving a negative impression on them on behalf of the former website. Thereupon, a website with fast loading is taken to be an essential trait of a web design that visitors like.
<h3>Browser Consistency</h3>
<p class="justify">Browser compatibility is something which is frequently neglected by many companies. There are a number of companies who face this issue due to ignorance. This further is taken to be bad for the company’s profile as it conveys a negative impact on the usability of the website.</p>
Even though modern browsers have emerged and become more efficient, there are certain discrepancies that pertain as to how the website interpretation by various browsers.

It is highly important to make sure that the web site's appearance and behaviour should be consistent across all the major browsers such as Internet Explorer, Chrome, Safari, Firefox and so on. These simple things make up for the best user experience with regard to the website.
<h3>Contrasting Color Schemes</h3>
<p class="justify">Although this may sound basic, keeping the right colour contrasts in a website is an important feature of any good web design. Thereupon, it should not be ignored.</p>
The perfect contrast between the background and text colour of the website is a must. For instance, black text displayed on a white background makes the content readable and appealing.

Whereas, lack of contrast, makes it illegible for the visitor, which again is not healthy for the success of a website.
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/7-Key-Principles-That-Make-A-Web-Design-Look-2.jpg" alt="7-Key-Principles-That-Make-A-Web-Design-Look-2"></div>
<h3>Right Error Handling</h3>
<p class="justify">Handling the errors and on-screen descriptive messages efficiently are highly important for a good impact on the user of the website. But again, unfortunately mostly it is neglected. Correct handling of errors at the backend coding guarantees the robustness and rigorousness of the website.</p>
With the right display of the error messages, comes the improved user experience and overall usability of the website.
<h3>Valid Mark-up and Clean Code</h3>
<p class="justify">A website that effectively takes the notice of the relevant web design, best practices and standards are often considered more persistent and reliable.</p>
It also ascertains the speedy loading and consistency in appearance across all browsers and devices. Moreover, it also helps in easy location of problems and troubleshoots if needed.
<h2><strong>Conclusion</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Since web design is the fundamental aspect of any website’s success, we at <a href="https://iamtechie.com/"><strong>Techies Infotech</strong></a>&nbsp;ensure you to deliver them utmost proficiency. A user-friendly yet professional website is deemed to offer a seamless experience to the visitors and also enhance the probability of success.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Importance of Long-Tail Keyword Research for PPC Campaign]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/long-tail-keyword-importance/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 May 2021 04:10:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2850</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">Keywords are the core element of any <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO</a></strong> campaign and are also considered to be the point of focus for any SEO decision. However, when any keyword research is conducted, the most vital things to be taken into account are its relevancy and the search volume. Subsequently, for any mall business or a startup for that matter are not recommended to use these high search volume keywords as it might take them years to even observe any pull.

Therefore, your best deal will be to focus on the keywords that lie somewhere in the middle and have search volume yet are not as competitive. So, here you can employ long tail keyword or the keywords that comprise of three or more words in a phrase. For that matter consider any company that is running a successful <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">PPC Campaign,</a></strong> you will certainly find long-tail keywords as a part of their strategy. These are the phrases that generally have low CPC (cost-per-click) and low search volume. Still, they are at times they are neglected by many PPC marketers.</p>

<h2><strong>Why employing long-tail keywords is a good move?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">As discussed above, long-tail keywords are an inevitable part of any successful PPC strategy. Perhaps in almost all the PPC markets, it is always advocated to consistently look out for the advantages and create ads in relevant areas, where your competitors have not yet invaded or where cost and quality are inversely proportional. Moreover, the searches on the long-tail keywords are high as the searcher is quite specific in his search. Additionally, the level of competition is too low to help you fetch an opportunity to convert searches at real-time low-cost. So, let’s understand these concepts comprehensively, as to how important is the long-tail keywords research for PPC Campaign:</p>

<h3>Cost-effective</h3>
<p class="justify">As a matter of fact, SEO and PPC have differences. SEO takes times and PPC can certainly help you drive more traffic to your site. Besides, PPC can be an expensive affair for you if you opt for competitive keywords. Here comes the importance of long-tail keywords. Since these terms are less competitive, they are inexpensive, yet effective in targeting your audience. As soon as you make out that your <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO campaign</a></strong> has started gaining some traction, you can minimize your efforts on PPC.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/long-tail-2.jpg" alt="long tail keyword importance" /></div>
<h3>Less Competitive</h3>
<p class="justify">Although broad keywords have higher search volume, the number of sites considering these words is very few when it comes to rank them. Since, long-tail keywords are less competitive, as discussed above their prices per click are also lower than any other short-tail keyword or organic keywords for that matter. A very few numbers of people bid for such terms, as they are quite intricate to locate them manually and then create and optimizing them is even more complicated. Therefore, employing such keywords in your PPC campaign results in effective CPC (cost per click).</p>

<h3>Stronger CTR (Click-through Rate)</h3>
<p class="justify">A substantial part of SEO is currently developing and sharing content. Thereupon it becomes highly important to infuse keywords into campaigns such as PPC, so as to make them appear within the search over a period of time. With the continuous usage of same keywords repeatedly, it may pose a threat to your social presence. Therefore, using variations of long-tail keywords not only in your PPC Campaigns but also in your content will help you keep things organic and easily discoverable to your targeted audience. This will also directly affect your CTR (click through rate). This is because the searches for 1, 2 and 3 words have comparatively low CTR. Following which that CTR, significantly increases for the searches of at least 4 words. Consequently, CTR for long-tail keywords is considered to be stronger.</p>

<h3>Higher Conversion Rates</h3>
<p class="justify">Now that we are aware of the fact that with long-tail keywords have considerable search volume, they also have strong CTR and they are often cost-effective as compared to the organic short-tail keywords. Since the searcher is specific about his search, the conversions on those particular products or services get higher. On average long tail keywords have 10% of the conversion rate, which is great.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/long-tail-3.jpg" alt="long tail keyword importance" /></div>
<h3>Better CPA (Cost Per Acquisition)</h3>
<p class="justify">There is a direct relation between the word count and the CPA. It is proven that the conversions from the long-tail product keywords are way economical as compared to those from the generic short-term keyword searches. Therefore, this is why employing long-tail keywords are a must in creating, optimizing and retargeting your PPC Campaigns.</p>

<h2><strong>Final Thought</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Always remember that on an average your long-tail keywords will represent 80% of your terms that will further account for 20% of your leads. However, we at <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Techies Infotech,</a></strong> Australia understand that your goal is to create leads which are low in cost. Moreover, 80% of your leads generated from your head terms will represent only 20% of your keywords. Therefore, our team of experts will help you create and optimize PPC Campaigns by focusing on long-tail keywords, so as to reduce your cost-per-lead yet help you achieve business.</p>

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
