					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[5 Easy Ways to Transform Your Business Using the Hashtag]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/easy-way-to-use-hashtag/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 May 2021 04:40:16 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2853</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">Hashtags have become one of the important aspects that the marketers seem to consider while promoting themselves on social media, yet not many of them are using it to the fullest.As a matter of fact, one can spot a hashtag probably everywhere on <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media.</a></strong> Be it Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, Google+ or Facebook for that matter. As a present-day marketer ignoring hashtags can bring an opportunity loss to your business. Therefore you should be aware of the strategies to employ hashtags.

Considering the fact, hashtags can expand your content reach, magnify your brand, target your audience, get your content discovered, and enhance your SEO and many more. This article showcases the five easy ways to transform your business using the hashtag on any social site.</p>

<h2><strong>5 easy ways to transform business using Hashtag</strong></h2>
<h3>Comprehend the basics</h3>
<p class="justify">To put it in simpler words, hashtags are the easiest way of organizing your social media content. They are chiefly employed on Instagram and Twitter. Moreover, these social platform permits the users to designate hashtags for their individual posts and inculcate them in their profiles.

Probing further towards the brands, they can opt for a pre-existing hashtag, that they consider themselves to be associated with or they can also create their own hashtags, expanding their reach to the users who hold the similar interest areas of that hashtag.

This makes the search process easier for the user. Using hashtags makes the user find the content and bios easily on <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media platforms,</a></strong> further, this can make your brand highly discoverable.Moreover, Instagram has lately introduced a new feature that allows the user to follow particular hashtags that will make your feed loaded with the content that is associated with those or relevant hashtags.</p>

<h3>Selecting the Right number of hashtags</h3>
<p class="justify">The recent studies on social media behaviour have shown that the number of hashtags used by a user on these sites has a direct influence on the organic reach and user engagement.The various tracking software installed for the social media sites has come up with the results showing that more than 65,000 posts across Instagram, Facebook and Twitter are identified with an optimal number of hashtags for each platform.

It was discovered that one to two hashtags for Twitter are optimal for engagement. Whereas for Instagram, 9-11 hashtags are considered to be feasible for driving user engagement. However, for Facebook hashtags are not that prolific and there are not many consents on the effectiveness of its usage. Furthermore, if it is to be used on Facebook, then one hashtag is deemed to be the best for steering user engagement and a maximum of 6 can be used.

Consequently, it is believed that a standardized content and the right choice of hashtags make you evolve your <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/hire-digital-marketing-agency.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">brand marketing</a></strong> over time and the success follows. Perhaps the best approach to try on the hashtags and the number you use is by supervising the results and moderating it strategically.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/transform-2.jpg" alt="5 easy ways to transform your business using the hashtag" /></div>
<h3>Be Brief</h3>
<p class="justify">The resent studies have shown that the ideal lengths of the hash tags are equally important while using them. As a matter of fact, the hashtags on Twitter are found to be more effective when they are super short or not as long as 18 characters.It is also believed that the limitations on the character usage in Twitter have made the shortened hashtags a fit in them. Moreover, its common practice of using a variety of long and short hashtags in a single post is also effective.

Whereas on Instagram, one can manage to opt for a little longer hashtags, somewhere between 21 to 23 characters are considered to be ideal. Subsequently, keeping your hashtags both short and long is a good strategy to transform your business.</p>

<h3>Be specific</h3>
<p class="justify">It is of utmost importance to pick only those hashtags that are particularly related to your brand. Although at first, you would consider choosing a generic hashtag that has substantial search results, it would always be better to serve by being more specific. It is said that your hashtags should resonate with your standard customers and brands.</p>

<h3>Use trending hashtags</h3>
<p class="justify">If there are any hashtags that are trending, then you should account for the ways to integrate it into your content. If there is a trending hashtag that is doing the rounds, then you may consider looking for ways to incorporate it into your content. Once you have done it, your post is certain to receive traffic which ultimately amplifies your brand awareness.A word of caution doesn’t just blindly use the trending hashtags, rather see for it if it makes sense to your brand and not appear inappropriate when used.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/transform-3.jpg" alt="5 easy ways to transform your business using the hashtag" /></div>
<h2><strong>Final Thought</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">We at<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Techies Infotech</a></strong> have been serving the industry for quite a while. Thereupon, our experiences imply that putting your hashtags at the test before using it on social media marketing strategy is a must. We recommend using them sparingly and avoiding over-stuffing hashtags into your posts.

As one of the<strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> best SEO companies in Australia,</a></strong> our diligent experience has helped us curate this above-mentioned list of the easy ways to transform your business using hashtags. Our team of experts is employed day in and out on the projects to help the people of Australia boost their business on social media using hashtags. Having said that, these simple hashtag strategies for social media, are certain to get you efficient results for your business.</p>

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How a Content Marketing Strategy Helps You Build a Brand]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-a-content-marketing-strategy-helps-you-build-a-brand/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 26 May 2021 03:57:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2856</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">To keep up with the pace of the competitive online market, one is required to attract and retain the clients right from the beginning till end. This means that you will have to build your credibility and let your audiences cling on to you even after a deal closes.

Thereupon, <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/6-tips-on-how-to-use-images-to-improve-your-content-marketing-strategy.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>strategic content marketing</strong></a> aids you in building your brand. There are various factors responsible for conducting this process. But first, let us understand what content marketing actually is?

Content Marketing is a process of developing and sharing free content to allure and convert the prospects into customers and further those customers are converted into loyal buyers. It is all about educating people about your products or services and earning their trust so as to drive sales and build a brand.

Probing further, you might be wondering how does it work and most of all, builds a brand? So, let’s follow below to get an answer to this question.</p>

<h2><strong>Consistent Messaging – Builds Credibility</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Content Marketing allows you to develop your content in compliance with similar goals. This will further help you achieve consistency in your brand, its messages that further aids in building your credibility among the users.

Ensure that whatever content you are developing, it should be in obedience to the goals of your company. Moreover, they should comprise of the appropriate information that both entertains and educate your audience. Once you arrange a consistent setup for your company’s content, you are bound to promote inbound marketing by nurturing interest in the service or product offered by your company, instead of being a mere brand name.

You should always remember that consistent, qualitative and notable content is remembered by your audience as compared to the company’s name or tag line. Since the present day consumers are more inclined towards brand authenticity, you should be consistent in addressing your customers’ needs with relevant information, so as to promote loyalty within your customers.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border alignnone" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/build-a-brand-techies-infotech-2.jpg" alt="How a Content Marketing Strategy Helps You Build a Brand" width="1200" height="450" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Reliable Content – Incites Consumer Interest</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">When you choose to showcase your company’s expertise, you are only aiming to pick inbound marketing over outbound marketing. Now the question is how inbound marketing outperforms outbound marketing. This is because outbound marketing is an aggressive one, while inbound marketing aims at selling smoothly with some strategic, killer content marketing.

As discussed earlier, you should draft content with respect to your products or services that you are willing to sell to your audience. Once you have published content on an appropriate media for your target audience to receive it, then you have considerable made an effort to stir up your prospective buyers to convert into end buyers.

But to maintain this loop, you should keep a regular check on your content as it needs regular alterations with respect to the changing market needs and circumstances. For instance, you can look out for some best guest posts from the other experts of the industry. This will certainly help in raising the volume of the readers for the platforms, yours and theirs.</p>

<h2><strong>Credible Content – Converts Leads</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Although effective <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html"><strong>SEO</strong></a> is a key factor in your marketing strategy, yet it alone does not account for lead conversion. If your content is unable to engage your readers, then even the SEO infused into that content will be of no help in making conversions.

The content that you market should always be highly qualified in terms of appropriateness and usefulness in context to your target audience. Make sure that your content envelops all the relevant keywords, so as to build credibility and <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">enhance traffic and conversion</a></strong> over time.

The recent researches have also proven the fact, that there is a strong link between the content marketing and raised positive brand recall, which further generates lead conversion. This is more powerful as compared to other marketing strategies that are less substantial and pushier that consequently leads to negative reactions from the potential clients.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/build-a-brand-%20techies-infotech%203.jpg" alt="How a Content Marketing Strategy Helps You Build a Brand" /></div>
<h2><strong>Long-Term Thinking – Fosters Customer Loyalty</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Content marketing is considered to be a long term marketing strategy since it detects and serves your audience’s current need for new and equally useful content. And if the leads are converted into sales, then the respective clients are likely to stay hooked with you, as what you have offered them does not cease after a sale.

Since you have employed effective and long-term content marketing strategy, you are certain to offer new and useful content that is ever-evolving. This will generate leads for you, as you will offer your current clientele some content that is shareworthy and holds the potential to attract and engage new clients

<strong><em>Now that you have read all of that, you might be wondering how content marketing is going to work for you.</em></strong></p>

<h2><strong>Do not worry!</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">We at Techies Infotech Australia provide the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing services in Melbourne</a></strong>, Frankston, and other major parts of Australia. We understand the importance of content in a marketing strategy. Over a considerable period of time, we have learned some new strategies to implement content marketing which further helps in building brands. Therefore, our exceptionally good content marketing services are bound to drive results for business and even help you build your brand’s credibility among the people.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/trends-that-will-define-future-of-digital-marketing-in-2019-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 May 2021 06:19:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2905</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>With 2019 knocking at our doors, new trends of digital marketing platform too are coming besides. Now, digital marketing is not just about SEO, PPC, Social Media, or Content Writing, but it has developed a way above. Artificial Intelligence and Visual Search have gained much importance now.</p><p>Currently, these trends and strategies are being implemented in high-tech, internet connected firms and slowly are crawling to other business sectors too. Businesses need to adopt these trends if they wish to survive in the dynamic environment of 2019.</p><p><b>Here are some of the key Digital Marketing Trends for 2019.</b></p><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong> </strong></h2><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif;">Chatbots</strong></h2><p>Chatbots are becoming an important part of digital marketing. And by the year 2019, it is expected that their importance would increase by a manifold. </p><p>This basically is a service based on Artificial Intelligence, which gets into conversations with your clients and site visitors automatically. At the moment, around 1.2 billion people are interacting with chatbots and </p>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/chatbots-p7v5fbab210yupwj63k5sa5ylpqa047kl9xclooikg.jpg" title="chatbots" alt="Chatbots" />														
		<p style="margin-bottom: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.28px;">it has been&nbsp;estimated that by 2020, around 81% of the businesses&nbsp;would be using chatbots.&nbsp;It has also been estimated that by the year 2022, people would be able to save around $8 billion with help of the chatbots.<br></p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 20px; letter-spacing: 0.28px;">The reason people prefer the chatbots is that they are highly responsive and could reply within a quick span of time. They are always technically correct and never lose their patience. Moreover, they always save the chat histories and are very good in bringing references.</p>
<p><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw></p>
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Artificial Intelligence</strong></h2><p>Artificial intelligence or AI has become the need of tomorrow. It is the smarter form of technology which itself gets into the conversations to extract the required information. Latest research shows that by the year 2020, 1/4th of the businesses would be relying on chatbots for most of their conversations.</p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;"> </p><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">To take an overview, businesses adopting AI by the year 2019 would get an edge over the competition, save a lot of money and could accelerate the growth.</p>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/artificial-intelligence-p7v74jhvb45npqxoz0ab1oqx7n5674xv5arn81bbi8.jpg" title="artificial-intelligence" alt="artificial-intelligence" />														
		<h2> </h2><h2><strong>Video Marketing</strong></h2><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">Videos have gained much importance in the past 5 years. Many businesses are using the videos to rank high in the digital world.</p><p>Following figures clear the facts of its importance:</p><ul style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;"><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">70% of the viewers share the brand’s video within their circle.</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">39% of the people call the vendors after watching the videos of their businesses.</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">52% of the customers say that they become more confident in buying the product online after seeing the video of the product.</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">72% businesses claim that their conversion rates have increased with videos.</li></ul><p> </p>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/video-marketing-p7v7cwa7qp41zlqvax0id7wuplr8tlo4comueu6q68.jpg" title="video-marketing" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<p>YouTube has experienced the highest rate of <a style="color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/five-tips-for-hiring-a-great-video-production-compan.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">video marketing</a>. Every day, numerous videos are uploaded on this platform and this has proven to extract the profitable businesses.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />With the growth of technology, Live videos have gained much importance. Businesses use Live videos for interviews, product demos, the glimpse of events etc. Live videos catch a much wider audience at no cost.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Video Marketing has gained much encouragement with decreasing prices of video equipment and increasing the quality of smartphone cameras. And that is one of the pivotal reasons why entrepreneurs are transferring to personalized video messages from phone calls or emails.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Youtube is the best platform for video marketing as its videos are displayed on SERP and the <a style="color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SEO</a> of the videos has acquired the level of real importance.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />With technological advancements, 360 degree video contents too are in the latest business gossips. It gives a user interactive experience where a person can literally interact with the videos.</p><h2><strong> </strong></h2><h2><strong>Social Messaging Apps</strong></h2><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">We all know what important place social media has reserved in our lives. The following figures clear the air for those who are in oblivion to its importance;</p><ul style="margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal;"><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">Around 2 billion messages are exchanges on Facebook Messenger every month</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">55 billion messages are sent every day through Whatsapp.</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">Facebook has around 1.3 billion active users</li><li style="background-repeat: no-repeat; padding-left: 20px; padding-top: 6px; background-image: url('../images/arrow.png'); background-position: 0px 10px; line-height: 24px;">There are around 1 billion active WhatsApp users</li></ul><p style="font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">If social media has so wide reach, why shan’t we use it for our good? Since people are spending so much time on <a style="color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media</a>, it is but obvious that contacting them over there would generate a good response.</p>		
												<img src="https://newtechiesui.deepdiveinnovations.dev/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/social-messaging-apps.jpg" title="social-messaging-apps" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<p>Moreover, sending messages through these apps could get us immediate responses and would also increase the users’ experience.</p><h2> </h2><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Visual Search</strong></h2>Visual Search is a step-up in the digital world. Now forget the long typing and describing what you want. Just click the picture and the search engine would find all the relevant information regarding that.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />2019 is the high time. Many large businesses like Pinterest have already dived into the pool of Visual Search. With its new advancement named Smart Lens (Visual Search Tool), people can experience their visual search service.		
												<img src="https://newtechiesui.deepdiveinnovations.dev/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/visual-search.jpg" title="visual-search" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<p>Google Lens, the visual search engine by Google can recognize objects, landmarks and other various stuff to provide you with a better experience. All you have to do is click the image of the object with their camera app and BAM! You get the most relevant information for what you have searched for.</p><p>There are other apps as well which can help you with Visual Search through mobile phones.</p><p>Marketers can ace the market and get an edge over the competition by implementing visual search in their websites. It could especially reap a good fortune in e-commerce websites.</p><h2> </h2><h2 style="margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Voice Search and Smart Speakers</strong></h2>The velocity of today’s world has become so fast that no one considers stopping for a moment and writing the whole thing they are searching for. Instead, they prefer the actions to be taken on their voice. That is where voice search comes to rescue.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Voice Search mechanism is getting implemented in many sites and apps. With its increasing importance, businesses now have been compelled to reformulate their strategies.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />With the blessing of artificial intelligence, we could get specified results with command of our voice only. Voice assistants like Siri, Cortana, Alexa and Google Assistant are getting smarter, leading to committing fewer mistakes.<strong><br /></strong><p> </p>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/voice-search-and-smart-speakers-p7v89cnmk0wfxpsz6fmo55vz3p5alkuvnjpkynblds.jpg" title="voice-search-and-smart-speakers" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<p>Businesses are trying to include the smart speakers in their working as well to ensure efficiency and stay parallel to the running technology.</p><h2> </h2><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Programmatic Advertising</strong></h2>Programmatic advertising could be defined as advertisements run by Artificial Intelligence itself in order to reach a more specific audience. This results in fast and effective automation and tends to increase the conversions and lower customer acquisition costs.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />It has been expected that by the year 2020, 90% of the ads we’ll see would be automated.<strong><br /></strong><p> </p>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/programmatic-advertising-p7v8ni45g89twwjzkiarjialus99mw5qynh8lavm68.jpg" title="programmatic-advertising" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<h2> </h2><h2><strong>Personalization</strong></h2><p>Who wouldn’t like getting the services made personally for him? Our business world of 2019 is revolving pretty much around it. If you want to survive in the digital world, you need to alter your strategies and move on to personalized marketing. This means that you need to have personalized emails, products, contents and many more.</p>		
												<img src="https://newtechiesui.deepdiveinnovations.dev/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/personalization.jpg" title="personalization" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<p>It has been evident from past actions that vendor-client relationship could be strengthened with the help of personalized services.</p>
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong> </strong></h2><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Influencer Marketing</strong></h2>Influencer Marketing is one of the top grossing business promotion strategies. It is like the word-of-mouth. Recently, social media has experienced a good rise in social influencers. These people could be YouTubers, Bloggers or other social media celebrities. These people have a good amount of following and their message is grasped by their followers religiously.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />So, businesses contact these influencers to spread a mass message. The influencers are rising and 2019 seems to be the year of such influencers. These influencers are easy to approach, and they don't charge high bills.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Hence, we can say that Influencer Marketing is the future of Business Promotion.<strong><br /></strong>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/influencer-marketing-p7v90sjzcl752w49b2o85ktwy3tk2h2950j1e5cqv4.jpg" title="influencer-marketing" alt="influencer-marketing" />														
		<h2><strong> </strong></h2><h2><strong>Social Media Stories</strong></h2>Entrepreneurs need to stay parallel to the latest technological advancements. One of the most revolutionary steps taken on <a style="color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media platforms</a> is the introduction of ‘My Stories’.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />This concept was first introduced by Snapchat which was then followed by Instagram and Facebook. Youtube too came up with the same concept named ‘Reels’.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />As the stories appear for only a short period of time, they reap quick and good responses as there always prevails a fear of missing out. By 2019, stories would gain<br /> much importance and businesses are suggested to start their marketing on this platform as well.		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/social-media-stories-p7v93qrpfr0l06qdp0nbmiijvuuo4of6hpaot090qo.jpg" title="social-media-stories" alt="Trends That will Define Future of Digital Marketing in 2019" />														
		<h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong> </strong></h2><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Conclusion</strong></h2><p style="font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">2019 is going to set the benchmarks in the digital world. With ever increasing advancements in the digital world, 2019 is coming with many new opportunities. One just needs to identify the right opportunity and grab it.</p><p>Let Techies Infotech, the <a style="color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">best digital marketing company in Melbourne</a> help you get used to the new technologies and advancements. We have some of the best digital marketers who are good at foreseeing the future trends and make you ready for the changes in advance.</p><p>Meet us and let us help you plan a good future!</p>]]></content:encoded>

							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_yoast_wpseo_content_score]]></wp:meta_key>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How To Rank #1 on Google Search Results]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/rank-number-one-on-google-search-results/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 May 2021 04:15:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2906</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12">
<p class="justify">So hey! Here you are. After long searches and finger taps, you have come to the perfect place where you are going to get an answer to your question “How To Rank #1 on Google Search Results” and all the sub-quest heading under that one question. How to get your site to Number 1 Rank on Google? Is that what you are looking for?

Well then, welcome to the bible of , perhaps a mini bible where you shall be quenching your thirst of long prevailing questions. We shall be digging deeper, and deeper to get the clarity of the facts. You might have heard of . The sole mantra to seduce the first place on the Google ranks.

Let’s get a little known to it.</p>

<h2><strong>What is SEO?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">SEO or <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/seo-service" target="_blank" rel="noopener">search engine optimization</a></strong> is the process to make your content or the site or any webpage friendly to the search engine algorithm so that your content may rise to the high ranks of that particular search engine. Now that if we are talking about search engines, there is just one name that comes to the mind. The Googol or; as we say today The Google. Well, this is just a drop from the ocean which I presented above. It is the overview of what is and what role it plays in the Google rankings. befriends the Google Bots and its algorithms to get the higher ranks.

Pufft! A new word again! The Google Bot. Well, no need to worry as I am here to explain. Just sit back and observe what I want you to and embed it in your workings.</p>

<h2><strong>What is Googlebot?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Let’s know what the Google Bots and Algorithms are what role they play in ranking Factor. GoogleBot is a web crawler used by Google. It is used to find and retrieve web pages. The information gathered by GoogleBot is used to update the Google Index. GoogleBot visits billions of web pages all over the web. A GoogleBot retrieves the content of web pages, notes if the web pages are linked to some other pages, and sends whatever it collects to Google.

Now you might be wondering that what in God’s green earth this Web Crawler or Google Index is. Well, allow me to define the terms to you. Web Crawlers are a type of software designed to stalk links, gather information and send the information collected to Google. However, the Google Index takes the content received from GoogleBot and uses it to rank pages according to the conditions and algorithms of Google. I can smell the doubt you have with the relation of GoogleBot with your website. Well, in order for your web pages to be found on Google, they must be visited by GoogleBot. And in order for your web page to rank on Google, it must be accessible by GoogleBot.</p>

<h2><strong>Basic Introduction to Google Algorithms to let you understand the process of ranking your site on Google</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">There are various Google Algorithms which help your site get the good ranks on search web. Let’s have a look at them and be informed about what their functions are.</p>

<h3>Google Panda</h3>
<p class="justify">This algorithm analyses the content on the web page and evaluates its rank on the web. It also sees if the work is duplicate, plagiarized or has thin content; checks if it is user-generated spam, and also makes sure that keyword stuffing is up to the limits.</p>

<h3>Google Penguin</h3>
<p class="justify">Backlinks keep the websites intact. Google Penguin checks the backlinks and verifies if it is from a secured source or not. It also looks for the spammy or irrelevant links and the links with over-optimized anchor texts.</p>

<h3>Google Pigeon and Google Possum</h3>
<p class="justify">These 2 algorithms analyze the location wise search and see if the content is capable enough to rank even on the local search results or not. Pigeon work on those searches in which the user’s location plays an important role. The recent update has created nearer ties between local algorithms and the core algorithms i.e. traditional factors are now used to rank local results. Possum helps search a physical place near your location.</p>

<h3>Google Hummingbird</h3>
<p class="justify">Keywords aren’t everything. Maybe the best content isn’t keyword friendly or maybe the best keyword-friendly content isn’t what you are looking for. Google Hummingbird understands the intention of the searcher and brings out the relevant content.</p>

<h3>Google RankBrain</h3>
<p class="justify">It is like the artificial intelligence of Google. It uses its intelligence to rank the content on Google. It evaluates if the content is good enough to go on the first pages of Google.</p>

<h3>Google Fred</h3>
<p class="justify">The world is full of hackers and frauds. But Google knows not to spare them even for a while. And that’s where Google Fred comes to help. It helps detect Black Hat and block the source so that it won’t happen again. Not only this, but it also checks the Google ads and sees if the quality of content is up to the mark or not.</p>

<h3>Google Mobile Friendly</h3>
<p class="justify">Come on! Who isn’t on the mobiles today? Google ought to be there as well. Google strives to make the sites <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">mobile friendly</a></strong> and hence has recently launched the initiation of mobile first as well.</p>
Now let’s come back to the question.
<h2><strong>How should we optimize our website to rank it higher?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">This is a step by step process wherein you can’t jump or skip. Before starting with optimization, you first need to get a proper analysis or what is there in your website and where does it rank. So, there are many tools which can help you with that. Some of them could be tools like site checkup, iwebchk, Moz etc. These tools would help you know what weaknesses of your site are and how to remove them. There are some other tools as well which would guide you on how to do a good keyword research and how to stuff those keywords in the content. Some of such tools could be Google Adword Keyword Planner, keyword.io etc.

Techies Infotech is the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">company in melbourne</a></strong> having years of experiences befriending Google algorithms. Hence, it provides a free Analysis for your website as well. Call our experts today and see where do you stand and how good our help can be. After analyzing, the optimization part comes. Let’s start with the On-Page Optimization. In On-Page Optimization, we need to take care of some things.</p>

<h2><strong>Meta Tag Optimization</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Meta tags are tit-bits of the text used to describe a page’s content. These do not appear on the site but are included in the Google codes. Hence you need to choose the best of the best keywords for your meta tags as these solely would define your webpage.</p>

<h3>Meta Title</h3>
<p class="justify">Your title is the first to come in view of the viewer and the Google itself. Make sure it is stuffed with the keywords. The keywords should be stuffed in such a way that it compels the viewer to get to your site.</p>

<h3>Meta Description</h3>
<p class="justify">The richer your Meta description, the better is your optimization. Keep it in mind that Meta Description should wholesomely be keyword stuffed. The description you are writing should be very much compelling. It should trigger the reflexes of the person to view the site at first glance.

<strong>Some more points you need to keep in mind are:</strong></p>

<h3>Robots.txt</h3>
<p class="justify">This extension instructs GoogleBot on which page to crawl and which page to not. Hence, your ranking would wholesomely depend upon the pages you allow GoogleBot to crawl. And for the same, you need to upload your robot.txt file on your site.</p>

<h3>Sitemap.xml</h3>
<p class="justify">It is like a file which stores all the URLs of the site. It helps Google to crawl all the URLs of the site more efficiently. You need to upload a sitemap.xml file on your site to help Google do the same.</p>

<h3>Alt tag fixings</h3>
<p class="justify">Basically, Google doesn’t understand images but it can read the alt text which would explain what the image is all about. Hence, you ought to be careful while you write alt text.</p>

<h3>Unique content grammatically correct</h3>
<p class="justify">Make sure that the content you write is user-friendly, grammatically correct and not too much keyword stuffed.</p>

<h3>Making website mobile friendly</h3>
<p class="justify">With Google’s initiations of Mobile First, algorithms are now giving weight to the sites which are mobile friendly.</p>

<h2><strong>Canonicalization Fixing</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">The world is going fast and seeks the shortcuts. People want to search your site just with your name. They don’t want to waste their time over HTTP// or www. Here is where canonicalization helps. It optimizes your site to be reachable even without adding these words and would still redirect you to the same URL and Google won’t consider it to be a duplicate page. Through canonicalization, Google would consider a URL with www, HTTP or both or none as a single page. If we use canonicalization fixing, we use this code in .htaccess file of the site:</p>

<blockquote><em><strong><q>RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST}^www.example.com$
RewriteRule ^/?$ "http://example.com/" [R=301,L]</q></strong></em></blockquote>
<h3>Correct Website URL structure</h3>
<p class="justify">Google likes everything clean and at a place. It wants a clear path to where your page is. No stories; nothing at all. Hence you need to carefully write your web address for various web pages. The URL structure needs to be understandable.</p>

<h2><strong>Make your website load Fast</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Viewers too like only those sites which are fast to load, and Google prioritizes the customer experience. Analyze the speed of your web page with Google Speed Check and follow the rules to make it faster. As faster the site, better the customer experience and better is the ranking.</p>

<h3>Optimize images</h3>
<p class="justify">As told before, Google can’t read the images, but can surely read the alt text provided along. Hence optimize the alt tags wisely and it would befriend the Google Algorithms. Also, compress the size of the image so that it is easy to load and increase the website speed.</p>

<h3>Increase Site Speeds</h3>
<p class="justify"><strong>Minify JavaScript, CSS, and HTML</strong> - By reducing the code sizes and by combining all the codes, you can make your page load faster. This further means high preferability by customers and by Google.

<strong>Use gzip compression -</strong> Increase or decrease the size of .htaccess code page so that loading speed reduces. Through this, the size of the page gets reduced by almost 70%. This, in turn, would increase the customer preferability and further your page might come in the good books of Google.

The code used in gzip compression is given below. One needs to copy such code in .htaccess file.</p>

<blockquote>&lt;ifModule mod_gzip.c&gt;
mod_gzip_on Yes
mod_gzip_dechunk Yes
mod_gzip_item_include file .(html?|txt|css|js|php|pl)$
mod_gzip_item_include handler ^cgi-script$
mod_gzip_item_include mime ^text/.*
mod_gzip_item_include mime ^application/x-javascript.*
mod_gzip_item_exclude mime ^image/.*
mod_gzip_item_exclude rspheader ^Content-Encoding:.gzip.
&lt;/ifModule&gt;</blockquote>
<strong>Page Cache -</strong> Make your page in such a way that it can store the offline cache so that when a viewer hits the back button, he can view the same content eliminating the loading time.This can be done through the following code placed in .htaccess file.
<blockquote>&lt;ifModule mod_headers.c&gt;
# YEAR
&lt;FilesMatch ".(ico|gif|jpg|jpeg|png|flv|pdf)$"&gt;
Header set Cache-Control "max-age=29030400"
&lt;/FilesMatch&gt;

# WEEK
&lt;FilesMatch ".(js|css|swf)$"&gt;
Header set Cache-Control "max-age=604800"
&lt;/FilesMatch&gt;

# 45 MIN
&lt;FilesMatch ".(html|htm|txt)$"&gt;
Header set Cache-Control "max-age=2700"
&lt;/FilesMatch&gt;
&lt;/ifModule&gt;</blockquote>
<strong>Header Expiration Session -</strong> Usually when the page is refreshed, its header expires. Optimizing header expiration session would help to increase the expiration limit to some extent of time. Following code is used in this regard. (in .htaccess file)
<blockquote>
# BEGIN Expire headers
&lt;ifModule mod_expires.c&gt;
ExpiresActive On
ExpiresDefault "access plus 5 seconds"
ExpiresByType image/x-icon "access plus 2592000 seconds"
ExpiresByType image/jpeg "access plus 2592000 seconds"
ExpiresByType image/png "access plus 2592000 seconds"
ExpiresByType image/gif "access plus 2592000 seconds"
ExpiresByType application/x-shockwave-flash "access plus 2592000 seconds"
ExpiresByType text/css "access plus 604800 seconds"
ExpiresByType text/javascript "access plus 216000 seconds"
ExpiresByType application/javascript "access plus 216000 seconds"
ExpiresByType application/x-javascript "access plus 216000 seconds"
ExpiresByType text/html "access plus 600 seconds"
ExpiresByType application/xhtml+xml "access plus 600 seconds"
&lt;/ifModule&gt;
# END Expire headers</blockquote>
<h2><strong>Implement Rich Cards in your Website</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">The better the design of the site, the more is the customer involvement. Use the rich cards to give some extra designs to the <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/lead-generation-with-google-my-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">business page of Google</a></strong> and make your business more compelling. Not only this, but it also improves the business appearance on Google.</p>

<h3>Breadcrumbs Rich Card</h3>
<p class="justify">This word might look familiar to you. Basically, breadcrumbs help Google know the path of the content easily. This further helps for better site navigation.</p>

<h3>Local Business Page Rich Card</h3>
<p class="justify">You can change your appearance on the local business page using the rich cards and can even link your social media handles over it.</p>

<h3>Reviews Rich Card</h3>
<p class="justify">Reviews can be embedded in the rich cards to show how good the business is doing. You can show your reviews through ranking in between 1 to 5.</p>

<h3>Products or Services Rich Card</h3>
<p class="justify">Add all your products and services along with the images to embed it in rich cards. So, when a customer searches for the product or service you provide, your rich cards would be shown on top of the google search results.</p>

<h3>Article / Blog Rich Card</h3>
<p class="justify">Keep uploading regular articles to your site. This would improve the keyword growth and would increase your involvement on the web. Try answering most asked questions through your blogs or articles. This would help in the long run. These too can be used as rich cards to show in the top of google search results.</p>

<h2><strong>Backlinking</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Include Backlinking to your site. This would make the site intact and may help people know in addition to what they are looking for. Now, we know that what should be done to get the site to top. However, there are some things which you should avoid doing. If you pursue these things, Google might not like it and instead of taking you to high growths, may just ban or block you from the web. Let’s see what these things are:</p>

<h2><strong>Black Hat</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Black Hat or Hacked is what Google hates. If Google gets to know that there is something fishy about the it might just ban your site from even showing on the web.</p>

<h3>Hidden Content</h3>
<p class="justify">Google doesn’t like anything hidden. You ought to disclose everything else Google might create a problem for you.</p>

<h3>Keyword Stuffing</h3>
<p class="justify">Stuff the keywords in such a way that they do not seem to be forced into the content. There is a limit to use a particular keyword. You ought to stay in those limits while stuffing.</p>

<h3>Cloaking and Doorway Pages</h3>
<p class="justify">This is a type of Black Head wherein Google is shown some other page but when it is clicked, the user gets directed to some other page. This can affect your site and Google may even block it or put it in spam.

Techies Infotech is the best agency in Australia which can help you with Google Rankings. With almost a decade of experience, we have helped our global clientele climb the stairs of Google Rank 1. We have the skilled personnel to help you with your site-building and optimization. Reach us now and we shall together have a voyage to the higher levels.</p>

</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Top SEO Benefits of Responsive Web Design]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 31 May 2021 04:06:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2933</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">With acclivitous web trends, having a good and responsive web design isn't just a luxury but has become a necessity. Moreover, making a site mobile friendly is not just an alternative but a requisite for every business having an online presence.

A recent study has shown that more than 65% of web traffic comes from mobile devices like smartphones and tablets. The research even demonstrated the figure of around 55% people not getting a good mobile web experience and out of those, an appropriation of 90% people preferred not to make further plans with the brands having poor mobile performance.</p>

<h2><strong>How does web design connect with SEO?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Web design was just another fish in the pond to attract the fishers of information until the Google talked about its initiative of ‘Mobile First Index’. But now, web designs are as important as it were never before. Your site ranking, your <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/seo-service">SEO</a> grandness and everything else, now depends upon the designs you make for the mobile optimization.

Making the grounds clear, let’s pace up to what we are here to talk about.</p>

<h2><strong>Top SEO Benefits of Responsive Web Design</strong></h2>
<h3>Level Up for Mobile-First Index</h3>
<p class="justify">Responsive web designs were not that important until April 2018. As on that date, Google implemented the policy of ranking the sites on the basis of their mobile friendliness. Yes, now the responsive web designs are as important as <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/seo-benefits-for-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>search engine optimization</strong></a> and prime content. This means that if your site is not good to go for mobiles along with the equal content, then you might have to face the music while rankings.</p>

<h3>Never underestimate the User Experience</h3>
<p class="justify">A customer is King! It's the slogan of today's business world. Your customer isn't happy; it isn't late when you'd be kicked from your own throne. A responsive <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/web-design-and-development.html"><strong>web design</strong></a> pleases the eyes, favors the mobiles and pacifies the Google Norms. So, tighten up your reigns and make your site up to the mark and ace all the algorithms Google sets to rank up.</p>

<h3 class="justify">Cut off the Duplicity</h3>
<p class="justify">Don’t get yourself wrong, but a lot many companies use both ‘desktop’ and ‘mobile’ versions to maintain their online presence. While doing such, developers make different but identical URLs. For instance, xyz.com, m.xyz.com Now here, we can understand that former URL is for desktop version and latter for the mobile version. But Google bots would consider those 2 different sites of different ventures and can impose high penalties for plagiarism. In this case, techniques of Mobile First come to rescue where you could simply design both the versions under the same URL.</p>

<h3>Gear Up the Loading Speed</h3>
<p class="justify">The extrapolations say that around 72% of people decide not to jaunt your site if they face loading delays and troubles. If your site takes more than 3 seconds to load, then My Dear, you are in a problem. Google’s algorithms also include the speed testing and loading timers. If you fail the standards, bury your dream of getting the top ranks.

Your site speeds are directly proportional to the customer experience and their likability to visit your site again.

As an optimistic businessman, you would definitely want your site to work well on both the desktops and phones. But do make sure that your site is responsive even on the moderate 3G and 2G phones.</p>

<h3 class="justify">Bring Down the Bounce Rate</h3>
<p class="justify">How the user sees your website matters a lot. Make sure that you provide the best experience to the user. Because Google itself calculates your site according to the experience you provide.

As plowed earlier, most of the people use internet through their mobile phones and if you aren’t providing good mobile experience, you are in a hell lot of trouble.

If the user doesn’t find relevant information from your site, he might leave it hence increasing your bounce rate (how fast the user leaves your site). The quicker they leave, the higher the bounce rate is. A properly optimized mobile site with engaging and presentable information would surely pull the seekers and make them stay at your site for longer.</p>

<h2><strong>Final Comments</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Techies Infotech is the SEO Company in Australia offering high-end services in Web Design and Development. Always keeping itself updated with latest trends, this <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/"><strong>Best SEO Company in Melbourne</strong></a> is always available to aid your web presence to make it more promising, dominant and in the good rankings with years of successful experience.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to take Business to Top of Local Search Results]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/business-to-top-of-local-search-results/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 01 Jun 2021 04:39:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2936</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[World today has become compact enough to fit in few taps of screens and a few clicks of the mouse. The technological advancements have now made the other end of the world close to our window panes. Just a few words and BAM! we are on another horizon.

In this steadily shrinking world, it is now much more essential to stay on the top. Else the time won’t be far when you are crushed beneath the top going hoard. Preceding the desktop clicks, mobile phone taps have now taken a crucial position on search engines.

Google now prioritizes the mobile clicks for <a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong>search engine optimization</strong> </a>as these have increased on a long go.

For local businesses, each mobile click takes them a step ahead to get on the top of local search engines. Who doesn’t want to be the first one to be looked on google? Who doesn’t want his/her business to be visited by a hoard of mass? I guess everyone would.

So, what to wait for! Let’s look on to what takes to be on the first of local search results. Have a read to it and let’s get what we want.
<h2><strong>View the Reviews</strong></h2>
Reviews matter a ton in businesses. They not only provide feedback but also generate the SEO favorability of the business. When surveyed people to if they relied on online and offline reviews, the extrapolations came out to be at around 80%. There is a list of ways to get the reviews. You can get a system from scratch, buy review and reputation management software suites, you can also seek aid from online review management services.

<img title="view-the-reviews" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/view-the-reviews-p80arg23c3b72wgwkzysif93j810vy7u7z60pbx3pc.png" alt="How to take Business to Top of Local Search Results" />

Keep it in mind! You need to get genuine reviews on at least 2 web platforms viz. Facebook and Google My Business. On Facebook, because it is always in the talks. Businesses have been through a long run on this <a style="font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Social Media Platform</a>. And Google My Business because indirectly google monitors your business growth through this platform. This means that getting good reviews and rankings on these would gradually increase your local search ranking.
<p style="letter-spacing: 0.28px;">So, what are you waiting for? Ask your customers to give sweet feedback for you on the internet too.</p>

<h2><strong>Google me up on Google My Business</strong></h2>
Google My business has to be given the credit for being the basic necessity to take the business to online heights. Still, it's the matter of sadness that many people do not understand its worth and ruthlessly fail in front of their aspirations. The pack you get to see on the top of the local search is basically driven from Google My Business only.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Google actually takes you through the whole process of digital placing and ranking. Google isn't wholly digital. There is a physical process too. To verify your business, Google sends a code to you by post which you have to enter online to complete the process.

<img title="google-me-up-on-google-my-business" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/google-me-up-on-google-my-business-p80bftzbb422g2r4zvuyxsnfzq3gm3g7mofi9ys268.png" alt="How to take Business to Top of Local Search Results" />

You need to <a style="transition-property: all; color: #007bff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/lead-generation-with-google-my-business.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">optimize your listing</a> far better than you are thinking of. Your listing also depends upon your place of business, the competitors along and the strategies they are using. So ensure to be with the best strategies if you want to win this game.
<h2><strong>Direct yourself to other online listings and directories</strong></h2>
Efforts are never ending and there is always room for improvement. Google my business is an online directory. Similar is Bing for Business. There are many such online directories which may vary from place to place and type of business you are into. The better you get into listings of these directories, better are the chances to rank up in local SEO. The best way to find the appropriate directory is to simply search for the relevant product on Google or Bing; it would itself show the appropriations.

<img title="listings-and-directories" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/listings-and-directories-p80bttst6p2u09wedr1nqrkc4535t5cq7n2g3alh4w.png" alt="How to take Business to Top of Local Search Results" />

Keep in mind to always remain consistent with the information on all the directories. Master the Google and Bing information and add same information to other directories. It is suggested to keep the Name, Address and Phone Number (NAP) same in all the directories. If any changes required be, keep a track on all the directories and bring the same changes.
<h2><strong>Mark your words with Structured Data Markup</strong></h2>
When it comes to getting higher Search Engine Results Positions, Google always recommends editing your content according to Structured Data Markup. Schema.org stands to be the best example of Structured Data Markup. Schema works to make information easier for google bot to understand. The more it understands, the more it finds easier to publish on web searches. Hence, results from schema always tend to be preferred by Google.

<img title="structured-data-markup" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/structured-data-markup-p80c5mnw7o0bc5x717nl7avmvo8z9ivrfty0bt8q9s.png" alt="structured-data-markup" />

As writing such codes is no easy task for a layman, Google provides several tools to ease up the work. It offers a tool to check structured data to hunt for any errors. This may help businesses to get their work published without any flaws. It even avails a tool which makes the coding easier with the assistance of a bot.
<h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Tag yourselves to Title Tags, Meta Tags, and NAPWs</strong></h2>
With all the hullabaloos of SEO and keywords, many of you would have forgotten the basic thing. ‘THE TAGS!’ What’s the fun of buying a car which you don’t even know how to drive? Similar is the situation with our tags. There is no fun of using keywords if you do not have satisfying tags.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />Titles and Meta Descriptions are good advertising agents for your website. These not only tell what the company is about but also tells about the page we are looking at. Hence, it is necessary to stuff these contents with good tags to gear up the search rank.

<img title="meta-tags-and-napws" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/meta-tags-and-napws-p80cgc1q1qo0vsvpumao0ncfc1vrgk3f1x8x7tv7cw.jpg" alt="How to take Business to Top of Local Search Results" />

Name, Address, Phone Number and Website (NAPW) are essential pillars of a website and business. You should tie a knot in your mind to always remain consistent with this information. These are even more important than Tags for being the top negative rating factor for local SEO. Most people do not understand the importance of keeping NAPW consistent over various online platforms and end up being blurred on the search engines.

Techies Infotech in Australia offers best services in making your business clearly visible on local search results. Being one of the most experienced <a style="color: #007bff; background-color: #ffffff; touch-action: manipulation; outline: solid 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agency in Melbourne</a>, it has a wonderful experience of what it takes to be on the top and understands that if something doesn’t appear on the first page, it doesn’t exist at all.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" /><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;" />So, grab your phone and contact us, put on your boots and visit us or simply plug into web and log on to us. We shall find a delight to help you.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[[{"id":"849e9d7","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"f48a033"}]},"elements":[{"id":"c19f336","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"b1702d0","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p>World today has become compact enough to fit in few taps of screens and a few clicks of the mouse. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Questions to ask before hiring a Website Design and Development Agency]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/website-design-and-development-agency/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 01 Jun 2021 05:21:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2950</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">Business today is not just confined to 4 walls of a building or some piles of files but has expanded to the universe of the web over terabytes of data. The world today has no place for naïve deeds. The era demands the skills, the specialization and the perfection in every sphere.</p>
All the efforts drain to oblivion if the world isn't aware of your existence. To be on a roller coaster which goes only high, you need to have an aggressive Digital Marketing and Website Design &amp; Development Team.

Hiring a&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><b>Website Design and Development Agency</b></a>&nbsp;is no different from hiring a new employee. You need to be fully aware of what the agency has to serve and what are you going to feast on.

Given below are the 5 most important questions to ask before hiring a web design and development agency. These questions have been framed after proper experimentations so that you may feel confident and hold a concrete agendum while in an interrogatory meeting. So sit back and feast on what we have to serve you.
<h2><strong>What services do you offer?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Most of the website design teams offer ample services like graphic designing, content writing, digital marketing over the specialization for SEO optimization and social media.</p>

<ul class="blog_archieve">
 	<li>Make sure that the team you are selecting is well synchronized with its words and graphics.</li>
 	<li>Make sure they understand the customer’s requirements and weave a website which could take the company to heights.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Would I be able to peep into the working?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">It is a vantage for a firm to look into the working of the agency on its project. This way, a company can provide a personal touch to the final product and the risk of heavy changes may reduce at the end.</p>

<ul class="blog_archieve">
 	<li>Some agencies go on to extra miles by providing the drafts to the firms and asking them for any amendments required</li>
 	<li>While there are some agencies which keep the firms in total oblivion and present just the final product. Such types of agencies are more vulnerable to faults and dissatisfactions.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Would I have the power to make updates?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">We all know that business works in a dynamic atmosphere where conditions change in a fraction of second. To make the mass aware of such policies, a website would definitely need the updates.</p>

<ul class="blog_archieve">
 	<li>Now, some agencies allow you to make future updates or minor changes through your own website management system.</li>
 	<li>But there are some companies which are the antonym to the previous ones. They make changes themselves with a stake of a minor fee.</li>
 	<li>You need to be well versed with the type of agency you are dealing with so that no future conflicts arise and both firm and agency go parallel.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Would the search engine befriend my site?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">The primary target of a firm is to grow globally. A top-notch website lends a helping hand to achieve this goal. Now the question arises that "How to make a Top Notch Website?" SEO keywords are the highest priority if we are talking to take the site to the trending list.</p>

<ul class="blog_archieve">
 	<li>The site must be composed of the latest algorithms and standards and woven in such a way that when a customer searches for anything, your site is listed in the top players</li>
 	<li>Make sure that the agency you are hiring offers <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/seo-service">SEO services</a> and has super skilled staff for SEO Specialization.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>How do they measure the growth?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">A website is a full magazine arm which helps you hit the bull’s eye of success.</p>

<ul class="blog_archieve">
 	<li>You should have proper knowledge of how the agency keeps the check on the market value of its clients.</li>
 	<li>How it measures their growth rate.</li>
 	<li>Have a research on its previous clients' bounce rate, traffic, keyword ranking etc. to get a clear image of the agency.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Who are we?</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">We are one of the best Website Design and Development Agencies in Melbourne offering the services varying from Content Writing to Graphic Designing; from Digital Marketing to Social Media Handling and from Creativity Skills to SEO Specialization. With Top Notch Technology and Technical Knowhow, we have never failed to satisfy the customers with the services we offer.</p>
Have a look at our&nbsp;<a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/portfolio.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><b>Web Designing Portfolio</b></a>&nbsp;Or pay us a visit at
<h4>16 Greenaway Terrace Cranbourne East Victoria 3977</h4>
Want to talk to us personally? Ring us anytime at
<h4>+61 450 000 023</h4>
<h4>“Eveready to Serve Eveready to Grow”</h4>]]></content:encoded>
