					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Company]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/five-tips-for-hiring-a-great-video-production-company/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 May 2021 04:10:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2862</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">If you are looking for a successful marketing strategy, then you should understand the vitality of infusing it with videos. However, there are a number of marketers who are still unaware of this marketing strategy. Consequently, they have no clue as in, which companies to approach and how to go about the process of picking a professional <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/video-production.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">video production company in Melbourne</a></strong> who could consider their brand’s needs.

Therefore, if you are one from the league or even a regular practitioner of this technique, you should run down these essential 5 tips when hiring a great video production company:</p>

<h2><strong>Consider the goal of producing video</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Firstly, you should understand the purpose of creating the video. The reasons can be varied. Sometimes, you might be creating a video to make your audience learn how to employ your product. You can also compile a video to promote your latest products and services. Moreover, videos can be used to acknowledge people about your upcoming events, or for any other business-oriented task.

Hence, either of the reasons outlines the content and style to be adopted while video production. Subsequently, here arises the need and perks of hiring a great video production company at the earliest of the stage. This is because; they are professional enough to understand what would work and not work to serve the purpose of your video.</p>

<h2><strong>Possess a view that can be shared, adapted and executed</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">The other best perk of hiring a professional video production company is they can steer you on how to create a video that best suits your vision, budget and time constraints. For instance, you are a newborn products’ brand. You hold expertise in crafting newborn baby products. In the same way, when you engage a video production company that undertakes your promotional tasks through creating videos.

They too are specialists in their job, addressing the best ideas and ways to communicate and execute your vision to your audience. Subsequently, feel free to share your ideas with these companies and open enough to welcome and adapt the techniques advanced by them. Moreover, you should also be realistic when defining your budget cap and time constraints. Since video production is all about planning, scheduling and budgeting the appropriate resources in order to perform best. Hence, employing the team earlier in this process, the better the result you will achieve.</p>

<h2><strong>Consistency in your idea and final goal</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Altering your core idea in the midst of the execution of the video, only make your video less productive. Therefore, you should take adequate time to visualize, understand and plan your idea and goal prior to sending out it to the video production team to capture and edit.

In case you avoid taking this step, you will not only face off budget issues but also deliver you a result you were not intending to receive. Consequently, maintaining the consistency in your plan throughout the process. Furthermore, if at any point of the process you feel the need of either adding or subtracting anything from the initial plan, just ensure that your resources are rescheduled accordingly and the changes intended should only aim for a better video as compared to the earlier anticipation.</p>

<div class="h10"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/video-production-company-2.jpg" alt="5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Company" /></div>
<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Hire the appropriate video production company pertaining to your vision</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">The market is swelled with video professionals. You will find a variety of them, which comprises of those who just focus more on the story, others who will focus just on making a video look amazing, and also those who will work on both the aspects. A few of them addresses coverage rather than creativity, while others are more creative and cinematic in their approach. So, you should be quite selective while hiring one, taking your vision into consideration.

Try and be specific in hiring when hiring a professional, calculating him on the skills and style required bringing out the best of your vision. For instance, if you find that some company is good at producing comic videos and you are looking for a <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">comic commercial or product video</a></strong>, then it is best to go with it.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<h2><strong>Be Proactive and Push your team to the limits</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Now, that you are hiring a professional video production company to deliver you with the best results that cannot be achieved by you of your own. Therefore, you should ensure yourself to go through various trials if your team could not deliver you what you demanded in one go. The best way is to speak to them. Make them learn your thoughts and concerns clearly and logically. Advance the directions that can be implemented rather confusing. Hopefully, these aforementioned tips, listed by Techies Infotech will aid you as a marketer or a company in reaping maximum rewards through video promotions.

As one of the best video production companies in Melbourne, Australia we understand and translate your ideas on screen, the way you want. Pertaining to our expertise in video production, feel free to inquire us about anything relates to this service. We are more than happy to assist you with our proficiency.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/video-production-company-3.jpg" alt="5 Tips for Hiring a Great Video Production Company" /></div>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[15 Social Media Strategies to Grow Your Online Sales]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 27 May 2021 04:46:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2865</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12" data-wow-duration="1s">
<p class="justify">With the gradual invasion of Social Media into our lives, the challenge to grow online sales has also become inevitable for every business. Many of you might be standing at the crossroads, thinking where to begin and how to emerge victorious, in this highly competitive world of e-commerce sites.</p>
<p class="justify">The escalation in e-commerce has made it even more challenging to lure visitors required to boost online sales. With the ever-evolving social media marketing trends, traditional marketing has taken a back seat and has been replaced by a way of revolutionized marketing strategies. Therefore, this article showcases the best social media strategies to grow your online sales, for sure. So, let’s quickly sail through these amazing social media marketing strategies.</p>

<h2><strong>15 Social Media Strategies</strong></h2>
<h3><strong>Consistency in Posting Persuasive Content</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Staying consistent in posting influential content on social media is one of tried and tested ways to boost your volume of followers. However, studies suggest that you should ensure your tempo for your brand since the audience is quite responsive to the frequent posts. Moreover, you can also draw a comparison between your frequency of posts and engagement rates to your competitors.</p>

<h3><strong>Feed the Social Feeds with Micro-Content</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">While drafting the content for social feeds, you should consider the context employed by the users to browse social media. You might have witnessed people surfing social media in-between other tasks. For instance when they are on their mobiles during commutation, or while taking a short break between their work schedules. This is the major reason why you should opt for bite-sized content to enrapture your audience. This social media strategy works wonders in boosting your online sales.</p>

<h3><strong>Conduct a Twitter Chat with your audience</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">As a matter of fact, engagement is vital to keep your online audience active and contended. And to keep this going, what’s better than Twitter Chat. It not only enhances your followers but also grows your online sales. You can host this chat in either way. Firstly you can co-host Twitter Chat, where you are allowed to access the existing audience. Secondly, you can start your own chat, where you will have to put an extra effort into its promotion. Gradually, the Twitter Chat will permit you to establish your brand as an authority.</p>

<h3><strong>Facilitate the sharing of products</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">If you are looking to grow your online sales by making your site viral, then there is nothing better than facilitating your audience with share buttons on your social media. Ensure that the share buttons are easily discoverable by the users.</p>

<h3><strong>Stay alert on appropriate #hashtags</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Over a period of time, hashtags have emerged successful in the social web in order to simplify the relevancy of the posts and participation in the discussions and events. For instance, you are a fashion brand. Therefore, you should consider tweeting, covering high profile events and even commenting on the celebrity styles with relevant <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/easy-way-to-use-hashtag.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">hashtags to your brand</a></strong>. You can discover, retweet and reply to the posts under the relevant hashtags. This strategy will help you stay active and boost your online presence.</p>

<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales-2.jpg" alt="15 Social Media Strategies to Grow Your Online Sales" /></div>
<h3><strong>Affiliate your Post to the trending theme</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Another way to maximize your reach is by affiliating your post with the trends that are currently relevant. If you stay updated with the relevant hashtags and news, you are likely to seize an opportunity to put forth your views in the trending topics.</p>

<h3><strong>Subsidize with Infographics</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Employing professionally crafted infographics, are certain to drive traffic and build backlinks, which helps you <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/search-engine-optimization.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">boost your ranking in major SEOs</a></strong>. Quality infographics are designated to promote your ranking (SERP), which further helps you grow your online sales.</p>

<h3><strong>Establish Interactive Content like quizzes</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">The idea of introducing quizzes and other interactive content plays an important role in engaging and promoting your brand on social media platforms. These interactive pieces of content compel the quiz-takers to share their results on the social web. However, to steer this engagement, you are required to produce contests and quizzes that are oriented towards displaying some exciting information about the participant, which further induces him to share the results.</p>

<h3><strong>Place your best posts on the top of your profile</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Building an effective social profile not only enhances your social presence but also help you build your brand. You also hold a chance to drive your visitors to your social profile and make them click through your site or content. Make sure that you use every feature at your disposal, so as to let your profile signify your desires and channels the clicks where you want. Some activities like updating your cover photos, captioning them with eye catchy lines, infusing backlinks into your profile etc. can help you build your brand on social media. Moreover, you can place your already established posts to drive more traffic and get more conversions.</p>

<h3><strong>Elaborate your Pinterest with Complementary Board</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">The greatest way of offering additional value to your clients is by supplying them the information and offers on your brand’s complementary products that you do not promote otherwise. For instance, if you own a sportswear store, selling hiking shoes, then you can create an additional Pinterest Board where you can feature relevant items like sunscreen, backpacks, etc. In this way, the other brands and sites promoted by you will consider the incoming traffic from your Pinterest profile. Subsequently, they may even adopt a similar strategy to direct back the traffic your way.</p>

<div class="h20"></div>
<div align="center"><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales-3.jpg" alt="15 Social Media Strategies to Grow Your Online Sales" /></div>
<h3><strong>Empower Your Instagram with Shopping Option</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">On one hand, where linking on Instagram is looked upon as a challenge by brands, on the other, it becomes even harder when they are directed towards driving traffic and getting conversions. Therefore, <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/easy-way-to-use-hashtag.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Instagram posts</a></strong> and stories work miracles in boosting online sales. All you have to do is just put product tags on your product photos. The users can then click on these tags, to discover the cost and other details of the product, making it possible for them to make the purchases. Hence, this is one of the most effective strategies to compound Instagram and E-commerce.</p>

<h3><strong>Create or Join a Facebook Group</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Facebook groups are online clusters that are available to Facebook users to participate in. These groups operate on ideas of common interests. Therefore, you should join or create a group relevant to your industry and targeted audience. There is a standard methodology to be adopted to grow your sales through these groups. Initially, you should just join the group and not consider selling your products. Gradually, build your relations and set up your credibility in the group. Once you do that, you are good to promote your products and generate sales.</p>

<h3><strong>Check for the retargeted ads</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">With the increased competition in gaining traction in the News Feed organically, the business pages have inclined towards paid retargeted ads on social media. Besides this, you also enjoy control over the viewers who can see your content in contrast to the limited existing audience through your organic efforts. However, when you run retargeted ads, you address the already visited users. Therefore, these ads can be customized pertaining to their behavior.</p>

<h3><strong>Inaugurate a Facebook Shop</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Were you ever aware of selling your products directly via Facebook? You can operate a brand new sales channel on Facebook by adding the shop section to your respective business page. This introduces you to the already existing customers. The Facebook Shop gives the users access to your online store so that they can make the purchases while being within the same platform.</p>

<h3><strong>Host an Influencer Campaign</strong></h3>
<p class="justify">Influencer marketing has developed as a successful online marketing strategy. If you discover a relatable influencer who already possess your target audiences, then you can ask them to assist you in featuring a sponsored post that promotes your brands and products.</p>

<h2><strong>Creativity - the need for Social Media Marketing Strategies</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Effective social media marketing accounts for a lot. Right from curating the content to scheduling the posts related to products and also to automate the profile.

But, establishing a successful social media marketing to grow online sales is way beyond broadcasting your brand. Therefore, Techies Infotech, being one of the trusted brands in <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media marketing in Melbourne</a></strong> that understands the intricacies of this industry. Our expert digital marketers are committed to understand, engage and react to the targeted audience of your business. <a href="https://iamtechie.com/">Techies Infotech</a> are dedicated enough in offering social media marketing services in Australia to help you build your brand and grow your online sales.</p>

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[ekit_post_views_count]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[278]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[wpmm_postgrid_views]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[38]]></wp:meta_value>

		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[litespeed_vpi_list]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:1:{i:0;s:63:"gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==";}]]></wp:meta_value>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/tips-for-writing-google-adwords-ads-for-taxi-industry/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 May 2021 04:54:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2868</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Writing a spellbound Google AdWord ad is no less than a riddle; not just for naive, but for an expert as well. An advertisement should be so compelling that a person just jumps to experience an array of services after seeing just a Google ad. Recent times have witnessed the increase of taxicab companies and many of them have evolved themselves by aligning with Google and other search engines. All goes well, but the person or a company gets to a halt when it comes to writing a Google AdWord ad.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;"><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;">So, worry no more for we have come to end your misery and share the mystery. We have a good number of taxi companies as our worthy clients who have sought fortune with our Google AdWord skills.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;">Let’s get started with the blog.</p>
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><h2><strong>Avoid Blunder, Write Phone Number</strong></h2>
Usually, the leads you seek are in a bit of a hurry. They want something as quick as possible. So, asking them to visit your site would already be too much. Instead of that, you can simply add on your phone number in the description of your ad so that customer may reach you as quick as possible.<br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;"><br style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;">You can also add the call extension feature with your ad and provide another step of comfort to your worthy leads. And don’t forget, you can always add your phone number in the 35-character limited URL display field.<strong><br></strong>
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/avoid-blunder-p7tdx9wyirhoaxi1twq2zwrlgmjydhfzaz7w8jqxog.jpg" title="avoid-blunder" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" />														
		<h2><b>The Secret of Rising is displaying Exact Pricing</b></h2>
<p style="font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">Many times it happens that you get a lead, it contacts you but doesn't get converted due to pricing issues. Hence, it is better to add your pricing in the advertisement itself.</p>
<p>It would sieve out the quality leads, saving the time of both yours and the leads’. It would only allow those people to contact you who can afford your services.</p>
&nbsp;
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/secret-of-rising-p7tdyh5j954v4zr8tfex6lusscmu7k7msx88b9ytq8.jpg" title="secret-of-rising" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" />														
		<h2><strong>Keep it Simple!</strong></h2><p style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;">Where on one hand, writing fancy and artistic lines might look convincing and Shakespearean, but we now know that most of the seekers are in hurry and are not really in a mood to dive to the literary world. Hence, it is better to write a simple text wherein you mention factual points of what customer would like to know; like the pricing, categories etc. s</p><h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Why should you be chosen?</strong></h2>
<p style="font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">There are dozens of cab companies out there. Why should one choose you? Well, you need to be clear with the answer. Most of people prefer handing over the wheels to those who are local and are properly screened. Use the keyword ‘Local’ if you are native to that area, as it may attract more people.</p>
<p>If you offer your services 24*7, it is a good place to advertise that. Emergencies may arise anytime, and cabs are one of the prior needs in such situations. Mark your territory in those times as well by using the keyword ‘24*7’.&nbsp;</p>
&nbsp;
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/chosen-p7tdkwdgjajrfrh83k4x6173vzjz0yb7lpzqre3jls.jpg" title="chosen" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" />														
		<h2><strong>Use your Locations as the Prior Keywords</strong></h2>
<p>Whenever customers look for cabs or taxis online, they tend to use their geolocation in the search. It is highly advised to use your service locations in the ads for they would be the attracting anchors for the seeking leads. Use your locations as the main keywords in headings and descriptions. These would help you set high on google searches.</p>
<gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw><gwmw style="display:none;"></gwmw>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/your-locations-p7tdow6rky0ms3obrsau9iwmrxv4qn655ht16q6b5s.jpg" title="your-locations" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" />														
		<h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>The Keyword Choice</strong></h2>
<p>It should include the geographical area you provide service in. : Most people who are looking for a taxi are usually in a rush and directly aim for the service provider of the same locality who could be familiar with all the routes. Suppose if you are providing a taxi service in Frankston, you can use keywords like</p>
<ul><li>Taxi in Frankston</li><li>Frankston Cab Service</li><li>Frankston taxi Service</li><li>Frankston cab booking, etc.</li></ul><ul>
</ul>		
												<img src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/the-keyword-choice-p7tdzyqc2p67irlf4kknmqc2nbareb4c0aewo1rdvk.jpg" title="the-keyword-choice" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" />														
		<p style="letter-spacing: 0.28px;">Use Zip Codes as keywords: You can even use your zip codes as your authentic keywords. Google has the power to target locations according to zip codes. Customizing google ads with their content with your zip codes may garner a great audience. Taking Frankston as the base, you can use keywords likes</p><ul><li>75763 Taxi</li><li>Taxi near 75763</li><li>Cabs in 75763</li><li>75763 Taxi Service, etc.</li></ul><p style="margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;">Using 75763 zip code as one of the main keywords would help attract more audience and searchers who are searching for the cab services using the zip codes. Use Airport names as pivot keywords: most of the people search cab services for airport pickup and drop-off. Using the airport names as the keywords where you provide pickup and drop-off services can garner good results. For eg.</p><ul><li>Melbourne Airport Taxi Service</li><li>Frankston and Peninsula Airport Shuttle Cab service</li><li>Cabs near Frankston Peninsula Airport, etc.</li></ul><h2><strong>Pay Per Click (PPC) and Return on Investment (ROI)</strong></h2>
Google is nothing about ruthless charging even if your ad is not yielding good results. Google always charges according to the number of clicks. The better the&nbsp;<a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/pay-per-click" target="_blank" rel="noopener">PPC</a>, the better can be the ROI. By showing your Google AdWord ads, Google would try to extract as many clicks as possible. Those clicks could prove to be worthy leads and hence can help in business growth. Google works with the pattern of mutual interest. By setting a generous PPC campaign, Google will prioritize the ad providing benefit to both itself and to you.<strong><br></strong>
<p></p>		
												<img width="350" height="300" src="https://newtechiesui.deepdiveinnovations.dev/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/pay-per-click.jpg" alt="Tips for Writing Google Adwords Ads for Taxi Industry" loading="lazy" srcset="https://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/pay-per-click.jpg 350w, https://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/pay-per-click-300x257.jpg 300w, https://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/pay-per-click-150x129.jpg 150w" sizes="(max-width: 350px) 100vw, 350px" />														
		<p>Well, these are some of the many tips you need to follow while writing Google Google AdWords for the cab industry as they may harness the power to attract a large number of quality leads. These tips to write Google Google AdWord ads for the taxi industry have proven their worth in our long course of business. We have come to the list of top preferences for the cab companies due to our personalized services in digital marketing and running successful ads on search engines such as Google and Bing.</p><p>We are Techies Infotech, the best <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/digital-marketing-solution.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">digital marketing agency in Melbourne</a></strong>. In our long course of service, we have helped many cab companies meet their fortune with our skilled and professional services. If you are looking for perfect aid in digital marketing, we might be the one you are looking for. So, wait no more and reach out to us now!</p>]]></content:encoded>

Emergencies may arise anytime, and cabs are one of the prior needs in such situations. Mark your territory in those times as well by using the keyword \u201824*7\u2019.&nbsp;<\/p>\n<\/div>\n<div>&nbsp;<\/div>\n<gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"61eadfa","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"93a2d93","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"http:\/\/iamtechie.com\/blog\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/05\/chosen.jpg","id":2869},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"350","height":"300"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"db2ff4e","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"c8e0c86"}]},"elements":[{"id":"6ad102f","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"8021484","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"66f2091"}],"structure":"20"},"elements":[{"id":"75f5dd2","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"7f75c3f","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h2><strong>Use your Locations as the Prior Keywords<\/strong><\/h2>\n<p class=\"justify\">Whenever customers look for cabs or taxis online, they tend to use their geolocation in the search. It is highly advised to use your service locations in the ads for they would be the attracting anchors for the seeking leads. Use your locations as the main keywords in headings and descriptions. These would help you set high on google searches.<\/p>\n<gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"f46d57c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"b6d5027","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"http:\/\/iamtechie.com\/blog\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/05\/your-locations.jpg","id":2870},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"350","height":"300"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"20c6dfe","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"4ac71dc"}]},"elements":[{"id":"39e0bca","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"89e6bbf","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"9e167c5"}],"structure":"20"},"elements":[{"id":"30f55e4","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"de38b2d","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h2 style=\"margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;\"><strong>The Keyword Choice<\/strong><\/h2>\n<p class=\"justify\">It should include the geographical area you provide service in. : Most people who are looking for a taxi are usually in a rush and directly aim for the service provider of the same locality who could be familiar with all the routes. Suppose if you are providing a taxi service in Frankston, you can use keywords like<\/p>\n<ul><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Taxi in Frankston<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Frankston Cab Service<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Frankston taxi Service<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Frankston cab booking, etc.<\/span><\/li><\/ul><ul class=\"arrow-list\">\n<\/ul>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"83fbf45","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"b980abc","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"http:\/\/iamtechie.com\/blog\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/05\/the-keyword-choice.jpg","id":2873},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"350","height":"300"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"c32c454","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"27a48eb"}]},"elements":[{"id":"7b89b53","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"a87851e","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<p class=\"justify\" style=\"letter-spacing: 0.28px;\">Use Zip Codes as keywords: You can even use your zip codes as your authentic keywords. Google has the power to target locations according to zip codes. Customizing google ads with their content with your zip codes may garner a great audience. Taking Frankston as the base, you can use keywords likes<\/p><ul><li><span style=\"font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">75763 Taxi<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Taxi near 75763<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Cabs in 75763<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">75763 Taxi Service, etc.<\/span><\/li><\/ul><p class=\"justify\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 28px; color: #757575; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: normal;\">Using 75763 zip code as one of the main keywords would help attract more audience and searchers who are searching for the cab services using the zip codes. Use Airport names as pivot keywords: most of the people search cab services for airport pickup and drop-off. Using the airport names as the keywords where you provide pickup and drop-off services can garner good results. For eg.<\/p><ul><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Melbourne Airport Taxi Service<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Frankston and Peninsula Airport Shuttle Cab service<\/span><\/li><li><span style=\"font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; letter-spacing: 0.02em;\">Cabs near Frankston Peninsula Airport, etc.<\/span><\/li><\/ul>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"b36c4ec","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"8800ff2"}]},"elements":[{"id":"ae37c12","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"421f9ac","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"2bd1bd8"}],"structure":"20"},"elements":[{"id":"e148291","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"3e95188","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h2><strong>Pay Per Click (PPC) and Return on Investment (ROI)<\/strong><\/h2>\n<div><span style=\"color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;\">Google is nothing about ruthless charging even if your ad is not yielding good results. Google always charges according to the number of clicks. The better the&nbsp;<\/span><a href=\"https:\/\/iamtechie.com\/services\/pay-per-click\" target=\"_blank\">PPC<\/a><span style=\"color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;\">, the better can be the ROI. By showing your Google AdWord ads, Google would try to extract as many clicks as possible. Those clicks could prove to be worthy leads and hence can help in business growth. Google works with the pattern of mutual interest. By setting a generous PPC campaign, Google will prioritize the ad providing benefit to both itself and to you.<\/span><strong><br><\/strong><\/div>\n<p><\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"8d7da48","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"f0c1c93","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"http:\/\/iamtechie.com\/blog\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/05\/pay-per-click.jpg","id":2874}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"e5fe4a5","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"e3bad67"}]},"elements":[{"id":"853f9f0","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"832ca5c","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<div class=\"row\"><div class=\"col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12 wow fadeInRight\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\"><p class=\"justify\"><span style=\"color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;\">Well, these are some of the many tips you need to follow while writing Google Google AdWords for the cab industry as they may harness the power to attract a large number of quality leads. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Future of Web Development - 5 Design & Development Trends in 2019]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/future-of-web-development-five-design-and-development-trends-in-2019/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 May 2021 05:18:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2887</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[In the dynamic arena of the online world, nothing seems stable. The web development, which is an integral part of the online world keeps on changing according to the latest trends, fashion, tastes and preferences. With the upcoming of the year 2019, a lot has been stirred in the recipe of web design.

Let’s now look at what changes have been brought up in the world of <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/web-design-and-development.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">website designing and development</a></strong>.
<h2><strong>Speed</strong></h2>
Believe me, we human beings are very impatient and flighty. We do not want to spend a single extra second over a thing if we can find another alternative. According to a study, a viewer wishes to see a site get loaded within 2 seconds and they abandon the site if it takes more than 3 seconds to load.

We know that a site needs to be a real beauty. But, what fun is in that if a person is not even loading the site. Hence, it is necessary that a site should be designed in such a way that it can load faster and easier. A website designer should not rely completely on the developer for speed optimisation, rather he should himself make necessary changes as required to make the website load faster.

To give it even more prioritisation, Google has begun prioritizing rankings for the sites which load faster. So, buckle up the seats and give an upper pace to your website speed. In case you need any help, reach out to Techies Infotech, the best website design and development company in India. And we shall provide you with an experienced aid for your betterment.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/speed-testing.jpg" alt="Speed" />
<h2><strong>Flat Design</strong></h2>
<strong>Simple, Sober, and Best</strong>
This is now the Mantra of Website Designing. Since the last couple of years, mobile surfing has increased to a large extent. But sites, which have high-resolution images, finicky designs and other hullabaloos, tend to slow up the loading process. Hence, to make good out of it, designers have started shifting to simple designs which not just reduce the load on the site but also give a pleasing look to the eyes.

It isn’t necessary that a site with basic designs would have a horrible outlook. The designer just needs to be creative, and he can make a gold cloak out of rags. A simple and light site is going to increase the speed of loading and would gradually get a good rank by Search Engines like Google and Bing. What else could be that good?

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/flat-design.jpg" alt="Flat Design" />
<h2><b>Mobile First</b></h2>
As discussed earlier, mobile searches have increased significantly from the past some years; with this change, Google too has altered its ranking criteria.

Formerly, sites used to be ranked on the basis of their desktop response and they were initially made for desktop screens, having an add-on option of making it <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">mobile-friendly</a></strong>. But now, designers have to make a site according to mobile first and then they can make an alteration for the version of the desktop.

If the site is made according to mobile first, it gradually attains the attention of Google and lures it to get a good SEO ranking.

<img src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/mobile-first-design.png" alt="Mobile First" />

&nbsp;

&nbsp;
<h2 style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;"><strong>Broken Grid</strong></h2>
The online world is all about innovation and thinking out of the box. The audience demands something different every time and if this demand is not fulfilled, it can doom the company.<strong>
</strong>

<img title="broken-grid" src="http://iamtechie.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/elementor/thumbs/broken-grid-p7tfka8alz7ked2q7wczr7j0jycrptpip9p7cqfu2o.jpg" alt="Broken Grid" />
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;">The designer needs to pro-activate his creative mind and break the grids in an attractive manner. He then needs to place everything on the page asymmetrically in such a way that it would tingle the reflexes of the visitor. This serves many benefits. One, it brings something new to the world; Two, the visitor would find the site oddly satisfying; and Three, it would increase the customer engagement over the site.</p>
With the use of shapes, colours, textures, and dynamic imagery, the designer can direct the user’s attention in an engaging and a whole new manner towards the content.
<p style="color: #2f2c2c; font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 25px; line-height: 1.2;"><b style="font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit; background-color: transparent;">Shapes</b></p>
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; line-height: 28px; text-align: justify;">In order to maintain the attractiveness on the website even after implementing broken grids and flat designs, shapes come to help. These are not any other shapes for which you need a specific study, rather these are only those simple geometric shapes about which we learnt in the middle school.</p>
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;">The magical thing about shapes is that they can fit anywhere and can increase the fascination by a million times. Geometric shapes, if coupled with bright colours tingle the senses of a human being, making the site even more engaging.</p>
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;">With the geometric rules of perfection, these shapes pacify the chaos created by flat and asymmetric designs. In fact, each shape represents a different feeling. A circle represents unity, a rectangle represents stability, triangles and rhombus have made their association with the dynamic nature. Each sector of the economy has a different suited shape. It is just a matter of creativity that how it is implemented on the website. Simpler designs, broken grids, shapes have taken an auspicious place in web development which seems to rise in 2019.</p>

<img style="vertical-align: middle; box-shadow: #c6c3c3 0px 0px 4px; margin-top: 10px; border: 8px solid #ffffff;" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/shapes.jpg" alt="Shapes" />
<h2 style="color: #2f2c2c; font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 25px; line-height: 1.2;"><strong>Closing Comments</strong></h2>
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 28px; text-align: justify;">So, these are some of the many trends which are going to restructure the whole idea of web development in 2019. In case you find it difficult to own it as your own new habitat, let us help you get through it. Techies Infotech, (Yeah! That is what we are called) is the best web development agency in Melbourne, Australia has some of the pro players of the field.</p>
<p style="color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;">With years of experience and wide knowledge, we are sure to provide you with the best service and as what our previous experiences say, we can provide you with the work even above your expectations. So, wait no more and reach out to us!</p>
&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

A simple and light site is going to increase the speed of loading and would gradually get a good rank by Search Engines like Google and Bing. What else could be that good?<\/p>\n<div class=\"h20\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.com.au\/images\/flat-design.jpg\" alt=\"Flat Design\"><\/div>\n<h2><b>Mobile First<\/b><\/h2>\n<p class=\"justify\">As discussed earlier, mobile searches have increased significantly from the past some years; with this change, Google too has altered its ranking criteria.<\/p>\n<p>Formerly, sites used to be ranked on the basis of their desktop response and they were initially made for desktop screens, having an add-on option of making it&nbsp;<strong><a href=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.com.au\/blogs\/top-seo-benefits-of-responsive-web-design.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">mobile-friendly<\/a><\/strong>. But now, designers have to make a site according to mobile first and then they can make an alteration for the version of the desktop.<\/p>\n<p>If the site is made according to mobile first, it gradually attains the attention of Google and lures it to get a good SEO ranking.<\/p>\n<div class=\"h10\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div align=\"center\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.com.au\/images\/mobile-first-design.png\" alt=\"Mobile First\"><\/div>\n<p><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw><\/p>\n<gwmw style=\"display:none;\"><\/gwmw>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"7bc938c","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"8953b77"}]},"elements":[{"id":"a1c406a","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"e888458","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"b95bd1e"}],"structure":"20"},"elements":[{"id":"dc8cb91","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"9e27209","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<h2 style=\"margin-bottom: 25px; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; line-height: 1.2; color: #2f2c2c; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: left;\"><strong>Broken Grid<\/strong><\/h2><div><span style=\"color: #757575; font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;\">The online world is all about innovation and thinking out of the box. The audience demands something different every time and if this demand is not fulfilled, it can doom the company.<\/span><strong><br \/><\/strong><\/div><p>\u00a0<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"d755376","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"048bec1","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"http:\/\/iamtechie.com\/blog\/wp-content\/uploads\/2021\/05\/broken-grid.jpg","id":2888},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"600","height":"336"}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"0adfd91","elType":"section","settings":{"jet_parallax_layout_list":[{"jet_parallax_layout_image":{"url":""},"_id":"c2e128b"}]},"elements":[{"id":"2b6a05c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"4ecc714","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"<div class=\"row\" style=\"margin-right: -15px; margin-left: -15px;\">\n<div class=\"col-lg-12 ml-auto col-md-12\" style=\"width: 1140px; padding-right: 15px; padding-left: 15px; margin-left: auto !important;\" data-wow-duration=\"1s\"><p style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;\">The designer needs to pro-activate his creative mind and break the grids in an attractive manner. He then needs to place everything on the page asymmetrically in such a way that it would tingle the reflexes of the visitor. This serves many benefits. One, it brings something new to the world; Two, the visitor would find the site oddly satisfying; and Three, it would increase the customer engagement over the site.<\/p><p style=\"\"><span style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: justify;\">With the use of shapes, colours, textures, and dynamic imagery, the designer can direct the user\u2019s attention in an engaging and a whole new manner towards the content.<\/span><\/p>\n<p style=\"color: rgb(47, 44, 44); font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 25px; line-height: 1.2;\"><b style=\"font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: inherit; background-color: transparent;\">Shapes<\/b><\/p>\n<p class=\"justify\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; line-height: 28px; text-align: justify;\">In order to maintain the attractiveness on the website even after implementing broken grids and flat designs, shapes come to help. These are not any other shapes for which you need a specific study, rather these are only those simple geometric shapes about which we learnt in the middle school.<\/p>\n<p style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;\">The magical thing about shapes is that they can fit anywhere and can increase the fascination by a million times. Geometric shapes, if coupled with bright colours tingle the senses of a human being, making the site even more engaging.<\/p>\n<p style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;\">With the geometric rules of perfection, these shapes pacify the chaos created by flat and asymmetric designs. In fact, each shape represents a different feeling. A circle represents unity, a rectangle represents stability, triangles and rhombus have made their association with the dynamic nature. Each sector of the economy has a different suited shape. It is just a matter of creativity that how it is implemented on the website. Simpler designs, broken grids, shapes have taken an auspicious place in web development which seems to rise in 2019.<\/p>\n<div class=\"h10\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; height: 10px;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div align=\"center\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;\"><img class=\"img-fluid img_border\" style=\"vertical-align: middle; box-shadow: #c6c3c3 0px 0px 4px; margin-top: 10px; border: 8px solid #ffffff;\" src=\"https:\/\/techiesinfotech.com.au\/images\/shapes.jpg\" alt=\"Shapes\"><\/div>\n<div class=\"h10\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; height: 10px;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div class=\"clear\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div class=\"dashed\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(135, 135, 135); padding-bottom: 10px; padding-top: 10px;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<div class=\"h20\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; height: 20px;\">&nbsp;<\/div>\n<h2 style=\"color: rgb(47, 44, 44); font-family: inherit; font-size: 26px; letter-spacing: normal; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 25px; line-height: 1.2;\"><strong>Closing Comments<\/strong><\/h2>\n<p class=\"justify\" style=\"color: rgb(117, 117, 117); font-family: Nunito, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 28px; text-align: justify;\">So, these are some of the many trends which are going to restructure the whole idea of web development in 2019. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[How to boost e-Commerce sales with Instagram]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/how-to-boost-ecommerce-sales-with-instagram/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 31 May 2021 03:54:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://iamtechie.com/blog/?p=2928</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="justify">The era today isn't just confined to the limited scope or measurable area but has gone far beyond that, demolishing each geographical bound through aggressive online presence. In the world of infinite possibilities, there is an oceanic radius for marketers to grow their businesses. Among many of the options, Instagram has become top grossing, most loved and highly preferred tool of social media marketing. Hence, if you want to convert the browsers into shoppers and get your sales graph to high peaks, Instagram is the best option.</p>
<p class="justify">We know that there is a good scope of growth on Instagram, but we still are in oblivion with regards to <strong>‘How does Instagram works for eCommerce businesses.’</strong></p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>It fascinates a vast audience, enhances your reach, helps you in the betterment of brand positioning and magnifies your business.</li>
 	<li>It includes images which are of superior quality and are more engaging.</li>
 	<li>Since Instagram is a responsive mobile app, users can have easy reach to your online shop.</li>
</ul>
<p class="justify">The brands today are no longer relying just on Facebook for their promotion but now they have included Instagram too into their social media marketing campaigns to achieve the targeted level of business.</p>
<p class="justify">Instagram is the best place for the startups to give a shoot to their initiation and for the already established brands to drill deeper in the market. It is the perfect solution to convert passive shoppers into active customers.</p>
<p class="justify">Let’s find out how Instagram can accelerate your business with these 8 basic steps.</p>

<div><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/e-commerce-sales-2.jpg" /></div>
<div></div>
<h2><strong>Switch your Personal Instagram Account to a Business Account</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Instagram has a commendable feature of Business Profile in which one can set up a professionally acceptable profile with relevant information extracted from other <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/social-media-strategies-to-grow-your-online-sales.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media platforms</a></strong> like Facebook while retaining Instagram's marketable links. It also provides you some beneficiary information like impressions, reach, clicks etc. on a timely basis.

If you do not know how to change your personal profile to a business profile, follow these easy steps.</p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>Open your account setting and click the option of ‘Switch to Business Profile’</li>
 	<li>Log In to your Facebook account in the app, and chose the page you want to connect to Instagram. Make sure that you have admin rights of that page.</li>
 	<li>Link some information from your Facebook Page to an Instagram page like email address or phone number.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Visually appealing Photos</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Try posting photos which stimulate one’s visual senses and feast the eyes of the searcher. Remember that the recommended size of an Instagram image is 1080 x 1080 pixels. Another good way of increasing your online traffic is by applying watermarks to your images. Prefer writing your domain name on your photos. This way when a customer gets fascinated by one image, his curiosity arises to know more about the brand. Hence, with the help of the watermark, he may reach your site, which would gradually increase your site engagement and its traffic.</p>

<h2 class="justify"><strong>Make a good use Hashtags</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Visually attractive photos solely can't help you achieve your goal. They need a support of hashtags. Hashtags basically help Instagram catalog your products into a category. If you are <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/easy-way-to-use-hashtag.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">using appropriate hashtags</a></strong>, your posts are more likely to reach a much larger audience; being specific, your posts are much likely to reach your target audience. But using too many and irrelevant hashtags might give negative reacts to your posts.

Hashtags make your profile easy to find over the large social media platforms. When the Instagram content is shared on Facebook, the hashtags get copied and hence it becomes easy to search your profile using hashtags on Facebook graphs.</p>

<h2 class="justify"><strong>Instagram Advertising</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Instagram advertising is one of the greatest tools for social media marketers. It can improve the lead conversion rates of your website, hence taking your website to another level. Here are some of the points on how <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/blogs/best-instagram-marketing-agency-in-melbourne.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Instagram advertising </a></strong>can help you in your business growth.</p>

<ul class="arrow-list">
 	<li>The average duration of user engagement on Instagram is 198 seconds, which is the highest of any social media platform. Hence, users are more likely to see your advertisement than on any other platform.</li>
 	<li>Ad recalls from Instagram is 2.9 times higher than other social sites. This means that ads from Instagram are more likely to be remembered by people.</li>
 	<li>Instagram ensures that your ad gets noticed and attracts the most potential customers. According to research, users are 120 times more likely to engage in the ads of Instagram than that of Twitter and 58 times more likely than that of Facebook.</li>
</ul>
<h2><strong>Tools for selling with Instagram</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">There are 2 effective Instagram selling tools which could be used to boost the sales. These tools are:</p>

<h3 class="justify"><em><strong>Creating a Clickable Storefront</strong></em></h3>
<p class="justify">Selling becomes much easier when your link gets converted into a clickable storefront, showcasing all your merchandise. There are many <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/software-development-company" target="_blank" rel="noopener">softwares</a></strong> which could help you attach many products to a single image. For e.g. Yotpo. Now with your link in the bio, a potential customer can visit your store and buy the items using the ‘Buy Now" button, making buying easy.</p>

<h3 class="justify"><em><strong>Hashtag Selling</strong></em></h3>
<p class="justify">Hashtags are in the latest trends of the online marketing. Attaching the relevant hashtags may bring a lot of traffic to your products. There are many hashtags which when added help you in online selling by adding your products to their sites as well. One such hashtag is Inselly.</p>

<h2><strong>Post-User-Generated Content</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">People seek a personal touch to every post. Encourage your users to create content for you. Ask them to click pictures with your products and give the reviews. Ask them to post their pictures with the products. This way, other users will get inspired to purchase from you. This is called a Referral Marketing Technique and can bring a positive impact on your business.</p>

<h2><strong>Ask Influencers to review your products</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Influencer marketing is one of the top-grossing types of online marketing. It acts just like the word-of-mouth. A merit of using Instagram is that we can reach any person of any field or basically saying the mass influencers.

Asking them to collaborate with the brand may bring good fortunes for the business as the followers of the influencer take them seriously and perhaps act too on what they want. It further improves sales and increases revenue.</p>

<h2><strong>Time for the Contest</strong></h2>
<p class="justify">Give a velocity to your conversions by running contests, giveaways and discount coupons to your followers. It would not only increase your following but would improve engagement on Instagram too. Do not forget to launch the teasers before the campaign to leave a tingling effect in the minds of your followers.</p>

<div><img class="img-fluid img_border" src="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/images/e-commerce-sales-3.jpg" /></div>
<p class="justify">Now that you have come to know that what role Instagram can play to boost your business, it is time to implement these techniques in real life.

Get the aid from such experienced people of the field to proclaim your presence not only on Instagram but every other web platform. Get a hand from Techies Infotech, a <strong><a href="https://techiesinfotech.com.au/services/social-media-marketing.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">social media marketing agency in melbourne</a></strong>, Australia to give a growth to your businesses and dreams.</p>]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Shopify Plus - Pros and cons - The definitive guide]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/shopify-plus-pros-and-cons-the-definitive-guide/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 02 Dec 2021 12:09:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=13842</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<b style="color: black">Do you want to make close to or more than $500,000 in sales or revenue every year? Do you estimate a considerable rise in your sales volume in the next few years? Do you intend to grow your Store into other nations, currencies, and languages?</b>

If you are wondering all these spikes in the coming years for your business then Shopify Plus is the platform that you should invest in. However, before you pour in your money be thorough with how Shopify plus works &amp; what glitches you need to handle if you get stuck.

Spare yourself from falling into any conclusion without having a complete rundown of Shopify Plus applications and how it can help you create brand loyalty while boosting your sales and ROI.

Yes, you can do it if you follow proper and planned techniques that are appropriate for your business and your target audience.

Augmenting Shopify Plus has benefitted reputable brands like RedBull, Budweiser, KKW Beauty, Kylie Cosmetics, GymShark, and The Economist.

For the people who want to know about Shopify and Shopify plus from scratch; Shopify is an e-commerce platform that allows you to create and sell on an online store. At the same time, Shopify plus is an extended and better version of Shopify that allows you to take your store to the next level.

Shopify Plus was designed for businesses that want to get more out of their e-commerce platform. It is very customizable while being user-friendly; it speeds up the process of marketing new items; it features specialized Apps, flexible API calls, and much more. Sounds good? Let's dig deeper.

<b style="color:black">As of May 2021, the company said over 1,700,000 enterprises in 175 countries used its platform.</b>

<b style="color:black">According to Builtwith, the Shopify platform will host 1.58 million websites by December 2021. For calendar 2019, the overall gross merchandise volume topped US$61 billion.</b>

Let's talk about what Shopify plus offers to its subscribers.
<h2 style="font-size: 32px;">Shopify Plus Pros</h2>
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Easy to Learn, Simple to Use</h3>
Shopify's backend is simple, and it is by far the most user-friendly platform on the market.

A business owner's main aim is to boost sales without being dragged down by technology and other time-consuming responsibilities. That is why Shopify offers many benefits and features that other eCommerce platforms do not, such as help with managing the Store's technological demands, a simple interface, or access to a variety of helpful commands.

<b style="color:black">One of the significant features of Shopify Plus has been its status as the first mainstream SaaS platform solution for SMB and mid-market merchants, removing overheads associated with platform maintenance, updates, and security patching. </b>

In addition, Shopify is a powerfully hosted platform that will also handle transaction processing time for you.

When you choose Shopify Plus, you are in charge of design, marketing, and dealing with clients directly.
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Be Creative While Designing Your Store</h3>
It is crucial to establish a good first impression on your clients whenever they visit your website. Online shoppers will skip a website if its design is unappealing.

Indeed, businesses constantly strive to embed spectacular strategies to improve the user experience and increase eCommerce conversions; this also applies to Shopify eCommerce business owners, around 1.75 million. Therefore, choosing the best Shopify theme for your website is essential to its success.

Beautiful storefront themes are one of Shopify's key advantages. They make a website seem appealing and professional, which aids in consumer retention. Shopify offers sellers a variety of theme options for their stores.

Art &amp; Photography, Jewelry &amp; Accessories, Food &amp; Beverages, Furniture, and many other industries are represented. In addition, Shopify Plus provides free and premium themes.

<b style="color:black">Some of the best themes of Shopify plus includes:</b>
<ul>
 	<li>Ella</li>
 	<li>Minimal</li>
 	<li>District</li>
 	<li>Roxxe</li>
 	<li>Responsive</li>
 	<li>Vendy</li>
 	<li>Testament and so on.</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Artificial Intelligence {Shopify apps} to Automate Your Duties</h3>
One of Shopify's best points is its plugins. Shopify provides over <b>1,200 different applications</b> that may help you automate your duties, allowing you to focus on other vital things like marketing and sales growth.

Accounting, customer support, inventory, reporting, shipping, and other tasks may all be aided by applications. The Shopify tools make your life easier by giving you the technology you need to expand your business.

Shopify Plus provides an API and other tools to get more control over your business.

Shopify API is a service that allows software developers to access and use data from Shopify-based online stores. <b style="color:black">The API works with HTTP requests such as GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE and supports XML and JSON.</b>

The JavaScript (JS) Buy SDK is also a little toolkit that allows you to add commerce to any website. It uses Shopify's Storefront API to get goods and collections from your shop, add things to a cart, and check out.

GraphQL is a query language for software and applications (APIs) that prioritizes providing clients with only the data they need. GraphQL, allows developers to create queries that extract data from various data sources in a single API call.
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Here is a quick glimpse at the authoritative Shopify Plus apps.</h3>
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Conversion Optimization Apps for Shopify</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>TrustPulse</li>
 	<li>Push Engage</li>
 	<li>OptinMonster</li>
 	<li>PushOwl</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Best Shopify Email Marketing Apps</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Constant Contact</li>
 	<li>Sendinblue</li>
 	<li>Drip</li>
 	<li>Omnisend</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Best Shopify Marketing Apps</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Candyrack</li>
 	<li>Referral Candy</li>
 	<li>Smile.io Rewards</li>
 	<li>SEO Plug-in</li>
 	<li>SEO Image Optimizer</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Best Shopify Sales Channel Apps</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Facebook Channel</li>
 	<li>Messenger Channel</li>
 	<li>Buy Button Channel</li>
 	<li>Instafeed</li>
 	<li>ReConvert</li>
</ul>
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Best Shopify Customer Service Apps</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Yotpo</li>
 	<li>Rewards &amp; Referrals by Swell</li>
 	<li>Wishlist Plus</li>
 	<li>Accessibility</li>
 	<li>Facebook Live Chat</li>
 	<li>One-Click Social Login</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Add Discount Codes Like a Marketing Expert</h3>
You can accomplish a lot with Shopify like; making discount codes, selling your items on Shopify, Pinterest, and other social media platforms.

Promo codes are an essential part of most businesses' marketing strategies. They can serve as a valuable tool in meeting sales objectives, acquiring new consumers without capital loss, and selling excess inventory.

Promotional codes are alphanumeric strings that online shops use to boost sales on their website. They are often linked with a more extensive promotional marketing campaign. For example, a promo code's discount might be applied to specific goods or a whole order.

How to advertise a Shopify discount? Go to Store&gt; Discounts in the Shopify app. Select the deal that you want to publicize. Tap and choose Promote discount. Next, select the page, product, or collection you want the link to take visitors to.
<h4 style="font-size: 18px;">Are you worried about SEO?</h4>
You can also boost SEO rankings by using relevant keywords on website pages and product descriptions.

Also, make a blog. Blogging is a built-in element that has an impact on your SEO rankings. <b>Use Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) to improve the speed of content delivery to mobile consumers, hence increasing your customers' buying experience and Google's SEO ranking.</b>

Get an automatically created sitemap, which Google uses to assess the information on all of your website's pages
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Add Discount Codes Like a Marketing Expert</h3>
Whether you are a seller or consumer, if you are facing any issue regarding the service, Shopify will surely assist. On top of it, Shopify Plus offers a highly devoted support crew that is available 24/7.

Through live chat, email, social media, and telephone, you can get excellent customer experiences whenever you want.

Besides all the good things, there are a few limitations of Shopify plus.
<h2 style="font-size: 32px;">Shopify Plus: Shopify plus Cons</h2>
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">An absence of multi-store architecture</h3>
The lack of a multi-store architecture is one of Shopify Plus' most frequently cited functional limitations, as it prevents merchants from handling multiple brands and international setups as efficiently as they can with other platforms (especially Magento and Salesforce Commerce Cloud).

Moreover, there are still areas that are very manual and time-intensive (such as merchandising, app management, promotions management etc), which can be somewhat frustrating if you come from a platform that natively supports these functions.

In response to this, Shopify has announced a solution to help reduce this overhead; the hope is that Shopify will release their first move toward multi-store within months, rather than years, from now
<h3 style="font-size: 22px;">Lack of control over SEO</h3>
Some users choose not to use Shopify because of its locked-down SEO features. The following examples are among the limitations:
<ul>
 	<li>Inability to control the overall URL structure (all pages will be located under /collections, /blogs, /pages, or /products) - so every URL will need to change when moving to Shopify. Creating a headless site using the Storefront API is the only way around this.</li>
 	<li>As part of a move to Shopify Plus, international stores must be on a subdomain or CCtld since subfolders cannot be used.</li>
 	<li>The robots.txt file cannot be edited</li>
 	<li>Access to the server is denied - this eliminates the possibility of using an external company's merchandising solution since there's no way to render the product grid server-side.</li>
</ul>
Aside from the mentioned Shopify plus cons, <b>one of the most significant advantages of Shopify is its ability to amplify your business.</b>

In addition, Shopify is widely regarded as the most user-friendly platform for both small and large eCommerce enterprises since it provides merchants with all of the tools required to create stunning eCommerce websites.
<h2 style="font-size: 32px;">Shopify Plus: Breakdown of Shopify Plus Plans</h2>
Shopify plus plans are very customizable while being user-friendly. It allows for quick time to market for new applications and features specialized Apps, flexible API calls, and much more.

<b>The following is a breakdown of the prices for each Shopify Plus plan:</b>
<ul>
 	<li>Basic Shopify Plan - $29 per month plus 2.9 percent and 30 cents for each transaction</li>
 	<li>Shopify Plan - $79 per month plus 2.6 percent and 30 cents for each transaction</li>
 	<li>Advanced Shopify Plan - $299 per month plus 2.4 percent and 30 cents for each transaction</li>
 	<li>The Lite Plan begins at $9 per month and allows you to sell on your current website or social media accounts.</li>
 	<li>Shopify Plus, an enterprise package, starts about $2000 per month + 2.15 percent each transaction.</li>
</ul>
Have you considered using the Shopify Plus features for your business?
