					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[4 Tips On How To Boost Your Google My Business Listing]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/boost-google-my-business-listing/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 06 Apr 2022 05:27:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=14512</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">There is no question that every business wants to get more visibility online, especially on Google.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">What steps can you take to make sure you appear for just the right people in local search results?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">With the help of <strong>Google My Business Optimization,</strong> you can attract more searchers and convert them into paying customers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">In this article, we have covered all the essential <strong>Google my business SEO tips</strong> that will help you achieve quick wins without blowing your budget.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"33px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h2 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:33px">Why is Google My Business Important for Your Business?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Having a Google My Business optimisation provides the ability to list your business's location on google maps and to appear in local search results.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">It is possible to display important business details, such as the hours of operation, contact information, or a link to your website. Moreover, Google has just launched a new feature that allows you to share links to articles and upcoming events.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Business listings are free, but they should be viewed as an essential by every company. Having a Google My Business page is still beneficial if your business is online rather than having a physical store.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h3 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:28px">1. Boost review rates</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Growing your GBP through reviews is the best way to do so. <strong>This doesn't cost anything but increases your </strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/"><strong>business's organic search</strong></a><strong> engine results visibility.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Take a moment and consider how you would choose a general contractor out of a large selection if you were hiring one for the first time.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Having no third-party confirmation of such factors as costs and quality of workmanship on a contractor's website leaves you uncertain whether their claims are accurate.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">If you want to increase your rankings in local searches, you need GBP reviews.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px"><strong>Having 10 to 15 reviews in the four-to-five-star range will increase your chances of being trusted by people looking for a particular service you offer in their area.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">However, those reviews won't appear right away.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Getting happy customers to leave reviews requires a bit of outreach.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px"><strong>The review requests that you send should encourage your customers to be as honest and detailed as possible.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px"><strong>Original pictures of the work or product you provided will make your customer much more likely to provide an honest review.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Since photos can help increase your GBP's visibility even further.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h3 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:28px">2. Steer clear of spammy tactics</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px"><strong>Google today can certainly detect when someone is trying to trick the search engine by automating content, creating doorways, and stuffing keywords into the content.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">The same is true for GBP.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Being a Google tool, how is it possible for one of the most significant, most powerful search engines around to let spammy tactics slip by, such as paying people to leave positive reviews?</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Potential customers are smart enough and will only trust an honest review.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Reviewers who mention incentives may seem dishonest to potential customers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">In the meantime, bribing people for positive reviews obscures the real picture of an issue.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">People won't mention any negative experiences with your business in their reviews.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">As a result, potential customers may be "fooled" and disappointed when they expect better service.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h3 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:28px">3. Address negative reviews</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">To avoid working harder than you need to,&nbsp; it is best to prevent negative GBP reviews or handle bad reviews as soon as they occur.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Obviously, in the former case, you would have to spend much more time digging into all aspects of your business and making sure everything is going fine.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">At all times, be courteous to customers, and if anything goes wrong, be understanding, correct it promptly, and make sure everyone walks away satisfied.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Whenever negative reviews appear online, apologize and empathize with those customers feeling disappointed with your offered product and services. Doing this will demonstrate to the general public that you care about your customers even after they leave your business.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h3 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:28px">4. Maximize the potential of GBP tools</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Last but not least, one final tip to <strong>optimize your Google My Business listing</strong> would be to use <strong>Google's online business tool.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">A great example of this is<strong> </strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/"><strong>Google Marketing Kit</strong></a>, which allows you to create free stickers, posters, and social media posts to promote your business promotions and events.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Especially, social posts can significantly improve your online presence.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">It is excellent to have your positive reviews created into cool posters with blurbs from the text and then post them to your social media platforms.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Users can also follow your business's local profile on a social network such as Facebook or Instagram. Through this, followers will be able to access:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px"><li>New social posts</li><li>Offers</li><li>Blog posts</li><li>Events</li><li>Product updates</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">All of these things contribute to making your brand more known to your followers.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Furthermore, Google Posts let you creatively promote deals, coupons, and events. You can even use images, videos, and call-to-action buttons to drive user engagement.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">The <strong>analytics feature</strong> of<strong> Google Posts</strong> lets you see how users interact with whatever you post, which makes it a wonderful way to advertise using GBP. Next time, you will be able to develop even better posts based on the data you've discovered.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">An important tip is to <strong>improve local SEO</strong> since it can quickly boost the Google My Business listing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"33px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<h2 class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:33px">Conclusion</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Optimizing your business's local profile is essential to Google. It aims to create a healthy competitive environment between local businesses.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">Almost everything Google does these days is to improve the user experience.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"16px"}},"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color" style="font-size:16px">At Techies Infotech, as the <a href="https://iamtechie.com/"><strong>Best SEO company</strong></a><strong>, </strong>we can offer you expert help to make you rank on Google My Business Listing. We can help your business rank on the top page of search engine results by planning the best digital marketing strategies.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[XEvil 6.0 automatically solve most kind of captchas,

+ hCaptcha supported in new XEvil 6.0! 
 
1.) Fast, easy, precisionly 
XEvil is the fastest captcha killer in the world. Its has no solving limits, no threads number limits 
you can solve even 1.000.000.000 captchas per day and it will cost 0 (ZERO) USD! Just buy license for 59 USD and all! 
 
2.) Several APIs support 
XEvil supports more than 6 different, worldwide known API: 2Captcha, anti-captcha (antigate), RuCaptcha, death-by-captcha, etc. 
just send your captcha via HTTP request, as you can send into any of that service - and XEvil will solve your captcha! 
So, XEvil is compatible with hundreds of applications for SEO/SMM/password recovery/parsing/posting/clicking/cryptocurrency/etc. 
 
3.) Useful support and manuals 
After purchase, you got access to a private tech.support forum, Wiki, Skype/Telegram online support 
Developers will train XEvil to your type of captcha for FREE and very fast - just send them examples 
 
4.) How to get free trial use of XEvil full version? 
- Try to search in Google "Home of XEvil" 
- you will find IPs with opened port 80 of XEvil users (click on any IP to ensure) 
- try to send your captcha via 2captcha API ino one of that IPs 
- if you got BAD KEY error, just tru another IP 
- enjoy! :) 
- (its not work for hCaptcha!) 
 
WARNING: Free XEvil DEMO does NOT support ReCaptcha, hCaptcha and most other types of captcha!

+ hCaptcha supported in new XEvil 6.0! 
 
1.) Fast, easy, precisionly 
XEvil is the fastest captcha killer in the world. Its has no solving limits, no threads number limits 
you can solve even 1.000.000.000 captchas per day and it will cost 0 (ZERO) USD! Just buy license for 59 USD and all! 
 
2.) Several APIs support 
XEvil supports more than 6 different, worldwide known API: 2captcha.com, anti-captchas.com (antigate), RuCaptcha, death-by-captcha, etc. 
just send your captcha via HTTP request, as you can send into any of that service - and XEvil will solve your captcha! 
So, XEvil is compatible with hundreds of applications for SEO/SMM/password recovery/parsing/posting/clicking/cryptocurrency/etc.

- Try to search in Google "Home of XEvil" 
- you will find IPs with opened port 80 of XEvil users (click on any IP to ensure) 
- try to send your captcha via 2captcha API ino one of that IPs 
- if you got BAD KEY error, just tru another IP 
- enjoy! :) 
- (its not work for hCaptcha!)

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Why digital marketing is important in today’s business?]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/why-digital-marketing-important/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 12 Apr 2022 10:06:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=14610</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Nowadays, digital marketing is certainly one of the most essential aspects of the business. Unlike traditional marketing, it requires a different approach. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">The strategic plans are developed, used, and employed to attract customers by driving brand awareness across various digital channels, through emails and social media promotions.<br>Still, there are many people having a question in their mind “Why is digital marketing important today?” </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}}} -->
<h2 style="font-size:28px"><strong><em>Let’s have a look at the four key advantages of Digital Marketing which make it very popular today over traditional marketing.</em></strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px">Engage the Customer at Every Buying Stage</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Customer journeys weren't talked about much before digital marketing became popular, mostly because they were difficult to understand and evaluate. Most customers go to a physical store after seeing an advertisement on TV or in the newspaper, decide, and pay in person for the product or service. We can track the entire journey that a customer takes in digital marketing, often from the moment they begin searching for a solution or product.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Easily affordable</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px">Easily affordable</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Digital marketing is a cost-effective method of marketing your business locally or internationally. By using highly targeted strategies, it allows even the smallest businesses to compete with large ones.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px">Interaction with the customers at a faster pace</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">In digital marketing, one of the biggest benefits over traditional marketing is that it gives you the ability to track campaigns and measure their performance.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Digital marketing provides detailed data at the end of every campaign as to which tactics worked and which were not so effective, and this information can be analyzed and used for future campaigns.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Businesses now have access to a multitude of new opportunities via the internet. Digital Marketing enables businesses to stay online nearly all the time.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">It goes without mentioning how it has transformed the market for business owners to market their products and services.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Today, it is one of the most productive ways to attract new customers through social media networks. The platform can help boost any online business by gaining new customers and interacting with those already there. It also increases the company's visibility, which in turn increases sales. All of these things are accomplished with the help of digital marketing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">In the coming years, Digital Marketing is expected to open up many digital promotion channels for your business. Today's business world is a digital one, and only businesses that utilise digital technology can survive. In today's business environment, Digital Marketing is&nbsp; one of the most thoughtful strategies to consider.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Thus, digital marketing generates more income and better conversion rates for businesses and organisations using effective strategies designed to boost growth.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}}} -->
<h2 style="font-size:28px"><strong>Benefits of digital marketing</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Digital marketing offers certain benefits, including:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color"><li>Interaction with potential customers and understanding what they want.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color"><li>Helps gain access to the global market regardless of any international restrictions.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color"><li>Needs less investment to reach out wider and extensive demographics</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color"><li>Helps build brand stability by getting to know customers and letting them know you and your business on a more personal level.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"textColor":"black"} -->
<ul class="has-black-color has-text-color"><li>Immediately track the effectiveness of your marketing efforts.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}}} -->
<h2 style="font-size:28px"><strong>Why do businesses today need the expert services of top-notch digital marketing companies?</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Nowadays, people are gathering more information online. In light of this, Digital Marketing services are the best way to attract and reach out to many potential customers. To better your business’ reach and visibility, here are 5 <strong>benefits of hiring a Digital Marketing agency</strong> these days:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px"><strong>Higher conversion rate</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Companies using online marketing as their primary marketing model can measure conversion rates in real-time. It allows for tracking the number of customers who convert into subscribers and then customers who purchase the product or service.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">When you choose the best Digital Marketing agency, you can reach out only to customers searching for the kind of service you offer, so the conversion rate for that particular service can be better.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Social media marketing, <strong>SEO, and PPC</strong> generate a high conversion rate as they act as a fast and effective channel of communicating with clients.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px"><strong>Establishes Brand Trust</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Communicating with a brand's social media page for any questions or concerns is becoming a standard way of dealing with any problems. In turn, this sets up a very strong image of the brand in the minds of the brand's new customers, resulting in more conversions.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">With the brand’s presence across the various platforms, customers can easily rate the brand's services based on their experiences. Because customers can rate the brand's services across various platforms, their experiences are easy to track.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px"><strong>Robust &amp; Impactful Marketing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Expert agencies that have been offering digital marketing services can effectively market services and products. With their digital marketing services, they can help create lasting impressions on your customers as they are familiar with the dos and don'ts of digital marketing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px"><strong>Cost-effective marketing for any business</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Before reaching the top level and starting to make profits, small businesses need to save up their resources. An effective Digital Marketing strategy like <strong>best and expert SEO services</strong> allow you to reach many customers within a limited budget.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3,"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"24px"}}} -->
<h3 style="font-size:24px"><strong>Get to know your target audience</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Digital marketing is mainly important because of the ability to target your audience more effectively. If you could promote directly to individuals interested in the products or services you offer, that would be amazing. Digital marketing brings you direct access to customers who are highly interested in your products and services.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">It's unnecessary to depend on individuals seeing your regular advertising campaigns and contacting you. The cost of digital marketing is significantly less than that of TV, radio, or standard mail, and it also reaches a wider audience.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">With digital marketing, you're more likely to succeed with your business. The importance of digital marketing today cannot be overstated.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"style":{"typography":{"fontSize":"28px"}}} -->
<h2 style="font-size:28px"><strong>Conclusion</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">Investing in digital marketing presents your business with the opportunity to grow and achieve new heights.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"textColor":"black"} -->
<p class="has-black-color has-text-color">We at Techies Infotech, the <a href="https://iamtechie.com/"><strong>best digital marketing company</strong></a><strong>, </strong>provide <strong>digital marketing services</strong> that will drive a great deal of revenue to your business. We employ highly skilled digital marketers to help you with all your marketing needs.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There is a boom in online shopping. A part of this can be attributed to the ongoing pandemic, but part of it is a long-term trend.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>Statista reports that almost 80% of U.S. consumers shop online, and over 50% prefer to purchase online rather than in person. The industry is expected to be worth trillions of dollars by the end of 2022.</em></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Sellers are in luck because, with the right tools, any small business can quickly start selling online and make money. With a decent eCommerce store, you can list your products, take payments, and handle shipping—all without leaving the comfort of your home office.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>No matter what type of business you have, whether you are an independent creative or a multinational corporation, there are solutions available. <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/ecommerce-industry-solutions/">Building an eCommerce website</a> </strong>isn't that difficult, but choosing the wrong eCommerce platform will hurt your business quickly. Based on objective performance data, feature set, and value, this article will give you an overview of some of the top eCommerce platforms in 2022.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Let's find the best e-commerce platform that comes with all the features you'll need to launch your store and improve sales.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>1. <strong><strong><strong>Shopify</strong></strong></strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":17164,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://iamtechie.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Shopify-1-1024x538.jpg" alt="Shopify" class="wp-image-17164"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Shopify is one of the most popular eCommerce platforms, powering about 25% of all eCommerce websites online. This all-in-one eCommerce platform provides everything a business needs to create an online store - store customization, unlimited products, inventory management, payment processing, order monitoring, abandoned cart reminders, discount codes, gift cards, etc.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is a hosted, SaaS-based platform that takes care of your online store's technicalities. Shopify also allows businesses to sell products through popular eCommerce marketplaces like Amazon and eBay, social media websites like Instagram and Facebook, and in-person with its point-of-sale feature.<strong> <a href="https://iamtechie.com/service/shopify-development/">Shopify development</a> </strong>is more focused on product selling and provides lesser options for content creation and SEO. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pricing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>Basic Plan - $29 per month: </strong>The plan offers limited eCommerce functionality with unlimited products, gift cards, abandoned cart recovery, and 20 staff accounts. Shopify charges a 2% transaction fee on all basic plans.</li><li><strong>Shopify Plan - $79 per month</strong>: The Shopify plan includes more eCommerce features like international, professional reports, and 5 staff accounts. The transaction fee on this Shopify plan is 1%</li><li><strong>Advanced Plan - $299 per month:</strong> Key features of the advanced plan are automatically calculating shipping rates, advanced reports, up to 8 inventory locations, and 15 staff accounts. Shopify charges a 0.5% transaction fee in this plan.&nbsp;</li><li><strong>Shopify Plus: </strong>The cost of the enterprise-level plan starts from $2000 per month and is suitable for businesses generating $1 million or more in revenue.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros of a Shopify Store:</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Easy to setup and use</li><li>Fast loading time</li><li>1-click selling</li><li>Dropshipping integration</li><li>Social selling and point of sales</li><li>24/7 customer support</li><li>Over 6,000 app integrations&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cons</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Limited customization&nbsp;</li><li>Limited content marketing and SEO options</li><li>High transaction fee</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>2.<strong>WooCommerce</strong>  </h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":17165,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://iamtechie.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/best-woocommerce-plugins.jpg" alt="WooCommerce  " class="wp-image-17165"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>WooCommerce is a WordPress-based open-source eCommerce platform . It is the second most commonly used eCommerce platform, with over 3.5 million websites, accounting for 23% of the market share.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>You can convert your WordPress website into an online store by installing the WooCommerce plugin. WooCommerce provides complete control over the functionality and appearance of your store through customization. In addition, you can add various extensions for marketing, accounting, payment, and shipping to your<strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/service/woocommerce/"> WooCommerce</a></strong> store for better functionality. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition to its own payment processor, WooCommerce provides free extensions that allow you to integrate third-party payment methods such as PayPal, Stripe, Amazon Pay, and more. This eCommerce platform fits perfectly in your existing WordPress backend. You can check sales reports, manage inventory, check orders, and create discount coupons directly from the WordPress dashboard.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pricing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>WooCommerce is open-source software and is completely free to use. However, the extensions you install in your WooCommerce to add additional functionality to your store may require a subscription.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Free to use</li><li>Highly scalable</li><li>SEO friendly</li><li>Various payment gateway extensions are available</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cons</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>You need to buy a domain, hosting, SSL, and WordPress theme separately</li><li>It is necessary that you have familiarity with WordPress.</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>3.<strong>Magento </strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":17166,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://iamtechie.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/magentoblog-1024x556.jpg" alt="Magento " class="wp-image-17166"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Magento is a PHP-based open-source eCommerce platform. Some renowned brands like Samsung, Ford, Coca-Cola, Land Rover, and The Irish Store have eCommerce websites built in Magento.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>This eCommerce platform is available in two variations - Magento Open Source and Magento Commerce (or Adobe Commerce). Magento Open Source is a free version with all the tools and functionalities a small business may require. The functionalities of a free Magento Open Source platform include payment, checkout, mobile eCommerce, global selling catalogs, customer accounts, site search, and SEO.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/magento-development/">Magento</a></strong> Commerce is an enterprise-level eCommerce platform. It includes special features and functionalities like Live chat, product suggestions, WYSIWYG page builder, visual merchandising, customer segmentation, and B2B features like quotations and bespoke catalogs. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pricing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Although Magento Open Source is free to use, you will be required to invest in custom development, maintenance, support, and integrations unless you are familiar with coding and can develop your store. In addition, you will need to contact Adobe's sales team for price estimates for Magento Commerce.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros&nbsp;</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Highly customizable and flexible&nbsp;</li><li>Highly scalable&nbsp;</li><li>SEO friendly</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cons</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>High development cost</li><li>Complexity</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>4.<strong>Wix</strong> </h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":17167,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://iamtechie.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Wix_eCommerce_3-1024x579.jpg" alt="Wix" class="wp-image-17167"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wix is a popular drag-and-drop website builder that allows businesses to add eCommerce functionality to their website. It enables you to build a website using a drag-and-drop feature, and you don't need coding experience to use Wix. In addition, it offers a myriad of options for creating an eCommerce website, such as customizable shopping carts and storefronts, dropshipping, in-person sales, memberships, social selling, and abandoned cart recovery.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wix also allows users to add features like wishlists, quick add to cart button, mini carts, and related product galleries to your eCommerce store. Overall, Wix is a great SaaS platform for creating online stores for beginners, as it is very easy to use.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pricing</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Wix business and eCommerce plans start at $27 per month. It also offers enterprise-level plans but with additional features. You need to contact the Wix sales team to get a customized quote for your brand.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Pros</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Easy to set up&nbsp;</li><li>Highly customizable&nbsp;</li><li>Marketing automation</li><li>Easy integration to third-party apps like Google Tasks, Zapier, Trello, HubSpot, SalesForce, etc.&nbsp;</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Cons</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Doesn't have advanced sales features</li><li>It is difficult to migrate your website to other platforms</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Every business has its own eCommerce requirements depending on its size, product type, and target market. You can choose the best eCommerce platform for your online store according to your needs and preferences.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>While an eCommerce platform will provide you the ability to sell online, not every platform provides you the ability to scale. You should choose a platform that allows you the ability to scale up as your requirements might change when your business grows.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Regardless of the eCommerce platform you choose for your website, you will need the right skills and experience to develop your store. If you are unfamiliar with technologies, and looking for hiring an <strong>eCommerce developer in Dubai </strong>to set up your eCommerce store and start selling, Techies Infotech is your on-stop solution.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Get in touch with the leading <strong>eCommerce development company in Dubai </strong>and we can help you develop an eCommerce store in any of the above-mentioned platforms.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>Frequently Asked Questions</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>1.How many eCommerce platforms are there?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are countless eCommerce platforms available, and over 27 million eCommerce websites on the internet are using these platforms successfully.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>2.Which eCommerce platform is the most used?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>According to BuiltWith, Shopify is the leading eCommerce platform with over 3.8 million websites running worldwide. This accounts for 25% of the total market share.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>3.Which eCommerce platform is best for dropshipping?</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Magento is the best eCommerce platform for dropshipping due to its strong scalability. As a dropshipping business can grow rapidly, you need an eCommerce platform that provides you the ability to scale up quickly as and when required.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Digital Marketing Tips for Small Businesses to Maximise their Online Presence]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/digital-marketing-tips-for-small-businesses-to-maximise-their-online-presence/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 25 Nov 2022 10:08:58 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=17237</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>About 97% of customers search for a business or its products online before making a purchase.&nbsp;</em></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>If your business is not online, you may lose your potential customers to your competitors with a high online presence. No matter what small business you own, digital marketing is the best solution to attract the target audience to your business and retain them. Digital marketing for small businesses can help them find and connect with potential customers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Building a solid digital presence for your business requires time and careful strategies. When done right, it can help build meaningful connections with your audience, improve brand visibility, and generate more sales.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Regardless of the business size, digital marketing is no longer an option but a necessity to stay in the competition and reach your audience. It is the right time to begin if you haven’t started using digital marketing for your business.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here are some tips for small businesses to help you build an effective online presence:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Create a Google Business listing for your business&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Have you ever searched for “____ near me” on Google? If you have, you must have seen a list of business listings related to the search term. Google business listing helps your business appear in these searches.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>86% of people look at the location of a business on Google maps.&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Mobile queries with “near me” and “where to buy” keywords have increased by 200%&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With your customers already looking for businesses similar to yours on Google, your business cannot afford to miss the benefits of Google Business listing. It lets you list your business name, location, products or services, website, contact, and other details. So, when local customers search for a product or service that you offer, your business listing will appear in the search results along with other similar businesses.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Tips to optimize your Google business page:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Create/claim and update your Google Business listing with location, business category, contact details, and timings</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Add a short, compelling business description</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Add quality photos to your listing&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Ask customers to post their reviews and feedback on your business listing and respond to them.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Use the update section of your listing to provide regular updates to your audience.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":2} -->
<ol start="2"><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Use SEO to improve your brand visibility</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>How often have you looked on the second page when searching for something on Google? If you don’t look beyond the first page, how can you expect your customers to find you if your business website is not ranked on the first page?&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Search Engine Optimization (SEO) can help small businesses rank their websites higher in the search engine result pages (SERP) and improve brand visibility. SEO aims to optimize your business website to appear higher on the search results page. Here are a few stats to help you understand the value of SEO for your business website:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>The first result on the organic search result page of Google has an average click-through rate of 27.6%.&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>The #1 result is ten times more likely to get a click than a result on #10</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>The top 3 results on the organic search result page of Google get 54.5% of total clicks.</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Search engines use factors like the use of relevant keywords, website loading speed, ease of navigation, website reputation, and the number of backlinks to your website to decide the rank of your website in the SERPs.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here are some benefits of SEO for your business website:&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Improves visibility</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Builds trust&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Keeps you ahead of the competition</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Helps find new customers</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Improves conversion rate</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>SEO is a complex and long-term process that requires the right skills and expertise to rank your website higher. If you are unfamiliar with SEO strategies, you can hire a reputed <strong>digital marketing company </strong>that can help you optimize your website for search engines and rank it higher in SERPs.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":3} -->
<ol start="3"><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Use email marketing&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Email marketing is an effective digital marketing strategy that involves sending emails to customers and prospects. It is a cost-effective tool for small businesses to attract new customers and stay connected with previous customers. Use email marketing to convert your prospects into customers and one-time customers into loyal customers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>64% of small businesses use email marketing as an important part of their marketing strategy.</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Email marketing offers the best ROI of 3600%.&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Personalizing your email campaigns provides a one-on-one experience for the customers and improves the email opening rate. Furthermore, personalization can increase revenue by up to 760% as businesses will be sharing more relevant and customized content with each customer.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>“Email marketing is paramount to the retention of your customer base. There’s much more room for personalization and customization in an email, as you’re communicating directly with your own customers.”&nbsp;</em></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ryan Masten, founder Earn2Trade</em></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Create a strong email marketing strategy that aims to improve customer retention and build brand loyalty. Start by creating a powerful email list and segment it according to customers’ behavior and where they are in your sales funnel.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":4} -->
<ol start="4"><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Build a strong presence on social media&nbsp;</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are many social media channels, and a business should only choose those related to the industry and the target audience. Social media is an important part of the marketing strategy of most businesses. <strong>Over 88% of businesses invest in social media.&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When used effectively, social media is the best way for a small business to create brand awareness and improve customer acquisition. Moreover, social media can also be used to share news and updates with the audience and engage with them. It can also strengthen the customer base of a business and increase customer retention rates.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>&nbsp;Here are a few tips to help small businesses optimize their social media pages:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Create your business pages/accounts on social media platforms where the majority of the audience is already present and engaging with businesses similar to yours</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Update your profile with precise details like the product/services you deal in, your business website, contact information, and other details.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Post regularly on these platforms.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Engage with your audience actively.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>As a small business, you might not have the necessary skills and resources to create a strong social media presence. Moreover, with a reduced attention span and an increasing number of social media platforms, it is becoming even harder for businesses to reach their audience.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Hence, to stay ahead of the competition, small businesses should consider hiring a professional <strong><a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/digital-marketing-solution/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">digital marketing agency</a> </strong>to manage all social media accounts. A professional social media agency can help you develop a strong social media strategy for your business.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true,"start":5} -->
<ol start="5"><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Use Pay per click advertising</strong></li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Pay-per-click (PPC) is an online advertising strategy in which advertisers pay every time someone clicks on an ad. <strong>Small businesses can advertise on Google, Facebook, Instagram, Bing, and other platforms to reach their target audience.</strong> Each platform has its own pros and cons, so choose the platform that best fits your business needs.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>When advertising on these platforms, be specific about your target demographics. For better reach and results from your PPC ads, include additional details like the age, behavior, and interests of your target customers.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><em>How to optimize your PPC advertising</em></strong>:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Create a compelling call-to-action ad campaign</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Your ad should target the areas where you serve.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Add more details to your targeting to reach only your potential customers.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Evaluate your ad results and customize the ad to improve the reachability and conversion rate.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>You can start low and increase your budget as you get better ad campaign results.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>An effective digital marketing strategy allows small businesses to reach the audience, build brand awareness, and boost conversions. Small businesses require digital marketing to stay in the competition.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A digital marketing strategy is not a one-size-fits-all solution. Businesses can experiment with different things to check what works best for their business. The above-mentioned tips are the pillars of any effective digital marketing strategy and form a strong digital marketing strategy foundation for your business.&nbsp;Have any questions related to digital marketing for your business or want to hire a <strong>digital marketing agency in UAE</strong>? Reach out to Techies Infotech, and we will be happy to help.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Top Web Development Tools For Front-End Developers]]></title>
		<link>https://iamtechie.com/top-web-development-tools-front-end-developers/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 30 Dec 2022 07:04:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[admins]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://iamtechie.com/?p=18002</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>A creative and well-optimized UI can boost a website's conversion rate by 200%, and an interactive UX can increase the conversion rates by 400%.&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With numbers like these, the importance of a good user experience for a website cannot be ignored. As businesses are becoming more aware of the UI and UX of their websites to provide a better experience to their visitors, the demand for SEO-friendly, interactive and responsive websites is also growing.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With so much to consider while developing a website, managing everything with coding can be challenging. Fortunately, many front-end web development tools are there to ease the development process. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>What are front-end web development tools?</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>A web development tool is a software application that helps build attractive website layouts and allows you to debug and test the interface of the website and application.   Using these tools will accelerate the development process through drag-and-drop and numerous other features to create interactive and compelling web designs. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>From plugins and add-ons to processors and frameworks, front-end <a href="https://iamtechie.com/services/web-development/">web development tools</a> can help streamline the code and make the development easier. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>There are several front-end development tools for various requirements, such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Deployment, code-editing, security, wireframing and prototyping, and more.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With the number of dev tools increasing almost daily, finding the best ones to get the work done smoothly may feel challenging.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Here is the list of top web development tools<strong> </strong>that make developing the front end of the website easier and faster. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://atom.io/">Atom</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Atom is a community-built, open-source text and source code editor tool. It is compatible with macOS, Linux, and Windows and offers high levels of customization options. The tool is developed by GitHub using HTML, JavaScript, Less, and CoffeeScript languages.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Atom is the best text editor tool that offers seamless collaborations when working with a team. Additionally, this dev tool allows you to install open-source packages and add additional features through JavaScript and HTML to improve its functionality. Atom is compatible with popular programming languages, including C, C#, C++, Python, R, HTML, CSS, Java, and more.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Collaborative editing</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Syntax highlighting&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Multiple programming language support</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Cross-platform support</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Code folding to show and hide logical sections of the code</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://developer.chrome.com/docs/devtools/">Chrome DevTools </a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chrome DevTools is a set of debugging tools that are built into the Google Chrome web browser. It allows you to edit the HTML and CSS codes and debug the JavaScript code in real-time. Available in both Apple Safari and Google Chrome, Chrome DevTools allow users to view and change the DOM and page styling, diagnose problems, optimize the page speed, and edit pages in real time.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Chrome DevTools also offers additional features, such as&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Timeline </strong>to identify run-time performance problems</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Device Mode </strong>to test the responsiveness of a website</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Element Tab </strong>to debug HTML and CSS codes</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Performance </strong>to optimize the website's loading speed&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Network Panel </strong>to view and debug the network activity</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Sources Panel</strong> to debug JavaScript&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li><strong>Security</strong> to identify security concerns on the website</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It allows users to view and modify CSS and DOM</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The local override feature allows to save changes made to a webpage on a local computer and override the data automatically.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Using the lighthouse tool, you can perform web page audits to test the performance, accessibility, SEO, and page speed.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It has various functionalities for device mode, application panel, network panel, console panel, elements panel, memory panel, security panel, and sources panel.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://jquery.com/">JQuery</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>JQuery is a cross-platform JavaScript library that allows you to handle various functionalities, including CSS manipulation, event handling, DOM manipulation and transversing, animation, Ajax and JSON support, and more. It can also be used with other libraries and plugins to add additional features.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>JQuery is used by 77.2% of websites and is preferred by 48.7% of web developers.&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>JQuery is the most popular front-end web development tool because of its ease of creating animations and navigating documents. With better documentation, powerful chaining capabilities, and a huge development community, JQuery is a great web dev tool for front-end development.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features:</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>This JavaScript library is very lightweight. The size of the minified and gzipped file is only 30KB.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The tool makes it easy to select DOM elements, modify their content and transverse them.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It provides an easy-to-use API for Ajax, animation, and document navigation.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>JQuery is compatible with a wide range of modern browsers like Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge, IE, etc.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://codepen.io/">CodePen</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>CodePen is a collaborative development environment for front-end developers and designers. This online code editor tool allows editing HTML, JavaScript, and CSS codes.CodePen allows users to add other front-end libraries and frameworks.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>In addition, the tool offers various functionalities to develop and share the front end of the website. It also offers all the features and functionalities of an Integrated Development Environment in a web browser so that you can develop the entire website in a web browser.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>CodePen is a very adaptable and customizable code editor tool with features like Emmet and autocomplete.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It allows users to drag and drop CSS, images, animations, JSON files, SVGs, media files, and more.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The collaboration mode allows multiple people to edit the code at the same time.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>CodePen lets you keep pens private.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://git-scm.com/">Git</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Imagine working on a new feature in a project, and something goes wrong. A version control system like Git can rescue you in such situations. The tool allows to manage the source code, track changes made in the code, and conveniently roll back to the previous state. Written in C, Perl, Shell, and Tcl, it is an open-source tool that provides unmatched efficiency and support. The tool saves every change made in the project and allows everyone on the team to work on the same code without any code conflict.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Git is 10 times faster than other version control systems&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It makes collaboration easier by including several methods to resolve conflicts arising from multiple users working on the same file.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It is compatible with almost every operating system used these days.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>A distributed system holds its central repository allowing remote collaborators to access it anytime, anywhere.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/">NPM</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Node Package Manager or NPM is a JavaScript software registry to share and deploy local and global packages. The tool lets you install language-specific packages on your website on demand. NPM simplifies the development process as you don’t have to write new codes to add new functionality to the website.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>NPM also provides advanced features like security auditing, de-duplicated development, team management, and access control for seamless usage. The tool is available in three versions - NPM open source, NPM Orgs, and NPM Enterprise.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>More than 470,000 free code packages are available in the NPM registry.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>It is a registry for open-source projects, allowing sharing of the source code with other NPM users.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>The team plan allows NPM users to integrate workflows and control permissions within the team.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><a href="https://gruntjs.com/">Grunt</a></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>It is one of the best front-end development tools for automating mundane and repetitive tasks. It is a JavaScript task-runner tool that performs various frequent tasks like linting, minification, unit testing, and compilation. The tool comes with several pre-installed plugins for common tasks and is easily expandable.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Users can also write various activities relevant to their project requirements. Grunt can also be used to implement coding style guides throughout the project to ensure consistency.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Key Features</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>With the Grunt tool, you can automate most of the monotonous tasks with minimal effort.</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>There are over 5,000 plugins available&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Users can also publish their Grunt codes on NPM&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item -->

<!-- wp:list-item -->
<li>Users can create and modify custom tasks according to the project requirements.&nbsp;</li>
<!-- /wp:list-item --></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><strong>Conclusion</strong></h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>With a wide range of tools available to add various functionalities to a website, it is clear that front-end web development is not just limited to HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. You need to get familiar with various web dev tools to develop a responsive, user-friendly website.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Every successful business requires a website with a clean, attractive, and SEO-friendly front end that attracts customers. Developing such a website requires deep knowledge of various web development tools and technologies.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Get in touch with Techies Infotech, the <a href="https://iamtechie.ae/dubai/web-development/">best web development company</a><strong>, </strong>to develop a responsive website with interactive UX design. </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>Frequently Asked Questions</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Which language is most commonly used for front-end development?</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>HTML is the most commonly used language for front-end development. The language is used to develop websites and web applications. Some other popular front-end development languages are CSS, JavaScript, React, and Angular.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Is JavaScript used for developing the front-end or back-end?</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>JavaScript is used for both front-end and back-end development. It is a very easy-to-use programming language used for developing attractive websites and web applications.&nbsp;</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>Which is the best tool for back-end development?</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Just like front-end development, various tools are used for back-end development to add features and functionalities to the website. Some popular back-end development tools are Back4App, GitHub, GitLab, Apache, Visual Studio, Django, MongoDB, Laravel, and MySQL.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
